name: 罗兰·班克斯
text:
[reaction]在你击败一名敌人后：发现所在地点的一个线索。(每轮限制1次)
[elder_sign]效果：你所在地点每个线索，+1。
real_text:
[reaction] After you defeat an enemy: Discover 1 clue at your location. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1 for each clue on your location.
flavor: 所有的书在我眼中跟儿歌无异。它们过去可能有用，但现在，需要一种全新的解释了。
back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：守卫者([guardian])等级0-5，探求者([seeker])等级0-2，中立卡牌等级0-5。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：罗兰的.38特製手枪、掩盖罪证、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 罗兰总能在规则和命令中找到一种安全感。作为联邦探员之一，他在遇上任何状况的时候总能找到应对的办法。但对于近来他碰到的事件来说，他的联邦探员手册完全没帮上忙，尤其是在面对那些奇怪生物、时空之门、魔法咒文之时。如果不是亲眼所见，他永远不会相信这些奇闻……他确信，自己的上司只会把这些事情当做是都市怪谈。这次，他要完全靠自己来行动了。

name: 温蒂·亚当斯
text:
[reaction]在你抽取混乱标记时，选择你的一张手牌丢弃：取消该混乱标记并放回袋中，然后抽取一个新的混乱标记。(每次检定/技能限制1次。)
[elder_sign]效果：+0。如果温蒂的护身符在场，改为你自动成功。
real_text:
[reaction] When you reveal a chaos token, choose and discard 1 card from your hand: Cancel that chaos token and return it to the bag. Reveal a new chaos token. (Limit once per test/ability.)
[elder_sign] effect: +0. If Wendy's Amulet is in play, you automatically succeed instead.
back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：求生者([survivor])等级0-5，流浪者([rogue])等级0-2，中立卡牌等级0-5。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：温蒂的护身符、被抛弃的孤单、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 温蒂的妈妈在她还小的时候，就让她玩一个护身符。妈妈给她讲故事的时候，温蒂会举起这闪闪发光的项炼，仔细端详。之后爸爸在海上失踪，妈妈也变得行为古怪：她开始在房子内用粉笔涂写奥术符号。最终，人们将妈妈送入了精神病院。在妈妈离开前，她把项炼交给了温蒂，并说道"保护好她"。温蒂在孤儿院里待了几年就逃走了。她决定要靠自己的力量来保护自己。

name: "倒霉蛋"奥图尔
text:
[free]在你回合期间，花费2资源：你本回合可以额外进行1个行动。(每回合限制1次。)
[elder_sign]效果：+2。如果成功，获得2个资源。
real_text:
[free] During your turn, spend 2 resources: You may take an additional action this turn. (Limit once per turn.)
[elder_sign] effect: +2. If you succeed, gain 2 resources.
flavor: "我从那破地方逃出来，可不是为了看世界末日。"
back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：流浪者([rogue])等级0-5，守卫者([guardian])等级0-2，中立卡牌等级0-5。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：在逃中、医院债务、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 奥图尔一开始就没打算做一辈子的罪犯，他有时也会亲力亲为去做些正确的事情。奥图尔需要一笔钱给他的母亲做手术才犯事，而警察们对此毫不关心。就在他被判决的第二年，他的母亲因病去世。他的狱友布拉德·霍林告诉他，世界上还有比死亡更糟糕的命运。每晚他都无声地嘶喊着"旧日支配者"什么的，他还将梦中的怪异历险告诉奥图尔。奥图尔并未将这放在心上，直到一天夜里他醒来时看到他的狱友浑身着火。当奥图尔被释放时，他决定回到阿卡姆，寻找答案。

name: 米兰·克里斯托弗博士
text:
你获得+1[intellect]。
[reaction]在你成功调查后：获得1个资源。
real_text:
You get +1 [intellect].
[reaction] After you successfully investigate: Gain 1 resource.
traits: 盟友. 米斯卡塔尼克
flavor: "如果这破地方怪物没那么多该有多好！不过这样一来，就能得到新品种生物的标本了吧。"

name: 野猫
text: [free] 丢弃野猫：自动躲避你所在地点的一名非[[精英]]敌人。
real_text: [free] Discard Stray Cat: Automatically evade a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location.
flavor: 它从不会不请自来，也许它也有几个自己的小秘密。

name: 失忆
text: 显现 - 选择一张手牌保留，将其余手牌丢弃。
real_text: Revelation - Choose and discard all but 1 card from your hand.
flavor: 等等……我是谁？我在哪儿？

name: 温蒂的护身符
text: 温蒂·亚当斯牌组专用。 你可以将你弃牌堆顶部的一张事件卡视为是你的手牌打出。 强制 - 在你打出一张事件或从场上丢弃一张事件卡后：改为将其放置在你牌堆底部，而不是弃牌堆中。(Erratum v1.9)
real_text: Wendy Adams deck only. You may play the topmost event in your discard pile as if it were in your hand. Forced - After you play an event or discard an event from play: Place it on the bottom of your deck instead of in your discard pile.

name: 罗兰的.38特製手枪
text: 罗兰·班克斯牌组专用。 使用(4子弹)。 [action]花费1子弹：攻击。这次攻击期间你+1[combat](如果所在地点有至少1个线索，改为+3[combat])。这次攻击造成+1伤害。
real_text: Roland Banks deck only. Uses (4 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack (if there are 1 or more clues on your location, you get +3 [combat], instead). This attack deals +1 damage.
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械

name: 闪躲
text:
快速。在一名敌人攻击你所在地点的一位调查员时打出。
取消那次攻击。
real_text:
Fast. Play when an enemy attacks an investigator at your location.
Cancel that attack.

name: 运气好！
text:
快速。在你的技能检定将要失败时打出。
该次检定你的技能值+2。
real_text:
Fast. Play when you would fail a skill test.
Get +2 to your skill value for that test.

name: 眩光一闪
text: 躲避。这次躲避尝试不使用[agility]，改为使用[willpower]。如果成功，对躲避的敌人造成1点伤害。如果躲避尝试期间抽出[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]、[elder_thing]或[auto_fail]符号，本回合失去1个行动。
real_text: Evade. This evasion attempt uses [willpower] instead of [agility]. If you succeed, deal 1 damage to the enemy just evaded. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this evasion attempt, lose 1 action this turn.

name: 深挖
text:
[free]花费1资源：这次技能检定期间你+1[willpower]。
[free]花费1资源：这次技能检定期间你+1[agility]。
real_text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.

name: 胆识
text:
每次技能检定最多投入1张。
如果这次检定成功，抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test is successful, draw 1 card.
flavor: 退后！我会搞定的。

name: 手电筒
text: 使用(3补给)。 [action]花费1补给：调查。这次调查期间，你所在地点隐藏值-2。
real_text: Uses (3 supplies). [action] Spend 1 supply: Investigate. Your location gets -2 shroud for this investigation.

name: 放大镜
text:
快速。
你在调查时获得+1[intellect]。
real_text:
Fast.
You get +1 [intellect] while investigating.
flavor: 清清楚楚的世界，有时候不一定是你想看到的。

name: .45自动手枪
text: 使用(4子弹)。 [action]花费1子弹：攻击。这次攻击期间你+1[combat]。这次攻击造成+1伤害。
real_text: Uses (4 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage.
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械

name: 掩盖罪证
text: 显现 - 将掩盖罪证放置入你的威胁区域，并在卡上放置3个线索。 [reaction]在你将要从所在地点发现至少1个线索时：改为从掩盖罪证上丢弃同等数量的线索。 强制 - 在游戏结束时，如果掩盖罪证上仍然有线索：你受到1点精神创伤。
real_text: Revelation - Put Cover Up into play in your threat area, with 3 clues on it. [reaction] When you would discover 1 or more clues at your location: Discard that many clues from Cover Up instead. Forced - When the game ends, if there are any clues on Cover Up: You suffer 1 mental trauma.

name: 被抛弃的孤单
text: 显现 - 受到2点直接恐惧，并将你弃牌堆中所有卡牌移出游戏。
real_text: Revelation - Take 2 direct horror and remove all cards in your discard pile from the game.
flavor: 我才不需要他们。我不需要任何人。

name: 妄想症
text: 显现 - 丢弃你所有资源。
real_text: Revelation - Discard all your resources.
flavor: 那是什么声音？

name: 刀子
text: [action]：攻击。这次攻击期间你+1[combat]。 [action]丢弃刀子：攻击。这次攻击期间你+2[combat]。这次攻击造成+1伤害。
real_text: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. [action] Discard Knife: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage.
traits: 道具. 武器. 近战

name: 证据！
text:
快速。在你击败一名敌人后打出。
发现你所在地点的1个线索。
real_text:
Fast. Play after you defeat an enemy.
Discover 1 clue at your location.
flavor: 跟我想的一样！

name: 看门狗
text: [reaction]在一名敌人攻击并对看门狗造成伤害时：对攻击敌人造成1点伤害。
real_text: [reaction] When an enemy attack deals damage to Guard Dog: Deal 1 damage to the attacking enemy.
flavor: 极度忠诚的小狗，冒险好伴侣。

name: 心灵手巧
text:
每次技能检定最多投入1张。
如果这次检定成功，抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test is successful, draw 1 card.
flavor: 易如反掌。

name: 应急物品
text: 获得3个资源。
real_text: Gain 3 resources.
flavor: 俗话说多多益善。

name: 炸药爆破
text: 选择你的地点或一个连接的地点。对所选地点的每名敌人和调查员各造成3点伤害。
real_text: Choose either your location or a connecting location. Deal 3 damage to each enemy and to each investigator at the chosen location.

name: 压制
text:
每次技能检定最多投入1张。
如果这次检定成功，抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test is successful, draw 1 card.
flavor: 去死吧，你这个怪物！

name: 运气好！
text:
快速。在你的技能检定将要失败时打出。
该次检定你的技能值+2。抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
Fast. Play when you would fail a skill test.
Get +2 to your skill value for that test. Draw 1 card.

name: 眩光一闪
text: 躲避。这次躲避尝试不使用[agility]，改为使用[willpower]。如果成功，对躲避的敌人造成2点伤害。如果躲避尝试期间抽出[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]、[elder_thing]或[auto_fail]符号，本回合失去1个行动，并受到1点恐惧。
real_text: Evade. This evasion attempt uses [willpower] instead of [agility]. If you succeed, deal 2 damage to the enemy just evaded. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this evasion attempt, lose 1 action this turn and take 1 horror.

name: "看看我发现了什么！"
text:
快速。在你调查失败，并且低于难度2点及以内后打出。
发现你所在地点的2个线索。
real_text:
Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 2 or less while investigating.
Discover 2 clues in your location.

name: 体能训练
text:
[free]花费1资源：这次技能检定期间你+1[willpower]。
[free]花费1资源：这次技能检定期间你+1[combat]。
real_text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [combat] for this skill test.

name: 球棒
text: [action]：攻击。这次攻击期间你+2[combat]。这次攻击造成+1伤害。如果攻击期间抽出[skull]或[auto_fail]标记，在结算攻击后，丢弃球棒。
real_text: [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage. If a [skull] or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this attack, discard Baseball Bat after the attack resolves.
traits: 道具. 武器. 近战

name: 幸运兔脚
text: [reaction]在你技能检定失败后，消耗幸运兔脚：抽取1张卡牌。
real_text: [reaction] After you fail a skill test, exhaust Rabbit's Foot: Draw 1 card.
flavor: 他们都说这不会带来任何好运。我倒是觉得宁信其有，不信其无。

name: 黛西·沃克
text:
你回合期间，你可以进行额外一个行动，这个行动只能用于启动[[书籍]]的[action]能力。
[elder_sign]效果：+0。如果成功，你每控制一本[[书籍]]，抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
You may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used on [[Tome]] [action] abilities.
[elder_sign] effect: +0. If you succeed, draw 1 card for each [[Tome]] you control.
flavor: "我知道书本的力量，它们可以改写现实。"
back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：探求者([seeker])等级0-5，潜修者([mystic])等级0-2，中立卡牌等级0-5。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：黛西的手提包、死灵之书(约翰·迪伊译本)、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 作为米斯卡塔尼克大学中一位受人尊敬的图书馆员，黛西一直把书当作人生最重要的一部分。她在书里寻找着现实中不存在的恐惧与刺激感。直到有一天，她找到约翰·迪伊翻译的《死灵之书》。书中充满了各种邪恶和亵渎的内容。她试图用社会学的相关知识来解析这本书，渐渐地，她意识到书中的内容可能比现实更为真实。她决定踏入奥恩图书馆的深处，探索那些被深藏的禁书……

name: 死灵之书
text: 显现 - 将死灵之书放置入你的威胁区域，并在卡片上放置3个恐惧。该卡如果有至少1个恐惧，则不能离场。 将你抽出的[elder_sign]混乱标记视为[auto_fail]。 [action]：将死灵之书的一个恐惧移动到戴西·沃克上。然后，如果死灵之书没有恐惧，则将其丢弃。
real_text: Revelation - Put The Necronomicon into play in your threat area, with 3 horror on it. It cannot leave play while it has 1 or more horror on it. Treat each [elder_sign] you reveal on a chaos token as a [auto_fail]. [action]: Move 1 horror from The Necronomicon to Daisy Walker. Then, if The Necronomicon has no horror on it, discard it.

name: 圣玫瑰珠
text: 你获得+1[willpower]。
real_text: You get +1 [willpower].
flavor: 不论是小物件还是神器，蕴含的信仰之力都是平等的。

name: 背刺
text: 攻击。这次攻击不使用[combat]，改为使用[agility]。这次攻击造成+2伤害。
real_text: Fight. This attack uses [agility] instead of [combat]. This attack deals +2 damage.

name: 大砍刀
text: [action]：攻击。这次攻击期间你+1[combat]。如果被攻击敌人是与你交战的唯一一名敌人，则这次攻击造成+1伤害。
real_text: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. If the attacked enemy is the only enemy engaged with you, this attack deals +1 damage.
traits: 道具. 武器. 近战
flavor: 快速切开藤蔓、树丛、触手，省时省力。

name: 调虎离山
text: 躲避。自动躲避你所在地点的所有敌人。
real_text: Evade. Automatically evade all enemies at your location.
flavor: 这能为我们争取点时间。

name: 绝处逢生
text: 每次技能检定最多投入1张。
real_text: Max 1 committed per skill test.
flavor: 有时候，最危险的情况反而能激发人的奉献精神。

name: 艾格尼丝·贝克
text:
[reaction]在至少1点恐惧被放到艾格尼丝·贝克上后：对你所在地点一名敌人造成1点伤害。(每阶段限制1次。)
[elder_sign]效果：艾格尼丝·贝克上每有一点恐惧，+1。
real_text:
[reaction] After 1 or more horror is placed on Agnes Baker: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location. (Limit once per phase.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1 for each horror on Agnes Baker.
flavor: "我能记得我的前世，充满了巫术和征服的人生。"
back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：潜修者([mystic])等级0-5，求生者([survivor])等级0-2，中立卡牌等级0-5。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：希波利尔传家宝、黑暗回忆、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 艾格尼丝·贝克或许只是个默默无名的侍应，但是在前世，在那个超乎现世想像的惊奇时代，她是一个无比强力的女巫。这一切都要从一把钥匙说起，她在自己的小阁楼里，家传的一个首饰盒中找到了它。当她拿起钥匙，记忆突然如同洪水般涌入，伴随着一个词："希波利尔"。他越是沈浸在前世的画面与记忆之中，他就感到法力越发强悍……但是恐惧也愈发地强烈。

name: 希波利尔传家宝
text:
艾格尼丝·贝克牌组专用。
[reaction]在你打出一张[[法术]]卡后：抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
Agnes Baker deck only.
[reaction] After you play a [[Spell]] card: Draw 1 card.
flavor: 金属表面的花纹每天都在变化着，我不看着它时，它彷佛就在偷偷地发生改变。

name: 超感知
text:
[free]花费1资源：这次技能检定期间你+1[intellect]。
[free]花费1资源：这次技能检定期间你+1[agility]。
real_text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [intellect] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.

name: 屏障
text: 迭加到你所在地点。 非[[精英]]敌人不能移动到迭加地点。 强制 - 在一位调查员离开迭加地点时：丢弃屏障。
real_text: Attach to your location. Non-[[Elite]] enemies cannot move into attached location. Forced - When an investigator leaves attached location: Discard Barricade.

name: 百科全书
text: [action]消耗百科全书：选择你所在地点的一位调查员。直到本阶段结束，该调查员的一项你指定的技能+2。
real_text: [action] Exhaust Encyclopedia: Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator gets +2 to a skill of your choice until the end of the phase.
flavor: 我本来以为能理解一切，但我越是深入阅读，就发现我对这宇宙一无所知。

name: 弹簧刀
text: 快速。 [action]：攻击。如果你成功且超过难度至少2点，该次攻击造成+1伤害。
real_text: Fast. [action]: Fight. If you succeed by 2 or more, this attack deals +1 damage.
traits: 道具. 武器. 近战. 违法

name: 扒窃
text: [reaction]在你躲避一名敌人后，消耗扒窃：抽取1张卡牌。
real_text: [reaction] After you evade an enemy, exhaust Pickpocketing: Draw 1 card.

name: 里奥·德·卢卡
text: 在你回合期间，你可以额外进行1个行动。
real_text: You may take an additional action during your turn.
flavor: "我生在密西西比。不过路易斯安那听起来更好。"

name: 皮大衣
flavor: 皮大衣可能并不是很时尚，但是温暖又抗寒，而且很可靠。

name: 求生本能
text: 如果躲避尝试期间这次技能检定成功，躲避的调查员可以立即和每个与其交战的其他敌人解除交战，并可以移动到一个连接地点。
real_text: If this skill test is successful during an evasion attempt, the evading investigator may immediately disengage from each other enemy engaged with him or her, and may move to a connecting location.

name: 洞察力
text:
每次技能检定最多投入1张。
如果这次检定成功，抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test is successful, draw 1 card.
flavor: 总算找到了！

name: 忧郁症
text: 显现 - 将忧郁症放到你的威胁区域。 强制 - 在你受到至少1点伤害后：受到1点直接恐惧。 [action][action]：丢弃忧郁症。
real_text: Revelation - Add Hypochondria to your threat area. Forced - After you take 1 or more damage: Take 1 direct horror. [action] [action]: Discard Hypochondria.

name: 巡警
text:
你获得+1[combat]。
[free]丢弃巡警：对你所在地点的一名敌人造成1点伤害。
real_text:
You get +1 [combat].
[free] Discard Beat Cop: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.

name: 急救
text:
使用(3补给)。如果急救没有补给，则将其丢弃。
[action]花费1补给：对你所在地点的一位调查员，治癒1点伤害或恐惧。
real_text:
Uses (3 supplies). If First Aid has no supplies, discard it.
[action] Spend 1 supply: Heal 1 damage or horror from an investigator at your location.

name: 致命打击
text: 如果攻击期间的这次技能检定成功，则该次攻击造成+1伤害。
real_text: If this skill test is successful during an attack, that attack deals +1 damage.
flavor: 大斧砸在肉上，发出令人作呕的响声，他停不住地反覆打击着那个怪物，直到它再也无法动弹为止。

name: 智慧古书
text: [action]消耗智慧古书：选择你所在地点的一位调查员。那位调查员在其牌堆顶部3张卡牌中查找并抽取1张卡牌，并将剩余卡牌与其牌堆混洗。
real_text: [action] Exhaust Old Book of Lore: Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator searches the top 3 cards of his or her deck for a card, draws it, and shuffles the remaining cards into his or her deck.

name: 研究馆员
text: [reaction]在研究馆员入场后：查找你牌堆中的一张[[书籍]]支援卡，并加入你的手牌。混洗你的牌堆。
real_text: [reaction] After Research Librarian enters play: Search your deck for a [[Tome]] asset and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
traits: 盟友. 米斯卡塔尼克
flavor: "阿米蒂奇的身体状况越来越差，前几年还发生了不少奇怪的事情，我们应该都清楚，奥恩图书馆里肯定有什么不可告人的秘密。"

name: 医学教科书
text: [action]：选择你所在地点的一位调查员并检定[intellect](2)。如果成功，治癒该调查员1点伤害。如果失败，对该调查员造成1点伤害。
real_text: [action] Choose an investigator at your location and test [intellect] (2). If you succeed, heal 1 damage from that investigator. If you fail, deal 1 damage to that investigator.

name: 心胜于物
text:
快速。只能在你回合期间打出。
直到本轮结束，你可以使用[intellect]来代替[combat]和[agility]。
real_text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Until the end of the round, you may use your [intellect] in place of your [combat] and [agility].

name: 专业的直觉
text:
快速。只能在你回合期间打出。
发现你所在地点的1个线索。
real_text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Discover 1 clue at your location.

name: 推理
text: 如果调查一个地点时本技能检定成功，额外发现该地点的1个线索。
real_text: If this skill test is successful while investigating a location, discover 1 additional clue at that location.
flavor: 我就知道我看过这个符号。我现在通知其他人还为时不晚！

name: 夜盗
text: [action]消耗夜盗：调查。如果成功，不发现线索，改为获得3个资源。
real_text: [action] Exhaust Burglary: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering clues, gain 3 resources.

name: .41短口手枪
text: 使用(3子弹)。 [action]花费1子弹：攻击。这次攻击期间你+2[combat]。如果你成功且超过难度至少2点，这次攻击造成+1伤害。
real_text: Uses (3 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. If you succeed by 2 or more, this attack deals +1 damage.
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械. 违法

name: 沉重打击
text:
[free]花费1资源：这次技能检定期间你+1[combat]。
[free]花费1资源：这次技能检定期间你+1[agility]。
real_text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [combat] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.

name: 逃避隐藏
text:
快速。只能在你回合期间打出。
所有与你交战的敌人解除交战状态，你移动到一个没有敌人的已揭示地点。
real_text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Disengage from each enemy engaged with you and move to a revealed location with no enemies.

name: 偷袭
text: 对你所在地点的一名消耗敌人造成2点伤害。
real_text: Deal 2 damage to an exhausted enemy at your location.

name: 机会主义者
text:
只能在你执行的技能检定中投入。
如果你成功且超过难度至少3点，在检定后不丢弃机会主义者，改为将其返回你的手牌。
real_text:
Commit only to a skill test you are performing.
If you succeed by 3 or more, return Opportunist to your hand after this test instead of discarding it.

name: 拾荒
text: [reaction]在你成功调查，并超过难度至少2点后，消耗拾荒：选择你弃牌堆中一张[[道具]]卡，并加入你的手牌。
real_text: [reaction] After you successfully investigate by 2 or more, exhaust Scavenging: Choose an [[Item]] card in your discard pile and add it to your hand.

name: 恶灵附身
text: 显现 - 将恶灵附身放到你的威胁区域。 你的所有技能-1。 [action][action]：丢弃恶灵附身。
real_text: Revelation - Add Haunted to your threat area. You get -1 to each of your skills. [action] [action]: Discard Haunted.

name: 医院债务
text: 显现 - 将医院债务放置入你的威胁区域。 [free]：将你资源池一个资源移动到医院债务上。(每轮限制2次。) 强制 - 在游戏结束时，如果医院债务上资源数量少于6个：你这次冒险少获得2点经验。
real_text: Revelation - Put Hospital Debts into play in your threat area. [free]: Move 1 resource from your resource pool to Hospital Debts. (Limit twice per round.) Forced - When the game ends, if Hospital Debts has fewer than 6 resources on it: You earn 2 fewer experience for this scenario.

name: 多余的弹药
text: 在你所在地点的一位调查员的一张[[枪械]]支援卡上，放置3个子弹标记。
real_text: Place 3 ammo tokens on a [[Firearm]] asset controlled by an investigator at your location.
flavor: 能扛过我子弹的怪物，我还从来没见过哩。

name: 霰弹枪
text: 使用(2子弹)。 [action]花费1子弹：攻击。这次攻击期间你+3[combat]。攻击成功时使用下列方式代替普通伤害结算，你每超过难度1点，对敌人造成1点伤害(最小为1，最大为5)。攻击失败并要对另一位调查员造成伤害时使用下列方式代替普通伤害结算，你每低于难度1点，对另一位调查员造成1点伤害(最小为1，最大为5)。
real_text: Uses (2 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +3 [combat] for this attack. Instead of its standard damage, this attack deals 1 damage for each point you succeed by (to a minimum of 1, to a maximum of 5). If you fail and would damage another investigator, this attack deals 1 damage for each point you fail by (to a minimum of 1, to a maximum of 5).
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械

name: 放大镜
text:
快速。
你在调查时获得+1[intellect]。
[free]如果你所在地点没有线索：将放大镜返回你的手牌。
real_text:
Fast.
You get +1 [intellect] while investigating.
[free] If there are no clues on your location: Return Magnifying Glass to your hand.
flavor: 清清楚楚的世界，有时候不一定是你想看到的。

name: 佐伊·萨马拉斯
text:
[reaction]在你与一名敌人交战后：获得1个资源。
[elder_sign]效果：+1。如果攻击中的这次技能检定成功，这次攻击造成+1伤害。
real_text:
[reaction] After you become engaged with an enemy: Gain 1 resource.
[elder_sign] effect: +1. If this skill test is successful during an attack, that attack deals +1 damage.

deck_options.error: You cannot have more than 5 cards that are not Guardian or Neutral

flavor: "神已经发话，我要做的就是执行祂的指令。"
back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：守卫者([guardian])等级0-5，中立卡牌等级0-5，最多5张其它职阶([seeker]、[rogue]、[mystic]和/或[survivor])的其他等级0卡牌。(FAQ, v1.5) 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：佐伊的十字架、击退邪恶、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 六岁时有一晚，佐伊听到上帝对她说话，从此她觉得自己是世上独一无二的。可惜那一天，大火永久带走了她的父母。上帝告诉她，在世上所有人中，独有她一人可成为上帝的代理。她必须保护弱者，严惩恶徒。无论何时，只要她有困难，上帝将永远伴着她，给她安慰。现在，佐伊往返于不同城市之间，做着大厨的工作。但在不工作时，她会在深夜的街道行走，受主之命，给予那些恶人无尽的惩罚。

name: 吉姆·卡尔弗
text:
将你抽出的[skull]标记的修正值视为0。
每次你抽出[elder_sign]标记时，你可以选择将其视为[skull]标记。
[elder_sign]效果：+1。
real_text:
Treat the modifier on [skull] tokens you reveal as "0."
Anytime you reveal a [elder_sign] token, you may choose to instead treat it as a [skull] token.
[elder_sign] effect: +1.

deck_options.error: You cannot have more than 5 cards that are not Mystic or Neutral

flavor: "不，完全不是的。就算是死亡，我也能用音乐来为其注入活力"
back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：潜修者([mystic])等级0-5，中立卡牌等级0-5，最多5张其它职阶([guardian]、[seeker]、[rogue]和/或[survivor])的其他等级0卡牌。(FAQ, v1.5) 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：吉姆的小号、最后的狂想曲、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 自从吉姆拿起爸爸的小号开始，爵士乐就只会带来麻烦。小号的管口写着一些奇怪的文字，但是吹出的音色却沉重而流畅，如同咖啡一般。这把小号曾经也给吉姆带来了不少的乐趣，直到隔壁的寡妇——詹金斯葬礼的那天，当吉姆吹响小号，所有人都看到詹金斯的尸体竟随着音乐开始跳舞。后来，吉姆从墓地的食尸鬼中听到了一些关于爵士乐的事情，说是有一首曲子，能让一切终结，就叫最后的狂想曲。可惜，吉姆并不太想知道这些事。

name: 赌一把
text:
每次技能检定最多投入1张。
将该次检定难度加倍。如果检定成功，结算胜利效果两次。
real_text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
Double the difficulty of this skill test. If this skill test is successful, resolve the effects of the successful test twice.

name: 团队合作
text: 你所在地点的调查员，可以自由给予或交易任意数量的[[道具]]支援卡、[[盟友]]支援卡和资源。
real_text: Investigators at your location may give or trade any number of [[Item]] assets, [[Ally]] assets, or resources among one another.
flavor: 孤军奋战，最为致命。

name: 礼寻术
text: 使用(3充能)。 [action]花费1充能：调查。这次调查不使用[intellect]，改为使用[willpower]。如果成功，额外发现所在地点1个线索。如果检定中抽出[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]、[elder_thing]或[auto_fail]标记，在检定结束后，失去所有剩余行动，并立刻结束你的回合。
real_text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect]. If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue at this location. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this test, after this test resolves lose all remaining actions and immediately end your turn.

name: 黑暗回忆
text: 在当前密谋卡上放置1个毁灭标记。该效果可能导致当前密谋推进。 强制 - 如果你的回合结束时，手牌中有黑暗回忆：展示该牌并受到2点恐惧。
real_text: Place 1 doom on the current agenda. This effect may cause the current agenda to advance. Forced - If Dark Memory is in your hand at the end of your turn, reveal it and take 2 horror.
flavor: 不……不要再烦我了！

name: 黛西的手提包
text:
黛西·沃克牌组专用。
你拥有额外2个手部槽位，只能用来放置[[书籍]]类支援卡。
real_text:
Daisy Walker deck only.
You have 2 additional hand slots, which can only be used to hold [[Tome]] assets.

name: 千钧一髮
text:
快速。在一名与你同一地点的非弱点、非[[精英]]敌人被躲避后打出。
将该敌人与遭遇牌堆混洗。
real_text:
Fast. Play after a non-weakness, non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location is evaded.
Shuffle that enemy into the encounter deck.

name: 诡秘石像
text:
使用(4充能)。如果诡秘石像没有充能，则将其丢弃。
[reaction]在你将要抽出1个混乱标记时，花费1充能：改为抽出2个混乱标记而不是1个。选择其中1个标记结算，并忽略其余标记。
real_text:
Uses (4 charges). If Grotesque Statue has no charges, discard it.
[reaction] When you would reveal a chaos token, spend 1 charge: Reveal 2 chaos tokens instead of 1. Choose 1 of those tokens to resolve, and ignore the other.

name: 飞蛾扑火
text: 抽取遭遇牌堆顶部的卡牌。然后发现你所在地点的2个线索。
real_text: Draw the top card of the encounter deck. Then, discover 2 clues at your location.
flavor:
"我们生活在无限的黑海中，一个无知的岛屿上，这意味着我们不应该航行太远。"
<cite>H. P. 洛夫克拉夫特，《克苏鲁的呼唤》</cite>

name: 神秘研究
text:
[free]花费1资源：这次技能检定期间你+1[willpower]。
[free]花费1资源：这次技能检定期间你+1[intellect]。
real_text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [intellect] for this skill test.

name: 百战百胜
text: 获得10个资源。
real_text: Gain 10 resources.
flavor: "我又赢啰！亲爱的真是抱歉，你今晚只是运气有点差。"

name: 巡警
text:
你获得+1[combat]。
[free]消耗巡警并对其造成1点伤害：对你所在地点的一名敌人造成1点伤害。
real_text:
You get +1 [combat].
[free] Exhaust Beat Cop and deal 1 damage to it: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.

name: 里奥·德·卢卡
text: 在你回合期间，你可以额外进行1个行动。
real_text: You may take an additional action during your turn.
flavor: "我生在密西西比。不过路易斯安那听起来更好。"

name: 生存意志
text:
快速。只能在你回合期间打出。
直到你回合结束，你执行任何技能检定不用抽取混乱标记。
real_text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Until the end of your turn, do not reveal chaos tokens for any skill tests you perform.

name: 佐伊的十字架
text:
佐伊·萨马拉斯牌组专用。
[reaction]在一名敌人与你交战后，消耗佐伊的十字架并花费1资源：对该敌人造成1点伤害。
real_text:
Zoey Samaras deck only.
[reaction] After an enemy becomes engaged with you, exhaust Zoey's Cross and spend 1 resource: Deal 1 damage to that enemy.

name: 击退邪恶
text: 显现 - 从遭遇牌堆顶弃牌，直到弃掉1张敌人，将其生成在离你最远的地点上，并将击退邪恶迭加到该敌人卡。 强制 - 在游戏结束时，如果被迭加的敌人在场：佐伊·萨马拉斯受到1点精神创伤。(FAQ, v1.0)
real_text: Revelation - Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until an enemy is discarded. Attach Smite the Wicked to that enemy and spawn it at the location farthest from you. Forced - When the game ends, if attached enemy is in play: Zoey Samaras suffers 1 mental trauma.

name: 内伤
text: 显现 - 将内伤放置入你的威胁区域。 强制 - 当你的回合结束时：受到1点直接伤害。 [action][action]：丢弃内伤。
real_text: Revelation - Place Internal Injury into play in your threat area. Forced - At the end of your turn: Take 1 direct damage. [action] [action]: Discard Internal Injury.

name: 警徽
text:
你获得+1[willpower]。
[free]你所在地点的一位调查员进行其回合时，丢弃警徽：该调查员可以在其回合额外进行2个行动。
real_text:
You get +1 [willpower].
[free] While an investigator at your location is taking his or her turn, discard Police Badge: That investigator may take 2 additional actions this turn.

name: 皱缩术
text: 使用(4充能)。 [action]花费1充能：攻击。这次攻击不使用[combat]，改为使用[willpower]，并造成+1伤害。如果攻击期间抽出[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]、[elder_thing]或[auto_fail]标记，受到1点恐惧。
real_text: Uses (4 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat] and deals +1 damage. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this check, take 1 horror.

name: 探知术
text:
使用(3充能)。
[action]消耗探知术并花费1充能：查看任一位调查员牌堆或遭遇牌堆顶部3张卡牌。然后按任意顺序放回该牌堆顶部。
real_text:
Uses (3 charges).
[action] Exhaust Scrying and spend 1 charge: Look at the top 3 cards of any investigator's deck or the encounter deck. Return them to the top of that deck in any order.

name: 防弹衣
flavor: 子弹是一回事……12英吋的长牙又是另一回事了。

name: 远古印记护身符
flavor: 这在我家代代相传。拿稳了，它会保护你的。

name: 禁忌知识
text:
使用(4秘密)。如果禁忌知识没有秘密，则将其丢弃。
[free]消耗禁忌知识并受到1点恐惧：将禁忌知识上1个秘密移动到你的资源池，作为资源使用。
real_text:
Uses (4 secrets). If Forbidden Knowledge has no secrets, discard it.
[free] Exhaust Forbidden Knowledge and take 1 horror: Move 1 secret from Forbidden Knowledge to your resource pool, as a resource.

name: 适应性
text:
永久。
在剧本模式中每场冒险间，你可以将你牌组中，最多2张等级0卡牌，替换为其他相同数量的等级0卡牌。(你仍需要遵守牌组构建相关的规则。)
real_text:
Permanent.
In between each game of a campaign, you may swap up to two level 0 cards out of your deck in exchange for an equal number of level 0 cards. (You must still follow all deckbuilding rules for your investigator).

name: 过度深入
text: 按玩家顺序，每位调查员抽取1张遭遇卡。然后，将过度深入加入胜利牌区。
real_text: In player order, each investigator draws 1 card from the top of the encounter deck. Then, add Delve Too Deep to the victory display.
flavor: 有些事情，你一旦看到了，就再也不能无视它。

name: 在逃中
text:
"倒霉蛋"奥图尔牌组专用。
快速。在你回合开始后打出。
直到本轮结束，非[[精英]]敌人不能攻击你。
real_text:
"Skids" O'Toole deck only.
Fast. Play after your turn begins.
Until the end of the round, non-[[Elite]] enemies cannot attack you.
flavor: 我可不会再进监狱了。

name: 伊察姆纳圆盘
text: [reaction]在非[[精英]]敌人生成于你所在地点时，丢弃伊察姆纳圆盘：丢弃那名敌人。
real_text: [reaction] When a non-[[Elite]] enemy spawns at your location, discard Disc of Itzamna: Discard that enemy.
flavor: 他们究竟是害怕护符对他们产生影响？还是害怕护符对你产生影响？

name: 隐密的研究
text:
快速。只能在你回合期间打出。
选择你所在地点的一名调查员，该调查员抽取3张卡牌。
real_text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator draws 3 cards.

name: 飞贼
text:
你获得+1[agility]。
[action]消耗飞贼：将所有与你交战的敌人解除交战状态，并移动到一个连接地点。该行动不会引起趁乱攻击。
real_text:
You get +1 [agility].
[action] Exhaust Cat Burglar: Disengage from each enemy engaged with you and move to a connecting location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: 老千手法
text:
快速。在你抽出一个负数修正值的混乱标记后打出。
将该标记的"–"变为"+"。
real_text:
Fast. Play after you reveal a chaos token with a negative modifier.
Switch that token's "-" to a "+".

name: 新晋术士
text: 强制 - 在新晋术士入场后：在该卡上放置1个毁灭标记。 [free] 消耗新晋术士：在你牌堆顶部3张卡牌中查找并抽取1张[[法术]]卡。混洗你的牌堆。
real_text: Forced - After Arcane Initiate enters play: Place 1 doom on it. [free] Exhaust Arcane Initiate: Search the top 3 cards of your deck for a [[Spell]] card and draw it. Shuffle your deck.

name: 守护结界
text:
快速。在你抽出一张非弱点诡计卡时打出。
取消该卡的显现效果。然后受到1点恐惧。
real_text:
Fast. Play when you draw a non-weakness treachery card.
Cancel that card's revelation effect. Then, take 1 horror.

name: 无所畏惧
text: 如果该次技能检定成功，治癒1点恐惧。
real_text: If this skill test is successful, heal 1 horror.
flavor: 只有在黑暗面前站稳脚步，才能看到明天的太阳。

name: 记忆抹消
text:
快速。在一个阶段开始后打出。
选择你所在地点的一名非[[精英]]敌人。将所选敌人的文字框视为空白，(除[[属性]]外)直到该阶段结束。
real_text:
Fast. Play after a phase begins.
Choose a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location. Treat the chosen enemy's printed text box as if it were blank (except for [[Traits]]) until the end of the phase.

name: 影之书
text:
你拥有额外1个法术槽位。
[action]消耗影之书：你控制的一张[[法术]]支援卡增加1充能。
real_text:
You have 1 additional arcane slot.
[action] Exhaust Book of Shadows: Add 1 charge to a [[Spell]] asset you control.

name: 安奎娜
text: [reaction]在敌人攻击你时，消耗安奎娜并对她造成1点恐惧：将攻击造成的伤害转移给你所在地点的另一名敌人。(你依然受到攻击造成的恐惧。)
real_text: [reaction] When an enemy attacks you, exhaust Aquinnah and deal 1 horror to her: Deal that enemy's damage to another enemy at your location, instead. (You still take horror dealt by the attack.)
flavor: "不要怕你看到的东西。真正可怕的是那些你看不到的。"

name: 神经紊乱
text: 显现 - 将神经紊乱放到你的威胁区域。 强制 - 在你受到至少1点恐惧后：受到1点直接伤害。 [action][action]：丢弃神经紊乱。
real_text: Revelation - Add Psychosis to your threat area. Forced - After you take 1 or more horror: Take 1 direct damage. [action] [action]: Discard Psychosis.

name: 黑帮打手
text: 猎物 - 仅对承受者。 猎手。 [action] 花费4资源：谈判。丢弃黑帮打手。
real_text: Prey - Bearer only. Hunter. [action] Spend 4 resources: Parley. Discard Mob Enforcer.
flavor: 敢和欧巴尼恩帮借钱，你胆子也够肥的。你越是穷，我们就越是要你还钱。

name: 银暮结社僧侣
text: 猎物 - 仅对承受者。 猎手。 强制 - 在银暮结社僧侣攻击后：在当前密谋上放置1个毁灭标记。
real_text: Prey - Bearer only. Hunter. Forced - After Silver Twilight Acolyte attacks: Place 1 doom on the current agenda.
traits: 类人. 异教徒. 银暮结社
flavor: 从你进入银暮结社的那天开始，这个秘密就会伴随着你。银暮结社不会让任何还知道这个秘密的叛徒活着。

name: 固执的侦探
text: 猎物 - 仅对承受者。 猎手。 只要固执的侦探与你在同一个地点，将你调查员卡说明框内的所有文字视为空白(除[[属性]]外)。
real_text: Prey - Bearer only. Hunter. While Stubborn Detective is at your location, treat your investigator as if his or her printed text box were blank (except for [[Traits]]).
flavor: 不管你怎么解释，他都坚信你和这几起谋杀有关联。

name: 团结一致
text: 选择你所在地点的另一位调查员。你和该调查员各抽取2张卡牌，并获得2个资源。
real_text: Choose another investigator at your location. Both you and that investigator draw 2 cards and gain 2 resources.
flavor: 我们绝不倒下！

name: 我要走了！
text: 只有"撤退"能力的冒险卡在场时才能打出。 撤退。你从这个鬼地方逃走了。
real_text: Play only if there is a scenario card with a 'resign' ability in play. Resign. You get the hell out of here.
flavor: 胆小鬼可能不会赢，但不太容易死

name: 魅力超凡
text:
永久。
你拥有额外1个盟友槽位。
real_text:
Permanent.
You have 1 additional ally slot.
flavor: 个人魅力光芒万丈，城中灯火黯淡无光。

name: 雷克斯·墨菲
text:
[reaction]在调查时技能检定成功后，如果你超过难度至少2点：发现所在地点1个线索。
[elder_sign]效果：+2。你可以选择让这次检定自动失败，来抽取3张卡牌。
real_text:
[reaction] After you succeed at a skill test by 2 or more while investigating: Discover 1 clue at your location.
[elder_sign] effect: +2. You may instead choose to automatically fail this skill test to draw 3 cards.

deck_options.error: You cannot have more than 5 cards that are not Seeker or Neutral

flavor: "这一次，我一定要找到真相。"
back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：探求者([seeker])等级0-5，中立卡牌等级0-5，最多5张其它职阶([guardian]、[rogue]、[mystic]和/或[survivor])的其他等级0卡牌。(FAQ, v1.5) 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：寻找真相、雷克斯的诅咒、1张随机基础弱点。 牌组构建限制：无[[幸运]]卡。
back_flavor: 不管走到哪里，雷克斯·墨菲都能看到灾难在向他招手。如果和雷克斯待一天，不管是哪个无神论者，都会相信这个男人被诅咒了。每次出现一个好兆头，就会立刻急转直下，最后变成一团乱。比如在印斯茅斯，刚拍到有用的照片，就被风吹进海里。在敦威治的时候，刚找到犯人的脚印，还没来得及叫警长，一场雨就把什么都弄没了。他的坏运气可让他吃了不少苦头。为了生存，雷克斯不得不动用自己的头脑，好迎接即将带来的灾难。

name: 珍妮·巴恩斯
text:
每个补给阶段额外获得1个资源。
[elder_sign]效果：你每持有1个资源，+1。
real_text:
You collect 1 additional resource during each upkeep phase.
[elder_sign] effect: +1 for each resource you have.

deck_options.error: You cannot have more than 5 cards that are not Rogue or Neutral

flavor: "请不要再叫我巴恩斯小姐。我的朋友都叫我珍妮。"
back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：流浪者([rogue])等级0-5，中立卡牌等级0-5，最多5张其它职阶([guardian]、[seeker]、[mystic]和/或[survivor])的其他等级0卡牌。(FAQ, v1.5) 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：珍妮的.45双枪、寻找伊莎贝拉、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 珍妮·巴恩斯把全部的青春都耗在了美食、时尚和享乐。直到她在巴黎度假时，收到了一份来自妹妹，伊莎贝拉的来信。信中说，她最近被一股黑暗势力给盯上了，并且很有可能成为受害者。此后，伊莎贝拉便杳无音讯，这令珍妮十分担心。她立刻决定返乡，去寻找心爱妹妹的踪迹，以及那些可疑份子的线索。在找到伊莎贝拉之前，她不会放弃搜索行动。她会用行动证明自己不是娇花，而是聪明无畏的调查员。

name: 寻找真相
text:
雷克斯·墨菲牌组专用。
抽取X张卡牌，X为雷克斯·墨菲持有的线索数(最多5张)。
real_text:
Rex Murphy deck only.
Draw X cards, where X is the number of clues on Rex Murphy (to a maximum of 5).
flavor:
当事情还会按着他的想法走时，雷克斯可是个好记者。他对故事很敏感，而且善于观察细节……
<cite>格雷厄姆·麦克内尔，《米斯卡塔尼克食尸鬼》</cite>

name: 雷克斯的诅咒
text: 显现 - 将雷克斯的诅咒放置入你的威胁区域。 强制 - 在你将要技能检定成功时：将抽出的混乱标记放回袋中，再抽取1个新标记。如果这个效果导致你检定失败，将雷克斯的诅咒与你的牌堆混洗。(每次检定限制1次。)
real_text: Revelation - Put Rex's Curse into play in your threat area. Forced - When you would succeed at a skill test: Return the revealed chaos token to the bag and reveal a new chaos token. If this effect causes you to fail the test, shuffle Rex's Curse into your deck. (Limit once per test.)

name: 珍妮的.45双枪
text: 珍妮·巴恩斯牌组专用。使用 (X子弹). [action]花费1子弹：攻击。这次攻击中你+2[combat]。这次攻击造成+1伤害。
real_text: Jenny Barnes deck only. Uses (X ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage.
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械
flavor: "……这不是多诺修先生的枪吗？"珍妮将一把枪举过肩膀，并摆了一个姿势。"我拿枪比他好看多了。不是吗？"

name: 寻找伊莎贝拉
text: 显现 - 将寻找伊莎贝拉迭加到离你最远的地点。 [action][action]：调查。如果成功，不获得线索，改为丢弃寻找伊莎贝拉。 强制 - 在游戏结束时，如果寻找伊莎贝拉在场：珍妮·巴恩斯受到1点精神创伤。(FAQ, v1.0)
real_text: Revelation - Attach Searching for Izzie to the location farthest from you. [action] [action]: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering clues, discard Searching for Izzie. Forced - When the game ends, if Searching for Izzie is in play: Jenny Barnes suffers 1 mental trauma.

name: 吉姆的小号
text:
吉姆·卡尔弗牌组专用。
[reaction]在技能检定期间抽出[skull]标记时，消耗吉姆的小号：治癒你所在地点或连接地点一位调查员的1点恐惧。
real_text:
Jim Culver deck only.
[reaction] When a [skull] token is revealed during a skill test, exhaust Jim's Trumpet: Heal 1 horror from an investigator at your location or a connecting location.
traits: 道具. 乐器. 遗物
flavor: 爸爸说过，"爵士乐如酒，能让你安心接受很多事情。"爸爸的确说了不少蠢话。

name: 最后的狂想曲
text: 显现 - 从混乱袋中抽取5个混乱标记。每抽出1个[skull]或[auto_fail]，受到1点伤害和1点恐惧。
real_text: Revelation - Reveal 5 chaos tokens from the chaos bag. For each [skull] and [auto_fail] token revealed, take 1 damage and 1 horror.
flavor: 当死亡说话时，请静静地听。

name: 捷径
text:
快速。只能在你回合中打出。
选择你所在地点的一位调查员。将该调查员移动到一个连接地点。
real_text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Choose an investigator at your location. Move that investigator to a connecting location.
flavor: 你对这个小镇瞭如指掌。

name: 负债
text:
永久。
每次游戏开始时，你少获得2个资源。
real_text:
Permanent.
You start each game with 2 fewer resources.
flavor: 一个人的债务是另一个人的财富。

name: 时间恐惧症
text: 显现 - 将时间恐惧症放置入你的威胁区域。 强制 - 当你的回合结束时：受到1点直接恐惧。 [action][action]：丢弃时间恐惧症。
real_text: Revelation - Place Chronophobia into play in your threat area. Forced - At the end of your turn: Take 1 direct horror. [action] [action]: Discard Chronophobia.

name: 随机基础弱点
text:
随机基础弱点放置处
你可以在此处使用Special tab以加入任意一张基础弱点牌，或者点击随机按钮从你的收藏之中随机加入一张基础弱点牌。
real_text:
This is a placeholder random basic weakness
 You can replace it with a specific weakness using the Special tab or click the random button to replace it with a random weakness from your collection.

name: 奇怪的溶液
text: [action]：检定[intellect] (4)。如果成功，丢弃奇怪的溶液，并抽取2张卡牌。在冒险日誌中，记录下"确认溶液成分"。
real_text: [action] Test [intellect] (4). If you succeed, discard Strange Solution and draw 2 cards. Record in your Campaign Log that "you have identified the solution."
flavor: 从科学角度来说，这不可能存在的

name: Marie Lambeau
text:
While you have 1 or more doom among cards you control, you may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to play [[Spell]] cards or activate [[Spell]] [action] abilities.
[elder_sign] effect: +1. You may add 1 doom to or remove 1 doom from a card you control.
real_text:
While you have 1 or more doom among cards you control, you may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to play [[Spell]] cards or activate [[Spell]] [action] abilities.
[elder_sign] effect: +1. You may add 1 doom to or remove 1 doom from a card you control.

deck_options.error: You cannot have more than 5 Seeker and/or Survivor cards

back_text: Deck size: 30. Deckbuilding options: [[Spell]] cards level 0-5, Mystic cards ([mystic]) level 0-3, Neutral cards level 0-5, [[Occult]] cards level 0, up to five other level 0 Seeker and/or Survivor cards ([seeker] and/or [survivor]). Deckbuilding requirements (do not count toward deck size): Mystifying Song, Baron Samedi, 1 random basic weakness.
back_flavor: Marie Lambeau always had a voice to die for. People called her "the Smoky Velvet." They said she was born to sing jazz, that she had the magic touch — and maybe they were right. After all, the songs she heard in her dreams ever since her Grand-Mère passed away were like nothing she'd ever heard before. The vocals sounded like no language spoken on Earth, the notes twisted and warped. Why her Grand-Mère had moved from New Orleans to Arkham, Marie would never know. People used to call her Grand-Mère a witch. Maybe there's more than just jazz in Marie's blood, after all...

name: Mystifying Song
text:
Marie Lambeau deck only.
Fast. Play when the agenda would advance by reaching its doom threshold.
Until the end of the phase, the agenda cannot advance by reaching its doom threshold. Remove Mystifying Song from the game.
real_text:
Marie Lambeau deck only.
Fast. Play when the agenda would advance by reaching its doom threshold.
Until the end of the phase, the agenda cannot advance by reaching its doom threshold. Remove Mystifying Song from the game.

name: Baron Samedi
text: Revelation - Put Baron Samedi into play. He cannot leave play while he has less than 3 doom on him. Forced – When any amount of damage is placed on an investigator in Baron Samedi's location: Place 1 additional damage on that investigator. [free] Exhaust Baron Samedi: Place 1 doom on Baron Samedi. If he has 3 or more doom on him, discard him.
real_text: Revelation - Put Baron Samedi into play. He cannot leave play while he has less than 3 doom on him. Forced - When any amount of damage is placed on an investigator in Baron Samedi's location: Place 1 additional damage on that investigator. [free] Exhaust Baron Samedi: Place 1 doom on Baron Samedi. If he has 3 or more doom on him, discard him.

name: "灰堆"皮特
text:
开始游戏时，将杜克放置入场。
[free]丢弃一张手牌：准备1张你控制的支援卡。(每轮限制1次。)
[elder_sign]效果：+2。准备杜克。
real_text:
You begin the game with Duke in play.
[free] Discard a card from your hand: Ready an asset you control. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +2. Ready Duke.

deck_options.error: You cannot have more than 5 cards that are not Survivor or Neutral

flavor: "来吧，伙计。我们该工作了。"
back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：求生者([survivor])等级0-5，中立卡牌等级0-5，最多5张其它职阶([guardian]、[seeker]、[rogue]和/或[mystic])的其他等级0卡牌。(FAQ, v1.5) 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：杜克、噩梦来袭、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: "灰堆"皮特流浪到哪里，就睡在哪里，无论是田野、火车还是谷仓。他已经习惯了，更何况还有他心爱的狗狗——杜克，还有随身的老吉他陪伴。有时候皮特进入梦乡时，会看到一个扭曲的未知场所，那里到处都是可怕的生物。当被噩梦惊醒后，那真实的感受令他坚信世界上有人被困在了那里。皮特已经漫无目的地流浪了很久，过着简单的生活。但是他内心的正义感无法容忍自己的漠视， 现在他要去拯救那个可怜虫。

name: 杜克
text: "灰堆"皮特牌组专用。 [action]消耗杜克：攻击。你该次攻击[combat]基础值视为4。这次攻击造成+1伤害。 [action]消耗杜克：调查。你该次调查[intellect]基础值视为4。在使用该效果调查前，你可以立刻移动到一个连接地点。
real_text: "Ashcan" Pete deck only. [action] Exhaust Duke: Fight. You attack with a base [combat] skill of 4. This attack deals +1 damage. [action] Exhaust Duke: Investigate. You investigate with a base [intellect] skill of 4. You may move to a connecting location immediately before investigating with this effect.

name: 噩梦来袭
text: 显现 - 消耗你控制的所有支援卡，并将噩梦来袭放置入你的威胁区域。 你控制的支援卡不能准备。 [action][action]：丢弃噩梦来袭。
real_text: Revelation - Exhaust all assets you control and put Wracked by Nightmares into play in your threat area. Assets you control cannot ready. [action] [action]: Discard Wracked by Nightmares.

name: 金属棍棒
text: [action]：攻击。这次攻击中你+1[combat]。如果你对与另一位调查员交战的敌人攻击并且失败，则不会对调查员造成伤害。
real_text: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. If you perform this attack against an enemy engaged with another investigator and you fail, you deal no damage.
traits: 道具. 武器. 近战

name: 嘲讽
text:
快速。只能在你回合中打出。
与你所在地点的任意数量敌人交战。
real_text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Engage any number of enemies at your location.
flavor: 你鼓起勇气，朝黑暗中大喊道："快来抓我！"

name: 嘲讽
text:
快速。只能在你回合中打出。
与你所在地点的任意数量敌人交战。你每通过该效果与一名敌人交战，抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Engage any number of enemies at your location. Draw 1 card for each enemy engaged in this way.
flavor: 你鼓起勇气，朝黑暗中大喊道："快来抓我！"

name: 实验室助理
text:
你手牌上限+2。
[reaction]在实验室助理入场后：抽取2张卡牌。
real_text:
Your maximum hand size is increased by 2.
[reaction] After Laboratory Assistant enters play: Draw 2 cards.
traits: 盟友. 米斯卡塔尼克. 科学

name: 寻找答案
text: 调查。如果你成功，不发现所在地点的一个线索，改为发现连接地点的一个线索。
real_text: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering a clue at your location, discover a clue at a connecting location.
flavor: 有些人会不惜一切代价来找到真相。但是有些真相却能伤人。

name: 酒胆
text:
使用(4补给)。
[action]花费1补给：选择你所在地点的一位调查员，治癒1点恐惧。然后，该调查员检定[willpower](2)。如果检定成功，该调查员额外治癒1点恐惧。如果检定失败，该调查员随机丢弃1张手牌。
real_text:
Uses (4 supplies).
[action] Spend 1 supply: Choose an investigator at your location to heal 1 horror. Then, that investigator tests [willpower] (2). If the test succeeds, he or she heals 1 additional horror. If the test fails, he or she discards 1 card at random from his or her hand.

name: 逃跑本能
text:
快速。在敌人将要在你所在地点生成时打出。
立刻移动到一个连接地点。(该敌人依然在原本地点生成。)
real_text:
Fast. Play when an enemy would spawn at your location.
Immediately move to a connecting location. (The enemy still spawns at your previous location.)

name: 雇佣打手
text: 你获得+1[combat]。 强制 - 当补给阶段结束时：你必须选择丢弃1资源，或丢弃雇佣打手。
real_text: You get +1 [combat]. Forced - At the end of the upkeep phase: You must either pay 1 resource or discard Hired Muscle.

name: 仪式蜡烛
text: [reaction]在技能检定期间，你抽出[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]或[elder_thing]标记后：你这次检定技能值+1。
real_text: [reaction] After a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] symbol is revealed during a test you are performing: You get +1 skill value for this test.
flavor: 蜂蜡滴落，反射出光泽。火焰舞蹈，彷佛活物般。

name: 净心术
text:
使用(3充能)。
[action]花费1充能：治癒你所在地点一位调查员1点恐惧。
real_text:
Uses (3 charges).
[action] Spend 1 charge: Heal 1 horror from an investigator at your location.
flavor:
虚幻带来现实
黑暗带来光明
死亡带来永恆

name: 困兽之笼
text: 躲避。这次躲避尝试不使用[agility]，改为使用[willpower]。如果成功并且该敌人为非[[精英]]，躲避并将困兽之笼迭加到该敌人。 [reaction]在被迭加的敌人要准备时：检定[willpower](3)。如果成功，迭加敌人不准备。如果失败，丢弃困兽之笼。
real_text: Evade. This evasion attempt uses [willpower] instead of [agility]. If you succeed and the enemy is non‑[[Elite]], evade it and attach Bind Monster to it. [reaction] When attached enemy would ready: Test [willpower] (3). If you succeed, attached enemy does not ready. If you fail, discard Bind Monster.

name: 消防斧
text: [action]：攻击。如果你未持有任何资源，这次攻击造成+1伤害。 [free]在使用消防斧的攻击中，花费1资源：这次技能检定中你+2[combat]。 (每次攻击限制3次。)
real_text: [action]: Fight. If you have no resources in your resource pool, this attack deals +1 damage. [free] During an attack using Fire Axe, spend 1 resource: You get +2 [combat] for this skill test. (Limit three times per attack.)
traits: 道具. 武器. 近战

name: 彼得·希尔维斯特
text:
你获得+1[agility]。
[reaction]在你回合结束后：治癒彼得·希尔维斯特1点恐惧。
real_text:
You get +1 [agility].
[reaction] After your turn ends: Heal 1 horror from Peter Sylvestre.
traits: 盟友. 米斯卡塔尼克
flavor: 这个壮实的小伙子，有着年轻人独有的自信。

name: 偷樑换柱
text: 躲避。如果成功并且该敌人为非[[精英]]，躲避并将该敌人移动到一个连接地点。
real_text: Evade. If you succeed, if the enemy is non-[[Elite]], evade the enemy and move it to a connecting location.

name: 彼得·希尔维斯特
text:
你获得+1[agility]和+1[willpower]。
[reaction]在你回合结束后：治癒彼得·希尔维斯特1点恐惧。
real_text:
You get +1 [agility] and +1 [willpower].
[reaction] After your turn ends: Heal 1 horror from Peter Sylvestre.
traits: 盟友. 米斯卡塔尼克
flavor: 这个壮实的小伙子，有着年轻人独有的自信。

name: 弯刀
text: [action]：攻击。这次攻击中你+1[combat]。如果成功，你可以花费1额外行动，来使这次攻击造成+1伤害。
real_text: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. If you succeed, you may spend 1 additional action to deal +1 damage for this attack.
traits: 道具. 武器. 近战

name: 锐利目光
text:
永久。
[free]花费2资源：在该阶段结束前，你获得+1[intellect]。
[free]花费2资源：在该阶段结束前，你获得+1[combat]。
real_text:
Permanent.
[free] Spend 2 resources: You get +1 [intellect] until the end of the phase.
[free] Spend 2 resources: You get +1 [combat] until the end of the phase.

name: 鲜血盟约
text:
永久。
[free]在鲜血盟约上放置1个毁灭标记：这次技能检定中你+3[willpower]。(每次技能检定限制1次。)
[free]在鲜血盟约上放置1个毁灭标记：这次技能检定中你+3[combat]。(每次技能检定限制1次。)
real_text:
Permanent.
[free] Add 1 doom to Blood Pact: You get +3 [willpower] for this skill test. (Limit once per test.)
[free] Add 1 doom to Blood Pact: You get +3 [combat] for this skill test. (Limit once per test.)

name: 应急物品
text: 获得3个资源，并抽取1张卡牌。
real_text: Gain 3 resources and draw 1 card.
flavor: 俗话说多多益善。

name: 思维敏捷
text: 如果该技能检定超过难度至少2点，在完成结算后，你可以立刻进行一个行动，如同在你的回合中(该行动不计入你每回合可进行的行动数)。
real_text: If this skill test is successful by 2 or more, after it resolves, you may immediately take an action as if it were your turn (this action does not count toward the number of actions you can take each turn).

name: 礼寻术
text: 使用(3充能)。 [action]花费1充能：调查。这次调查不使用[intellect]，改为使用[willpower]。这次检定中你+2[willpower]。如果成功，额外发现所在地点2个线索。如果检定中抽出[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]、[elder_thing]或[auto_fail]标记，在检定结束后，失去所有剩余行动，并立刻结束你的回合。
real_text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect]. You get +2 [willpower] for this test. If successful, you discover 2 additional clues at this location. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this test, after this test resolves lose all remaining actions and immediately end your turn.

name: 紧急救援
text: 选择你所在地点的一位调查员。治癒该调查员，或其控制的一张[[盟友]]支援卡2点伤害。
real_text: Choose an investigator at your location. Heal 2 damage from that investigator or from an [[Ally]] asset he or she controls.

name: 修士塞维尔
text:
你获得+1[willpower]。
你所在地点的其他调查员，可以将受到的伤害和恐惧分配给修士塞维尔。
[reaction]在修士塞维尔被击败时：对你所在地点的一名敌人，造成2点伤害。
real_text:
You get +1 [willpower].
Brother Xavier may be assigned damage and/or horror dealt to other investigators at your location.
[reaction] When Brother Xavier is defeated: Deal 2 damage to an enemy at your location.

name: "我有个计划！"
text: 攻击。这次攻击使用[intellect]代替[combat]。你每持有1个线索，这次攻击造成+1伤害(最大+3伤害)。
real_text: Fight. This attack uses [intellect]. You deal +1 damage for this attack for each clue you have (max +3 damage).
flavor: "这应该是我听过最烂的计划了。好吧，那还磨蹭什么？快动手吧！"

name: 探路者
text: [free]在你回合中，如果你不与任何敌人交战，消耗探路者：移动到一个连接地点。
real_text: [free]During your turn, if you are not engaged with any enemies, exhaust Pathfinder: Move to a connecting location.
flavor:
他们是搜寻者，追随着遥远而恐怖之处。
<cite>H. P.洛克夫克拉夫特，《屋中画》</cite>

name: 走私品
text: 选择一张你所在地点的调查员控制的支援卡。将该支援卡上的子弹或补给标记数量翻倍。
real_text: Choose an asset controlled by an investigator at your location. Double the number of ammo or supply tokens on that asset.
flavor: 管他违不违法，能办事就成。

name: 死亡之歌
text: 使用(5充能)。 [action]花费1充能：攻击。这次攻击不使用[combat]，改为使用[willpower]。这次攻击中你+1[willpower]。如果攻击中抽出[skull]标记，这次攻击造成+2伤害。
real_text: Uses (5 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. You get +1 [willpower] for this attack. If a [skull] symbol is revealed during this attack, this attack deals +2 damage.

name: 哎呀！
text:
快速。在你攻击与你交战的敌人失败，并且低于难度2点及以内后打出。
对你所在地点的不同敌人造成该次攻击的伤害。
real_text:
Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 2 or less while attacking an enemy engaged with you.
Deal this attack's damage to a different enemy at your location.

name: 灭火器
text: [action]：攻击。这次攻击中你+1[combat]。 [action]放逐灭火器：躲避。这次躲避中你+3[agility]。如果成功，同时躲避与你交战的其他所有敌人。
real_text: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. [action] Exile Fire Extinguisher: Evade. You get +3 [agility] for this test. If you are successful, evade each other enemy engaged with you, as well.
traits: 道具. 工具. 近战

name: 照明弹
text: 选择(一项)： - 攻击。这次攻击中你+3[combat]，造成+2伤害。放逐照明弹。 - 查找任意一位调查员的牌堆顶部9张卡牌，并将其中1张[[盟友]]支援卡放置入你的控制下。然后，放逐照明弹，并混洗被查找的牌堆。
real_text: Either (choose one): - Fight. You get +3 [combat] and deal +2 damage for this attack. Exile Flare. - Search the top 9 cards of any investigator's deck for an [[Ally]] asset and put it into play under your control. Then, exile Flare. Shuffle the searched deck.

name: 烟斗
text:
使用(3补给)。
[free]花费1补给，消耗烟斗，并受到1点伤害：治癒1点恐惧。
real_text:
Uses (3 supplies).
[free] Spend 1 supply, exhaust Smoking Pipe, and take 1 damage: Heal 1 horror.
flavor: 事后一支烟，赛过活神仙。

name: 止痛药
text:
使用(3补给)。
[free]花费1补给，消耗止痛药，并受到1点恐惧：治癒1点伤害。
real_text:
Uses (3 supplies).
[free] Spend 1 supply, exhaust Painkillers, and take 1 horror: Heal 1 damage.
flavor: 止痛药虽好，可不要贪吃哦。

name: 子弹带
text: 你拥有额外1个手部槽位，只能用于放置[[武器]]支援卡。
real_text: You have 1 additional hand slot, which can only be used to hold a [[Weapon]] asset.

name: 艺术生
text: [reaction]在艺术生入场后：发现你所在地点的1个线索。
real_text: [reaction] After Art Student enters play: Discover 1 clue at your location.
traits: 盟友. 米斯卡塔尼克

name: 推理
text: 如果调查一个地点时本技能检定成功，额外发现该地点的1个线索(如果超过难度至少2点，改为额外发现2个线索)。
real_text: If this skill test is successful while investigating a location, discover 1 additional clue at that location (2 additional clues instead if it succeeds by 2 or more).
flavor: 我就知道我看过这个符号。我现在通知其他人还为时不晚！

name: 弹簧刀
text: 快速。 [action]攻击。这次攻击中你+2[combat]。如果你成功且超过难度至少2点，该次攻击造成+1伤害。
real_text: Fast. [action] Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. If you succeed by 2 or more, this attack deals +1 damage.
traits: 道具. 武器. 近战. 违法

name: 催眠术
text:
快速。在一名敌人攻击你所在地点的调查员时打出。
取消该次攻击。然后从混乱袋中抽出1个标记。如果是[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]、[elder_thing]或[auto_fail]标记，将敌人的伤害转移给敌人自身。
real_text:
Fast. Play when an enemy attacks an investigator at your location.
Cancel that attack. Then, reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If it has a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, deal the attacking enemy's damage to itself.

name: 皱缩术
text: 使用(4充能)。 [Action]花费1充能：攻击。这次攻击不使用[combat]，改为使用[willpower]。这次攻击中你+2[willpower]，并造成+1伤害。如果攻击中抽出[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]、[elder_thing]或[auto_fail]标记，受到1点恐惧。
real_text: Uses (4 charges). [action] Spend one charge: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. You get +2 [willpower] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this attack, take 1 horror.

name: 报纸
text: 如果你没有线索，调查时你获得+2[intellect]。
real_text: You get +2 [intellect] while investigating if you have no clues.
flavor: 新闻头条里丝毫没有提到你目击的恐怖事件。但讣告栏里的名字却多得让人心中发怵。

name: 诱敌深入
text: 迭加到你所在地点。 在敌军阶段中移动的敌人，改为朝迭加地点以最短路径移动，而不是其原本路线。 强制 - 当该卡被迭加的轮次结束时：丢弃诱敌深入。
real_text: Attach to your location. During the enemy phase, each enemy that moves does so along the shortest path toward the attached location, instead of to where it would normally move. Forced - While attached, at the end of the round: Discard Lure.

name: 宝物猎人
text:
永久。
你拥有额外1个饰品槽位。
real_text:
Permanent.
You have 1 additional accessory slot.
flavor: 搜遍一砖一石，不留一金一银。

name: 最坏的打算
text: 查找你牌堆顶部9张卡牌，将其中1张[[武器]]支援卡加入你手牌。混洗你的牌堆。
real_text: Search the top 9 cards of your deck for a [[Weapon]] asset and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: 荒唐的素描像
text:
只能在你所在地点有至少1个线索时打出。
抽取3张卡牌。
real_text:
Play only if there is a clue on your location.
Draw 3 cards.

name: 高等教育
text:
永久。
只要你有至少5张手牌，高等教育获得：
"[free]花费1资源：这次技能检定中你+2[willpower]。
[free]花费1资源：这次技能检定中你+2[intellect]。"
real_text:
Permanent.
While you have 5 or more cards in your hand, Higher Education gains:
"[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +2 [willpower] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +2 [intellect] for this skill test."

name: 孤狼
text:
每位调查员限制1张。
[reaction]在你回合开始时，如果你所在地点没有其他调查员：获得1个资源。
real_text:
Limit 1 per investigator.
[reaction] When your turn begins, if there are no other investigators at your location: Gain 1 resource.
flavor: "我不介意单独行动，这样子才高效。"

name: 街头浪子
text:
永久。
[free]花费2资源：这次技能检定中你+3[intellect]。
[free]花费2资源：这次技能检定中你+3[agility]。
real_text:
Permanent.
[free] Spend 2 resources: You get +3 [intellect] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 2 resources: You get +3 [agility] for this skill test.

name: 逆反
text: 在你为这次检定抽取混乱标记前，选择下列一个符号：([skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]或[elder_thing])。在这次检定中，忽略所选符号的效果(包括其修正值)。
real_text: Before revealing chaos tokens for this test, choose one of the following symbols: ([skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing]). Ignore the effects of the chosen symbol during this test (including its modifier).

name: 随机应变
text: 只能在你执行的技能检定中投入，且该检定难度必须比你基础技能值高出至少2点。
real_text: Commit only to a skill test you are performing, and only if the difficulty of that test is at least 2 higher than your base skill value.

name: 拳击家
text:
永久。
[free]花费1资源：这次技能检定中你+1[combat]。
[free]花费1资源：这次技能检定中你+1[agility]。
real_text:
Permanent.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [combat] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.

name: 追根究底
text: 你所在地点必须有至少1个线索，你才能在技能检定中投入该卡。
real_text: Commit to a skill test only if there is a clue at your location.
flavor: 敏而好事，不耻下问。

name: 艾丽莎·格雷厄姆
text:
你获得+1[intellect]。
[free]消耗艾丽莎·格雷厄姆：查看遭遇牌堆，或任意玩家牌堆顶部1张卡牌。你可以在艾丽莎·格雷厄姆上放置1个毁灭标记，将察看的卡牌放到对应牌堆底部。
real_text:
You get +1 [intellect].
[free] Exhaust Alyssa Graham: Look at the top card of either the encounter deck or any player deck. You may then add 1 doom to Alyssa Graham to place the looked-at card on the bottom of its deck.

name: 闪电枪
text: 使用(3子弹)。 [action]花费1子弹：攻击。这次攻击中你+5[combat]。这次攻击造成+2伤害。
real_text: Uses (3 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +5 [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +2 damage.
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械

name: 芝加哥机关枪
text: 使用(4子弹)。 [action]花费1子弹：攻击。这次攻击造成+2伤害。你可以为这次攻击额外花费行动，每花费1个行动(包括本次行动)，这次攻击中你+2[combat]。
real_text: Uses (4 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You may spend any number of additional actions when you perform this attack. You get +2 [combat] for this attack for each action being spent (including this ability's [action] cost). This attack deals +2 damage.
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械. 违法

name: 黄金怀表
text: 卓越。 [reaction]在一个阶段开始时，将黄金怀表移出游戏：跳过该阶段。 [reaction]在一个阶段结束后，将黄金怀表移出游戏：再执行这个阶段一次。(FAQ, v1.2)
real_text:
Exceptional.
[reaction] When a phase begins, remove The Gold Pocket Watch from the game: Skip this phase.
[reaction] After a phase ends, remove The Gold Pocket Watch from the game: Repeat that phase.

name: "我见过更糟的……"
text:
快速。在你受到伤害和/或恐惧时打出。
取消你这次受到的最多5点伤害和/或恐惧。然后获得同等数量的资源。
real_text:
Fast. Play when you are dealt damage and/or horror.
Cancel up to 5 damage and/or horror just dealt to you. Then, gain that many resources.

name: 杀手锏
text:
卓越。快速。只能在你的回合中打出。
该回合中，你可以额外进行3个行动。
real_text:
Exceptional. Fast. Play only during your turn.
You may take an additional 3 actions this turn.

name: 萝拉·海耶斯
text: 强制 - 你抽取起始手牌后：选择一个角色([survivor]、[guardian]、[seeker]、[rogue]、[mystic]或中立)。 你打出、投入或触发能力的卡牌只限于中立卡和你所选角色的卡牌。 [free]：切换你的角色。(每轮限制1次。) [elder_sign]效果：+2。你可以切换角色。
real_text: Forced - After you draw your opening hand: Choose a role ([survivor], [guardian], [seeker], [rogue], [mystic], or Neutral). You can only play, commit, or trigger abilities on Neutral cards or cards of your role. [free]: Switch your role. (Limit once per round.) [elder_sign] effect: +2. You may switch roles.

deck_options.error: You must have at least 7 cards from 3 different factions

flavor: 也许这次是她东山再起的最好时机。
back_text: 卡牌张数：35。 牌组构建选项：求生者、守卫者、探求者、流浪者和潜修者卡([survivor]、[guardian]、[seeker]、[rogue]、[mystic])等级0-3，中立卡牌等级0-5。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：2张即兴表演、2张身分危机、1张随机基础弱点。 其它需求：你的牌组必须包含3个不同职阶([survivor]、[guardian]、[seeker]、[rogue]、[mystic])，每个职阶至少7张卡牌。
back_flavor: 萝拉在全球各地出演剧目时，门票每每都被抢购一空，但没有一部剧像《黄衣之王》一般不祥而诡异。就连排练期间，戏班子都连遭厄运。一天，与她联袂出演的米里亚姆被人发现浮尸于塞纳河上，她终于崩溃了，提笔写下辞职信，告诉导演下一场就是自己的告别演出。现在她回到自己的家乡阿卡姆，准备最后一次演出，她也希望这一次能永远告别这齣可怕的戏剧。

name: 即兴表演
text:
萝拉·海耶斯牌组专用。
快速。只能在你回合中打出。
切换你的角色。你回合结束前，你所选角色的下一张卡牌资源费用降低3点。抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
Lola Hayes deck only.
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Switch your role. Until the end of your turn, reduce the resource cost of the next card you play of your role by 3. Draw 1 card.

name: 身份危机
text: 显现 - 丢弃你控制的所有你当前角色的卡牌。然后，丢弃你牌堆顶的1张卡牌。将你的角色切换到该丢弃的卡牌职阶(如果丢弃的卡牌是弱点，切换为中立角色)。
real_text: Revelation - Discard all cards you control of your current role. Then, discard the top card of your deck. Switch your role to the class of the discarded card (if the discarded card is a weakness, switch your role to neutral).
flavor: "我演过那么多角色，就算疯了也是正常的。"

name: "如果它会流血……"
text:
快速。在你击败一名[[怪物]]敌人后打出。
你所在地点的每位调查员，各治癒等同于该敌人恐惧值的恐惧。
real_text:
Fast. Play after you defeat a [[Monster]] enemy.
Each investigator at your location heals horror equal to that enemy's horror value.
flavor: 小小慰藉，足以安心。

name: 春田M1903
text: 使用(3子弹)。 [action]花费1子弹：攻击。这次攻击中你+3[combat]，并+2伤害。不能用于攻击与你交战的敌人。
real_text: Uses (3 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +3 [combat] and deal +2 damage for this attack. Cannot be used to attack enemies engaged with you.
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械

name: 暴露弱点
text:
快速。在任何[free]玩家时间段中打出。
选择你所在地点的一名敌人。检定[intellect](X)，X为该敌人攻击值。你每超过难度1点，该阶段中，下一次攻击该敌人时，其攻击值降低1点。
real_text:
Fast. Play during any [free] player window.
Choose an enemy at your location. Test [intellect] (X), where X is that enemy's fight value. For each point you succeed by, reduce that enemy's fight value by 1 for the next attack performed against it this phase.

name: 幸运骰子
text: 卓越。 [reaction]在你抽出1个非[auto_fail]的混乱标记时，花费2资源：忽略该标记，并再抽1个标记结算。如果新抽出的标记为[auto_fail]符号，将幸运骰子移出游戏(不能被忽略或取消)。(FAQ, v1.1)
real_text:
Exceptional.
[reaction] When you reveal a non-[auto_fail] chaos token, spend 2 resources: Ignore that chaos token and reveal another one to resolve. If that token has a [auto_fail] symbol, remove Lucky Dice from the game (cannot be ignored/canceled).

name: 机会主义者
text:
只能在你执行的技能检定中投入。
如果你成功且超过难度至少2点，在检定后不丢弃机会主义者，改为将其返回你的手牌。
real_text:
Commit only to a skill test you are performing.
If you succeed by 2 or more, return Opportunist to your hand after this test instead of discarding it.

name: 黑马
text:
每位调查员限制1张。
在补给阶段，你可以选择不获得资源。
只要你的资源池中没有资源，你获得+1[willpower]，+1[intellect]，+1[combat]和+1[agility]。
real_text:
Limit 1 per investigator.
During the upkeep phase, you may choose to not gain resources.
While you have no resources in your resource pool, you get +1 [willpower], +1 [intellect], +1 [combat], and +1 [agility].

name: 求生本能
text: 如果躲避尝试期间这次技能检定成功，躲避的调查员可以立即躲避与其交战的每个其他敌人，并可以移动到一个连接地点。
real_text: If this test is successful during an evasion attempt, the evading investigator may immediately evade each other enemy engaged with him or her, and may move to a connecting location.

name: 安奎娜
text: [reaction]在敌人攻击你时，消耗安奎娜并对她造成1点恐惧：将攻击造成的伤害转移给你所在地点的一名敌人。(你依然受到攻击造成的恐惧。)
real_text: [reaction] When an enemy attacks you, exhaust Aquinnah and deal 1 horror to her: Deal that enemy's damage to any enemy at your location, instead. (You still take horror dealt by the attack.)
flavor: "不要怕你看到的东西。真正可怕的是那些你看不到的。"

name: 奥鲁斯的珠宝
text: [reaction]在你所在地点发生的技能检定中，抽出[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]、[elder_thing]或[auto_fail]标记后，消耗奥鲁斯的珠宝：抽取1张卡牌，或获得2个资源。
real_text: [reaction] After a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during a skill test at your location, exhaust Jewel of Aureolus: Draw 1 card or gain 2 resources.

name: 有胆有识
text:
快速。场上限制1张[[沉稳]]。
非直接恐惧必须分配给有胆有识后才能分配给你的调查员卡。
[free]花费1资源：这次技能检定中你+1[willpower]。
[free]花费1资源：这次技能检定中你+1[intellect]。
real_text:
Fast. Limit 1 [[Composure]] in play.
Non-direct horror must be assigned to Plucky before it can be assigned to your investigator card.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [intellect] for this skill test.

name: 绝命奔逃
text:
每次技能检定最多投入1张。
你剩余神智值为3点或更少时才可投入技能检定。
real_text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
Commit to a skill test only if you have 3 or fewer remaining sanity.

name: 无所畏惧
text: 如果该次检定成功，治癒1点恐惧(如果超过难度至少2点，则改为治癒2点恐惧)。
real_text: If this skill test is successful, heal 1 horror (2 horror instead if it succeeds by 2 or more).
flavor: 只有在黑暗面前站稳脚步，才能看到明天的太阳。

name: 喘息时间
text: 只有在你所在地点没有敌人时才能打出。治癒3点恐惧，并抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
Play only if there are no enemies at your location.
Heal 3 horror and draw 1 card.

name: 领导力
text: 当领导力被投入另一位调查员的技能检定时，领导力获得[willpower][wild]。
real_text: While Leadership is committed to a skill test being performed by another investigator, Leadership gains [willpower] [wild].

name: 奇怪的溶液
text: 研究。(FAQ, v2.0) 使用(4补给)。 [action]花费1补给：治癒你所在地点一位调查员2点伤害。
real_text:
Researched. Uses (4 supplies).
[action] Spend 1 supply: Heal 2 damage from an investigator at your location.

name: 奇怪的溶液
text: 研究。(FAQ, v2.0) 使用(3补给)。 [action]花费1补给：攻击。该次攻击[combat]基础值视为6。这次攻击造成+2伤害。
real_text: Researched. Uses (3 supplies). [action] Spend 1 supply: Fight. Attack with a base [combat] skill of 6. This attack deals +2 damage.

name: 奇怪的溶液
text: 研究。(FAQ, v2.0) 使用(4补给)。 [action]花费1补给：躲避。该次躲避[agility]基础值视为6。
real_text: Researched. Uses (4 supplies). [action] Spend 1 supply: Evade. Evade with a base [agility] skill of 6.

name: 乔伊"老鼠"弗吉尔
text: [free]花费1资源：选择你手中1张[[道具]]支援卡并打出(仍需支付卡牌费用)。
real_text: [free] Spend 1 resource: Choose an [[Item]] asset from your hand and play it (paying its cost).
flavor:
"墨菲，只要肯付钱，不管是谁、什么时间、什么地点，老鼠都能完成任务。"
<cite>《诡镇奇谈》调查员Jason Marker</cite>

name: 月光仪式
text: 将你控制的1张卡上，所有毁灭标记移除。
real_text: Remove all doom from 1 card you control.

name: 不期而遇
text: 选择任意玩家弃牌堆中的一张[[盟友]]支援。将该支援放置入场，置于你的控制之下。当一轮结束时，如果该支援卡依然在场，将其丢弃。
real_text: Choose an [[Ally]] asset in any player's discard pile. Put that asset into play under your control. At the end of the round, if that asset is still in play, discard it.

name: 鸿运当头
text:
只能在你执行的技能检定中投入。
在该次检定抽出混乱标记后，你可以放逐鸿运当头。如果你这么做，该次检定自动成功(除非抽出[auto_fail]标记)。
real_text:
Commit only to a skill test you are performing.
After revealing chaos tokens for this test, you may choose to exile Stroke of Luck. If you do, this test is automatically successful (unless a [auto_fail] token was revealed).

name: 华服
text: 你在执行"谈判"行动时执行的技能检定难度降低2。
real_text: Reduce the difficulty of skill tests you perform during 'parley' actions by 2.
flavor: 丝绸的触感简直妙不可言。

name: 戴红手套的男子
text: 快速。 [reaction]在戴红手套的男子入场后：选择你的2项技能。只要戴红手套的男子在场，所选技能的基础值变为6。 强制 - 当神秘阶段结束时：丢弃戴红手套的男子。
real_text: Fast. [reaction] After The Red-Gloved Man enters play: Choose two of your skills. While The Red-Gloved Man is in play, raise the base value of each of those skills to 6. Forced - At the end of the mythos phase: Discard The Red-Gloved Man.

name: 致命打击
text: 如果攻击中的这次技能检定成功，则该次攻击造成+1伤害(如果超过难度至少2点，改为造成+2伤害)。
real_text: If this skill test is successful during an attack, that attack deals +1 damage (+2 damage instead if it succeeds by 2 or more).
flavor: 大斧砸在肉上，发出令人作呕的响声，他停不住地反覆打击着那个怪物，直到它再也无法动弹为止。

name: 屠怪勇士
text: 攻击。如果这次攻击目标为1个非[[精英]]敌人并成功，立刻击败该敌人。
real_text: Fight. If this attack succeeds against a non-[[Elite]] enemy, defeat that enemy.

name: 威廉·T·玛律森博士
text: [reaction]在你从遭遇牌堆抽取1张遭遇卡时，消耗威廉·T·玛律森博士，并将你的1个线索放在所在地点上：取消该次抽牌，并将抽出的牌与遭遇牌堆混洗。然后，抽取1张遭遇卡。(FAQ, v1.2)
real_text: [reaction] When you draw an encounter card from the encounter deck, exhaust Dr. William T. Maleson and place 1 of your clues on your location: Cancel the drawing of that card and shuffle it back into the encounter deck. Then, draw a new card from the top of the encounter deck.
traits: 盟友. 米斯卡塔尼克

name: 揭开现实的面纱
text: 调查。该次技能检定难度，等同于场上已揭示的地点中，最高的隐藏值。如果成功，从场上每个已揭示地点各发现1个线索。
real_text: Investigate. The difficulty of this skill test is equal to the highest shroud value among revealed locations in play. If you succeed, discover 1 clue from each revealed location in play.

name: 皱缩术
text: 使用(4充能)。 [action]花费1充能：攻击。这次攻击不使用[combat]，改为使用[willpower]。这次攻击中你+3[willpower]，并造成+2伤害。如果攻击中抽出[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]、[elder_thing]或[auto_fail]标记，受到2点恐惧。
real_text: Uses (4 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. You get +3 [willpower] and deal +2 damage for this attack. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this attack, take 2 horror.

name: 守护结界
text:
快速。在你抽出一张非弱点的遭遇卡时打出。
取消该卡的所有效果，并将其丢弃。然后受到1点恐惧。
real_text:
Fast. Play when you draw a non-weakness encounter card. 
Cancel all of that card's effects and discard it. Then, take 1 horror.

name: 反覆尝试
text: [reaction]在一次技能检定失败后，如果你拥有的一张技能卡被投入该次检定中，消耗反覆尝试：将那张技能卡返回你手中。
real_text: [reaction] After a skill test is failed, if a skill card you own is committed to that test, exhaust Try and Try Again: Return that skill card to your hand.

name: 马克·哈里根
text: 你开始游戏时把索菲(深切的思念)放置到场上。 [reaction]有伤害放置到你控制的卡牌上后：抽取1张卡牌。(每个阶段限制一次。) [elder_sign]效果：马克·哈里根身上每有一点伤害，+1。
real_text: You begin the game with Sophie (In Loving Memory) in play. [reaction] After damage is placed on a card you control: Draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.) [elder_sign] effect: +1 for each damage on Mark Harrigan.
flavor: 如果有必要，他可以烧了整座城，但他不会让那些怪物夺走任何人的生命。
back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：守卫者卡([guardian])等级0-5，中立卡牌等级0-5，[[策略]]卡牌等级0。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：保卫后方、炮弹休克、索菲、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 有无数人拖着残缺的身体和受伤的心灵从战场回到家乡。但马克·哈里根见证的恐怖却是他无法解释的。但他写信回家时，把自己的见闻告诉了他心爱的索菲，她对此深信不疑——残杀人类的不是人类，而是些不明生物。他回家看她时，终于发现为什么她那么相信自己了：这种生物就寄宿在她体内，从内部啃食着她，从她体内破肚而出。在无助和恐惧之下，马克看着那个生物享用完它的美餐，看着索菲尖叫着消失在空气之中。现在所有人都觉得马克·哈里根疯了。也许他是疯了，但他知道那些怪物是真实存在的，除非消灭那些怪物，否则他永远不会罢手。

name: 潘明
text:
[reaction]你所在地点的调查员在技能检定中投入一张卡牌后：在此次技能检定结束前，该卡牌获得1个[wild]图标。(每位调查员每轮限制1次。)
[elder_sign]效果：+1。本次技能检定结束后，你可以选择投入本次技能检定的一张技能卡返回其所有者的手牌。
real_text:
[reaction] After an investigator at your location commits a card to a skill test: That card gains a [wild] icon until the end of the test. (Limit once for each investigator per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. You may choose a skill card committed to this skill test to return to its owner's hand after this test ends.
flavor: "相信我，我可以带你穿越未知的领域。"
back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：探求者卡([seeker])等级0-5，中立卡牌等级0-5，求生者卡([survivor])等级0-2。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：缜密分析、黄衣之王(第一幕)、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 潘明感觉自己从未融入美国。在移居之前，她居住在日本统治下的韩国，那时作为越南人的她生活更为艰难。她始终不忘自己的父母做出了多大牺牲才举家迁来美国，于是她勤奋学习，考取了大学文凭。终于有一天，她父亲结识了一位来自阿卡姆的托马斯先生，对方邀请她来自己公司工作。起初托马斯先生对她非常和善——但自从他开始阅读《黄衣之王》后，他性情大变。他把书借给潘明，但她看完第一章后就始终不敢继续阅读。三个星期后，人们发现托马斯先生自杀身亡……而真相就隐藏在这本《黄衣之王》中。

name: 保卫后方
text:
马克·哈里根牌组专用。
如果攻击中的这次技能检定成功，将马克·哈里根身上的1点伤害移动到受到攻击的敌人身上。
real_text:
Mark Harrigan deck only.
If this skill test is successful during an attack, move 1 damage from Mark Harrigan to the attacked enemy.
flavor: 真正的战争现在才开始。

name: 炮弹休克
text: 显现 - 你身上每有2点伤害，受到1点恐惧。
real_text: Revelation - For every 2 damage on you, take 1 horror.
flavor: 战争永远不会改变。

name: 索菲
text: 马克·哈里根牌组专用。 索菲不能离场。 [free]受到1点直接伤害：这次技能检定你+2技能值。 强制 - 如果马克·哈里根身上有5点或更多伤害：将索菲翻面。
real_text: Mark Harrigan deck only. Sophie cannot leave play. [free] Take 1 direct damage: You get +2 to your skill value for this skill test. Forced - If Mark Harrigan has 5 or more damage on him: Flip Sophie.
back_text: 索菲不能离场。 你每项技能-1。 强制 - 如果马克·哈里根身上有4点或更少伤害：将索菲翻面。

linked_card.name: 索菲
linked_card.text:
索菲不能离场。

你每项技能-1。

强制 - 如果马克·哈里根身上有4点或更少伤害：将索菲翻面。
linked_card.real_text: Sophie cannot leave play. You get -1 to each of your skills. Forced - If Mark Harrigan has 4 or less damage on him: Flip Sophie.

name: 缜密分析
text:
潘明牌组专用。
每次其它地点的调查员进行技能检定时，你都可以投入1张卡牌。
[reaction]你在技能检定中投入正好1张卡牌后，消耗缜密分析：抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
Minh Thi Phan deck only.
You may commit 1 card to each skill test performed by an investigator at another location.
[reaction] After you commit exactly 1 card to a skill test, exhaust Analytical Mind: Draw 1 card.

name: 黄衣之王
text: 显现 - 将黄衣之王放置入你的威胁区域。除非通过以下[reaction]能力，否则它不能离场。 你不能在技能检定中投入正好1或2张卡牌。 [reaction]技能检定成功且潘明投入至少6个与该次检定对应的技能图标后：丢弃黄衣之王。
real_text: Revelation - Put The King in Yellow into play in your threat area. It cannot leave play except through the [reaction] ability below. You cannot commit exactly 1 or 2 cards to a skill test. [reaction] After a skill test is successful in which Minh Thi Phan has committed at least 6 matching skill icons for that test: Discard The King in Yellow.

name: 勇气过人
text: 你所在地点的其他调查员受到的伤害可以分配给勇气过人。
real_text: True Grit may be assigned damage dealt to other investigators at your location.
flavor: 只是轻伤。

name: "放着我来！"
text:
快速。另一位调查员抽取了1张非祸害遭遇卡后，结算该卡牌效果前打出。
改为你被视为抽取了该遭遇卡。结算该卡牌的显现效果时，你每项技能+2。
real_text:
Fast. Play after another investigator draws a non-peril encounter card, but before resolving that card's effects.
You are considered to have drawn that encounter card, instead. You get +2 to each of your skills while resolving that card's revelation effect.

name: 殚精竭虑
text: 选择你所在地点的一位调查员。该调查员在其牌堆顶部的6张卡牌中查找并抽取1张卡牌，并且混洗自己的牌堆。
real_text: Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator searches the top 6 cards of his or her deck for a card, draws it, and shuffles his or her deck.

name: 掌握内幕
text: 使用(3秘密)。 [action]花费1秘密：调查。调查任意一个已揭示的地点，视为你在该地点中。
real_text: Uses (3 secrets). [action] Spend 1 secret: Investigate. Investigate any revealed location in play as if you were at that location.

name: 赛菲娜·卢梭
text: 强制 - 在你将要抽取起始手牌时：改为抽取13张卡牌。选择最多5张事件卡放在本卡牌下，并保留8张卡牌作为你的起始手牌。丢弃其余卡牌。(你不能换牌。) [action]：选择并抽取本卡牌下方的一张事件卡。不会引起趁乱攻击。 [elder_sign]效果：+3。你可以选择并抽取本卡牌下的一张事件卡。
real_text: Forced - When you would draw your opening hand: Draw 13 cards, instead. Choose up to 5 events to place beneath this card and keep 8 cards as your opening hand. Discard the rest. (You cannot mulligan.) [action]: Choose an event beneath this card and draw it. Does not provoke attacks of opportunity. [elder_sign] effect: +3. You may choose an event beneath this card and draw it.
back_text: 卡牌张数：33。 牌组构建选项：流浪者卡([rogue])等级0-5，中立卡牌等级0-5，潜修者卡([mystic])等级0-2。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：3张画中世界、毕宿星团、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 从小开始，赛菲娜漂亮的画就吸引了许多人的目光。后来，一位巴黎的艺术收藏家来到塔西提岛，发现了赛菲娜，给了她一份工作，但要求她为他绘製赝品。赛菲娜敏锐的眼光和稳健的巧手让她成为这份工作不二的人选，而她也发现造假工艺远比她想像中更能激发她的热情。最近一位腰缠万贯的匿名陌生人给了她一份差事，要她重绘出一座奇怪的异星城市的全景图。当她完成最后一笔时，她猛地被拖入了画中的世界。筋疲力竭之下，她昏厥了过去，差一点当场暴毙。她醒来时，已身处自己的画室，这时她知道，一切都是真实的。

name: 阿喀琦·奥耶莉
text:
你带有"使用(充能)"的支援卡入场时带有额外1点充能。
[elder_sign]效果：+1。你控制的一张带有"使用(充能)"的支援卡增加1点充能。
real_text:
Your assets with "uses (charges)" enter play with 1 additional charge on them.
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Add 1 charge to an asset with "uses (charges)" you control.
flavor: "我会渡越彼岸。我不惧怕它们。"
back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：潜修者卡([mystic])等级0-5，中立卡牌等级0-5，带有"使用(充能)"的卡牌等级0-4，[[密教]]卡牌等级0。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：灵言者、怒灵、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 阿喀琦来自奈及利亚，她从小就和他人格格不入。她经常与空气对话，也不和其他孩子一起玩耍，所以村里人觉得她疯了。而村民迪比亚第一个发现了她的潜力。他相信神灵选中了阿喀琦是需要她去成就大事，于是他教会了她如何发挥潜力与神灵交流。在他的教导下，阿喀琦迅速成长为一名年轻睿智的领袖，不仅她所在的村子，所有她帮助过的社群都对她尊敬有加。现在她要踏上征途，运用她独有的知识去解决那些只有她能解决的非自然问题。

name: 画中世界
text:
赛菲娜·卢梭牌组专用。
不能放在赛菲娜·卢梭下。
打出画中世界时，将其作为赛菲娜·卢梭下的一张非卓越事件卡。不要丢弃画中世界，改为将其从游戏中移除。
real_text:
Sefina Rousseau deck only.
Cannot be placed beneath Sefina Rousseau.
Play The Painted World as an exact copy of a non-exceptional event that is beneath Sefina Rousseau. Remove The Painted World from the game instead of discarding it.

name: 毕宿星团
text: 显现 - 随机选择赛菲娜·卢梭下的一张事件卡，将其从游戏中移除。如果你不能这么做，受到1点伤害和1点恐惧。如果你的牌组有5张或以上卡牌，不要丢弃毕宿星团，改为将其重洗回你的牌组。
real_text: Revelation - Randomly choose an event beneath Sefina Rousseau and remove it from the game. If you cannot, take 1 damage and 1 horror. If your deck has 5 or more cards in it, shuffle Stars of Hyades back into your deck instead of discarding it.

name: 灵言者
text: 阿喀琦·奥耶莉牌组专用。 [free]消耗灵言者：选择你控制的一张带有"使用(充能)"的支援卡。该支援卡返回你的手牌，或者将该支援卡上所有的充能(作为资源)移动到你的资源池并丢弃该支援卡。
real_text: Akachi Onyele deck only. [free] Exhaust Spirit-Speaker: Choose an asset you control with "uses (charges)." Either return that asset to your hand, or move all charges from that asset to your resource pool (as resources) and discard that asset.

name: 怒灵
text: 显现 - 将怒灵放置入你的威胁区域。 [free]消耗1张[[法术]]支援卡：将该支援卡上的1个充能移动到怒灵上。 强制 - 在游戏结束时，如果怒灵上的充能少于4个：你受到1点肉体创伤。
real_text: Revelation - Put Angered Spirits into play in your threat area. [free] Exhaust a [[Spell]] asset: Move 1 charge from that asset to Angered Spirits. Forced - When the game ends, if Angered Spirits has fewer than 4 charges on it: You suffer 1 physical trauma.

name: 古代雕文
text: [action]丢弃手牌中1张含有至少1个[intellect]技能图标的卡牌：从供应堆拿取1资源放到古代雕文上，作为秘密。 强制 - 第3个秘密放到古代雕文上后：丢弃古代雕文并获得5资源。在你的冒险日誌上记录下"你翻译出了雕文。"
real_text: [action] Discard a card with at least 1 [intellect] skill icon from your hand: Place 1 resource on Archaic Glyphs from the token pool, as a secret. Forced - After the third secret is placed on Archaic Glyphs: Discard Archaic Glyphs and gain 5 resources. Record in your Campaign Log that "you have translated the glyphs."
traits: 道具. 密教. 书籍

name: 障眼戏法
text: 快速。只能在你回合中打出。将手牌中的一张[[道具]]支援卡放置入场。当你回合结束时，如果该支援卡还在场上，将其收回你的手牌。
real_text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Put an [[Item]] asset into play from your hand. At the end of your turn, if that asset is still in play, return it to your hand.

name: 艺高胆大
text:
快速。在你技能检定将要成功时打出。
这次技能检定你+2技能值。
real_text:
Fast. Play when you would succeed at a skill test.
You get +2 skill value for this test.
flavor:
"麦克格伦，你想让我们两个都送命吗？"
"这次不会了，伙计。这次不会了。"

name: 炼金转化
text:
使用(3充能)。
[action]消耗炼金转化，花费1充能：检定[willpower](1)。你成功时每超过难度1点，获得1个资源(上限3个)。如果本次检定中抽出[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]、[elder_thing]或[auto_fail]标记，受到1点伤害。
real_text:
Uses (3 charges).
[action] Exhaust Alchemical Transmutation, spend 1 charge: Test [willpower] (1). For each point you succeed by, gain 1 resource (to a maximum of 3). If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this test, take 1 damage.

name: 解锢灵魂
text: 打出你手牌中一张[[法术]]或[[仪式]]，其资源费用降低3点。
real_text: Play a [[Spell]] or [[Ritual]] card from your hand, reducing its resource cost by 3.
flavor:
力量攫获了她，让她浑身战栗，痉挛。
能量与她融为一体，
然后，她睁开了双眼……

name: 星界旅行
text: 移动。移动到任意一个已揭示的地点并从混乱袋中随机抽取1个标记。如果抽出[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]、[elder_thing]或[auto_fail]标记，你必须丢弃一张你控制的[[道具]]或[[盟友]]支援卡(如果你不能这么做，则受到1点伤害)。
real_text: Move. Move to any revealed location and reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If you reveal a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, you must discard an [[Item]] or [[Ally]] asset you control (if you cannot, take 1 damage).
flavor: 跨维度的旅行存在着风险，这他很清楚。但谁能抗拒那超越时空的疆域呢?

name: 随行鬼影
text: 生成 - 离你最远的地点。 猎物 - 仅对承受者。 猎手。 强制 - 在随行鬼影将要被击败时：改为将其洗入承受者的牌组。
real_text: Spawn - Location farthest from you. Prey - Bearer only. Hunter. Forced - When The Thing That Follows would be defeated: Instead shuffle it into its bearer's deck.
flavor: 无论天涯海角，始终不离不弃。

name: 头脑发热
text: 显现 - 抽取遭遇牌堆顶上的1张卡牌。该卡牌获得涌动。
real_text: Revelation - Draw the top card of the encounter deck. That card gains surge.
flavor: "不要担心，现在局势完全在我掌控之下！"

name: 涂绘印记
text: 显现 - 将涂绘印记放置入你的威胁区域。 你的手牌上限降低5张。(FAQ, v1.6) [action][action]：丢弃涂绘印记。
real_text: Revelation - Put Drawing the Sign into play in your threat area. Your maximum hand size is reduced by 5. [action] [action]: Discard Drawing the Sign.

name: 威廉·约里克
text: [reaction]在你击败敌人后：从你的弃牌堆(支付其费用)打出一张支援卡。(每轮限制1次。) [elder_sign]效果：+2。如果本次检定成功，将你弃牌堆中的1张卡牌返回你的手牌。
real_text: [reaction] After you defeat an enemy: Play an asset from your discard pile (paying its cost). (Limit once per round.) [elder_sign] effect: +2. If this test is successful, return 1 card from your discard pile to your hand.
flavor: "我不过是这场剧中的一个演员，但我很幸运，我会活着看到落幕。"
back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：求生者卡([survivor])等级0-5，中立卡牌等级0-5，守卫者卡([guardian])等级0-2。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：挖土深埋、墓地食尸鬼、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 威廉·约里克从没想过要当一个挖墓人。他早年学习演艺，在波士顿当了多年演员，承接所有角色。莎士比亚的戏剧当然精彩，但是过了多年却没有接到几个角色的他也不得不承认舞臺不是他的归宿。掘墓是一件沉闷的工作，但死者却是最好的观众，而威廉最喜欢的就是戏剧独白。但当他发现一群堕落的生物正在啃食墓地里的尸体时，一切又变得不同了。自从那一晚起，为了保护死者，约里克用尽了各种手段驱赶那些生物。

name: 挖土深埋
text: 威廉·约里克牌组专用。 快速。你所在地点中1个非[[精英]]敌人被击败后打出。 将该敌人(与本卡牌)放入胜利牌区。
real_text: William Yorick deck only. Fast. Play after a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location is defeated. Add that enemy (and this card) to the victory display.
flavor:
"这些虽然是疯话，却有深意在内。"
<cite>《哈姆雷特》，威廉·莎士比亚着</cite>

name: 墓地食尸鬼
text: 猎物 - 仅限威廉·约里克。 猎手。 墓地食尸鬼与你交战时，你弃牌堆中的卡牌不能离开弃牌堆。
real_text: Prey - William Yorick only. Hunter. While Graveyard Ghouls is engaged with you, cards cannot leave your discard pile.
traits: 类人. 怪物. 食尸鬼
flavor:
"地狱空荡荡，魔鬼在人间。"
<cite>《暴风雨》，威廉·莎士比亚着</cite>

name: 提灯
text: [action]：调查。本次调查中你所在地点-1隐藏值。 [action]丢弃提灯：对你所在地点的一个敌人造成1点伤害。本行动不会引起趁乱攻击。
real_text: [action]: Investigate. Your location gets -1 shroud for this investigation. [action] Discard Lantern: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: 挖墓人的铲子
text: [action]：攻击。这次攻击中你+2[combat]。 [action]丢弃挖墓人的铲子：发现你所在地点的1个线索。
real_text: [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. [action] Discard Gravedigger's Shovel: Discover 1 clue at your location.
traits: 道具. 工具. 武器. 近战
flavor: 我知道我不应该再挖了，但我就是停不下来。

name: .32柯尔特手枪
text: 使用(6子弹)。 [action]花费1子弹：攻击。这次攻击造成+1伤害。
real_text: Uses (6 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You deal +1 damage for this attack.
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械
flavor: 虽然发明了半自动枪械，但许多警官和私有枪枝持有者仍然相信左轮手枪更为可靠。

name: 时刻警惕
text: 每次1张，打出你手牌中最多3张支援卡，每张资源费用减少1点。
real_text: One at a time, play up to 3 assets from your hand, reducing the resource cost of each by 1.
flavor:
不得不说，
洛根这傢伙对世界末日真的留了一手。

name: 实地调查
text: [reaction]你移动到一个地点后，如果该地点至少有1个线索，消耗实地调查：本阶段中你下一次技能检定+2技能值。
real_text: [reaction] After you move to a location, if that location has at least 1 clue on it, exhaust Fieldwork: You get +2 skill value for the next skill test you perform this phase.
flavor: 要是这都不能让吉尼进入探险家俱乐部，那就没可能了。

name: 潜行
text: [action]消耗潜行：躲避。本次躲避尝试所选敌人-2躲避。如果你成功躲避该敌人，它解除交战状态但不消耗。你回合结束前，该敌人不能与你交战。
real_text: [action] Exhaust Stealth: Evade. The chosen enemy gets -2 evade for this evasion attempt. If you successfully evade the enemy, disengage with it but do not exhaust it. Until the end of your turn, that enemy cannot engage you.

name: 撬锁工具
text: 使用(3补给)。如果撬锁工具上没有补给，将其丢弃。 [action]消耗撬锁工具：调查。这次调查中将你的[agility]数值加入你的技能值。如果你没有成功并超过难度至少2点，移除撬锁工具上的1补给。
real_text: Uses (3 supplies). If Lockpicks has no supplies, discard it. [action] Exhaust Lockpicks: Investigate. Add your [agility] value to your skill value for this investigation. If you do not succeed by at least 2, remove 1 supply from Lockpicks.
traits: 道具. 工具. 违法

name: 灵力祭祀刀
text: [free]进行[[法术]]卡上的技能检定时，消耗灵力祭祀刀：这次技能检定你+2技能值。 [action]消耗灵力祭祀刀：攻击。这次攻击中你+2[combat]。
real_text: [free] During a skill test on a [[Spell]] card, exhaust Spirit Athame: You get +2 skill value for this test. [action] Exhaust Spirit Athame: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack.
traits: 道具. 遗物. 武器. 近战

name: 藏身地点
text: 快速。将藏身地点迭加到一个任意地点。 被迭加地点上每名非[[精英]]敌人获得冷漠。 强制 - 当敌军阶段结束时，如果该地点上有准备的敌人：丢弃藏身地点。
real_text: Fast. Attach Hiding Spot to any location. Each non-[[Elite]] enemy at attached location gains aloof. Forced - At the end of the enemy phase, if a ready enemy is at attached location: Discard Hiding Spot.
flavor: 一隻羊、两隻羊……

name: 急中生智
text: 如果本次技能检定成功，选择你弃牌堆中一张标题不是急中生智的[survivor]卡牌。将选中的卡牌加入你的手牌。
real_text: If this skill test is successful, choose a [survivor] card not named Resourceful in your discard pile. Add the chosen card to your hand.

name: .45自动手枪
text: 使用(4子弹)。 [action]花费1子弹：攻击。这次攻击中你+2[combat]。这次攻击造成+1伤害。这次攻击忽略反击关键词。
real_text: Uses (4 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage. Ignore the retaliate keyword for this attack.
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械

name: 扒窃
text:
快速。
[reaction]在你躲避一名敌人后，消耗扒窃：抽取1张卡牌或获得1资源。如果你成功并超过难度2点或以上，改为执行以上两项。
real_text:
Fast.
[reaction] After you evade an enemy, exhaust Pickpocketing: Draw 1 card or gain 1 resource. If you succeeded by 2 or more, do both instead.

name: 查尔斯·罗斯大人
text:
你可以花费资源来支付你所在地点中其他调查员打出的[[道具]]支援卡。
[free]消耗查尔斯·罗斯大人：你所在地点的调查员打出的下一张[[道具]]支援卡的费用降低1点。
real_text:
You may spend resources to pay for [[Item]] assets played by other investigators at your location.
[free] Exhaust Charles Ross, Esq.: Reduce the cost of the next [[Item]] asset played by an investigator at your location by 1.

name: 预先警告
text:
快速。在你抽出一张非弱点诡计卡时打出。
将你的1个线索放置到你所在地点上。然后，取消该卡牌的显现效果。
real_text:
Fast. Play when you draw a non-weakness treachery card.
Place 1 of your clues on your location. Then, cancel that card's revelation effect.
flavor: 知己知彼者，百战不殆。

name: 达里奥·埃尔阿明
text:
如果你有10点或以上资源，你获得+1[willpower]和+1[intellect]。
[action]如果你所在地点没有敌人，消耗达里奥·埃尔阿明：获得2资源。
real_text:
While you have 10 or more resources, you get +1 [willpower] and +1 [intellect].
[action] If there are no enemies at your location, exhaust Dario El-Amin: Gain 2 resources.

name: 意志考验
text:
快速。在你所在地点的一位调查员抽出一张非弱点诡计卡时打出。
取消该卡牌的显现效果。放逐意志考验。
real_text:
Fast. Play when an investigator at your location draws a non-weakness treachery card.
Cancel that card's revelation effect. Exile A Test of Will.
flavor: 无论是否看得到希望，你所能做的只有抵抗。

name: 英勇救援
text: 快速。在一个非[[精英]]敌人将要攻击你所在地点的另一位调查员时打出。改为与该敌人交战并结算它对你的攻击。然后，对其造成1点伤害。
real_text:
Fast. Play when a non-[[Elite]] enemy would attack another investigator at your location.
Engage that enemy and resolve its attack against you instead. Then, deal it 1 damage.

name: 战斗训练
text:
快速。场上限制1张[[沉稳]]。
非直接恐惧必须分配给战斗训练后才能分配给你的调查员卡。
[free]花费1资源：这次技能检定中你+1[combat]。
[free]花费1资源：这次技能检定中你+1[agility]。
real_text:
Fast. Limit 1 [[Composure]] in play.
Non-direct horror must be assigned to Combat Training before it can be assigned to your investigator card.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [combat] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.

name: 解剖图表
text:
快速。在任意调查员的回合中打出。你剩余神智值为5点或以上时才可打出。
选择你所在地点中一个非[[精英]]敌人。在当前调查员回合结束前，该敌人-2攻击并-2躲避。
real_text:
Fast. Play during any investigator's turn. Play only if you have 5 or more remaining sanity.
Choose a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location. Until the end of the active investigator's turn, that enemy gets -2 fight and -2 evade.
flavor: 它们再怎样也只是动物。但那只是我们的想法。

name: 科学理论
text:
快速。场上限制1张[[沉稳]]。
非直接恐惧必须分配给科学理论后才能分配给你的调查员卡。
[free]花费1资源：这次技能检定中你+1[intellect]。
