text: 只要你剩余生命值和神智值总合至少为5时，坚定不移获得[willpower][combat](只要你剩余生命值和神智值总合至少为10时，改为坚定不移获得[willpower][willpower][combat][combat]。)。
real_text: While you have 5 or more total remaining health and sanity, Steadfast gains [willpower] [combat] (while you have 10 or more total remaining health and sanity, Steadfast gains [willpower] [willpower] [combat] [combat], instead).
flavor: 勇敢和愚蠢之间只有一线之隔。

name: 串联线索
text:
快速。在你发现你所在地点最后一个线索后打出。
发现一个地点的2个线索，该地点的打印隐藏值须低于你所在地点。
real_text:
Fast. Play after you discover the last clue at your location.
Discover 2 clues at a location with a lower printed shroud value than your location.
flavor: 他们曾认为你变得不可理喻。偏执。妄想。但结果证明，你一直以来都是对的。

name: 好奇心
text: 只要你至少有4张手牌，好奇心获得[willpower][intellect](只要你至少有7张手牌，改为好奇心获得[willpower][willpower][intellect][intellect])。
real_text: While you have 4 or more cards in hand, Curiosity gains [willpower] [intellect] (while you have 7 or more cards in hand, Curiosity gains [willpower] [willpower] [intellect] [intellect], instead).
flavor: 如果你就是被好奇心害死的那隻猫呢？

name: 良好人脉
text:
每位调查员限制1张。
[fast]消耗良好人脉：你每有5资源，这次技能检定你的技能值+1。
real_text:
Limit 1 per investigator.
[fast] Exhaust Well Connected: You get +1 skill value for this skill test for every 5 resources you have.
flavor: 有的时候，有关係比有本事强。

name: 狡猾
text: 只要你拥有至少5资源，狡猾获得[intellect][agility](只要你拥有至少10资源，改为狡猾获得[intellect][intellect][agility][agility])。
real_text: While you have 5 or more resources, Cunning gains [intellect] [agility] (while you have 10 or more resources, Cunning gains [intellect] [intellect] [agility] [agility], instead).
flavor: "别担心。"她坚持说。"我能搞定这事。"

name: 否决存在
text: 快速。在遭遇卡或一名敌人攻击将会导致你执行以下一项(选择一项)时打出：丢弃手牌、失去资源、失去行动、受到伤害或受到恐惧。 你忽略该效果的影响。(其它效果正常结算。)
real_text: Fast. Play when an encounter card or an enemy attack would cause you to do one of the following (choose one): Discard cards from hand, lose resources, lose actions, take damage, or take horror. You ignore that aspect of the effect. (Each other aspect resolves normally.)

name: 恐怖灵感
text: 快速。在你将要结算一张[mystic]卡牌的效果，且该效果在抽出[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]、[elder_thing]或[auto_fail]符号时、如果抽出或在抽出后触发时打出。(FAQ, v1.5) 取消该效果，或额外结算一次该效果。
real_text:
Fast. Play when you would resolve an effect on a [mystic] card that triggers "when," "if," or "after" a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed.
Either cancel that effect, or resolve it an additional time.

name: 预见未来
text: 只要场上至少有3个毁灭标记，预见未来获得[wild](只要场上至少有6个毁灭标记，改为预见未来获得[wild][wild])。
real_text: While there are 3 or more doom in play, Prophesy gains [wild] (while there are 6 or more doom in play, Prophesy gains [wild] [wild], instead).
flavor: 末日将至

name: 圣杯四
text:
你获得+1[willpower]。
[reaction]在游戏开始时，如果圣杯四在你起始手牌中：将其放置入场。
real_text:
You get +1 [willpower].
[reaction] When the game begins, if Four of Cups is in your opening hand: Put it into play.
flavor: 找寻你心灵与思绪的清明。

name: 绝望之举
text: 作为打出绝望之举的额外费用，从你手牌或游戏区域选择并丢弃一张占用至少1个手部槽位的[[道具]]支援卡。 攻击。你这次攻击+X[combat]并造成+1伤害，X为所选支援卡的打印资源 费用。如果你成功且该支援卡是从你的游戏区域中丢弃的，获得X资源。
real_text: As an additional cost to play Act of Desperation, choose and discard an [[Item]] asset that takes up at least 1 hand slot from your hand or play area. Fight. You get +X [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack, where X is the chosen asset's printed resource cost. If you succeed and that asset was in your play area, gain X resources.

name: 第十三幻象
text: 显现 - 将第十三幻象放置入你的威胁区域。 你所在地点的调查员在技能检定中，技能值等于检定难度时失败。 [action][action]：丢弃第十三幻象。
real_text: Revelation - Put The 13th Vision into play in your threat area. Investigators at your location fail ties during skill tests. [action] [action]: Discard The 13th Vision.
flavor: 前十二个都是假象……

name: 秘密捲轴
text:
使用(3秘密)。
[action]消耗秘密捲轴并花费1秘密：查看遭遇牌堆或任意一位调查员牌堆底部的卡牌。然后，丢弃该卡牌、将其加入其所有者手牌，或将其放到该牌堆顶部或牌堆底部。
real_text:
Uses (3 secrets).
[action] Exhaust Scroll of Secrets and spend 1 secret: Look at the bottom card of any investigator's deck or the encounter deck. Then, either discard that card, add it to its owner's hand, place it on the bottom of its deck, or place it on the top of its deck.

name: 田纳西酸麦芽威士忌
text: 使用(2补给)。 [fast]消耗田纳西酸麦芽威士忌并花费1补给：你在诡计卡的一次技能检定中+2[willpower]。 [action]丢弃田纳西酸麦芽威士忌：攻击。你这次攻击+3[combat]。
real_text: Uses (2 supplies). [fast] Exhaust Tennessee Sour Mash and spend 1 supply: You get +2 [willpower] for a skill test on a treachery card. [action] Discard Tennessee Sour Mash: Fight. You get +3 [combat] for this attack.

name: 恐怖图腾
text: [reaction]在你将一张卡牌投入技能检定后，消耗恐怖图腾：你选择该卡牌已有的任意一个技能图标，该卡牌额外获得该图标。
real_text: [reaction] After you commit a card to a skill test, exhaust Grisly Totem: That card gains another instance of one of its skill icons of your choice.
flavor: 当时应该马上把它丢掉的。但我们又怎么知道呢？

name: .45汤姆逊衝锋枪
text: 使用(5子弹)。 [action]花费1子弹：攻击。你这次攻击+2[combat]并造成+1伤害。
real_text: Uses (5 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack.
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械. 违法
flavor: 这款全自动的汤姆逊衝锋枪因为其精确度与大火力，同时受到黑帮与警察的青睐。

name: 赴汤蹈火
text: 对你所在地点的其他调查员造成的恐惧可以分配到赴汤蹈火。
real_text: Something Worth Fighting For may be assigned horror dealt to other investigators at your location.
flavor: 我不能死在这儿。现在不能，还不能。

name: 水落石出
text:
快速。在一位调查员发现你所在地点的最后一个线索后打出。
位于该地点的调查员获得总计X资源，由你自行分配，X为该地点的隐藏值。
real_text:
Fast. Play after an investigator discovers the last remaining clue at your location.
Investigators at that location gain a total of X resources, distributed as you wish. X is that location's shroud value.
flavor: "……当你排除掉一切不可能的情况后，不论剩下的有多不可思议，都一定是真相。"<cite>亚瑟·柯南·道尔《白化士兵》</cite>

name: 情报报告
text:
发现你所在地点的1个线索。
[reaction]在你打出情报报告时，提升其费用2点：将"发现……的1个线索"变为"发现……的2个线索。"
[reaction]在你打出情报报告时，提升其费用2点：将"你所在地点"变为"1个与你所在地点之间连接次数不超过2的地点"
real_text:
Discover 1 clue at your location.
[reaction] When you play Intel Report, increase its cost by 2: Change "Discover 1 clue" to "Discover 2 clues."
[reaction] When you play Intel Report, increase its cost by 2: Change "at your location" to "at a location up to 2 connections away."

name: 魔法手势
text:
快速。
你拥有额外1个法术槽位，只能用来放置[[法术]]或[[仪式]]支援卡。
real_text:
Fast.
You have 1 additional arcane slot, which can only be used to hold a [[Spell]] or [[Ritual]] asset.
flavor: 皮囊不过是意识的延伸。

name: 驱除
text: 躲避。仅可对非[[精英]]敌人使用。这次躲避尝试不使用[agility]，改为使用[willpower]。如果你成功，将刚刚躲避的敌人移动到场上任意一个地点。如果你成功，且这次躲避尝试期间抽出[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]或[elder_thing]符号，该敌人在下一个补给阶段中不准备。
real_text: Evade. Use only on a non-[[Elite]] enemy. This evasion attempt uses [willpower] instead of [agility]. If you succeed, move the enemy just evaded to any location in play. If you succeed and a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] symbol was revealed during this evasion attempt, that enemy does not ready during the next upkeep phase.

name: 切肉刀
text: [action]：攻击。这次攻击你+1[combat](如果你剩余神智值不超过3点，改为+2[combat])。如果这次攻击击败一名敌人，你可以治癒1点恐惧。作为发动此能力的额外费用，你可以受到1点恐惧来让这次攻击造成+1伤害。
real_text: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack (+2 [combat] instead if you have 3 or fewer remaining sanity). If this attack defeats an enemy, you may heal 1 horror. As an additional cost to initiate this ability, you may take 1 horror to have this attack deal +1 damage.
traits: 道具. 武器. 近战

name: 附魔剑
text: 使用(3充能)。 [action]：攻击。你这次攻击+1[combat]。作为发动此能力的额外费用，你可以花费1充能来为剑附魔。如果你这么做，你这次攻击再+1[combat]并造成+1伤害。
real_text: Uses (3 charges). [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. As an additional cost to initiate this ability, you may spend 1 charge to empower the blade. If you do, you get +1 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack.
traits: 道具. 遗物. 武器. 近战

name: 鹰眼摺迭相机
text: [reaction]在你所在地点的最后1个线索被发现后：在本卡牌上放置1资源(从供应堆拿取)，作为证据。(每场游戏每个地点限制一次。) 只要鹰眼摺迭相机上有…… - …… 至少1个证据，你获得+1[willpower]。 - ……至少2个证据，你获得+1[intellect]。 - ……至少3个证据，你+1神智值。
real_text: [reaction] After the last clue is discovered from your location: Place 1 resource (from the token pool) on this card, as evidence. (Limit once per game at each location.) While Hawk-Eye Folding Camera has ... - ... 1 or more evidence, you get +1 [willpower]. - ... 2 or more evidence, you get +1 [intellect]. - ... 3 or more evidence, you get +1 sanity.

name: 第六感
text: [action]：调查。不使用[intellect]，改为使用[willpower]调查。如果这次检定中抽出[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]或[elder_thing]符号，你可以选择与你所在地点连接的一个已揭示地点；改为如同你在所选地点调查，而不是在你所在地点(你可以使用两个地点中任意一个地点的隐藏值)。
real_text: [action]: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect]. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] symbol is revealed during this test, you may choose a revealed location connected to your location; you are now investigating as if you were at the chosen location instead of your location (you may use either shroud value).

name: 秘密捲轴
text:
使用(3秘密)。
[action]消耗秘密捲轴并花费1秘密：查看任意一位调查员牌堆或遭遇牌堆底部的3张卡牌。你可以丢弃其中1张。你可以将其中1张加入其所有者的手牌。将其中剩余的卡牌以任意顺序放到该牌堆底部或者顶部。
real_text:
Uses (3 secrets).
[action] Exhaust Scroll of Secrets and spend 1 secret: Look at the bottom 3 cards of any investigator's deck or the encounter deck. You may discard 1 of those cards. You may add 1 of those cards to its owner's hand. Place the rest of those cards on either the top or bottom of their deck, in any order.

name: 田纳西酸麦芽威士忌
text: 快速。使用(2补给)。 [fast]消耗田纳西酸麦芽威士忌并花费1补给：你在诡计卡的一次技能检定中+3[willpower]。 [action]丢弃田纳西酸麦芽威士忌：攻击。你这次攻击+3 [combat]并造成+1伤害。
real_text: Fast. Uses (2 supplies). [fast] Exhaust Tennessee Sour Mash and spend 1 supply: You get +3 [willpower] for a skill test on a treachery card. [action] Discard Tennessee Sour Mash: Fight. You get +3 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack.

name: 田纳西酸麦芽威士忌
text: 使用(3补给)。 [fast]消耗田纳西酸麦芽威士忌并花费1补给：你在诡计卡的一次技能检定中+2[willpower]。 [action]丢弃田纳西酸麦芽威士忌：攻击。你这次攻击+3[combat]。如果这次攻击目标为一名非[[精英]]敌人并成功，自动躲避该敌人。
real_text: Uses (3 supplies). [fast] Exhaust Tennessee Sour Mash and spend 1 supply: You get +2 [willpower] for a skill test on a treachery card. [action] Discard Tennessee Sour Mash: Fight. You get +3 [combat] for this attack. If this attack succeeds against a non-[[Elite]] enemy, automatically evade it.

name: 特工支援
text:
对你所在地点其他调查员造成的伤害和/或恐惧可以被分配到特工支援。
[free]消耗特工支援并对其造成1点伤害：对你所在地点的1名敌人造成1点伤害。
[free]消耗特工支援并对其造成1点恐惧：发现你所在地点的1个线索。
real_text:
Agency Backup may be assigned damage and/or horror dealt to other investigators at your location.
[free] Exhaust Agency Backup and deal 1 damage to it: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.
[free] Exhaust Agency Backup and deal 1 horror to it: Discover 1 clue at your location.

name: 黛雅娜·艾丝帕伦斯
text: 使用(3秘密)。 [free]：将一张非弱点[[法术]]事件卡从你的手牌迭加到黛雅娜·艾丝帕伦斯。被迭加到其身上的事件卡限制1张。 可以打出被迭加的事件卡，如同其在你的手牌中。将其打出后，不放到你的弃牌堆(其仍维持迭加)。作为打出打出被迭加事件卡的额外费用，消耗黛雅娜·艾丝帕伦斯并花费1秘密。
real_text: Uses (3 secrets). [free]: Attach a non-weakness [[Spell]] event from your hand to Dayana Esperence. Limit 1 event attached to her. The attached event may be played as if it were in your hand. It is not placed in your discard pile after it is played (it remains attached). As an additional cost to play the attached event, exhaust Dayana Esperence and spend 1 secret.

name: 否决存在
text:
快速。在遭遇卡或一名敌人攻击将会导致你执行以下一项(选择一项)时打出：丢弃手牌、失去资源、失去行动、受到伤害或受到恐惧。
你忽略该效果的影响。然后，对应地执行与之相反的效果(抽取卡牌、获得资源、获得额外行动、治癒伤害或治癒恐惧)。
real_text:
Fast. Play when an encounter card or enemy attack would cause you to do one of the following (choose one): Discard cards from hand, lose resources, lose actions, take damage, or take horror.
You ignore that aspect of the effect. Then, perform the opposite of that aspect (draw cards, gain resources, gain additional actions, heal damage, or heal horror, respectively).

name: 勇闯火线
text:
快速。只能在你回合中打出。
选择你的一项技能。直到你的回合结束，将该技能的基础值设为5。
real_text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Choose one of your skills. Until the end of your turn, set the base value of that skill to 5.
flavor: 只有在你性命受到威胁时，你才会认识到自己能力的极限。

name: 鸣枪示警
text:
作为打出鸣枪示警的额外费用，花费你控制的1张[[枪械]]支援卡的1子弹。
移动你所在地点所有非[[精英]]敌人到一个连接地点。此行动不会引起趁乱攻击。
real_text:
As an additional cost to play Warning Shot, spend 1 ammo from a [[Firearm]] asset you control.
Move all non-[[Elite]] enemies at your location to a connecting location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
flavor: "退后！"

name: 绝密地图集
text:
使用(4秘密)。
[action]花费1秘密并消耗绝密地图集：选择1个与你所在地点之间连接次数恰好为2的已揭示地点。移动到该地点。
real_text:
Uses (4 secrets).
[action] Spend 1 secret and exhaust Esoteric Atlas: Choose a revealed location that is exactly 2 connections away from your location. Move to that location.

name: 诱敌
text: 躲避。自动躲避你所在地点的一名非[[精英]]敌人。 [reaction]在你打出诱敌时，提升其费用2点：将"一名非[[精英]]敌人"变为"最多2名非[[精英]]敌人"。 [reaction]在你打出诱敌时，提升其费用2点：将"你所在地点"变为"1个与你所在地点之间连接次数不超过2的地点。"
real_text: Evade. Automatically evade a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location. [reaction] When you play Decoy, increase its cost by 2: Change "a non-[[Elite]] enemy" to "up to 2 non-[[Elite]] enemies." [reaction] When you play Decoy, increase its cost by 2: Change "at your location" to "at a location up to 2 connections away."

name: 指路鬼魂
text: 你获得+1[intellect]。 非直接恐惧在被分配到你的调查员卡之前，必须先被分配到指路鬼魂。 强制 - 在指路鬼魂由于恐惧而被击败时：将其放逐。
real_text: You get +1 [intellect]. Non-direct horror must be assigned to Guiding Spirit before it can be assigned to your investigator card. Forced - When Guiding Spirit is defeated by horror: Exile it.

name: 妥善养护
text:
快速。只能在你回合中打出。
迭加到你控制的一张[[道具]]支援卡。每张支援卡限制1张。
[reaction]在被迭加的支援卡被丢弃后：将其返回其所有者手牌，迭加到该支援卡的每张其它[[升级]]卡也返回各自所有者的手牌。
real_text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Attach to an [[Item]] asset you control. Limit 1 per asset.
[reaction] After attached asset is discarded: Return it to its owner's hand, along with each other [[Upgrade]] attachment that was attached to it.

name: 反应灵敏
text:
快速。在任意调查员的回合中(不含行动中)打出。
立刻进行一个行动，如同在你的回合。这个行动不计入你每回合可进行的行动数。
real_text:
Fast. Play during any investigator's turn, except during an action.
Immediately take an action as if it were your turn. This action does not count toward the number of actions you can take each turn.

name: 凋零术
text: [action]：攻击。这次攻击不使用[combat]，改为使用[willpower]。如果这次攻击中抽出[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]或[elder_thing]符号，受到攻击的敌人在本回合剩余时间内-1攻击并-1躲避(最低减至1)。
real_text: [action]: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] symbol is revealed during this attack, the attacked enemy gets -1 fight and -1 evade for the remainder of the turn (to a minimum of 1).

name: 险中求胜
text: [reaction]在你发动一次技能检定时，消耗险中求胜：提升这次技能检定难度2点。获得2资源或抽取1张卡牌。
real_text: [reaction] When you initiate a skill test, exhaust Drawing Thin: Increase the difficulty of this skill test by 2. Gain 2 resources or draw 1 card.

name: 勇闯虎穴
text:
快速。在你成功躲避一名敌人并超过难度至少2点后打出。
发现该敌人所在地点的1个线索。
real_text:
Fast. Play after you successfully evade an enemy by 2 or more.
Discover 1 clue at that enemy's location.

name: 密教辞典
text: 每副牌组限制1张。 强制 - 在密教辞典入场后：在你的绑定卡牌中查找3张鲜血仪式。将其中1张加入你的手牌并将其余2张混洗入你的牌堆。在密教辞典离场时，找出所有的鲜血仪式(不论其是否在场)并将其放在一边，位于场外。(FAQ, v2.0)
real_text: Limit 1 per deck. Forced - After Occult Lexicon enters play: Search your bonded cards for 3 copies of Blood-Rite. Add 1 to your hand and shuffle the other 2 into your deck. When Occult Lexicon leaves play, find each of those copies of Blood-Rite (even if they are out of play) and set them aside, out of play.
traits: 道具. 书籍. 密教

name: 鲜血仪式
text:
绑定(密教辞典)。
抽取2张卡牌。丢弃你最多2张手牌。每有1张卡牌因此被丢弃，你可以获得1资源，或花费1资源来对你所在地点的1名敌人造成1点伤害。此行动不会引起趁乱攻击。
real_text:
Bonded (Occult Lexicon).
Draw 2 cards. Discard up to 2 cards from your hand. For each card thusly discarded, you may either gain 1 resource, or spend 1 resource to deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: 第六感
text: [action]：调查。不使用[intellect]，改为使用[willpower]调查。这次调查你+2[willpower]。如果这次检定抽出[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]或[elder_thing]符号，你可以选择与你所在地点之间连接次数不超过2的一个已揭示地点；如同你在所在地点调查的同时，也在所选地点调查 (你可以使用两个地点中任意一个地点的隐藏值)。
real_text: [action]: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect]. You get +2 [willpower] for this investigation. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] symbol is revealed during this test, you may choose a revealed location up to 2 connections away from your current location; you are now investigating as if you were at the chosen location in addition to your location (you may use either shroud value).

name: .45汤姆逊衝锋枪
text: 使用(5子弹)。 将.45汤姆逊衝锋枪花费的子弹放进你的资源池，作为资源。 [action]花费1子弹：攻击。你这次攻击+2[combat]并造成+1伤害。
real_text: Uses (5 ammo). Ammo spent from .45 Thompson is placed in your resource pool, as resources. [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack.
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械. 违法

name: .45汤姆逊衝锋枪
text: 使用(5子弹)。 [action]花费1子弹：攻击。你这次攻击+2[combat]并造成+1伤害。如果你成功并超过难度至少X点，你可以花费1子弹来对你所在地点的另一名敌人造成这次攻击的伤害，X为该敌人的攻击值。
real_text: Uses (5 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If you succeed by at least X, you may spend 1 ammo to deal this attack's damage to another enemy at your location, where X is that enemy's fight value.
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械. 违法

name: 秘密捲轴
text:
使用(4秘密)。
[action]消耗秘密捲轴并花费1秘密：查看任意一位调查员牌堆或遭遇牌堆顶部或底部的卡牌。然后，丢弃该卡牌、将其加入其所有者的手牌，或将其放到该牌堆底部或者顶部。
real_text:
Uses (4 secrets).
[action] Exhaust Scroll of Secrets and spend 1 secret: Look at the top or bottom card of any investigator's deck or the encounter deck. Then, either discard that card, add it to its owner's hand, place it on the bottom of its deck, or place it on top of its deck.

name: 附魔剑
text: 使用(3充能)。 [action]：攻击。你这次攻击+2[combat]。如果你成功，你可以花费1充能来为剑附魔，这次攻击造成+1伤害。如果剑已附魔且这次攻击击败1名敌人，抽取1张卡牌并治癒1点恐惧。
real_text: Uses (3 charges). [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. If you succeed, you may spend 1 charge to empower the blade, dealing +1 damage for this attack. If the blade is empowered and this attack defeats an enemy, draw 1 card and heal 1 horror.
traits: 道具. 遗物. 武器. 近战

name: 附魔剑
text: 使用(4充能)。 [action]：攻击。你这次攻击+2[combat]。作为使用这个能力的额外费用，你可以花费最多2充能来为剑附魔(每以此方式花费1充能，你这次攻击再+1[combat]并造成+1伤害)。
real_text: Uses (4 charges). [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. As an additional cost to use this ability, you may spend up to 2 charges to empower the blade (for each charge spent in this way, you get +1 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack).
traits: 道具. 遗物. 武器. 近战

name: 恐怖图腾
text: [reaction]在你将一张卡牌投入技能检定后，消耗恐怖图腾：你选择该卡牌已有的任意一个技能图标，该卡牌额外获得该图标。如果该技能检定成功，执行该检定的调查员抽取1张卡牌。
real_text: [reaction] After you commit a card to a skill test, exhaust Grisly Totem: That card gains another instance of one of its skill icons of your choice. If that skill test is successful, the performing investigator draws 1 card.
traits: 道具. 守护. 诅咒萦绕
flavor: 当时应该马上把它丢掉的。但我们又怎么知道呢？

name: 恐怖图腾
text: [reaction]在你将一张卡牌投入技能检定后，消耗恐怖图腾：你选择该卡牌已有的任意一个技能图标，该卡牌额外获得该图标。如果该技能检定失败，将该卡牌返回你的手牌。
real_text: [reaction] After you commit a card to a skill test, exhaust Grisly Totem: That card gains another instance of one of its skill icons of your choice. If that skill test fails, return that card to your hand.
traits: 道具. 守护. 祝福
flavor: 当时应该马上把它丢掉的。但我们又怎么知道呢？

name: 委员会的保险箱
text: 使用(1[per_investigator]锁头)。如果委员会的保险箱上没有锁头，每位调查员在自己的牌堆或弃牌堆中查找并立即免费打出任意一张卡牌。放逐委员会的保险箱。(每个剧本最多1次。) [action][action]：检定任意一项技能(5)。如果你成功，移除1个锁头。你所在地点的任何调查员都可以启动这个能力。 卡牌设计于阿卡姆之夜2017理事会。
real_text: Uses (1 [per_investigator] locks). If there are no locks on The Council's Coffer, each investigator searches his or her deck or discard pile for any card and immediately plays it at no cost. Exile The Council's Coffer. (Max once per campaign.) [action] [action]: Test any skill (5). If you succeed, remove 1 lock. Any investigator at your location may activate this ability. Card design by The Council at Arkham Nights 2017.

name: 瞄准镜
text: 快速。迭加到你控制的一张占用2个手部槽位的[[枪械]]支援卡。被迭加支援卡不能被用来攻击与你交战的敌人。 [reaction]在你使用被迭加的支援卡执行攻击行动时，如果你未与敌人交战，消耗瞄准镜：这次攻击可以选择位于一个连接地点的一名非[[精英]]敌人作为目标。这次攻击忽略冷漠和反击关键词。
real_text: Fast. Attach to a [[Firearm]] asset you control that takes up two hand slots. Attached asset cannot be used to attack enemies engaged with you. [reaction] When you perform a Fight action using attached asset, if you are engaged with no enemies, exhaust Telecopic Sight: This attack can target a non-[[Elite]] enemy at a connecting location. Ignore the aloof and retaliate keywords for this attack.

name: 知识就是力量
text: 快速。只能在你回合中打出。 选择你控制的一张[[书籍]]或[[法术]]支援卡，或揭示你手牌里的一张[[书籍]]或[[法术]]支援卡。结算该支援卡上的一项[action]或[free]能力，忽略所有费用(包括其[action]费用)。然后，如果该支援卡是从你的手牌里揭示的，你可以将其丢弃来抽取1张卡牌。
real_text: Fast. Play only during your turn. Choose a [[Tome]] or [[Spell]] asset you control, or reveal a [[Tome]] or [[Spell]] asset from your hand. Resolve an [action] or [free] ability on that asset, ignoring all costs (including its [action] cost, if any). Then, if that asset was in your hand, you may discard it to draw 1 card.
flavor: ……这股力量也会堕落。

name: 投资
text:
使用(0补给)。投资上的补给上限为10。
[free]消耗投资：在本卡牌上放置1补给。
[action]消耗并丢弃投资：将本卡牌上所有补给移动到你的资源池，作为资源。
real_text:
Uses (0 supplies). Limit 10 supplies on Investments.
[free] Exhaust Investments: Place 1 supply on it.
[action] Exhaust and discard Investments: Move all supplies from it to your resource pool, as resources.

name: 蠕虫的秘密
text: [action]消耗蠕虫的秘密并在其上放置1个毁灭标记：从你的弃牌堆打出一张[[法术]]或[[洞察]]事件卡，其资源费用降低1点。在该事件卡结算后，将其移出游戏。
real_text: [action] Exhaust De Vermis Mysteriis and place 1 doom on it: Play a [[Spell]] or [[Insight]] event from your discard pile, reducing its resource cost by 1. After that event resolves, remove it from the game.
flavor:
本书作者是路德维格·普林恩；他在巫术审判达到高潮时死于布鲁塞尔的审讯桩上。
<cite>罗伯特·布洛克，来自星际的《蹒跚者》</cite>

name: 幸运或是注定
text:
快速。在毁灭标记将被放置到任何一张冒险卡上时打出。
每场游戏最多1次。
取消刚要被放置到该卡牌上的1个毁灭标记。放逐幸运或是注定。
real_text:
Fast. Play when doom would be placed on any scenario card.
Max 1 per game.
Cancel 1 doom just placed on that card. Exile Fortune or Fate.

name: MK1手榴弹
text: 使用(3补给)。如果MK1手榴弹没有补给，则将其丢弃。 [action]花费1补给：攻击。你这次攻击+2[combat]。如果这次攻击成功，不造成基础伤害，改为对被攻击敌人所在地点的每个敌人和其他每位调查员造成2点伤害(所有额外伤害只对被攻击敌人造成)。(FAQ, v2.0)
real_text: Uses (3 supplies). If Mk 1 Grenades has no supplies, discard it. [action] Spend 1 supply: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. If this attack is successful, instead of its standard damage, this attack deals 2 damage to each enemy and each other investigator at the attacked enemy's location (any additional damage is dealt to the attacked enemy).
traits: 道具. 武器. 远程

name: 安娜·卡斯洛
text:
你拥有额外2个塔罗牌槽位。
[reaction]在游戏开始时，如果安娜·卡斯洛在你的起始手牌中：将其放置入场。
[reaction]在安娜·卡斯洛入场后：在你的牌堆中查找并放置一张[[塔罗]]支援卡入场。
real_text:
You have 2 additional tarot slots.
[reaction] When the game begins, if Anna Kaslow is in your opening hand: Put her into play.
[reaction] After Anna Kaslow enters play: Search your deck for a [[Tarot]] asset and put it into play.

name: 帮个小忙
text:
对你所在地点的一名非[[精英]]敌人造成1点伤害。
[reaction]在你打出帮个小忙时，提升其费用2点：将"造成1点伤害"变为"造成2点伤害"。
[reaction]在你打出帮个小忙时，提升其费用2点：将"你所在地点"变为"1个与你所在地点之间连接次数不超过2的地点"
real_text:
Deal 1 damage to a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location.
[reaction] When you play Small Favor, increase its cost by 2: Change "Deal 1 damage" to "Deal 2 damage."
[reaction] When you play Small Favor, increase its cost by 2: Change "at your location" to "at a location up to 2 connections away."

name: 恐怖揭露
text: 发现你所在地点的3个线索。将你任意数量的线索交给其他一位调查员，或将你任意数量的线索放置在任意一个地点上。你被击败并受到1点精神创伤。此行动不会引起趁乱攻击。
real_text: Discover 3 clues at your location. Give any number of your clues to another investigator, or place any number of your clues on any location. You are defeated and suffer 1 mental trauma. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: 苦心钻研
text:
永久。
你每场游戏开始时的起始手牌中拥有额外1张卡牌。
real_text:
Permanent.
You begin each game with 1 additional card in your opening hand.
flavor:
或许吉尔曼不该那样努力地钻研。
<cite>H. P. 洛夫克拉夫特《女巫梦中之梦》</cite>

name: 干一天活计拿一天钱
text:
永久。
你每场游戏开始时拥有额外2资源。
real_text:
Permanent.
You begin each game with 2 additional resources.
flavor: 重要的东西盯紧点。

name: 偷樑换柱
text: 选择以下一项： - 躲避。如果你成功且该敌人为非[[精英]]，躲避该敌人并将其移动到一个连接地点。 - 躲避。只能对连接地点的一名非[[精英]]敌人使用，如果你成功，躲避并与该敌人交换地点。
real_text: Either (choose one): - Evade. If you succeed and the enemy is non-[[Elite]], evade the enemy and move it to a connecting location. - Evade. Use only on a non-[[Elite]] enemy at a connecting location. If you succeed, evade that enemy and switch locations with it.

name: 托尼·摩尔根
text:
在你的回合中你可以进行一次额外的行动，该行动只能用于攻击一名带有赏金的敌人或与其交战。
[elder_sign]效果：+2。在赏金合约上放置1赏金。
real_text:
You may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to engage or fight an enemy with 1 or more bounties on it.
[elder_sign] effect: +2. Place 1 bounty on Bounty Contracts.
flavor: "等我找到那隻怪物，我就把牠彻底干掉。"
back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 次级职阶选择：构筑牌组时，选择守卫者([guardian])、探求者([seeker])或求生者([survivor])。 牌组构建选项：流浪者([rogue])等级0-5，中立卡牌等级0-5，最多10张你所选次级职阶的等级0-1事件卡和/或技能卡。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：赏金合约、2张托尼的.38柯尔特长管手枪、托尼的猎物、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 托尼能把卑鄙的人渣从世上任何一个骯脏的角落里揪出来，但他却从来没想到，自己会在印斯茅斯杀死那样的傢伙。那傢伙的长相与人类有几分相似，但全身都布满了惹人生恶的鳞片和黏液，像是某种恐怖的深海生物。牠的气味混杂着海水、烂鱼和血液的味道。托尼本该在牠跳下水后就放手不管，但他从来不会让赏金打了水漂，而且他当时也不打算这么做。在那之后，他的赏金猎物又多了一种——可能是普通匪徒，也可能是怪物。只要有人付钱……他定会把目标解决。

name: 赏金合约
text: 永久。托尼·摩尔根牌组专用。使用(6赏金)。 [reaction]在一名敌人入场后：将1-3赏金从赏金合约移动到该敌人，最多放置该敌人生命值的赏金。 强制 - 在你击败一名带有赏金的敌人后：将其赏金移动到你的资源池，作为资源。
real_text: Permanent. Tony Morgan deck only. Uses (6 bounties). [reaction]: After an enemy enters play: Move 1-3 bounties from Bounty Contracts to that enemy, to a maximum of that enemy's health. Forced - After you defeat an enemy with 1 or more bounties on it: Move its bounties to your resource pool, as resources.

name: 托尼的.38柯尔特长管手枪
text: 托尼·摩尔根牌组专用。使用(3子弹)。 [reaction]：在你打出托尼的.38柯尔特长管手枪后：从你手牌中免费打出另一张托尼的.38柯尔特长管手枪。 [action]花费1子弹：攻击。被攻击的敌人上每有1赏金，你+1[combat]。这次攻击造成+1伤害。如果这次攻击击败一名带有赏金的敌人，在赏金合约上放置1赏金。
real_text: Tony Morgan deck only. Uses (3 ammo). [reaction]: After you play Tony's .38 Long Colt: Play another Tony's .38 Long Colt from your hand, at no cost. [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for each bounty on the attacked enemy. This attack deals +1 damage. If this attack defeats an enemy with 1 or more bounties on it, place 1 bounty on Bounty Contracts.
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械

name: 托尼的猎物
text: 生成 - 离托尼·摩尔根最远的地点。 冷漠。 强制 - 在托尼的猎物入场后：在其上放置1个毁灭标记。然后，(从供应堆)放置1资源在其上，作为赏金。
real_text: Spawn - Location farthest from Tony Morgan. Aloof. Forced - After Tony's Quarry enters play: Place 1 doom on it. Then, place 1 resource on it (from the token pool), as a bounty.
traits: 类人. 怪物. 深潜者

name: "你欠我一次！"
text: 查看另一位调查员的手牌。你可以打出该调查员手牌中的一张非弱点卡牌，置于你的控制之下。如果你这么做，你和该调查员每人抽取1张卡牌。
real_text: Look at another investigator's hand. You may play a non-weakness card in that investigator's hand, under your control. If you do, you and that investigator each draw 1 card.
flavor: "对对，当然了。你之前三次也是这么说的。"

name: 美满结局
text:
快速。在你技能检定中抽出1个会令你的技能值减少到零的混乱标记时打出(包括[auto_fail]标记)。
取消该标记并改为将其视为[elder_sign]标记。
real_text:
Fast. Play when you reveal a chaos token that would reduce your skill value to 0 during a skill test (including the [auto_fail] token).
Cancel that token and treat it as an [elder_sign] token, instead.

name: 圣化之镜
text: 每副牌组限制1张。 强制 - 在圣化之镜入场后：在你的绑定卡牌中查找3张舒缓旋律。将其中1张加入你的手牌并将其余2张混洗入你的牌堆。在圣化之镜离场时，找出所有的舒缓旋律(不论其是否在场)并将其放在一边，位于场外。(FAQ, v2.0)
real_text: Limit 1 per deck. Forced - After Hallowed Mirror enter play: Search your bonded cards for 3 copies of Soothing Melody. Add 1 to your hand and shuffle the other 2 into your deck. When Hallowed Mirror leaves play, find each of those copies of Soothing Melody (even if they are out of play) and set them aside, out of play.
traits: 道具. 遗物. 密教. 祝福

name: 舒缓旋律
text:
绑定(圣化之镜)。
治癒你所在地点的调查员和/或[[盟友]]支援卡的2点伤害或2恐惧(或者以任意方式组合，总计2点)。抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
Bonded (Hallowed Mirror).
Heal 2 damage or 2 horror (or any combination thereof) from among investigators and/or [[Ally]] assets at your location. Draw 1 card.
flavor:
……他们的歌声融入月光，
融入那凄美静谧的夜光……
<cite>保罗·魏尔伦，《月光》</cite>

name: "我见过更糟的……"
text:
快速。在你受到伤害和/或恐惧时打出。
取消你这次受到的最多2点伤害和/或恐惧。然后，获得同等数量的资源。
real_text:
Fast. Play when you are dealt damage and/or horror.
Cancel up to 2 damage and/or horror just dealt to you. Then, gain that many resources.

name: 窥看不思议之事
text: 将你手牌中任意数量的非弱点卡牌混洗入你的牌堆。抽取卡牌，直到手牌数量达到上限。将窥看不思议之事移出游戏。
real_text: Shuffle any number of non-weakness cards from your hand into your deck. Draw cards until you reach your maximum hand-size. Remove Glimpse the Unthinkable from the game.

name: 超级加倍
text:
卓越。
[reaction]在你打出一张事件卡后，消耗超级加倍：再次打出该事件卡，如同其在你手牌中。
real_text:
Exceptional.
[reaction] After you play an event, exhaust Double, Double: Play that event again as if it were in your hand.
flavor:
怪鸟在鸣啸："时候到了，时候到了。"
<cite>威廉·莎士比亚，《麦克白》</cite>

name: 凋零术
text: [action]：攻击。这次攻击不使用[combat]，改为使用[willpower]。这次攻击你+2[willpower]。如果这次攻击抽出[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]或[elder_thing]符号，受到攻击的敌人在本回合剩余时间内-1攻击、-1生命值、-1躲避(最低减至1)。
real_text: [action]: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. You get +2 [willpower] for this attack. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] symbol is revealed during this attack, the attacked enemy gets -1 fight, -1 health, and -1 evade for the remainder of the turn (to a minimum of 1).

name: 诱敌深入
text: 迭加到你所在地点或一个连接地点。 在敌人阶段中，每名敌人不以正常移动方向移动，改为以最短路现朝向迭加地点移动。 强制 - 迭加状态下，当一轮结束时：丢弃诱敌深入。
real_text: Attach to your location or to a connecting location. During the enemy phase, each enemy that moves does so along the shortest path toward the attached location, instead of to where it would normally move. Forced - While attached, at the end of the round: Discard Lure.

name: 头班守夜
text:
快速。在神话阶段的"抽取遭遇卡"步骤将要开始时打出。
不结算该步骤，改为查看遭遇牌堆顶部X张卡牌，其中X等于调查员人数。在任意调查员之间分发那些卡牌，你以外的每位调查员最多分发1张卡牌。然后，每位调查员依序抽取分发给他们的卡牌。
real_text:
Fast. Play when the "draw encounter cards" step of the mythos phase would begin.
Instead of resolving that step, look at the top X cards of the encounter deck, where X is the number of investigators. Deal those cards among the investigators as you wish, dealing no more than 1 card to each investigator other than yourself. Then, one at a time, each investigator draws the card(s) dealt to them.

name: 预言卷轴
text:
使用(4秘密)。
[action]花费1秘密：选择你所在地点的一位调查员。该调查员抽取3张卡牌，然后丢弃其1张手牌。
real_text:
Uses (4 secrets).
[action] Spend 1 secret: Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator draws 3 cards, then discards 1 card from their hand.
flavor: ……过去如是，将来亦如是。

name: 杰西卡·海德
text:
你获得+1[combat]。
杰西卡·海德入场时，其上带有2点伤害。
[reaction]在你的回合结束后：治癒杰西卡·海德1点伤害。
real_text:
You get +1 [combat].
Jessica Hyde enters play with 2 damage on her.
[reaction] After your turn ends: Heal 1 damage from Jessica Hyde.
traits: 盟友. 旅人. 诅咒萦绕
flavor: 我警告过你离我远一点，限在我们都被困在这里了。

name: .32柯尔特手枪
text: 使用(6子弹)。 [action]花费1子弹：攻击。这次攻击造成+1伤害。 [free]花费1资源：将.32柯尔特手枪返回你的手牌。
real_text: Uses (6 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You deal +1 damage for this attack. [free] Spend 1 resource: Return .32 Colt to your hand.
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械

name: "吃枪子吧！"
text: 快速。在你启动[[枪械]]支援卡上的攻击能力时打出。 花费该支援卡上的额外1子弹。本次攻击中，在你抽取混乱标记时，抽取额外1个混乱标记。选择其中一个结算并忽略其余标记。
real_text: Fast. Play when you activate the Fight ability on a [[Firearm]] asset. Spend 1 additional ammo token from that asset. When you reveal chaos tokens for this attack, reveal 1 additional chaos token. Choose one to resolve and ignore the other.

name: 逻辑推理
text: 你每有1个线索(最多3个)，治癒你所在地点的一位调查员的2点恐惧，或丢弃你所在地点的1张[[恐怖]]卡牌。
real_text: For each clue you have (to a maximum of 3), either heal 2 horror from an investigator at your location or discard a [[Terror]] card at your location.
flavor:
"我是活着的最智慧的人，因为我知道一件事，那就是我知道我一无所知。"
<cite>《理想国》，柏拉图着</cite>

name: 古代雕文
text: 研究。(FAQ, v2.0) 使用(3充能)。 [action]花费1充能：调查。如果你成功，你可以将手牌中1张打印费用最多为X的支援卡放置入场，其中X为你超过难度的点数。
real_text: Researched. Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. If you succeed, you may put an asset with printed cost of X or lower into play from your hand. X is the amount you succeeded by.

name: 潜行
text: [free]在你回合中，消耗潜行：躲避。本次躲避尝试所选敌人-2躲避。如果你成功躲避该敌人，它解除交战状态但不消耗。你回合结束前，该敌人不能与你交战。
real_text: [free] During your turn, exhaust Stealth: Evade. The chosen enemy gets -2 evade for this evasion attempt. If you successfully evade the enemy, disengage with it but do not exhaust it. Until the end of your turn, that enemy cannot engage you.

name: 建议
text: 使用(3充能)。如果建议没有充能，则将其丢弃。 [action]消耗建议：躲避。本次躲避尝试将你的[willpower]数值加入你的技能值。如果你没有成功并超过难度至少2点，移除建议上的1充能。
real_text: Uses (3 charges). If Suggestion has no charges, discard it. [action] Exhaust Suggestion: Evade. Add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this evasion attempt. If you do not succeed by at least 2, remove 1 charge from Suggestion.

name: 炼金转化
text:
使用(4充能)。
[action]消耗炼金转化，花费1充能：检定[willpower](0)。你成功时每超过难度1点，获得1个资源(上限4个)。如果本次检定中抽出[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]、[elder_thing]或[auto_fail]标记，受到1点伤害。
real_text:
Uses (4 charges).
[action] Exhaust Alchemical Transmutation, spend 1 charge: Test [willpower] (0). For each point you succeed by, gain 1 resource (to a maximum of 4). If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this test, take 1 damage.

name: 灵力风暴
text: 攻击。这次攻击不使用[combat]，改为使用[willpower]。你这次攻击获得+2[willpower]。如果你成功，这次攻击不造成基础伤害，而是对被攻击敌人所在地点的每个敌人造成3点伤害(所有额外伤害只对受到攻击的敌人造成)。(FAQ, v2.0)如果这次攻击中抽出[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]、[elder_thing]或[auto_fail]标记，对所在地点每位调查员造成2点伤害。
real_text: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. You get +2 [willpower] for this attack. If you succeed, instead of its standard damage, this attack deals 3 damage to each enemy at the attacked enemy's location (any additional damage is dealt to the attacked enemy). If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] token is revealed during this attack, deal 2 damage to each investigator at the attacked enemy's location.

name: 提灯
text: [action]：调查。本次调查中你所在地点-1隐藏值。 [action]丢弃提灯：对你所在地点的一个敌人造成1点伤害(或者改为造成2点伤害，并将提灯从游戏中移除)。本行动不会引起趁乱攻击。
real_text: [action]: Investigate. Your location gets -1 shroud for this investigation. [action] Discard Lantern: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location (or remove Lantern from the game to deal 2 damage, instead). This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: 挖墓人的铲子
text: [action]：攻击。你这次攻击+2[combat]。 [action]丢弃挖墓人的铲子：发现你所在地点的1个线索(或者改为发现2个线索，并将挖墓人的铲子从游戏中移除)。
real_text: [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. [action] Discard Gravedigger's Shovel: Discover 1 clue at your location (or remove Gravedigger's Shovel from the game to discover 2 clues, instead).
traits: 道具. 工具. 武器. 近战
flavor: 我知道我不应该再挖了，但我就是停不下来。

name: 邪秽誓约
text: 剧本模式专用。祸害。隐私。 显现 - 将本卡牌秘密地加入你的手牌。 强制 - 在游戏结束或你退场时，如果本卡牌仍在你手牌中：你少获得2点经验。 [reaction]在你对一个敌人造成过量伤害时：从你手牌中丢弃本卡牌。
real_text: Campaign Mode only. Peril. Hidden. Revelation - Secretly add this card to your hand. Forced - When the game ends or you are eliminated, if this card is in your hand: You earn 2 fewer experience. [reaction] When you deal damage to an enemy in excess of its remaining health: Discard this card from your hand.

name: 邪秽誓约
text: 剧本模式专用。祸害。隐私。 显现 - 将本卡牌秘密地加入你的手牌。 强制 - 在游戏结束或你退场时，如果本卡牌仍在你手牌中：你少获得2点经验。 [reaction]在你成功调查一个没有线索的地点后：从你手牌中丢弃本卡牌。
real_text: Campaign Mode only. Peril. Hidden. Revelation - Secretly add this card to your hand. Forced - When the game ends or you are eliminated, if this card is in your hand: You earn 2 fewer experience. [reaction] After you successfully investigate a location with no clues on it: Discard this card from your hand.

name: 邪秽誓约
text: 剧本模式专用。祸害。隐私。 显现 - 将本卡牌秘密地加入你的手牌。 强制 - 在游戏结束或你退场时，如果本卡牌仍在你手牌中：你少获得2点经验。 [action]：躲避。对象仅限你所在地点处于消耗且未交战状态的敌人。如果你成功，从你手牌中丢弃本卡牌。
real_text: Campaign Mode only. Peril. Hidden. Revelation - Secretly add this card to your hand. Forced - When the game ends or you are eliminated, if this card is in your hand: You earn 2 fewer experience. [action]: Evade. Use only on an exhausted unengaged enemy at your location. If you succeed, discard this card from your hand.

name: 托米·马尔登
text:
[reaction]在你控制的一张支援卡被击败时：获得X资源，X为该支援卡上的伤害和恐惧的总和。将该支援卡混洗入你的牌堆。
[elder_sign]效果：+2。你可以将托米·马尔登上的最多2点伤害和/或恐惧移动到你控制的1张支援卡上，或将你控制的1张支援卡上的最多2点伤害和/或恐惧移动到托米·马尔登上。
real_text:
[reaction] When an asset you control is defeated: Gain X resources, where X is the total amount of damage and horror on that asset. Shuffle that asset into your deck.
[elder_sign] effect: +2. You may move up to 2 damage and/or horror from Tommy Muldoon to an asset you control, or vice versa.
flavor: "保持警戒，托米。"
back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：守卫者([guardian])等级0-5，中立卡牌等级0-5，求生者cards([survivor])等级0-2。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：贝基、低级错误、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 马尔登家族里的大多数人都或多或少于波士顿警署任职。不久之前，马尔登家族最小的弟弟托米也得到了自己的警徽。托米有敏锐的洞察力、过人的胆识，还有一把可靠的步枪"贝基"，他愿献身于执法事业……但当他被借调到阿卡姆的警察局之后，他发现自己对这座诡异小城里层出不穷的怪事一点心理准备都没有。即便如此，不管罪案现场是烟雾缭绕的地下酒吧，还是血迹斑驳的圣坛，托米都不会停下追查的步子，直到将罪犯绳之以法。

name: 派翠斯·海瑟薇
text:
你的手牌上限减少3张。
每个补给阶段中，不抽取1张卡牌，改为丢弃你手牌中的所有非弱点卡牌，并抽取卡牌直到你有5张手牌。
[elder_sign]效果：+1。在这次检定结束后，你可以留下弃牌堆中的1张卡牌并将其余卡牌混洗回你的牌堆。
real_text:
Your maximum hand size is reduced by 3.
During each upkeep phase, instead of drawing 1 card, discard all non-weakness cards in your hand and draw until you have 5 cards in hand.
[elder_sign] effect: +1. After this test ends, you may shuffle all but 1 card from your discard pile into your deck.
back_text: 卡牌张数：42。 牌组构建选项：求生者([survivor])等级0-5，潜修者([mystic])等级0-2，中立卡牌等级0-5。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：派翠斯的小提琴、异次元监视者、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 派翠斯毕生都在为音乐而活。悠扬的奏鸣曲、曼妙的咏嘆调、低沉洪亮的进行曲，永远都是她最亲密的伙伴。但有的时候，当派翠斯拉起小提琴，，她能感觉到有个超出认知的怪异存在正监视且等待着她，心急如焚。在过去的一个月里，牠出现得越发频繁，派翠斯的情绪也日渐紧绷，已开始影响她拉琴的表现。她再也无法忍受。她在阿卡姆沃德剧院举办最后一场演奏会之后，终于决定要采取行动。

name: 贝基
text: 托米·马尔登牌组专用。使用(2子弹)。 从托米·马尔登的[reaction]能力获得的资源可以改为放置在贝基上，作为子弹。 [action]花费1子弹：攻击。这次攻击你+2[combat]并造成+1伤害。
real_text: Tommy Muldoon deck only. Uses (2 ammo). Each resource gained from Tommy Muldoon's [reaction] ability may instead be placed on Becky, as ammo. [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack.
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械

name: 低级错误
text: 显现 - 丢弃你控制的带有伤害或恐惧的每张支援卡。如果没有支援卡被此效果丢弃，将低级错误混洗回你的牌堆。
real_text: Revelation - Discard each asset you control with damage or horror on it. If no assets are discarded by this effect, shuffle Rookie Mistake back into your deck.

name: 派翠斯的小提琴
text:
派翠斯·海瑟薇牌组专用。
[fast]选择并丢弃你1张手牌，并消耗派翠斯的小提琴：选择你所在地点的一位调查员，其获得1资源或抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
Patrice Hathaway deck only.
[fast] Choose and discard 1 card from your hand and exhaust Patrice's Violin: Choose an investigator at your location to either gain 1 resource or draw 1 card.

name: 异次元监视者
text: 祸害。隐私。猎手。 显现 - 秘密地将本敌人加入你的手牌。 只要本敌人在你的手牌中，你可以攻击或躲避它(如同其在你所在地点)。如果你成功，将其从你手牌中丢弃。如果你失败，将其生成并与你交战。 强制 - 在你牌堆的卡牌耗尽时，如果本敌人在你的手牌中：其(从你的手牌中)攻击你。
real_text: Peril. Hidden. Hunter. Revelation - Secretly add this enemy to your hand. You may fight or evade this enemy while it is in your hand (as if it were at your location). If you succeed, discard it from your hand. If you fail, spawn it engaged with you. Forced - When your deck runs out of cards, if this enemy is in your hand: It attacks you (from your hand).

name: 渴血之刃
text: 每副牌组限制1张。作为打出本卡牌的额外的费用，你必须在你的绑定卡牌中查找3张嗜血，并将其混洗入你的牌堆。(FAQ, v1.9) [action]：攻击。每迭加1张嗜血，这次攻击你+1[combat]。这次攻击造成+1伤害。如果这次攻击击败了一名敌人，(从供应堆)放置1资源在本卡牌上，作为贡品。
real_text: Limit 1 per deck. As an additional cost to play this card, you must search your bonded cards for 3 copies of Bloodlust and shuffle them into your deck. [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack for each attached copy of Bloodlust. This attack deals +1 damage. If this attack defeats an enemy, place 1 resource on this card (from the token bank), as an offering.
traits: 道具. 武器. 近战. 遗物. 诅咒萦绕

name: 嗜血
text: 绑定(渴血之刃)。 显现 - 从渴血之刃移除2贡品来迭加嗜血到其上。如果你不能这么做，受到1点恐惧并将嗜血混洗回你的牌堆。 [free]用渴血之刃攻击时，将嗜血混洗入你的牌堆：这次攻击你造成+1伤害。(每次攻击最多一次。)
real_text: Bonded (The Hungering Blade). Revelation - Remove 2 offerings from The Hungering Blade to attach Bloodlust to it. If you cannot, take 1 horror and shuffle Bloodlust back into your deck. [free] While attacking with The Hungering Blade, shuffle Bloodlust into your deck: You deal +1 damage for this attack. (Max once per attack.)

name: 庄严立誓
text:
多重。快速。
打出庄严立誓到你所在地点另一位调查员的控制之下。
[fast]如果庄严立誓的所有者位于你所在地点，消耗庄严立誓：将你控制的卡牌上的1点伤害或恐惧移动到该调查员控制的卡牌上。
real_text:
Myriad. Fast.
Play Solemn Vow under the control of another investigator at your location.
[fast] If the owner of Solemn Vow is at your location, exhaust Solemn Vow: Move 1 damage or horror from a card you control to a card that investigator controls.

name: 一瓣缟玛瑙
text:
多重。快速。
[free]如果你场上有3张一瓣缟玛瑙：将它们放在一边，位于场外。在你的绑定卡牌中查找并将皇后的挂坠放置入场。
real_text:
Myriad. Fast.
[free] If you have 3 copies of Segment of Onyx in play: Set them aside, out of play. Search your bonded cards for Pendant of the Queen and put it into play.
traits: 道具. 遗物. 密教

name: 皇后的挂坠
text:
绑定(一瓣缟玛瑙)。使用(3充能)。如果本卡牌没有充能，将其放在一边，位于场外，并将放在一边的3张一瓣缟玛瑙混洗入你的牌堆。
[free]消耗皇后的挂坠并花费1充能：选择一个已揭示地点并选择以下一项 - 移动到该地点、发现该地点的1个线索、自动躲避该地点的一名敌人。
real_text:
Bonded (Segment of Onyx). Uses (3 charges). If this card has no charges, set it aside, out of play, and shuffle 3 set-aside copies of Segment of Onyx into your deck.
[free] Exhaust Pendant of the Queen and spend 1 charge: Choose a revealed location and select one - move to that location, discover 1 clue at that location, or automatically evade an enemy at that location.

name: 仰望星空
text:
每场游戏最多两次。
遭遇牌堆有10张以上卡牌时才能打出。
在你的绑定卡牌中查找1张群星正确之时，并将其混洗入遭遇牌堆顶部10张卡牌中。
real_text:
Max twice per game.
Play only if there are 10 or more cards in the encounter deck.
Search your bonded cards for 1 copy of The Stars Are Right and shuffle it into the top 10 cards of the encounter deck.

name: 群星正确之时
text: 绑定(仰望星空)。 显现 - 将群星正确之时移出游戏。选择一位调查员。该调查员抽取1张卡牌，获得1资源，并且可以立即进行一次行动，如同在自己回合(本行动不计入该调查员每回合可进行的行动数)。
real_text: Bonded (Stargazing). Revelation - Remove The Stars Are Right from the game. Choose an investigator. That investigator draws 1 card, gains 1 resource, and may take an immediate action as if it were their turn (this action does not count toward the number of actions that investigator can take each turn).

name: 开启大门
text:
多重。 快速。
只能在你的回合中打出。
迭加到你所在地点。团队在场上限制3张。
调查员可以在任何2个迭加开启大门的地点之间移动，如同两地点连接。
real_text:
Myriad. Fast.
Play only during your turn.
Attach to your location. Group limit 3 in play.
Investigators may move between any two locations with an attached Open Gate as if the locations were connected.

name: 道尔女士
text: 每副牌组限制1张。 强制 - 在道尔女士入场后：在你的绑定卡牌中查找希望、热诚和预见。随机选择1张放置入场，并将其余2张混洗入你的牌堆。在道尔女士离场时，找出这几张支援卡(不论其是否在场)，并将其放在一边，位于场外。(FAQ, v2.0)
real_text: Limit 1 per deck. Forced - After Miss Doyle enters play: Search your bonded cards for Hope, Zeal, and Augur. Randomly choose 1 to put into play and shuffle the other 2 into your deck. When Miss Doyle leaves play, find each of those assets (even if they are out of play) and set them aside, out of play.
traits: 盟友. 生物. 幻梦境

name: 希望
text: 绑定(道尔女士)。快速。 强制 - 在希望入场后：丢弃热诚和预见。 [action]如果希望已准备，将其消耗或丢弃：躲避。以5点基础[agility]值尝试躲避。(如果你丢弃希望，这次检定自动成功。然后，你可以将希望混洗入你的牌堆来将热诚或预见从你的弃牌堆放置入场。)
real_text: Bonded (Miss Doyle). Fast. Forced - After Hope enters play: Discard Zeal and Augur. [action] If Hope is ready, exhaust or discard him: Evade. Attempt to evade with a base [agility] value of 5. (If you discarded Hope, this test is automatically successful. Then, you may shuffle Hope into your deck to put Zeal or Augur into play from your discard pile.)
traits: 盟友. 生物. 幻梦境

name: 热诚
text: 绑定(道尔女士)。快速。 强制 - 在热诚入场后：丢弃希望和预见。 [action]如果热诚已准备，将其消耗或丢弃：攻击。以5点基础[combat]值攻击。(如果你丢弃热诚，这次检定自动成功。然后，你可以将热诚混洗入你的牌堆来将希望或预见从你的弃牌堆放置入场。)
real_text: Bonded (Miss Doyle). Fast. Forced - After Zeal enters play: Discard Hope and Augur. [action] If Zeal is ready, exhaust or discard her: Fight. Fight with a base [combat] value of 5. (If you discarded Zeal, this test is automatically successful. Then, you may shuffle Zeal into your deck to put Hope or Augur into play from your discard pile.)
traits: 盟友. 生物. 幻梦境

name: 预见
text: 绑定(道尔女士)。快速。 强制 - 在预见入场后：丢弃希望和热诚。 [action]如果预见已准备，将其消耗或丢弃：调查。以5点基础[intellect]值调查。(如果你丢弃预见，这次检定自动成功。然后，你可以将预见混洗入你的牌堆来将希望或热诚从你的弃牌堆放置入场。)
real_text: Bonded (Miss Doyle). Fast. Forced - After Augur enters play: Discard Hope and Zeal. [action] If Augur is ready, exhaust or discard her: Investigate. Investigate with a base [intellect] value of 5. (If you discarded Augur, this test is automatically successful. Then, you may shuffle Augur into your deck to put Hope or Zeal into play from your discard pile.)
traits: 盟友. 生物. 幻梦境

name: 曼蒂·汤普森
text:
[reaction] 在一位调查员在你所在地点将要在其牌堆或遭遇牌堆中查找并结算某一效果时：该调查员可以查找额外3张卡牌，或该次查找多结算1个目标。(每轮限制一次)
[elder_sign]效果：+0。在你的牌堆顶部3张卡牌中查找一张卡牌，并将其抽取或投入这次检定(如果可能)。混洗你的牌堆。
real_text:
[reaction] When an investigator at your location would search their deck or the encounter deck: They may either search 3 additional cards or resolve 1 additional target of the search. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +0. Search the top 3 cards of your deck for a card and either draw it or commit it to this test, if able. Shuffle your deck.
back_text: 卡牌张数：30、40或50(构筑牌组时选择)。 次级职阶选择：构筑牌组时，选择潜修者([mystic])、流浪者([rogue])或求生者([survivor])。 牌组构建选项：探求者([seeker])等级0-5，中立卡牌等级0-5，最多10张你所选次级职阶的等级0-1事件卡和/或技能卡。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：1张神秘证据(如果你的卡牌张数为40，改为2张；如果你的卡牌张数为50，改为3张)、惊人的发现、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 曼蒂打从小时候开始，睡不着就会看书。许多夜晚都是如此度过的。她过目不忘，擅长联繫事物找出真相，因此她得到了米斯卡塔尼克大学的一份宝贵工作——研究员。她曾花上数小时翻阅那些古老的禁书，细细阅读书中的亵渎内容。在阅读过程中，她发现字里行间在有规律地暗示着一场大乱即将来临。她是不是得了妄想症？还是说真有一场灾难或是动乱将要发生？

name: 卢克·罗宾逊
text:
你以门之匣在场开始游戏。
你每回合可以视为你位于一个连接地点并与该地点的每名敌人交战下，打出一张事件卡。
[elder_sign]效果：+1。在门之匣上放置1充能。
real_text:
You begin the game with Gate Box in play.
You may play one event each turn as if you were at a connecting location and engaged with each enemy at that location.
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Place 1 charge on Gate Box.
traits: 入梦者. 漂泊者. 旅人
flavor: "通往幻梦境的钥匙就在我们每个人心中。"
back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：潜修者([mystic])等级0-5，探求者([seeker])等级0-2，中立卡牌等级0-5。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：门之匣、脱离现实，1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 在多年之前，卢克发现了幻梦境的入口。从他叔叔留给他的礼物——不同寻常的盒子中，他掌握了进出梦境之门的方法。从那以后，他大部分的时间都在梦境里徘徊，寻历奇遇。从赛勒菲斯的街道到充满无穷谜团的魔幻森林，他信步徘徊，揭开梦境和居住在此的入梦者背后的秘密。如今，古老的混沌威胁着，不仅要毁灭现实世界，还要毁灭他的梦中世界。卢克绝不允许此事发生。

name: 神秘证据
text:
曼蒂·汤普森牌组专用。
将神秘证据混洗回你的牌堆。
[reaction]在你查找你的牌堆时若神秘证据在被查找卡牌中，将其揭示：将其抽取并发现你所在地点的1个线索。(每次查找最多使用一次[[研究]]能力。)
real_text:
Mandy Thompson deck only.
Shuffle Occult Evidence into your deck.
[reaction] When you search your deck and Occult Evidence is among the searched cards, reveal it: Draw it and discover 1 clue at your location. (Max one [[Research]] ability per search.)

name: 惊人的发现
text: 显现 - 将惊人的发现混洗回你的牌堆。(如果你不能，改为将其丢弃并抽取遭遇牌堆顶部的卡牌。) 强制 - 在你查找你的牌堆时若此卡牌在被查找卡牌中：将其丢弃。取消该次查找以及其所有效果。混洗被查找的牌堆。抽取遭遇牌堆顶部的卡牌。
real_text: Revelation - Shuffle Shocking Discovery back into your deck. (If you cannot, discard it and draw the top card of the encounter deck, instead.) Forced - When you search your deck and this card is among the searched cards: Discard it. Cancel the search and all of its effects. Shuffle the searched deck. Draw the top card of the encounter deck.

name: 门之匣
text: 卢克·罗宾逊牌组专用。 使用(3充能)。 [fast]消耗门之匣并花费1充能：与每名与你交战的敌人解除交战，在你的绑定卡牌中查找并放置梦境之门(奇妙旅程)入场，并移动到该地点。
real_text: Luke Robinson deck only. Uses (3 charges). [fast] Exhaust Gate Box and spend 1 charge: Disengage from each enemy engaged with you, search your bonded cards for Dream-Gate (Wondrous Journey), put it into play, and move to it.

name: 脱离现实
text: 显现 - 如果梦境之门 (奇妙旅程)已经在场，将其翻面。否则，在你的绑定卡牌中查找并放置梦境之门(无谓现实)入场。不论哪种情况，与每名与你交战的敌人解除交战，并移动到梦境之门。
real_text: Revelation - If Dream-Gate (Wondrous Journey) is already in play, flip it over. Otherwise, search your bonded cards for Dream-Gate (Pointless Reality) and put it into play. In either case, disengage from each enemy engaged with you and move to Dream-Gate.

name: 梦境之门
text: 绑定(门之匣)。 梦境之门与其它每个已揭示地点互相连接。敌人和卢克·罗宾逊以外的调查员不能进入梦境之门。 强制 - 当调查员阶段结束时：将梦境之门放在一边，位于场外。(如果卢克·罗宾逊在这里，将他移动到任一已揭示地点。)
real_text: Bonded (Gate Box). Dream-Gate is connected to each other revealed location, and vice versa. Enemies and investigators other than Luke Robinson cannot enter Dream-Gate. Forced - At the end of the investigation phase: Set Dream-Gate aside, out of play. (If Luke Robinson is here, move him to any revealed location.)

linked_card.name: 梦境之门
linked_card.text:
绑定(脱离现实)。

敌人和卢克·罗宾逊以外的调查员不能进入梦境之门。

在你成功调查梦境之门后：将其翻面。

强制 -当调查员阶段结束时：将梦境之门放在一边，位于场外。(如果卢克·罗宾逊在这里，将他移动到任一已揭示地点，并受到2点恐惧。)
linked_card.real_text: Bonded (Detached from Reality). Enemies and investigators other than Luke Robinson cannot enter Dream-Gate. [reaction] After you successfully investigate Dream-Gate: Flip it. Forced - At the end of the investigation phase: Set Dream-Gate aside, out of play. (If Luke Robinson is here, move him to any revealed location, and he takes 2 horror.)

name: 梦境之门
text: 绑定(脱离现实)。 敌人和卢克·罗宾逊以外的调查员不能进入梦境之门。 [reaction]在你成功调查梦境之门后：将其翻面。 强制 -当调查员阶段结束时：将梦境之门放在一边，位于场外。(如果卢克·罗宾逊在这里，将他移动到任一已揭示地点，并受到2点恐惧。)
real_text: Bonded (Detached from Reality). Enemies and investigators other than Luke Robinson cannot enter Dream-Gate. [reaction] After you successfully investigate Dream-Gate: Flip it. Forced - At the end of the investigation phase: Set Dream-Gate aside, out of play. (If Luke Robinson is here, move him to any revealed location, and he takes 2 horror.)

name: 骇人真相
text:
多重。
不能打出骇人真相。
[reaction]在你查找你的牌堆时若骇人真相在被查找卡牌中，将其丢弃：获得2资源或在你控制的支援卡上放置1秘密。(每次查找最多使用一次[[研究]]能力。)
real_text:
Myriad.
Astounding Revelation cannot be played.
[reaction] When you search your deck and Astounding Revelation is among the searched cards, discard it: Either gain 2 resources or place 1 secret on an asset you control. (Max one [[Research]] ability per search.)

name: 梦境结晶器
text: 作为打出本卡牌的额外费用，你必须在你的绑定卡牌中查找1张结晶器守卫，并将其混洗入你的牌堆。(FAQ, v1.9) [reaction]在你打出一张事件卡后：不将其丢弃，改为将其正面朝下迭加到梦境结晶器(最多迭加5张事件卡)。可以将迭加的事件卡投入技能检定，如同其为你的手牌。
real_text:
As an additional cost to play this card, you must search your bonded cards for 1 copy of Guardian of the Crystallizer and shuffle it into your deck.
[reaction] After you play an event: Attach it facedown to Crystallizer of Dreams instead of discarding it (to a maximum of 5 attached events). Attached events may be committed to skill tests as if they were in your hand.

name: 结晶器守卫
text: 绑定(梦境结晶器)。猎手。 猎物 -仅对有梦境结晶器的调查员。 结晶器守卫以消耗状态入场。 强制 - 如果场上没有梦境结晶器：将结晶器守卫放在一边，位于场外。
real_text: Bonded (Crystallizer of Dreams). Hunter. Prey - Investigator with a Crystallizer of Dreams only. Guardian of the Crystallizer enters play exhausted. Forced - If there is no Crystallizer of Dreams in play: Set Guardian of the Crystallizer aside, out of play.

name: 冤大头
text:
多重。
获得2资源并抽取1张卡牌。
[reaction]在你打出冤大头后：从你手牌中免费打出另一张冤大头。
real_text:
Myriad.
Gain 2 resources and draw 1 card.
[reaction] After you play Easy Mark: Play another Easy Mark from your hand, at no cost.

name: 意外的发现
text: 多重。 X为你弃牌堆中其余的意外的发现张数。 调查。这次调查你+X[intellect]。如果你成功，额外发现你所在地点的X个线索。
real_text: Myriad. X is the number of other copies of Fortuitous Discovery in your discard pile. Investigate. You get +X [intellect] for this investigation. If you succeed, discover X additional clues at your location.

name: 自私自利
text: 多人游戏专用。 显现 - 将自私自利放置入你的威胁区域。 你不能投入卡牌到其他调查员的技能检定，或用玩家卡效果影响其他调查员(造成伤害或恐惧的效果除外)。 [action] [action]：丢弃自私自利。
real_text: Multiplayer only. Revelation - Put Self-Centered into play in your threat area. You cannot commit cards to other investigators' skill tests or affect other investigators with player card effects (except aspects that cause damage or horror). [action] [action]: Discard Self-Centered.

name: 偷窃癖
text: 多人游戏专用。 显现 - 将偷窃癖放置入你的游戏区域。 [action]：控制你所在地点另一位调查员的一个[[道具]]支援卡或2资源。然后，将偷窃癖混洗入你的牌堆。 强制 - 当你回合结束时：受到1点恐惧。
real_text: Multiplayer only. Revelation - Put Kleptomania into play in your play area. [action]: Take control of an [[Item]] asset or 2 resources from another investigator at your location. Then, shuffle Kleptomania into your deck. Forced - At the end of your turn: Take 1 horror.

name: 嗜睡症
text: 多人游戏专用。 显现 - 将嗜睡症放置入你的威胁区域。 你不能进行行动、触发能力或打出卡牌。 [action]："醒醒！"丢弃嗜睡症。 强制 - 在你受到伤害或恐惧后：丢弃嗜睡症。
real_text: Multiplayer only. Revelation - Put Narcolepsy into play in your threat area. You cannot take actions, trigger abilities, or play cards. [action]: "Wake up!" Discard Narcolepsy. Forced - After you take damage or horror: Discard Narcolepsy.

name: 最可怕的噩梦
text: 多人游戏专用。 猎手。 猎物 - 仅对承受者。 最可怕的噩梦的承受者不能对其攻击、造成伤害或将其击败。
real_text: Multiplayer only. Hunter. Prey - Bearer only. The bearer of Your Worst Nightmare cannot attack, damage, or defeat it.

name: 清醒梦
text: 选择你游戏区域的一张卡牌，或揭示你的一张手牌。在你的牌堆中查找并抽取另一张该卡牌的同名卡牌。混洗你的牌堆。
real_text: Choose a card in your play area or reveal a card in your hand. Search your deck for another copy of that card and draw it. Shuffle your deck.
flavor:
"……所有这些生命都仅仅只是大脑的一串图像，这些图像不管是来自真实，还是来自内在梦境，他们之间并无区别……"
——H. P. 洛夫克拉夫特《银钥匙》

name: 浑身是胆
text: 只能投入到攻击或尝试躲避敌人的技能检定中。该敌人在这次技能期间检定获得反击和警戒。在这次检定结束后，抽取1张卡牌。
real_text: Commit only to a skill test during an attack or evasion attempt against an enemy. That enemy gains retaliate and alert for the duration of this skill test. After this test ends, draw 1 card.

name: 梦境日记
text:
[action]：在你的绑定卡牌中查找梦的本质，并将其加入你的手牌。
[reaction]在你投入梦的本质的技能检定中成功并超过难度至少3点后：在你的冒险日誌中记录"你洞悉了梦境"。
real_text:
[action]: Search your bonded cards for Essence of the Dream and add it to your hand.
[reaction] After you succeed by 3 or more during a skill test to which Essence of the Dream is committed: Record in your Campaign Log that "you have interpreted the dreams."
traits: 道具. 书籍. 守护

name: 梦的本质
text:
绑定(梦境日记)。
在梦的本质将要进入你的弃牌堆或被混洗入你的牌堆时，不将其放入，改为将其放在一边，位于场外 (与你的绑定卡牌一起)。
real_text:
Bonded (Dream Diary).
When Essence of the Dream would enter your discard pile or be shuffled into your deck, instead set Essence of the Dream aside, out of play (with your bonded cards).

name: 跟踪
text: 调查。选择你所在地点的一名敌人。所选敌人上每有1点伤害，这次调查你+1[intellect](最多+5[intellect])。如果你成功，在此地点发现额外1个线索。此行动不会引起所选敌人的趁乱攻击。
real_text: Investigate. Choose an enemy at your location. You get +1 [intellect] for this investigation for each damage on the chosen enemy (to a maximum of +5 [intellect]). If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue at this location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity from the chosen enemy.

name: 势不可挡
text: 如果这次技能检定成功，本阶段你执行的下次技能检定难度降低X，其中X为这次技能检定超过难度的点数(最多为3)。
real_text: If this skill test is successful, reduce the difficulty of the next skill test you perform this phase by X, where X is the amount this skill test succeeded by (to a maximum of 3).
flavor: 你从不走阳关道。

name: 解读秘符
text: 调查。将你的[willpower]值加入你这次调查的技能值。你可以忽略在这次调查中将在你所在地点触发的任意效果或关键词。如果你成功，在此地点发现额外1个线索。
real_text: Investigate. Add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this investigation. You may ignore any effect or keyword on your location which would trigger during this investigation. If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue at this location.
flavor:
可怕的未来就在你眼前。
你是要转头就跑，还是对它敞开胸怀？

name: 虎口拔牙
text: 在你投入虎口拔牙到技能检定后，从你的牌堆顶部揭示卡牌，直到你揭示了能投入到这次检定的[rogue]技能卡。将其投入。将其它每张已揭示卡牌混洗回你的牌堆。
real_text: After you commit Daredevil to a skill test, reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a [rogue] skill you can commit to this test. Commit it. Shuffle each other revealed card back into your deck.
flavor:
"你是个疯子，温妮！"
"我知道，这难道不是件好事吗？"

name: 希望微光
text: 多重。 只能从你的弃牌堆打出希望微光。 将你弃牌堆中所有希望微光加入你的手牌(包括本卡牌)。
real_text: Myriad. A Glimmer of Hope can only be played from your discard pile. Add all copies of A Glimmer of Hope in your discard pile to your hand (including this copy).

name: 异界手稿
text:
使用(3秘密)。
[action]消耗异界手稿并花费1秘密：在遭遇牌堆顶部9张卡牌中查找并从中选择一张非[[精英]]卡牌。丢弃场上一张与所选卡牌同名的卡牌。将所有查找的卡牌混洗回遭遇牌堆。
real_text:
Uses (3 secrets).
[action] Exhaust Otherworld Codex and spend 1 secret: Search the top 9 cards of the encounter deck and choose a non-[[Elite]] card among them. Discard a copy of the chosen card from play. Shuffle all of the searched cards back into the encounter deck.

name: "让上帝分辨去吧……"
text:
只能在你击败了总计生命值至少6点的敌人的回合中打出。
将"让上帝分辨去吧……"加入胜利牌区，并立即结束你的回合。在这场冒险结局中获得经验值时，你获得额外1点经验值。
real_text:
Play only during one of your turns in which you defeated enemies with a total of 6 or more health.
Add "Let God sort them out..." to the victory display and immediately end your turn. When earning experience during the resolution of this scenario, you earn 1 additional experience.

name: 飘渺灵体
text: 躲避。将你的[willpower]值加入你这次躲避尝试的技能值。如果你成功，与每名与你交战的其余敌人解除交战，并且本轮接下来的时间里，你视为无形(敌人不能与你交战，且你不能攻击或对敌人造成伤害)。
real_text: Evade. Add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this evasion attempt. If you succeed, disengage from each other enemy engaged with you, and for the remainder of the round, you are ethereal (enemies cannot engage or be engaged with you, and you cannot attack or deal damage to enemies).

name: 多才多艺
text:
永久。
你的牌组卡牌张数+5。
你的调查员的牌组构建选项获得："1张任何职阶([guardian]、[seeker]、[rogue]、[mystic]或[survivor])的其它0级卡牌。"
real_text:
Permanent.
You get +5 Deck Size.
Your investigator's Deckbuilding Options gain: "one other level 0 card from any class ([guardian], [seeker], [rogue], [mystic], or [survivor])."
flavor: "不抢风头"不代表你没做好准备。

name: 受召猎犬
text: 作为打出受召猎犬的额外费用，你必须在你的绑定卡牌中查找1张脱缰野兽，并将其混洗入你的牌堆。 [free]在你的回合中，除了行动中以外，消耗受召猎犬：攻击/调查。以基础值5点的[combat]技能攻击，或用基础值5点的[intellect]技能调查。
real_text: As an additional cost to play Summoned Hound, you must search your bonded cards for 1 copy of Unbound Beast and shuffle it into your deck. [free] During your turn, except during an action, exhaust Summoned Hound: Fight/Investigate. Either attack with a base [combat] skill of 5, or investigate with a base [intellect] skill of 5.

name: 脱缰野兽
text: 绑定 (受召猎犬)。 猎物 - 承受者。 猎手。反击。 显现 - 如果场上没有受召猎犬，将脱缰野兽放在一边，位于场外。否则，将一位调查员的受召猎犬放在一边，位于场外，并且生成脱缰野兽并与该调查员交战。
real_text: Bonded (Summoned Hound). Prey - Bearer. Hunter. Retaliate. Revelation - If there is no copy of Summoned Hound in play, set Unbound Beast aside, out of play. Otherwise, set an investigator's Summoned Hound aside, out of play, and spawn Unbound Beast engaged with the same investigator.
traits: 怪兽. 异次元. 廷达洛斯

name: 背水一战
text:
如果你的资源少于5，获得资源，直到你有5资源。
如果你手牌少于5张，抽取卡牌，直到你有5张手牌。
将背水一战移出游戏。
real_text:
If you have fewer than 5 resources, gain resources until you have 5 resources.
If you have fewer than 5 cards in your hand, draw cards until you have 5 cards in your hand.
Remove Nothing Left to Lose from the game.

name: 森哲夫
text:
对你所在地点其他调查员造成的伤害和/或恐惧，可以分配给森哲夫。
[reaction]在森哲夫被击败时：选择你所在地点的一位调查员。该调查员在其弃牌堆或牌堆顶部9张卡牌中查找一张[[道具]]支援卡，并加入其手牌。如果查找了牌堆，将其混洗。
real_text:
Tetsuo Mori may be assigned damage and/or horror dealt to other investigators at your location.
[reaction] When Tetsuo Mori is defeated: Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator searches either their discard pile or the top 9 cards of their deck for an [[Item]] asset and adds it to their hand. Shuffle their deck if it is searched.

name: "吃一堑……"
text:
快速。在你结算一张诡计卡的任何效果后，将要丢弃该卡牌时打出。
将"吃一堑……"放置入你的游戏区域，并迭加该诡计卡到其上。
[reaction]在任一调查员抽取到一张与迭加的诡计卡同名的卡牌时，丢弃"吃一堑……"：取消该卡牌的显现效果。
real_text:
Fast. Play when you would discard a treachery card after resolving any of its effects.
Put "Fool me once..." into play in your play area and attach that treachery to it.
[reaction] When any investigator draws a copy of the attached treachery card, discard "Fool me once...": Cancel that card's revelation effect.

name: 自我牺牲
text:
只能投入到你所在地点的另一位调查员执行的(任何类型的)技能检定中。
如果这次检定失败，检定失败的所有效果不由执行检定的调查员结算，改为必须由你结算。然后，你或执行检定的调查员抽取2张卡牌。
real_text:
Commit only to a skill test (of any type) being performed by another investigator at your location.
If this test fails, you must resolve all effects from the failed test, instead of the performing investigator. Then, either you draw 2 cards, or the performing investigator draws 2 cards.

name: 强梦血清
text:
你手牌中的每张同名卡牌，于检查手牌上限时其只算作1张。
[reaction]在你抽取到一张与你的手牌同名的卡牌后，揭示这两张卡牌，并消耗强梦血清：抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
Only the first copy of each card in your hand counts toward your maximum hand size.
[reaction] After you draw a copy of a card that is already in your hand, reveal both copies and exhaust Dream-Enhancing Serum: Draw 1 card.

name: 快速装填
text:
快速。只能在你的回合中打出。
选择你控制的一张子弹标记数量少于其"使用(X)"中的X的[[枪械]]支援卡。在该支援卡上放置子弹，直到其子弹等于其"使用(X)"中的X。
real_text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Choose a [[Firearm]] asset you control with fewer ammo tokens than its uses (X) value. Place ammo on that asset until it has ammo equal to its uses (X) value.

name: 格雷戈里·葛利
text:
使用(9资源)。
[reaction]在你发起技能检定时，花费格雷戈里·葛利的最多3资源：如果这次技能检定成功且至少超过该资源数量，获得同等数量的资源。
real_text:
Uses (9 resources).
[reaction] When you initiate a skill test, spend up to 3 resources from Gregory Gry: If this skill test succeeds by at least that amount, gain that many resources.
traits: 盟友. 罪犯. 入梦者
flavor: 这小子在拿到自己的第一张手牌之前，只靠打量就能猜出对方下注的理由。

name: 治癒真言
text:
使用(3充能)。
[action]花费1充能：治癒你所在地点一位调查员的1点伤害。
real_text:
Uses (3 charges).
[action] Spend 1 charge: Heal 1 damage from an investigator at your location.
flavor: 你不是必须相信密教之言，只是你别无选择。

name: 搜刮补给
text: 选择你弃牌堆中一张0级卡牌。将所选卡牌加入你的手牌。
real_text: Choose a level 0 card in your discard pile. Add the chosen card to your hand.
flavor:
你掰开尸体的手把东西拿了下来。
反正他也不会发牢骚。

name: 蛮力
text:
每次技能检定最多投入1张。
只要在基础攻击行动中投入蛮力，其获得[combat][combat]和以下文本："如果这次检定成功且超过难度至少2点，这次攻击造成+2伤害。"
real_text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
While Brute Force is committed during a basic fight action, it gains [combat][combat] and the text: "If this test is successful by 2 or more, this attack deals +2 damage."

name: 真理之眼
text:
如果这次技能检定是诡计卡上的检定，且检定成功，将该诡计卡加入胜利牌区，并迭加真理之眼到其上。
只要真理之眼迭加到诡计卡，其技能图标会投入到该卡牌的同名卡牌的所有技能检定。
real_text:
If this skill test is on a treachery and the test is successful, add that treachery to the victory display and attach The Eye of Truth to it.
While attached, The Eye of Truth contributes its skill icons to all tests on copies of the attached treachery.
flavor: 它会一直看着你。

name: 短管霰弹枪
text: 使用(2子弹)。 [action]花费1子弹：攻击。这次攻击不造成其基础伤害，改为你每成功且超过难度1点，造成1点伤害(最小为1，最大为6)。如果你检定失败并且将要对另一名调查员造成伤害，这次攻击你每失败且低于难度1点，造成1点伤害(最小为1，最大为6)。
real_text: Uses (2 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. Instead of its standard damage, this attack deals 1 damage for each point you succeed by (to a minimum of 1, to a maximum of 6). If you fail and would damage another investigator, this attack deals 1 damage for each point you fail by (to a minimum of 1, to a maximum of 6).
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械. 违法

name: .35温彻斯特步枪
text: 使用(5子弹)。 [action]花费1子弹：攻击。(FAQ, v1.7)这次攻击你+2[combat]。如果这次攻击中抽出+1、0或[elder_sign]混乱标记，这次攻击造成+2伤害。
real_text: Uses (5 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. If a +1, 0, or [elder_sign] chaos token is revealed during this attack, this attack deals +2 damage.
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械

name: 安全护卫
text: [reaction]在另一位调查员的回合中，消耗安全护卫：该调查员的回合接下来的时间里，其从你所在地点移动到连接地点时，你也可以移动到该地点。
real_text: [reaction] During another investigator's turn, exhaust Safeguard: For the remainder of that investigator's turn, as they move from your location to a connecting location, you may move to that location as well.
flavor: 她告诉我，当心别碰上麻烦。我翻了个白眼。麻烦事可从来没消停过。

name: 熟能生巧
text:
快速。在你所在地点的技能检定中打出。
在你的牌堆顶部9张卡牌中查找一张[[精通]]技能卡，并将其投入这次技能检定(如可能)。将其余卡牌混洗回你的牌堆。在这次检定结束后，如果检定成功，不将该技能卡丢弃，改为将其加入你的手牌。
real_text:
Fast. Play during a skill test at your location.
Search the top 9 cards of your deck for a [[Practiced]] skill and commit it to this skill test, if able. Shuffle the remaining cards back into your deck. After this test ends, if it was successful, add that skill to your hand instead of discarding it.

name: 海量研究
text:
你每有1张其它手牌，降低海量研究的打出费用1点。
发现你所在地点的2个线索。
real_text:
Reduce the cost to play Extensive Research by 1 for each other card in your hand.
Discover 2 clues at your location.
flavor:
"这儿也没发现。我们还差多少没查？"
"……瞧瞧你背后这面墙？"

name: 三条A
text: 多重。 如果你将3张三条A投入到一次技能检定，该次检定自动成功(不要从混乱袋抽出混乱标记)。然后，抽取3张卡牌并获得3资源(本效果每次检定最多一次)。
real_text: Myriad. If you commit 3 copies of Three Aces to a skill test, that test automatically succeeds (do not reveal chaos tokens from the chaos bag). Then draw 3 cards and gain 3 resources (max once per test).

name: 夜盗
text: [action]消耗夜盗：调查。如果你成功，不发现线索，改为获得2资源，你每成功且超过难度1点，额外获得+1资源(最大+3资源)。
real_text: [action] Exhaust Burglary: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering clues, gain 2 resources, +1 additional resource for each point you succeed by (to a maximum of +3 resources).

name: 幽灵利刃
text: 攻击。将你的[willpower]值加入这次攻击的技能值。在这次攻击前，你可以立即与被攻击的敌人交战。这次攻击造成+1伤害(如果该敌人为非[[精英]]，改为+2伤害)。
real_text: Fight. Add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this attack. Immediately before this attack, you may engage the attacked enemy. This attack deals +1 damage (+2 damage instead if the enemy is non-[[Elite]]).

name: 命令真言
text: 声名一张[[法术]]卡牌。在你的牌堆中查并抽取1张声名的卡牌。混洗你的牌堆。
real_text: Name a [[Spell]] card. Search your deck for 1 copy of the named card and draw it. Shuffle your deck.
flavor:
为明视野，要有光。
为暖体肤，要有热。
为救灵魂，要有火。

name: 月石
text: 你获得+1[willpower]和+1[agility]。 你不能将月石从你的手牌中打出或投入检定。 [reaction]在你从手牌中丢弃月石后：将其打出(支付其费用)。
real_text: You get +1 [willpower] and +1 [agility]. You cannot play or commit Moonstone from your hand. [reaction] After you discard Moonstone from your hand: Play it (paying its cost).
traits: 道具. 遗物. 幻梦境

name: 目力敏锐
text:
每次技能检定最多投入1张。
只要在基础调查行动中投入目力敏锐，其获得[intellect][intellect]和以下文本："如果这次检定成功且超过难度至少2点，在此地点发现额外1个线索。"
real_text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
While Sharp Vision is committed during a basic investigate action, it gains [intellect] [intellect] and the text: "If this test is successful by 2 or more, discover 1 additional clue at this location."

name: 英勇救援
text:
快速。在一名非[[精英]]敌人将要攻击你所在地点或连接地点的另一位调查员时打出。
如果你此时不在该地点，移动到那里。该敌人改为与你交战，并对你结算该次攻击。然后，对其造成1点伤害。
real_text:
Fast. Play when a non-[[Elite]] enemy would attack another investigator at your location or a connecting location.
Move to that location if you are not already there. Engage that enemy and resolve its attack against you instead. Then, deal it 1 damage.

name: 领导力
text:
只要领导力被投入到另一位调查员执行的技能检定，领导力获得[willpower][wild]。
如果这次检定成功，获得2资源。如果领导力被投入到另一位调查员执行的技能检定，该调查员也获得2资源。
real_text:
While Leadership is committed to a skill test being performed by another investigator, Leadership gains [willpower] [wild].
If this test is successful, gain 2 resources. If Leadership is committed to a skill test being performed by another investigator, that investigator also gains 2 resources.

name: 梦境日记
text: 研究。(FAQ, v2.0) 只要你在隐藏值至少4的地点，你的梦的本质获得[wild][wild]。 [reaction]在你的回合开始时：在你的绑定卡牌中查找梦的本质，并将其加入你的手牌。
real_text:
Researched.
While you are at a location with at least 4 shroud, your Essence of the Dream gains [wild][wild].
[reaction] When your turn begins: Search your bonded cards for Essence of the Dream and add it to your hand.
traits: 道具. 书籍. 守护

name: 梦境日记
text: 研究。(FAQ, v2.0) 只要你与敌人交战，你的梦的本质获得[wild][wild]。 [reaction]在你的回合开始时：在你的绑定卡牌中查找梦的本质，并将其加入你的手牌。
real_text:
Researched.
While you are engaged with an enemy, your Essence of the Dream gains [wild][wild].
[reaction] When your turn begins: Search your bonded cards for Essence of the Dream and add it to your hand.
traits: 道具. 书籍. 守护

name: 梦境日记
text: 研究。(FAQ, v2.0) 只要你有至少8张手牌，你的梦的本质获得[wild][wild]。 [reaction]在你的回合开始时：在你的绑定卡牌中查找梦的本质，并将其加入你的手牌。
real_text:
Researched.
While you have at least 8 cards in hand, your Essence of the Dream gains [wild][wild].
[reaction] When your turn begins: Search your bonded cards for Essence of the Dream and add it to your hand.
traits: 道具. 书籍. 守护

name: 快手
text: 每位调查员限制1张。 [reaction]在你连续执行同一种行动两次后，消耗快手：再进行一次该种行动(行动种类包括启动、交战、躲避、攻击、调查、移动、打出、资源和抽取)。
real_text: Limit 1 per investigator. [reaction] After you perform the same type of action twice in a row, exhaust Haste: Take another action of that type again (types include activate, engage, evade, fight, investigate, move, play, resource, and draw).

name: 增强自我
text: 多重。每副牌组限制1张增强自我(毅力)。 一个法术槽位可以有最多3张增强自我卡牌。 每当有卡牌效果要求你不使用[combat]，改为使用[willpower] 改为 of ，你可以忽略此类效果。 [fast]消耗增强自我：这次检定你+2[combat]。
real_text: Myriad. Limit 1 Empower Self (Stamina) per deck. Up to 3 Empower Self cards take up a single arcane slot. Anytime a card effect requires you to use [willpower] instead of [combat], you may ignore that aspect of the effect. [fast] Exhaust Empower Self: You get +2 [combat] for this test.

name: 增强自我
text: 多重。每副牌组限制1张增强自我(迅捷)。 一个法术槽位可以有最多3张增强自我卡牌。 每当有卡牌效果要求你不使用[agility]，改为使用[willpower]，你可以忽略此类效果。 [fast] 消耗增强自我：这次检定你+2[agility]。
real_text: Myriad. Limit 1 Empower Self (Alacrity) per deck. Up to 3 Empower Self cards take up a single arcane slot. Anytime a card effect requires you to use [willpower] instead of [agility], you may ignore that aspect of the effect. [fast] Exhaust Empower Self: You get +2 [agility] for this test.

name: 增强自我
text: 多重。每副牌组限制1张增强自我(敏锐)。 一个法术槽位可以有最多3张增强自我卡牌。 每当有卡牌效果要求你不使用[intellect]，改为使用[willpower]，你可以忽略此类效果。 [fast]消耗增强自我：这次检定你+2[intellect]。
real_text: Myriad. Limit 1 Empower Self (Acuity) per deck. Up to 3 Empower Self cards take up a single arcane slot. Anytime a card effect requires you to use [willpower] instead of [intellect], you may ignore that aspect of the effect. [fast] Exhaust Empower Self: You get +2 [intellect] for this test.

name: 特薇拉·凯瑟琳·普莱斯
text: [reaction]在你花费一张[[法术]]支援卡的充能后，消耗特薇拉·凯瑟琳·普莱斯：在该支援卡上放置1充能。
real_text: [reaction] After you spend 1 or more charges from a [[Spell]] asset, exhaust Twila Katherine Price: Place 1 charge on that asset.
traits: 盟友. 艺术家. 入梦者
flavor: "有时……我会希望我永远都不要回到这个世界来。"

name: 迅速撤退
text:
每次技能检定最多投入1张。
只要在躲避行动中投入迅速撤退，其获得[agility][agility]和以下文本："如果这次检定成功且超过难度至少2点，你可以自动躲避你所在地点的另一名敌人。"
real_text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
While Expeditious Retreat is committed during a basic evade action, it gains [agility][agility] and the text: "If this test is successful by 2 or more, you may automatically evade another enemy at your location."

name: 摒绝杂念
text:
多重。
[fast]从你的手牌丢弃一张摒绝杂念：治癒本摒绝杂念的所有伤害和恐惧。
real_text:
Myriad.
[fast] Discard a copy of Spiritual Resolve from your hand: Heal all damage and horror from this copy of Spiritual Resolve.

name: 阿比盖尔·福尔曼
text:
[fast]：将你的游戏区域中一张[[书籍]]支援卡迭加到阿比盖尔·福尔曼，或将你游戏区域中的一张[[书籍]]支援卡与已迭加的支援卡互换。迭加到她的支援卡不占手部槽位(迭加的支援卡限制1张)。
[reaction]在你结算此迭加的[[书籍]]支援卡上的[action]能力后，消耗阿比盖尔·福尔曼：再次结算其效果。
real_text:
[fast]: Attach a [[Tome]] asset in your play area to Abigail Foreman, or switch a [[Tome]] asset in your play area with an attached asset. The asset attached to her takes up no hand slots. (Limit 1 attached asset.)
[reaction] After you resolve an [action] ability on the attached [[Tome]] asset, exhaust Abigail Foreman: Resolve its effects again.
traits: 盟友. 米斯卡塔尼克

name: 乔伊"老鼠"弗吉尔
text:
[free]花费1资源：从你的手牌选择一张[[道具]]支援卡并将其打出(支付其费用)。
[free]从场上丢弃一张[[道具]]支援卡：获得2资源。
real_text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: Choose an [[Item]] asset from your hand and play it (paying its cost).
[free] Discard an [[Item]] asset from play: Gain 2 resources.
flavor:
"莫菲，只要肯付钱，不管是谁、什么时间、什么地点，老鼠都能完成任务。"
——《诡镇奇谈》调查员Jason Marker

name: 神识之眼
text:
多重。使用(3秘密)。
[reaction]在你将要检定你的[intellect]、[combat]或[agility]时，花费1秘密：改为检定你的[willpower]。
[fast]从你的手牌丢弃一张神识之眼：在本神识之眼上放置2秘密。
real_text:
Myriad. Uses (3 secrets).
[reaction] When you would test your [intellect], [combat], or [agility], spend 1 secret: Test your [willpower] instead.
[fast] Discard a copy of Mind's Eye from your hand: Place 2 secrets on this copy of Mind's Eye.

name: 闪耀的偏方三八面体
text: [reaction]在你将要支付一张[[法术]]卡牌的费用时，消耗闪耀的偏方三八面体：改为检定[willpower](X)，其中X为该卡牌的资源费用。如果你成功，其资源费用被视为你已支付。如果你失败，取消打出该卡牌，并且不支付其任何费用(包括其行动费用)。本轮接下来的时间里，你不能打出该卡名的卡牌。
real_text: [reaction] When you would pay the cost of a [[Spell]] card, exhaust Shining Trapezohedron: Instead, test [willpower] (X), where X is the card's resource cost. If you succeed, its resource cost is considered paid. If you fail, cancel the playing of that card without paying any of its costs (including its action cost). For the remainder of the round, you cannot play copies of that card.

name: 噩梦球
text: 每副牌组限制1张。 强制 - 在噩梦球入场后：在你的绑定卡牌中查找3张梦境寄生物，并将其迭加到噩梦球。在噩梦球离场时，将迭加的每张梦境寄生物放在一边，位于场外。 [reaction] 在你抽出一个[auto_fail]混乱标记时，将一张迭加的梦境寄生物混洗入你的牌堆：取消该标记。
real_text: Limit 1 per deck. Forced - After Nightmare Bauble enters play: Search your bonded cards for 3 copies of Dream Parasite and attach them to Nightmare Bauble. When Nightmare Bauble leaves play, set each attached Dream Parasite aside, out of play. [reaction] When you reveal an [auto_fail] chaos token, shuffle an attached Dream Parasite into your deck: Cancel that token.
traits: 道具. 守护. 诅咒萦绕

name: 梦境寄生物
text:
绑定(噩梦球)。
只要梦境寄生物在你手牌中，你必须将其投入到你执行的下一次技能检定(如可能)。
你的技能值不加上此技能卡的图标，改为减去。
如果这次技能检定失败，受到1点伤害和1点恐惧。
real_text:
Bonded (Nightmare Bauble).
While Dream Parasite is in your hand, you must commit it to the next skill test you perform, if able.
This skill's icons subtract from your skill value instead of adding to it.
If this skill test fails, take 1 damage and 1 horror.

name: 拾荒
text: [reaction]在你成功调查并且超过难度至少2点后，消耗拾荒：选择你弃牌堆中一张[[道具]]卡牌，将其加入你的手牌或者打出(支付其费用)。
real_text: [reaction] After you successfully investigate by 2 or more, exhaust Scavenging: Choose an [[Item]] card in your discard pile and either add it to your hand or play it (paying its cost).

name: 空虚项炼
text:
每副牌组限制1张。使用(0充能)。
[reaction]在你击败一名敌人后：在空虚项炼上放置充能。
[fast]如果空虚项炼上有至少3充能：在你的绑定卡牌中查找食愿项炼，并将其与空虚项炼交换，将空虚项炼上的所有充能移动到食愿项炼上。
real_text:
Limit 1 per deck. Uses (0 charges).
[reaction] After you defeat an enemy: Place 1 charge on Empty Vessel.
[fast] If there are at least 3 charges on Empty Vessel: Search your bonded cards for Wish Eater and swap it with Empty Vessel, moving all charges from Empty Vessel to Wish Eater.
traits: 道具. 遗物. 祝福

name: 食愿项炼
text: 绑定(空虚项炼)。 [reaction]你在技能检定中抽出一个[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]或[elder_thing]混乱标记时，花费1充能：取消该标记。治癒1点伤害和1点恐惧。 强制 - 如果食愿项炼没有充能：在你的绑定卡牌中查找空虚项炼，并将其与食愿项炼交换。
real_text: Bonded (Empty Vessel). [reaction] When you reveal a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] chaos token during a skill test, spend 1 charge: Cancel that token. Heal 1 damage and 1 horror. Forced - If Wish Eater has no charges: Search your bonded cards for Empty Vessel and swap it with Wish Eater.
traits: 道具. 遗物. 祝福

name: 惊喜的发现
text:
多重。
[reaction]在你查找你的牌堆时若惊喜的发现在被查找卡牌中：将其放置入你的游戏区域。你必须将其投入到你执行的下一次能将其投入的技能检定。如果该检定成功，抽取1张卡牌。(每次查找最多使用一次[[研究]]能力。)
real_text:
Myriad.
[reaction] When you search your deck and Surprising Find is among the searched cards: Put it into play in your play area. You must commit it to the next eligible skill test you perform. If that test is successful, draw 1 card. (Max one [[Research]] ability per search.)

name: 智慧古书
text:
使用(2秘密)。
[action] 消耗智慧古书：选择你所在地点的一位调查员。该调查员在其牌堆顶部3张卡牌中查找并抽取一张卡牌，并混洗其牌堆。然后，你可以花费1秘密来使该调查员立即以-2费用打出该卡牌。
real_text:
Uses (2 secrets).
[action] Exhaust Old Book of Lore: Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator searches the top 3 cards of their deck for a card, draws it, and shuffles their deck. Then, you may spend 1 secret to have that investigator immediately play that card, reducing its cost by 2.

name: 绞喉索
text: [fast]在你的回合中，消耗绞喉索：攻击。这次攻击你+2[combat]。只能对剩余1点生命值的敌人使用此能力。
real_text: [fast] During your turn, exhaust Garrote Wire: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. Use only on an enemy with exactly 1 remaining health.

name: 黛利拉·欧鲁尔克
text:
你获得+1[combat]和+1[agility]。
[fast]消耗黛利拉·欧鲁尔克并花费X资源：选择你所在地点的一名敌人。对所选敌人造成1点伤害(如果该敌人已消耗，改为2点伤害)。X为所选敌人的躲避值。
real_text:
You get +1 [combat] and +1 [agility].
[fast] Exhaust Delilah O'Rourke and spend X resources: Choose an enemy at your location. Deal 1 damage to the chosen enemy (2 damage instead if that enemy is exhausted). X is the chosen enemy's evade value.
traits: 盟友. 罪犯. 犯罪团伙
flavor: "谢尔顿？欧巴尼恩？我才不管他们是谁。只要能拿到报酬就行。"

name: 黑猫
text:
每当你在技能检定中抽出[tablet]、[elder_thing]或[elder_sign]符号，你可以不使用该图标的效果，改为选择使用以下效果：
[tablet]：-1。黑猫受到1点直接伤害。
[elder_thing]：-1。黑猫受到1点直接恐惧。
[elder_sign]：+5。治癒黑猫的所有伤害和恐惧。
real_text:
Anytime you reveal a [tablet], [elder_thing], or [elder_sign] symbol during a skill test, you may choose to use the following effects instead of that symbol's normal effects:
[tablet]: -1. The Black Cat takes 1 direct damage.
[elder_thing]: -1. The Black Cat takes 1 direct horror.
[elder_sign]: +5. Heal all damage and horror from The Black Cat.
traits: 盟友. 化身. 幻梦境

name: 神秘启示
text:
你的手牌上限增加1张。
你拥有额外1个手部槽位，只能用来放置一张[[书籍]]支援卡。
real_text:
Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.
You have 1 additional hand slot, which can only be used to hold a [[Tome]] asset.
flavor: 大脑增广后能够整本地记忆大量书籍。

name: 昴星团断章
text:
只要你有……
- ……至少5张手牌，你获得+1[intellect]。
- ……至少10张手牌，你获得+1[willpower]。
- ……至少15张手牌，你获得+1[intellect]。
real_text:
While you have...
- ...5 or more cards in hand, you get +1 [intellect].
- ...10 or more cards in hand, you get +1 [willpower].
- ...15 or more cards in hand, you get +1 [intellect].

name: 神秘笔迹
text:
获得3个资源(如果你手牌中有至少10张其它卡牌，改为4个资源)。
[reaction]在你自己回合抽取神秘笔迹后：将其打出。
real_text:
Gain 3 resources (4 resources instead if you have 10 or more other cards in hand).
[reaction] After you draw Cryptic Writings during your turn: Play it.
flavor:
"……相比之下，还有少量书籍是以我无法理解的语言写说的。"
<cite>H. P. 洛夫克拉夫特，《伦道夫·卡特的供述》</cite>

name: 心胜于物
text:
快速。只能在你回合中打出。
直到本轮结束，将你的[intellect]分别增加到[combat]和[agility]。抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
Fast. Play during your turn.
Until the end of the round, add your [intellect] to your [combat] and [agility]. Draw 1 card.

name: 预见手镜
text: 使用(4秘密)。 [reaction]在你所在地点的技能检定开始后，消耗预见手镜并花费1秘密：这次检定的"抽出混乱标记"步骤改为在此时(投入卡牌之前)执行，而不在投入卡牌后执行。
real_text: Uses (4 secrets). [reaction] After a skill test at your location begins, exhaust Scrying Mirror and spend 1 secret: Perform the "reveal chaos token" step of the test now (before committing cards), instead of after committing cards.

name: 蓝焰术
text: 使用(4充能)。 [action]花费1充能：攻击。这次攻击不使用[combat]，改为使用[willpower]并造成+1伤害。如果这次攻击期间抽出[elder_sign]、"+1"或"0"标记，受到1点伤害。
real_text: Uses (4 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat] and deals +1 damage. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this attack, take 1 damage.

name: 预知术
text: 使用(3充能)。 [action]花费1充能：调查。这次调查不使用[intellect]，改为使用[willpower]。如果你成功，额外发现此地点的1个线索。如果这次调查期间抽出[elder_sign]、"+1"或"0"标记，受到1点恐惧。
real_text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect]. If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue at this location. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this investigation, take 1 horror.

name: 水晶灵摆
text:
你获得+1[willpower]。
[reaction]在你所在地点开始技能检定后，消耗水晶灵摆：声明一个数字。如果这次检定成功且超过的点数为该数字，或者失败且低于的点数为该数字，抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
You get +1 [willpower].
[reaction] After a skill test at your location begins, exhaust Crystal Pendulum: Name a number. If this test succeeds by that number or fails by that number, draw 1 card.

name: 永夜长袍
text: [reaction]在你打出一张[[法术]]卡牌时，消耗永夜长袍：该卡牌的费用减1。打出该卡牌不会引起趁乱攻击。
real_text: [reaction] When you play a [[Spell]] card, exhaust Robes of Endless Night: Reduce the cost of that card by 1. Playing that card does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
flavor: 黑暗是意外的深渊。光明是内心的深渊。

name: 难述真相
text: 使用(3充能)。 [action]花费1充能：躲避。这次躲避尝试不使用[agility]，改为使用[willpower]。这次躲避尝试你+2[willpower]。如果你成功，对你躲避的敌人造成1点伤害。如果这次躲避尝试期间抽出[elder_sign]、"+1"或"0"标记，失去1资源。
real_text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Evade. This evasion attempt uses [willpower] instead of [agility]. You get +2 [willpower] for this evasion attempt. If you succeed, deal 1 damage to the evaded enemy. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this evasion attempt, lose 1 resource.

name: 重新充能
text: 选择你所在地点的调查员控制的一张[[法术]]或[[遗物]]支援卡，从混乱袋中随机抽出1个标记。如果抽出[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]、[elder_thing]或[auto_fail]符号，所选支援卡增加1充能。否则，所选支援卡增加4充能。
real_text: Choose a [[Spell]] or [[Relic]] asset controlled by an investigator at your location and reveal a random chaos token from the chaos bag. If you reveal a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, add 1 charge to the chosen asset. Otherwise, add 4 charges to the chosen asset.

name: 拳击手套
text:
你攻击时+1[combat]。
[reaction]在你击败一名敌人后，消耗拳击手套：在你牌堆顶部6张卡牌中查找1张[[勇气]]事件卡，将其加入你的手牌。混洗你的牌堆。
real_text:
You get +1 [combat] while fighting.
[reaction] After you defeat an enemy, exhaust Boxing Gloves: Search the top 6 cards of your deck for a [[Spirit]] event and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: 干掉他们
text: 攻击。在这次行动开始时，获得2资源。
real_text: Fight. When this action begins, gain 2 resources.
flavor: 该紧紧螺丝了。

name: 还击
text: 快速。在一名敌人攻击你后打出，不论该次攻击是否被取消。 攻击。这次攻击将刚刚发动攻击的敌人作为目标。
real_text: Fast. Play after an enemy attacks you, even if that attack was canceled. Fight. This attack targets the attacking enemy.

name: 一二连击
text: 攻击。这次攻击中你+1[combat]。如果你成功，你可以再次攻击该敌人。该次攻击中你+2[combat]并造成+1伤害。
real_text: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. If you succeed, you may fight that enemy again. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for that attack.
flavor: 纳撒尼尔以他左手迅速的刺拳、还有他右手标誌性的后手重拳着称。

name: "到这儿来！"
text: 快速。在任何[free]时间段中打出。 交战。攻击。选择一名与你所在地点之间最多相隔2个地点的非[[精英]]敌人。将该敌人移动到你所在地点，与其交战，并攻击该敌人。
real_text: Fast. Play during any [free] window. Engage. Fight. Choose a non-[[Elite]] enemy up to 2 locations away. Move that enemy to your location, engage it, and attack it.

name: 吸取教训
text:
快速。在你受到一名敌人攻击造成的伤害后打出。
发现你所在地点的2个线索。
real_text:
Fast. Play after you take damage from an enemy attack.
Discover 2 clues at your location.

name: .18大口径短口手枪
text: 使用(2子弹)。 [action]花费1子弹：攻击。这次攻击中你+2[combat]并造成+1伤害。如果你失败，将1子弹放置在.18大口径短口手枪上。
