real_text: Uses (2 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If you fail, place 1 ammo on .18 Derringer.
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械. 违法

name: 格林童话
text:
使用(4秘密)。
[reaction]在你所在地点的调查员技能检定失败且低于难度至少2点后，消耗格林童话并花费1秘密: 治癒该调查员的1点恐惧。
real_text:
Uses (4 secrets).
[reaction] After an investigator at your location fails a skill test by 2 or more, exhaust Grimm's Fairy Tales and spend 1 secret: Heal 1 horror from that investigator.

name: 陈旧的钥匙圈
text: 使用(2钥匙)。如果陈旧的钥匙圈上没有钥匙，则将其丢弃。 [action]：调查。这次调查中，你所在地点隐藏值-2。如果你成功，移除陈旧的钥匙圈上的1钥匙。
real_text: Uses (2 keys). If there are no keys on Old Keyring, discard it. [action]: Investigate. Your location gets -2 shroud for this investigation. If you succeed, remove 1 key from Old Keyring.

name: 咬紧牙关
text:
快速。在你技能检定失败后打出。
在本轮接下来的时间里，你每项技能+1。
real_text:
Fast. Play after you fail a skill test.
You get +1 to each of your skills for the remainder of the round.

name: .18大口径短口手枪
text: 使用(3子弹)。 [action]花费1子弹：攻击。这次攻击中你+2[combat]并造成+1伤害。如果你失败，放置1子弹在.18大口径短口手枪上，并且本轮你下一次触发本能力时，该次攻击中你额外+1[combat]。
real_text: Uses (3 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If you fail, place 1 ammo on .18 Derringer and the next time you trigger this ability this round, you get an additional +1 [combat] for that attack.
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械. 违法

name: 奥恩奶奶
text:
你获得+1[willpower]和+1[intellect]。
[reaction]在你所在地点的调查员的技能检定将要失败时，消耗奥恩奶奶：该调查员该次检定的技能值+1或-1。
real_text:
You get +1 [willpower] and +1 [intellect].
[reaction] When an investigator at your location would fail a skill test, exhaust Granny Orne: That investigator either gets +1 skill value or -1 skill value for that test.

name: 一点就通
text:
永久。
在你每回合的第一次行动中，或在你回合期间第一次行动前，你执行的每次技能检定难度+1。
在你每回合的第三次行动中，或在你回合期间第三次行动后，你执行的每次技能检定难度-1。
real_text:
Permanent.
During or before your first action of each of your turns, each skill test you perform gets +1 difficulty.
During or after your third action of each of your turns, each skill test you performed gets -1 difficulty.

name: 温妮弗雷德·哈巴默克
text:
[free]如果在这次技能检定中，你投入了自己控制的2张不同的非弱点卡牌：抽取1张卡牌。(每次检定限制1次。)
[elder_sign]效果：+1。在这次检定结束后，你每成功超过难度2点，将你本次检定投入的1张卡牌返回自己手中。
real_text:
[free] If 2 different non-weakness cards you control are committed to this skill test: Draw 1 card. (Limit once per test.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. After this test ends, for every 2 points you succeeded by, return a card you committed to this test to your hand.
flavor: "我能飞得更高。"
back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：流浪者([rogue])等级0-5，中立卡牌等级0-5。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数限制)：你能做得更好、嚣张、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 温妮弗雷德——她父母叫她温特尔，朋友们都叫她温妮——在就读的保留地学校里，她是最聪明的孩子之一。但是，她做事不顾后果，不将权威放在眼中，常常因此陷入麻烦。有一天，她从一个农夫的车库里发现了一架陈旧的双翼飞机，决定"把它开上天兜一圈。"她的人生轨迹从此彻底改变。曾是一战飞行员的飞机主人被温妮的天赋给折服，主动提出要将自己的所有技艺传授给她。现在，温妮在全国各地巡迴表演，炫耀自己的技术，大家都知道她是个"无所畏惧的女人"。但她的无畏在一场表演当中受到了挑战，她发现了一种自己差点没法描述的生物：牠有着皮质的翅膀和一隻鼓着脓疱的眼睛。

name: 你能做得更好
text:
温妮弗雷德·哈巴默克牌组专用。
只能在你执行的技能检定中投入。
real_text:
Winifred Habbamock deck only.
Commit only to a skill test you are performing.
flavor: "我跟你说过的。"

name: 嚣张
text:
你执行的技能检定若能投入嚣张，则必须将其投入。
你的技能值改为减去本卡牌上的技能图标，而不是加上。
如果这次技能检定成功，将本技能卡返回手牌。
real_text:
You must commit Arrogance to each eligible skill test you perform.
This skill's icons subtract from your skill value instead of adding to it.
If this test succeeds, return this skill to your hand.

name: 毛瑟C96手枪
text: 使用(5子弹)。 [action]消耗毛瑟C96手枪并花费1子弹：攻击。这次攻击中你+1[combat]并造成+1伤害。如果你成功且超过难度至少2点，你可以准备毛瑟C96手枪或获得1资源。
real_text: Uses (5 ammo). [action] Exhaust Mauser C96 and spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +1 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If you succeed by 2 or more, either ready Mauser C96 or gain 1 resource.
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械. 违法

name: 身手矫捷
text: 这次技能检定成功且每超过难度1点，在本次检定结算后你可以立即移动到一个连接地点(最多移动3次)。
real_text: For each point this skill test succeeds by, after it resolves, you may immediately move to a connecting location (to a maximum of 3 times).

name: 心灵手巧
text:
每次技能检定最多投入1张。
如果这次技能检定成功，抽取1张卡牌(如果超过难度至少2点，改为抽取2张卡牌)。
real_text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test is successful, draw 1 card (2 cards instead if it succeeds by 2 or more).
flavor: 易如反掌。

name: 学人精
text: 在你将学人精投入到技能检定后，在另一位调查员的弃牌堆中查找并投入一张你能够投入到这次检定中的技能卡。这次检定结束后，将该卡放到其所有者的牌堆底部。
real_text: After you commit Copycat to a skill test, search the discard pile of another investigator for a skill you can commit to this test, and commit it. After this test ends, place that card on the bottom of its owner's deck.

name: 贝雷塔M1918衝锋枪
text: 使用(4子弹)。 [action]消耗贝雷塔M1918衝锋枪并花费1子弹：攻击。这次攻击中你+4[combat]并造成+1伤害。如果你成功且超过难度至少2点，执行以下一项：准备贝雷塔M1918衝锋枪，或者这次攻击额外造成+1伤害(如果你成功且超过难度至少4点，则改为执行两项)。
real_text: Uses (4 ammo). [action] Exhaust Beretta M1918 and spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +4 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If you succeed by 2 or more, either ready Beretta M1918, or this attack deals an additional +1 damage (if you succeed by 4 or more, do both).
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械. 违法

name: 哈维·沃尔特斯
text:
[reaction]调查阶段中，在你所在地点的一位调查员从其牌堆抽取至少1张卡牌后：该调查员抽取1张卡牌。(每轮限制1次。)
[elder_sign]效果：+1。抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
[reaction] After an investigator at your location draws 1 or more cards from their deck during the investigation phase: That investigator draws 1 card. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Draw 1 card.
flavor: "我在处理这类恐怖事件上有经验。"
back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：探求者([seeker])等级0-5，中立卡等级0-5。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数限制)：知识宝库、该死的好奇心、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 沃尔特斯教授本来热衷于神秘与晦涩的事物，但是在多年之后他发现，自己积累的关于古语言、亵渎古物和怪异仪式的知识，对于解决当代危机至关重要。他既是一位狂热收藏家，热衷于收集史前曾出现的东西；他又是一口知识的源泉，了解那些最初的、崇拜上亿年前的恐怖神明的宗教。仍然在世并且没有陷入疯狂的人当中，没有谁能比哈维更了解神秘事物。当有超自然事件发生，沃尔特斯教授就会用他大量的资源和经验来担起责任。

name: 知识宝库
text:
哈维·沃尔特牌组专用。
你的手牌上限增加2张。
[reaction]在你调查成功后，消耗知识宝库并选择你所在地点的一位调查员：该调查员抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
Harvey Walters deck only.
Your maximum hand size is increased by 2.
[reaction] After you successfully investigate, exhaust Vault of Knowledge and choose an investigator at your location: That investigator draws 1 card.

name: 该死的好奇心
text: 显现 - 你每有3张手牌：受到1点伤害。
real_text: Revelation - For every 3 cards in your hand: Take 1 damage.
flavor:
"……我只希望我的描述能让那些完全信任我的人保持理智和谨慎，而不是勾起他们的好奇心。"
<cite>H. P. 洛夫克拉夫特，《疯狂山脉》</cite>

name: 杰奎琳·法恩
text:
[reaction]在你所在地点的一位调查员将要抽出任意数量的混乱标记时：抽出2个额外的标记。从抽出的标记中选择并取消2个非[auto_fail]标记，或取消1个[auto_fail]标记。(每轮限制1次。)
[elder_sign]效果：+1。如果本效果被取消或忽略，抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
[reaction] When an investigator at your location would reveal any number of chaos tokens: Reveal 2 additional tokens. Of the revealed tokens, choose and cancel 2 non-[auto_fail] tokens, or 1 [auto_fail] token. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. If this effect is canceled or ignored, draw 1 card.
flavor: "未来是可以改写的。"
back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：潜修者([mystic])等级0-5，中立卡牌等级0-5。 牌组构建需求 (不计入卡牌张数限制)：命运决定者、黑暗未来、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 鲜血。火焰。毁灭。每个晚上，杰奎琳的梦里总是充满了还未发生的情景。一开始，她认为这些梦是一种可怕的诅咒。但是，当她开始控制自己的灵视，仔细观察梦中的事件时，她现在明白这不是诅咒，而是一种召唤。世界将会陷入长达千年、难以言名的混沌，而这预兆只有她一个人得知。她梦境的预示从未出错，但不能让这夜夜萦绕的噩梦成为现实。

name: 命运决定者
text:
杰奎琳·法恩牌组专用。
[reaction]在你使用杰奎琳·法恩的[reaction]能力时，消耗命运决定者：这次使用不计入她能力的使用次数限制。
real_text:
Jacqueline Fine deck only.
[reaction] When you use Jacqueline Fine's [reaction] ability, exhaust Arbiter of Fates: This use of her ability does not count towards its limit.
flavor: 我能看见命运之线，知道它们何时会断裂。

name: 黑暗未来
text: 显现 - 将黑暗未来放置入你的威胁区域。 你不能取消也不能忽略[elder_sign]、[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]、[elder_thing]、[auto_fail]标记。 强制 - 当你回合结束时：从混乱袋随机抽出5个混乱标记。如果抽出了[elder_sign]符号，丢弃黑暗未来。
real_text: Revelation - Put Dark Future into play in your threat area. You cannot cancel or ignore [elder_sign], [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], and [auto_fail] tokens. Forced - At the end of your turn: Reveal 5 random tokens from the chaos bag. If an [elder_sign] symbol is revealed, discard Dark Future.

name: 纳撒尼尔·曹
text:
[reaction]在你藉由事件卡，或事件卡上的攻击能力对一名敌人造成伤害时：造成额外1点伤害。(每阶段限制1次。)
[elder_sign]效果：+1。如果这次攻击中这次技能检定成功，将你弃牌堆的1张事件卡返回你的手牌。
real_text:
[reaction] When you deal damage to an enemy by an event or a fight ability on an event: Deal 1 additional damage. (Limit once per phase.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. If this skill test is successful during an attack, return an event from your discard pile to your hand.
flavor: "我必须继续战斗。"
back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：守卫者([guardian])等级0-5，中立卡牌等级0-5。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数限制)：兰道尔·曹、汤米·马洛伊、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 前途无量的拳击手纳撒尼尔·曹，曾有人以重金邀请他参加一场拳赛，争夺冠军，那时他以为自己终于要成功了。但纳撒尼尔·曹的经纪人竟是臭名昭着的欧巴尼恩帮成员，他常常逼迫纳撒尼尔·曹在拳击台上假装倒下，捏造赛果。他出言拒绝，导致自己的哥哥兰道尔出了"意外"。这群黑帮匪徒每晚都在危害着阿卡姆市民的安全，纳撒尼尔再也无法容忍他们的所为。现在他将自己的拳头用在正途，在街道上巡逻，保护他人不受伤害。但他很快就发现，阿卡姆的阴影之下危机四伏，不仅仅是黑帮……

name: 兰道尔·曹
text: 纳撒尼尔·曹牌组专用。 [reaction]在兰道尔·曹入场后：治癒3点伤害，或者在你的牌堆及弃牌堆中查找一张[[武器]]支援卡，将其打出(支付其费用)，并混洗你的牌堆。(FAQ, v1.8)
real_text: Nathaniel Cho deck only. [reaction] After Randall Cho enters play: Heal 3 damage or search your deck and discard pile for a [[Weapon]] asset, play it (paying its cost), and shuffle your deck.
flavor: "你别干了，纳撒尼尔。早晚你会把自己的命也给搭进去。"

name: 汤米·马洛伊
text: 猎物 - 仅对纳撒尼尔·曹。 猎手。 强制 - 在汤米·马洛伊将要受到任意数量的伤害时：该伤害数量减至1。
real_text: Prey - Nathaniel Cho only. Hunter. Forced - When Tommy Malloy would take any amount of damage: Reduce that amount to 1.
traits: 类人. 罪犯. 犯罪团伙
flavor:
他们都管他叫"大傻"。
纳撒尼尔称呼他为人渣。

name: 斯特拉·克拉克
text:
[reaction]在你技能检定失败后：你本轮可以在自己回合期间进行额外一次行动。(每轮限制1次。)
[elder_sign]效果：+1。你可以改为选择让该次技能检定自动失败，来治癒1点伤害和1点恐惧。
real_text:
[reaction] After you fail a skill test: You may take an additional action during your turn this round. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. You may instead choose to automatically fail this skill test to heal 1 damage and 1 horror.
flavor: "我能听见它的声音。那它听得见我说话吗？"
back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：求生者([survivor])等级0-5、中立卡牌等级0-5。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数限制)：3张不畏雨雪、1张雾之召唤、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 打从斯特拉在阿卡姆邮局当差以来，她很清楚两件事。第一，她的父母错将她叫做儿子，还给他取了一个男孩名字。第二是，在深夜里——国王港悬崖上的小屋曾低声念出了她的真名——她为自己挑选的名字："斯特拉"。斯特拉每週六不论天气如何都会派送邮件，这不是一件易事，但她只要想到自己在维繫人们之间的联繫，变对这份工作满怀热忱。随后她就开始翻找信件。每次她派送到最后，包里总是会多出来一个信封。信封上的收件人一直是她，盖有国王港的邮戳。信封里只有一封信，信上是印刷的一个词："斯特拉"。

name: 不畏雨雪
text:
斯特拉·克拉克牌组专用。
如果这次技能检定失败，取消这次检定失败的所有效果。
real_text:
Stella Clark deck only.
If this skill test fails, cancel all effects of the failed test.
flavor: ……即便是夜色昏暗，邮差也不会受困，迅速地完成派件任务。

name: 雾之召唤
text: 显现 - 将雾之召唤放置入你的威胁区域。 强制 - 在你发动难度值至少4点的技能检定后：受到1点伤害。 [action][action]：丢弃雾之召唤。
real_text: Revelation - Put Called by the Mists into play in your threat area. Forced - After you initiate a skill test with a difficulty of 4 or higher: Take 1 damage. [action] [action]: Discard Called by the Mists.

name: Dexter Drake
text:
[free] During your turn, discard an asset you control: Play an asset with a different title from your hand, reducing its cost by 1. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +2. You may return an asset from your play area to your hand. Then, draw 1 card.
real_text:
[free] During your turn, discard an asset you control: Play an asset with a different title from your hand, reducing its cost by 1. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +2. You may return an asset from your play area to your hand. Then, draw 1 card.
flavor: "Do you want to see true magic?"
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Mystic cards ([mystic]) level 0-5, Rogue cards ([rogue]) level 0-2, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Showmanship, Occult Scraps, 1 random basic weakness.
back_flavor: For Dexter Drake, the magic of fairy tales and myth has been a lifelong fascination. The chance discovery of an old book page during the Great War opened Drake's eyes to the possibility that magic might truly exist. Years later, the promise of arcane tomes locked away in Miskatonic University's special collection draws the successful stage magician to the quiet town of Arkham. Lured to an auction of occult items, "Drake the Great" and his assistant, Molly Maxwell, find themselves targeted by the depraved servants of an otherwordly force of disease and corruption. To save Molly, Arkham, and perhaps the world from a horrific transformation, Drake needs more than his wits and quick hands. He must turn to real magic, even if it risks his mind, body, and spirit.

name: Molly Maxwell
text:
Dexter Drake deck only. Replacement.
[free] Exhaust Molly Maxwell and deal her 1 horror: Name any trait. One at a time, reveal cards from the top of your deck until an asset with the named trait is revealed. Draw that asset. Shuffle each other revealed card back into your deck.
real_text:
Dexter Drake deck only. Replacement.
[free] Exhaust Molly Maxwell and deal her 1 horror: Name any trait. One at a time, reveal cards from the top of your deck until an asset with the named trait is revealed. Draw that asset. Shuffle each other revealed card back into your deck.

name: Yaztaroth
text: Dexter Drake deck only. Replacement. Revelation - Put Yaztaroth into play in your threat area. You cannot put assests into play. [action] [action]: Discard Yaztaroth.
real_text: Dexter Drake deck only. Replacement. Revelation - Put Yaztaroth into play in your threat area. You cannot play assets or put assets into play. [action] [action]: Discard Yaztaroth.

name: 神射手
text:
[reaction]在你使用[[枪械]]支援卡的攻击能力时，消耗神射手：选择以下一项或两项： - 
- 这次攻击不使用[combat]，改为使用[agility]。你的[combat]修正值改为修正你的[agility]。
- 对于本次攻击中受到攻击的敌人，不使用其攻击值，改为使用其躲避值。
real_text:
[reaction] When you use a fight ability on a [[Firearm]] asset, exhaust Sharpshooter: Choose one, or both - 
- This attack uses [agility] instead of [combat]. All modifiers to your [combat] for this attack modify your [agility] instead.
- Use the attacked enemy's evade value for this attack, instead of their fight value.

name: 惠顿·格林
text:
只要你有控制[[书籍]]或[[遗物]]支援卡，你获得+1[intellect]。
[reaction]在你翻开一张地点卡或将一个新地点放置入场后，消耗惠顿·格林：在你牌堆顶部6张卡牌中查找并抽取1张[[书籍]]或[[遗物]]支援卡。混洗你的牌堆。
real_text:
While you control a [[Tome]] or [[Relic]] asset, you get +1 [intellect].
[reaction] After you reveal a location or put a new location into play, exhaust Whitton Greene: Search the top 6 cards of your deck for a [[Tome]] or [[Relic]] asset and draw it. Shuffle your deck.
traits: 盟友. 米斯卡塔尼克

name: 米斯卡塔尼克考古基金
text: 永久。每副牌组限制1张。 你拥有额外2个盟友槽位，只能用来放置[[米斯卡塔尼克]]支援卡。 强制 - 在你每次受到伤害或恐惧时：不能分配超过1点伤害/恐惧到[[米斯卡塔尼克]]支援卡。
real_text: Permanent. Limit 1 per deck. You have 2 additional ally slots, which can only be used to hold [[Miskatonic]] assets. Forced - When you take damage or horror: No more than 1 of that damage/horror can be assigned to a [[Miskatonic]] asset.

name: 死灵之书
subname: 彼得鲁斯·德·达西亚译本
text:
使用(6秘密)。每副牌组限制1张。
[free]花费1秘密：这次技能检定你的技能值+2。
[free]花费2秘密：抽取2张卡牌。
[free]花费3秘密：发现任意地点的1个线索。
[free]花费4秘密：对与你交战的一名敌人造成3点伤害。
real_text:
Uses (6 secrets). Limit 1 per deck.
[free] Spend 1 secret: You get +2 skill value for this skill test.
[free] Spend 2 secrets: Draw 2 cards.
[free] Spend 3 secrets: Discover 1 clue at any location.
[free] Spend 4 secrets: Deal 3 damage to an enemy engaged with you.

name: 玛丽修女
text:
在设置期间，加入2个[bless]标记到混乱袋。
[reaction]在一轮结束时：加入1个[bless]标记到混乱袋。
[elder_sign]效果：+1。如果你成功，加入1个[bless]标记到混乱袋。
real_text:
During setup, add 2 [bless] tokens to the chaos bag.
[reaction] When the round ends: Add 1 [bless] token to the chaos bag.
[elder_sign] effect: +1. If you succeed, add 1 [bless] token to the chaos bag.
flavor: "主看护我的道路。我以信为冑。"
back_text: 牌组卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：守卫者卡牌([guardian])等级0-5，中立卡牌等级0-5，潜修者卡牌([mystic])等级0-2。 牌组构建需求 (不计入牌组卡牌张数)：守护天使、信仰危机、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 玛丽修女坚信，越是有诡奇奥义的力量在世上作怪，自己就越要在这条道路上抵御那些力量，只要有可能，无论有多远，都要保护无辜之人。儘管除了教会的罩袍和坚定的信仰之外别无他物，但玛丽修女只要一从同侪那裏听闻超自然的威胁作祟，必然挺身前往一探究竟。教会中其他成员对此不屑一顾，以为这些都是中世纪的无知妄言。但玛丽修女知道，这些阴影中潜藏着真实的邪恶——他还知道这些邪恶如果听之任之，会给主创造的一切都带来毁灭和恐怖。

name: 阿曼达‧夏普
text: 强制 - 当调查阶段开始时：抽取1张卡牌。丢弃阿曼达‧夏普底下的卡牌。选择你的一张手牌放置在她底下。 强制 - 当你执行的技能检定开始时：如果可能，投入阿曼达‧夏普底下的卡牌。在检定结束时不要将其丢弃。(FAQ, v1.8) [elder_sign]效果：+0。这次检定你可以将阿曼达‧夏普底下的卡牌的技能图标数量翻倍。
real_text: Forced - At the start of the investigation phase: Draw 1 card. Discard the card beneath Amanda Sharpe. Choose a card from your hand and place it beneath her. Forced - At the start of a skill test you are performing: Commit the card beneath Amanda Sharpe, if able. Do not discard it when the test ends. [elder_sign] effect: +0. For this test, you may double the number of skill icons on the card beneath Amanda Sharpe.
traits: 米斯卡塔尼克. 学者
back_text: 牌组卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：探求者卡牌([seeker])等级0-5，中立卡牌等级0-5，[[精通]]技能卡等级0-3。 牌组构建需求(不计入牌组卡牌张数)：晦涩研究、深海低语、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 阿曼达‧夏普眼看就要成为米大最杰出的毕业生。但自从她看见一幅诡奇的绘画之后，课业就受到了影响。画上是一个庞然巨物从深海涌起。她的梦境中全是一座巨大的沉没之城，还有不明语言的低语。她继续埋头研究，但目标已不是以兼职生的身分毕业，而是她定要找到现实之间潜藏的异教秘密究竟有何含义。

name: 守护天使
text:
玛丽修女牌组专用。
你所在地点和连接地点的其他调查员受到的伤害可以分配给守护天使。
[reaction]在任意数量的伤害分配给守护天使时：加入同等数量的[bless]标记到混乱袋。
real_text:
Sister Mary deck only.
Guardian Angel may be assigned damage dealt to other investigators at your location and connecting locations.
[reaction] When any amount of damage is assigned to Guardian Angel: Add that many [bless] tokens to the chaos bag.

name: 信仰危机
text: 显现 - 混乱袋里每有一个[bless]标记，你必须选择将其替换成[curse]标记或受到1点恐惧。
real_text: Revelation - For each [bless] token in the chaos bag, you must either replace it with a [curse] token or take 1 horror.

name: 晦涩研究
text:
阿曼达‧夏普牌组专用。
快速。在你发动技能检定时打出。
将阿曼达‧夏普底下的卡牌返回你的手牌，并将晦涩研究放置在她底下。
real_text:
Amanda Sharpe deck only.
Fast. Play when you initiate a skill test.
Return the card beneath Amanda Sharpe to your hand and place Obscure Studies beneath her.

name: 深海低语
text: 你的技能值不增加此技能卡的图标，改为减少。 强制 - 在选择卡牌放置到阿曼达‧夏普底下时，如果深海低语在你手牌：你必须选择它。
real_text: This skill's icons subtract from your skill value instead of adding to it. Forced - When choosing a card to place beneath Amanda Sharpe, if Whispers from the Deep is in your hand: You must choose it.

name: 神秘魔法书
text:
[action]：加入1个[curse]标记到混乱袋。
[action]如果混乱袋内有10个[curse]标记，丢弃神秘魔法书：在你的冒险日誌中纪录"你翻译了魔法书"。将混乱袋内的5个[curse]标记替换为5个[bless]标记。
real_text:
[action]: Add 1 [curse] token to the chaos bag.
[action] If there are 10 [curse] tokens in the chaos bag, discard Cryptic Grimoire: Record in your Campaign Log that "you have translated the grimoire." Replace 5 [curse] tokens in the chaos bag with 5 [bless] tokens.
traits: 道具. 书籍. 密教

name: 浮士德的交易
text:
作为打出浮士德的交易的额外费用，加入2个[curse]标记到混乱袋。
你所在地点的调查员获得总计5资源，由你自行分配。
real_text:
As an additional cost to play Faustian Bargain, add 2 [curse] tokens to the chaos bag.
Investigators at your location gain a total of 5 resources, distributed as you wish.

name: 命运之潮
text:
快速。在任何[fast]玩家时间段中，或当一轮开始时打出。
将混乱袋内所有的[curse]标记替换为相同数量的[bless]标记。当该轮结束时，将混乱袋内所有的[bless]标记替换为相同数量的[curse]标记。
real_text:
Fast. Play during any [fast] window, or at the start of the round.
Replace all [curse] tokens in the chaos bag with an equal number of [bless] tokens. At the end of the round, replace all [bless] tokens in the chaos bag with an equal number of [curse] tokens.

name: 光辉结界
text:
快速。你所在地点一位调查员在抽取一张非弱点诡计卡时打出。
从混乱袋随机抽出5个混乱标记。
如果抽初[bless]或[elder_sign]标记，取消该诡计卡的显现效果。
real_text:
Fast. Play when an investigator at your location draws a non-weakness treachery card.
Reveal 5 random chaos tokens from the chaos bag.
If a [bless] or [elder_sign] token is revealed, cancel that treachery card's revelation effect.

name: 既定命运
text:
每次技能检定最多投入1张。
你可以投入既定命运到任意类型的检定。
如果这次检定失败，加入2个[bless]标记到混乱袋，或从混乱袋移除2个[curse]标记。
real_text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
You may commit Predestined to any type of test.
If this test fails, either add 2 [bless] tokens to the chaos bag or remove 2 [curse] tokens from the chaos bag.

name: 先见之明
text:
每次技能检定最多投入1张。
在你将先见之明投入到技能检定后，声明"双数"、"单数"或"符号"。在这次检定结束后，如果这次检定中抽出了声明类型的混乱标记，你可以将你弃牌堆的一张[[法术]]卡返回手牌。
real_text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
After you commit Prescient to a skill test, name "even," "odd," or "symbol." After this test ends, if a chaos token of the named type was revealed during this test, you may return a [[Spell]] card from your discard pile to your hand.

name: 神秘研究
text:
使用(2资源)。当每轮开始时重新补满资源。
[fast]花费你资源池或神秘研究的1资源：这次技能检定你+1[willpower]或+1[intellect]。
real_text:
Uses (2 resources). Replenish these resources at the start of each round.
[fast] Spend 1 resource from your resource pool or from Arcane Studies: You get +1 [willpower] or +1 [intellect] for this skill test.

name: 一二连击
text: 攻击。这次攻击你自动成功并造成+1伤害。你可以再次攻击。该次攻击中你+3[combat]并造成+2伤害。
real_text: Fight. You automatically succeed and deal +1 damage for this attack. You may fight again. You get +3 [combat] and deal +2 damage for that attack.
flavor: 纳撒尼尔以他左手迅速的刺拳、还有他右手标誌性的后手重拳着称。

name: 似曾相识
text:
永久。
在剧本的两场冒险之间，以每张经验值费用-1的价格，回购你在上一场冒险期间放逐的最多3张卡牌。
real_text:
Permanent.
In between two scenarios of a campaign, reduce the experience cost to repurchase up to 3 cards that you exiled during the last scenario by 1 each.
flavor: 你之前没见过这个吗？

name: 虎口拔牙
text: 在你将虎口拔牙投入到技能检定后，从你牌堆顶部弃牌，直到丢弃一张可以投入这次检定的[rogue]技能卡。将其投入。将本效果中丢弃的所有弱点卡洗回你的牌堆。
real_text: After you commit Daredevil to a skill test, discard cards from the top of your deck until you discard a [rogue] skill you can commit to this test. Commit it. Shuffle each weakness that was discarded by this effect back into your deck.
flavor:
"你是个疯子，温妮！"
"我知道！这难道不是件好事吗？"

name: 黛西·沃克
text:
你每控制1张[[书籍]]支援卡，获得+1[willpower]和+1神智值。
[fast]：依次结算你控制的每张[[书籍]]支援上的[action]能力，忽略其[action]费用。(每场游戏限制一次。)
[elder_sign]效果：+1。你可以将你弃牌堆中的1张[[书籍]]支援卡返回你的手牌。
real_text:
You get +1 [willpower] and +1 sanity for each [[Tome]] asset you control.
[fast]: One at a time, resolve an [action] ability on each [[Tome]] asset you control, ignoring their [action] cost. (Limit once per game.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. You may return a [[Tome]] asset from your discard pile to your hand.

deck_options.error: You cannot have more than 5 Guardian and/or Mystic cards

flavor: "我可以阖上书本，但我永远无法忘掉它的内容。"
back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：[[书籍]]卡牌等级0-5，探求者([seeker])等级0-3，中立卡牌等级0-5，最多5张守卫者和/或潜修者卡牌([guardian]和/或[mystic])的其他等级0卡牌。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：黛西的手提包、死灵之书(约翰·迪伊译本)、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 作为米斯卡塔尼克大学中一位受人尊敬的图书馆员，黛西一直把书当作人生最重要的一部分。她在书里寻找着现实中不存在的恐惧与刺激感。直到有一天，她找到约翰·迪伊翻译的《死灵之书》。书中充满了各种邪恶和亵渎的内容。她试图用社会学的相关知识来解析这本书，渐渐地，她意识到书中的内容可能比现实更为真实。她决定踏入奥恩图书馆的深处，探索那些被深藏的禁书⋯⋯

name: 黛西的手提包
text:
黛西·沃克牌组专用。进阶。
你拥有额外2个手部槽位，只能用来放置[[书籍]]支援卡。
[reaction]在你的回合中打出[[书籍]]支援卡时，消耗黛西的手提包：该卡获得快速。
real_text:
Daisy Walker deck only. Advanced.
You have 2 additional hand slots, which can only be used to hold [[Tome]] assets.
[reaction] When you play a [[Tome]] asset during your turn, exhaust Daisy's Tote Bag: That asset gains fast.

name: 死灵之书
text: 进阶。 显现 - 将死灵之书放置入你的威胁区域，并在该卡上放置3个恐惧。该卡如果有至少1个恐惧，则不能离场。 当此卡在场，将你抽出的[elder_sign]标记视为[cultist]、[tablet]和[elder_thing]标记(结算3个标记)。 [action]：将死灵之书的1个恐惧移动到戴西·沃克上。然后，如果死灵之书没有恐惧，则将其丢弃。
real_text: Advanced. Revelation - Put this card into play in your threat area, with 3 horror on it. It cannot leave play while it has 1 or more horror on it. While it is in play, treat each [elder_sign] you reveal on a chaos token as a [cultist], [tablet], and [elder_thing] (resolve all three). [action]: Move 1 horror from this card to Daisy Walker. Then, if The Necronomicon has no horror on it, discard it.

name: 求生匕首
text: [action]：攻击。这次攻击中你+2[combat]。 [reaction]在一个敌人在敌军阶段攻击你时(在该次攻击结算之前)，消耗求生匕首：攻击。这次攻击将刚刚发动攻击的敌人作为目标。这次攻击中你+2[combat]并造成+1伤害。
real_text: [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. [reaction] When an enemy attacks you during the enemy phase (before resolving that attack), exhaust Survival Knife: Fight. This attack targets the attacking enemy. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack.
traits: 道具. 武器. 近战

name: 鲜血失色
text: 作为打出鲜血失色的额外费用，受到2点伤害。 攻击。这次攻击不使用[combat]，改为使用[willpower]。这次攻击中你+2[willpower]并造成+2伤害。
real_text: As an additional cost to play Blood Eclipse, take 2 damage. Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. You get +2 [willpower] and deal +2 damage for this attack.

name: 去伪存真
text: 在你所在地点上的调查员控制的支援卡上放置总共2秘密(如果你所在地点有线索，改为3秘密)。
real_text: Place 2 secrets among assets controlled by investigators at your location (3 secrets instead if there is a clue at your location).
flavor:
"你怎么知道我是疯的？"爱丽丝说。
"你肯定疯了。"柴郡猫说，"不然你不会到这儿来。"
<cite>路易斯·卡罗，《爱丽丝梦游仙境》</cite>

name: 古代巨石
text: 研究。(FAQ, v2.0) 使用(X秘密)。X为"你鉴定了古代巨石"旁括号内的数字。 [reaction]在你抽取任何数量的卡牌时，花费等量的秘密：移动等量的次数。
real_text:
Researched. Uses (X secrets). X is the number in parentheses next to "you have identified the stone."
[reaction] When you draw any number of cards, spend that many secrets: Move that many times.

name: 彩饰骷髅
text: 使用(0充能)。 [reaction]在你所在地点有调查员、[[盟友]]支援卡或敌人被击败后：将1资源(从供应堆拿取)放到彩饰骷髅上，视为充能。 [action]花费最多3充能：抽取等量的卡牌并获得等量的资源。
real_text: Uses (0 charges). [reaction] After an investigator, [[Ally]] asset, or enemy at your location is defeated: Place 1 resource (from the token bank) on Decorated Skull, as a charge. [action] Spend up to 3 charges: Draw that many cards and gain that many resources.
traits: 道具. 遗物. 诅咒萦绕

name: 柯尔特袖珍手枪
text: 使用(5子弹)。 [action]花费1子弹：攻击。这次攻击中你+2[combat]。这次攻击造成+1伤害。 强制 - 当本轮结束时，如果你触发过柯尔特袖珍手枪的"[action]"能力：丢弃柯尔特袖珍手枪。
real_text: Uses (5 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage. Forced - At the end of the round, if you triggered Colt Vest Pocket's "[action]" ability: Discard it.
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械. 违法

name: 拉莱耶迷雾
text: 使用(5充能)。 [action]花费1充能：躲避。这次躲避尝试不使用[agility]，改为使用[willpower]。这次躲避尝试你+1[willpower]。如果你成功，在躲避所选敌人后，你可以移动到一个连接地点。如果在本次躲避尝试期间抽出[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]、[elder_thing]或[auto_fail]符号，从你手牌中选择并丢弃1张卡牌。
real_text: Uses (5 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Evade. This evasion attempt uses [willpower] instead of [agility]. You get +1 [willpower] for this evasion attempt. If you succeed, after evading the chosen enemy, you may move to a connecting location. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this evasion attempt, choose and discard a card from your hand.

name: 钻地魔虫之石
text: 封印([skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]或[elder_thing])。使用(3充能)。如果钻地魔虫之石没有充能，则将其返回手牌。 强制 - 在你在技能检定中抽出[auto_fail]标记后：移除钻地魔虫之石的1充能。
real_text: Seal ([skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing]). Uses (3 charges). If The Chthonian Stone has no charges, return it to your hand. Forced - After you reveal an [auto_fail] symbol during a skill test: Remove 1 charge from The Chthonian Stone.
traits: 道具. 遗物. 诅咒萦绕

name: 改变命运
text: 选择并丢弃场上一张没有迭加到[[精英]]敌人的非弱点诡计卡。
real_text: Choose and discard from play a non-weakness treachery that is not attached to an [[Elite]] enemy.
flavor: 我们的命运由自己书写。

name: 自食其力
text: 卓越。永久。 你的调查员获得："牌组构建限制：无占用盟友槽的支援卡。" [reaction]在你打出一张[survivor]事件时，消耗自食其力：该事件费用减少2点。
real_text: Exceptional. Permanent. Your investigator gains: "Deckbuilding Restrictions: No assets that take up an ally slot." [reaction] When you play a [survivor] event, exhaust On Your Own: Reduce that event's cost by 2.

name: 背包
text:
[reaction]在背包入场后：查找你牌堆顶部12张卡牌，找出最多3张非弱点的[[道具]]或[[供给]]卡牌，并将这些卡牌面朝下迭加到背包。混洗你的牌堆。
可以打出迭加到背包的卡牌，如同这些卡牌在你的手牌中。如果没有卡牌迭加到背包，则将其丢弃。
real_text:
[reaction] After Backpack enters play: Search the top 12 cards of your deck for up to 3 non-weakness [[Item]] or [[Supply]] cards, and attach them facedown to Backpack. Shuffle your deck.
Cards attached to Backpack may be played as if they were in your hand. If there are no cards attached to Backpack, discard it.

name: 植形变异
text: 显现 - 将植形变异放置到你的威胁区域。植形变异上没有伤害时，其不能离场。 [fast]受到1点直接伤害：对植形变异造成1点伤害。 卡牌由植物学家设计于阿卡姆之夜2018。
real_text: Revelation - Put Dendromorphosis into play in your threat area. It cannot leave play while it has no damage on it. [fast] Take 1 direct damage: Deal 1 damage to Dendromorphosis. Card design by the Botanists at Arkham Nights 2018.
flavor: "植物！"

name: 附加条款
text: 显现 - 失去7个资源。如果你不能这么做，改为将附加条款从你的牌组移除，并查找收藏中的出卖灵魂，将其加入你的弃牌堆。
real_text: Revelation - Lose 7 resources. If you cannot, instead remove Fine Print from your deck, search the collection for Sell Your Soul, and place it in your discard pile.
flavor: 你鲜红的签名从它表面滴落。

name: 出卖灵魂
text: 显现 - 失去10个资源。如果你不能这么做，黑暗资助人将你的意识从身体里剥离了出去。你立刻发疯。
real_text: Revelation - Lose 10 resources. If you cannot, your dark patron tears your consciousness from your body. You are driven insane.
flavor: 债务无论如何终将被偿还。

name: 你无法拒绝的条件
text: 剧本模式专用。 在你成为本弱点卡的承受者时，获得2经验。 显现 - 失去5个资源。如果你不能这么做，改为将无法拒绝的提案从你的牌组移除，并查找收藏中的附加条款，将其加入你的弃牌堆。
real_text: Campaign Mode only. When you become the bearer of this weakness, gain 2 experience. Revelation - Lose 5 resources. If you cannot, instead remove Offer You Cannot Refuse from your deck, search the collection for Fine Print, and place it in your discard pile.

name: "倒霉蛋"奥图尔
text:
[fast]花费最多3资源：进行一次基础技能值为3的检定，检定难度等于你花费的资源数量。如果你成功，获得所花资源两倍数量的资源。只有[agility]和[wild]技能图标可以被投入到此检定中。(每轮限制一次。)
[elder_sign]效果：+1。在你的弃牌堆中选择1张等级2或以下的卡牌。将该卡加入你的手牌。
real_text:
[fast] Spend up to 3 resources: Test a base skill value of 3 against a difficulty equal to the amount of resources just spent. If you succeed, gain twice the number of spent resources. Only [agility] and [wild] skill icons may be committed to this test. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Choose a level 2 or less card in your discard pile. Add the chosen card to your hand.
back_text: 卡牌张数：25。 牌组构建选项：流浪者([rogue])等级0-5，[[幸运]]卡牌等级0-3，[[局势]]卡牌等级0-3，中立卡牌等级0-5。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：在逃中、医院债务、1张随机基础弱点。 额外选项：当你升级[[幸运]]或[[局势]]卡牌时，你可以改为支付较高等级卡牌的全额经验值，并将较低等级卡牌保留在你的牌组中(该卡不计入你的牌组卡牌张数，或你牌组中的同名卡牌数量)。
back_flavor: 奥图尔一开始就没打算做一辈子的罪犯，但有时做正确的事情意味着会弄脏自己的双手。他的狱友布拉德·霍林每晚都无声地嘶喊着"旧日支配者"什么的。奥图尔并未将这放在心上，直到一天夜里他醒来时看到他的狱友浑身着火。当奥图尔被释放时，他决定回到阿卡姆，寻找答案。

name: 在逃中
text:
"倒霉蛋"奥图尔牌组专用。进阶。
快速。在任何[fast]时间段打出。
直到本轮结束，非[[精英]]敌人不能攻击你。当一轮结束时，你可以与每个交战的敌人解除交战状态并移动到一个连接次数不超过2的地点。
real_text:
"Skids" O'Toole deck only. Advanced.
Fast. Play during any [fast] window.
Until the end of the round, non-[[Elite]] enemies cannot attack you. At the end of the round, you may disengage from each engaged enemy and move up to 2 locations away.
flavor: 我可不会再进监狱了。

name: 医院债务
text: 进阶。显现 - 将医院债务放置入你的威胁区域。 [fast]：将你资源池一个资源移动到医院债务上。(每轮限制3次。) 强制 - 在游戏结束时，如果医院债务上资源数量少于9个：你这次冒险少获得2点经验。
real_text: Advanced. Revelation - Put Hospital Debts into play in your threat area. [fast]: Move 1 resource from your resource pool to Hospital Debts. (Limit three times per round.) Forced - When the game ends, if Hospital Debts has fewer than 9 resources on it: You earn 2 fewer experience for this scenario.

name: 成圣仪式
text:
封印(最多5[bless])。如果成圣仪式上没有封印的标记，将其丢弃。
[reaction]你所在地点一位调查员在打出一张卡牌时，消耗成圣仪式并释放其上封印的一个混乱标记：该卡牌费用降低2。
real_text:
Seal (up to 5 [bless]). If Rite of Sanctification has no tokens sealed on it, discard it.
[reaction] When an investigator at your location plays a card, exhaust Rite of Sanctification and release a chaos token sealed on it: Reduce the cost of that card by 2.

name: 剑杖
text: 打出剑杖不会引起趁乱攻击。 [reaction]在剑杖入场后：立即触发其"[action]"能力，不支付其费用。 [action]消耗剑杖：攻击/躲避。这次攻击或躲避尝试你可以不使用你的[combat]或[agility]，改为使用你的[willpower]。
real_text: Playing Sword Cane does not provoke attacks of opportunity. [reaction] After Sword Cane enters play: Immediately trigger its "[action]" ability without paying its cost. [action] Exhaust Sword Cane: Fight/Evade. You may use your [willpower] in place of your [combat] or [agility] for this attack or evasion attempt.
traits: 道具. 遗物. 武器. 近战

name: 过分痴迷
text: 显现 - 将过分痴迷放置入你的威胁区域。 强制 - 在你回合开始时：随机丢弃你手牌中的1张非弱点卡牌。 [action][action]：丢弃过分痴迷。
real_text: Revelation - Put Obsessive into play in your threat area. Forced - When your turn begins: Discard 1 non-weakness card at random from your hand. [action] [action]: Discard Obsessive.

name: 伊察姆纳圆盘
text: [reaction]在非[[精英]]敌人生成于你所在地点时，丢弃伊察姆纳圆盘：自动躲避该敌人或对其造成2点伤害。
real_text: [reaction] When a non-[[Elite]] enemy spawns at your location, discard Disc of Itzamna: Automatically evade that enemy or deal it 2 damage.
flavor: 他们究竟是害怕护符对他们产生影响？还是害怕护符对你产生影响？

name: 百科全书
text:
使用(5秘密)。
[action]消耗百科全书并花费1秘密：选择你所在地点的一位调查员。直到本阶段结束，该调查员的一项你指定的技能+2。
real_text:
Uses (5 secrets).
[action] Exhaust Encyclopedia and spend 1 secret: Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator gets +2 to a skill of your choice until the end of the phase.

name: 养神术
text:
使用(3秘密)。
[action]消耗养神术并花费1秘密：检定[intellect](1)。你成功且每超过难度1点(最多3点)，抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
Uses (3 secrets).
[action] Exhaust Feed the Mind and spend 1 secret: Test [intellect] (1). For each point you succeed by (to a maximum of 3), draw 1 card.

name: 禁忌之书
text:
使用(5秘密)。
[action]消耗禁忌之书并花费1秘密：抽取1张卡牌。然后，如果你有至少10张手牌，且禁忌之书上没有秘密，你可以将其丢弃并在冒险日誌记录"你翻译了这本书籍。"
real_text:
Uses (5 secrets).
[action] Exhaust Forbidden Tome and spend 1 secret: Draw 1 card. Then, if you have 10 or more cards in your hand and there are no secrets on Forbidden Tome, you may discard it to record in your Campaign Log that "you have translated the tome."
traits: 道具. 遗物. 书籍

name: 高等教育
text:
只要你有至少5张手牌，高等教育获得：
"[free]花费1资源：这次技能检定中你+1[willpower]。
[free]花费1资源：这次技能检定中你+1[intellect]。"
real_text:
While you have 5 or more cards in your hand, Higher Education gains:
"[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [intellect] for this skill test."

name: 晓烛夜深
text: 调查。在这次行动开始时，获得2资源。
real_text: Investigate. When this action begins, gain 2 resources.
flavor: 至死方入眠

name: 神秘笔迹
text:
获得2资源。
[reaction]在你自己回合抽到神秘笔迹后：将其打出。
real_text:
Gain 2 resources.
[reaction] After you draw Cryptic Writings during your turn: Play it.
flavor:
"……相比之下，还有少量书籍是以我无法理解的语言写说的。"
<cite>H. P. 洛夫克拉夫特，《伦道夫·卡特的供述》</cite>

name: 海量研究
text:
你每有1张其它手牌，海量研究的打出费用减少1点。
发现你所在地点的2个线索。
real_text:
Reduce the cost to play Extensive Research by 1 for each other card in your hand.
Discover 2 clues at your location.
flavor:
"这儿也没发现。我们还差多少没查？"
"……瞧瞧你背后这面墙？"

name: 秘法祷言
text: 作为打出秘法祷言的额外费用，丢弃你最多2张手牌。 攻击。这次攻击不使用[combat]，改为使用[intellect]。支付本卡牌费用时你每丢弃1张手牌，在这次攻击中你+1[intellect]并造成+1伤害。
real_text: As an additional cost to play Occult Invocation, discard up to 2 cards from your hand. Fight. - This attack uses [intellect] instead of [combat]. You get +1 [intellect] and deal +1 damage for this attack for each card discarded as part of this card's cost.

name: 图书馆讲解员
text: [reaction]在图书馆讲解员入场后，将一张你控制的[[书籍]]支援卡返回其所有者的手中：打出你手牌中的另一张(名称不同的)[[书籍]]支援卡，其资源费用减2。
real_text: [reaction] After Library Docent enters play, return a [[Tome]] asset you control to its owner's hand: Play a different [[Tome]] asset (by title) from your hand, reducing its cost by 2.
traits: 盟友. 米斯卡塔尼克

name: 窥看不思议之事
text: 抽取1张卡牌。将你手牌中任意数量的非弱点卡牌洗入你的牌堆。然后，抽取同等数量的卡牌。
real_text: Draw 1 card. Shuffle any number of non-weakness cards from your hand into your deck. Then, draw that many cards.
flavor: 无知是福，但你无福消受。

name: 绝密地图集
text:
使用(4秘密)。
[action]花费1秘密：选择1个与你所在地点的连接次数不超过3的已揭示地点。移动到该地点。
real_text:
Uses (4 secrets).
[action] Spend 1 secret: Choose a revealed location up to 3 connections away from your location. Move to that location.

name: 惠顿·格林
text:
只要你有控制[[书籍]]或[[遗物]]支援卡，你获得+1[willpower]和+1[intellect]。
[reaction]在你翻开一张地点卡或将一个新地点放置入场后，消耗惠顿·格林：在你牌堆顶部9张卡牌中查找并抽取1张[[书籍]]或[[遗物]]支援卡。混洗你的牌堆。
real_text:
While you control a [[Tome]] or [[Relic]] asset, you get +1 [willpower] and +1 [intellect].
[reaction] After you reveal a location or put a new location into play, exhaust Whitton Greene: Search the top 9 cards of your deck for a [[Tome]] or [[Relic]] asset and draw it. Shuffle your deck.
traits: 盟友. 米斯卡塔尼克

name: "我有个计划！"
text: 攻击。这次攻击不使用[combat]，改为使用[intellect]。这次检定中你+2[intellect]。你每持有1个线索，这次攻击造成+1伤害(最大+3伤害)。
real_text: Fight. This attack uses [intellect] instead of [combat]. You get +2 [intellect] for this test. You deal +1 damage for this attack for each clue you have (max +3 damage).
flavor: "这应该是我听过最烂的计画了。好吧，那么还蹭什么？快动手吧！"

name: 寻找答案
text: 调查。如果你成功，不发现所在地点的一个线索，改为发现你所在地点和连接地点的总计2个线索。(FAQ, v1.9)
real_text: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering a clue at your location, discover 2 total clues from among your location and connecting locations.
flavor: 有些人会不惜一切代价来找到真相。但是有些真相却能伤人。

name: 洞察力
text:
每次技能检定最多投入1张。
如果这次检定成功，抽取1张卡牌(如果超过难度至少2点，改为抽取2张卡牌)。
real_text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test is successful, draw 1 card (2 cards instead if it succeeds by 2 or more).
flavor: 总算找到了！

name: 禁忌之书
text: 研究。(FAQ, v2.0) [action][action][action][action]消耗禁忌之书：将你所在地点的一张玩家卡上的1点伤害移动到你所在地点的一名敌人上。你每有4张手牌，本能力费用减1行动(最低减至[action])。
real_text:
Researched.
[action] [action] [action] [action] Exhaust Forbidden Tome: Move 1 damage from a player card at your location to an enemy at your location. Reduce this ability's cost by 1 action for every 4 cards in your hand (to a minimum of [action]).
traits: 道具. 遗物. 书籍

name: 禁忌之书
text: 研究。(FAQ, v2.0) [action][action][action][action]消耗禁忌之书：你可以移动到一个连接地点。发现你所在地点的一个线索。你每有4张手牌，本能力费用减1行动(最低减至[action])。
real_text:
Researched.
[action] [action] [action] [action] Exhaust Forbidden Tome: You may move to a connecting location. Discover 1 clue at your location. Reduce this ability's cost by 1 action for every 4 cards in your hand (to a minimum of [action]).
traits: 道具. 遗物. 书籍

name: 远见
text: [fast]在你回合中，如果你有至少8张手牌，消耗远见：打出一张事件卡(支付其费用)。
real_text: [fast] During your turn, if you have 8 or more cards in your hand, exhaust Farsight: Play an event from your hand (paying its cost).
flavor: 超越时间的任何一刻。超越空间的任何一隅。超越现世的曲折蜿蜒。

name: 虚无主义
text: 显现 - 将虚无主义放置入你的威胁区域。 强制 - 在你抽出、取消或忽略一个[auto_fail]标记后：受到1点伤害和1点恐惧。
real_text: Revelation - Put Nihilism into play in your threat area. Forced - After you reveal, cancel, or ignore an [auto_fail] token: Take 1 damage and 1 horror. [action][action]: Discard Nihilism.

name: 难述真相
text: 使用(3充能)。 [action]花费1充能：躲避。这次躲避尝试不使用使用[agility]，改为使用[willpower]。如果你成功，对你躲避的敌人造成1点伤害。如果这次躲避尝试期间抽出[elder_sign]、"+1"或"0"标记，失去1资源。
real_text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Evade. This evasion attempt uses [willpower] instead of [agility]. If you succeed, deal 1 damage to the evaded enemy. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this evasion attempt, lose 1 resource.

name: 幽灵魔宠
text: 你拥有额外1个法术槽位，只能用来放置一张[[法术]]支援卡。
real_text: You have 1 additional arcane slot, which can only be used to hold a [[Spell]] asset.
traits: 盟友. 生物. 召唤
flavor: "汝全然不配。但从现在开始，吾将侍奉汝。"

name: 永夜长袍
text: [reaction]在你打出一张[[法术]]卡牌时，消耗永夜长袍：该卡牌的费用减1。
real_text: [reaction] When you play a [[Spell]] card, exhaust Robes of Endless Night: Reduce the cost of that card by 1.
flavor: 黑暗是意外的深渊。光明是内心的深渊。

name: 平行命运
text: 查看遭遇牌堆顶部的4张卡牌。从混乱袋随机抽出1个标记。如果抽出[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]、[elder_thing]或[auto_fail]符号，将这些卡牌混洗入遭遇牌堆。否则，将它们以任意顺序放回遭遇牌堆顶部。
real_text: Look at the top 4 cards of the encounter deck. Reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If it has a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, shuffle those cards into the encounter deck. Otherwise, return them to the top of the encounter deck in any order.
flavor: "如果我说，在你濒死之际我才会把你的命运告诉你，你还想知道吗？"

name: 太阳神之音
text: 获得1个资源。从混乱袋随机抽出3个标记。每抽出1个[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]、[elder_thing]或[auto_fail]符号，额外获得2个资源。
real_text: Gain 1 resource. Reveal 3 random tokens from the chaos bag. For each [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol revealed, gain an additional 2 resources.

name: 恐怖灵感
text:
快速。在你将要结算一张[mystic]卡牌的效果，且该效果在混乱标记抽出时或抽出后触发时打出。
取消该效果或额外结算一次该效果。
real_text:
Fast. Play when you would resolve an effect on a [mystic] card that triggers "when," "if," or "after" a chaos token is revealed.
Either cancel that effect, or resolve it an additional time.

name: 诡秘石像
text:
使用(3充能)。如果诡秘石像没有充能，则将其丢弃。
[reaction]在你将要抽出1个混乱标记时，花费1充能：改为抽出2个混乱标记而不是1个。选择其中1个标记结算，并忽略其余标记。
real_text:
Uses (3 charges). If Grotesque Statue has no charges, discard it.
[reaction] When you would reveal a chaos token, spend 1 charge: Reveal 2 chaos tokens instead of 1. Choose one of those tokens to resolve, and ignore the other.

name: 催眠术
text:
快速。在一名敌人攻击你所在地点的调查员时打出。
取消该次攻击。然后，从混乱袋随机抽出1个标记。如果抽出[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]、[elder_thing]或[auto_fail]符号，对进行攻击的敌人造成伤害，伤害点数等于其伤害值或恐惧值。
real_text:
Fast. Play when an enemy attacks an investigator at your location.
Cancel that attack. Then, reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If it has a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, deal damage to the attacking enemy equal to its damage or horror.

name: 胆识
text:
每次技能检定最多投入1张。
如果这次检定成功，抽取1张卡牌(如果超过难度至少2点，改为抽取2张卡牌)。
real_text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test is successful, draw 1 card (2 cards instead if it succeeds by 2 or more).
flavor: 退后！我会搞定的。

name: 蓝焰术
text: 使用(4充能)。 [action]花费1充能：攻击。这次攻击不使用[combat]，改为使用[willpower]。这次攻击你+2[willpower]并造成+1伤害。如果这次攻击期间抽出了[elder_sign]、"+1"或"0"标记，受到1点伤害。
real_text: Uses (4 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. You get +2 [willpower] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this attack, take 1 damage.

name: 预知术
text: 使用(3充能)。 [action]花费1充能：调查。这次调查不使用[intellect]，改为使用[willpower]。这次调查你+2[willpower]。如果你成功，额外发现此地点的1个线索。如果这次调查期间抽出了[elder_sign]、"+1"或"0"标记，受到1点恐惧。
real_text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect]. You get +2 [willpower] for this investigation. If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue at this location. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this investigation, take 1 horror.

name: 蓝焰术
text: 使用(4充能)。 [action]花费1充能：攻击。这次攻击不使用[combat]，改为使用[willpower]。这次攻击你+3[willpower]并造成+2伤害。如果这次攻击期间抽出[elder_sign]、"+1"或"0"标记，受到2点伤害。
real_text: Uses (4 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. You get +3 [willpower] and deal +2 damage for this attack. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this attack, take 2 damage.

name: 预知术
text: 使用(3充能)。 [action]花费1充能：调查。这次调查不使用[intellect]，改为使用[willpower]。这次调查你+3[willpower]。如果你成功，额外发现此地点的2个线索。如果这次调查期间抽出[elder_sign]、"+1"或"0"标记，受到2点恐惧。
real_text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect]. You get +3 [willpower] for this investigation. If you succeed, discover 2 additional clues at this location. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this investigation, take 2 horror.

name: 难述真相
text: 使用(3充能)。 [action]花费1充能：躲避。这次躲避尝试不使用[agility]，改为使用[willpower]。这次躲避尝试你+3[willpower]。如果你成功，对你躲避的敌人造成2点伤害。如果这次躲避尝试期间抽出[elder_sign]、"+1"或"0"标记，失去2资源。
real_text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Evade. This evasion attempt uses [willpower] instead of [agility]. You get +3 [willpower] for this evasion attempt. If you succeed, deal 2 damage to the evaded enemy. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this evasion attempt, lose 2 resources.

name: 自我毁灭
text: 显现 - 将自我毁灭放置入你的威胁区域。 强制 - 在你将要对一名敌人造成至少1点伤害时：受到1点伤害。 [action][action]：丢弃自我毁灭。
real_text: Revelation - Put Self-Destructive into play in your threat area. Forced - When you deal 1 or more damage to an enemy: Take 1 damage. [action] [action]: Discard Self-Destructive.

name: 血肉结界
text:
使用(4充能)。
[reaction]在你受到敌人攻击造成的伤害和/或恐惧时，消耗血肉结界并花费1充能：取消该次攻击造成的1点伤害或1点恐惧。
real_text:
Uses (4 charges).
[reaction] When you are dealt damage and/or horror from an enemy attack, exhaust Flesh Ward and spend 1 charge: Cancel 1 damage or horror just dealt from that attack.

name: 格蕾特·瓦格纳
text:
你获得+1[combat]。
[reaction]在你击败一名敌人后，消耗格蕾特·瓦格纳并对她造成1点伤害：发现你所在地点的1个线索。
real_text:
You get +1 [combat].
[reaction] After you defeat an enemy, exhaust Grete Wagner and deal 1 damage to her: Discover 1 clue at your location.
flavor: "生命之所需：水火铁盐麵，蜜奶酒衣油。而我只需前四件。"

name: 无情
text:
[reaction]在你对一名敌人造成过量伤害时，消耗无情：将过量伤害放在无情上。
[fast]丢弃无情：获得资源，数量等于其上方的伤害点数。
real_text:
[reaction] When you deal excess damage to an enemy, exhaust Relentless: Place that excess damage on Relentless.
[fast] Discard Relentless: Gain resources equal to the amount of damage on it.

name: 安全护卫
text: [reaction]在另一位调查员从你所在地点移动到一个连接地点后，消耗安全护卫：移动到该地点。
real_text: [reaction] After another investigator moves from your location to a connecting location, exhaust Safeguard: Move to that location.
flavor: 她告诉我，当心别碰上麻烦。我翻了个白眼。麻烦事可从没消停过。

name: "到这儿来！"
text: 交战。攻击。选择你所在地点或一个连接地点的一名非[[精英]]敌人。将该敌人移动到你所在地点，与其交战，并攻击该敌人。
real_text: Engage. Fight. Choose a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location or a connecting location. Move that enemy to your location, engage it, and attack it.

name: 荣誉
text:
快速。在你击败一名敌人后打出。
抽取2张卡牌。
real_text:
Fast. Play after you defeat an enemy.
Draw 2 cards.
flavor: 叮，叮，叮！

name: 屠怪勇士
text: 攻击。这次攻击造成+1伤害。
real_text: Fight. This attack deals +1 damage.

name: 团结一致
text: 选择你所在地点的另一位调查员。你和该调查员都获得2资源。
real_text: Choose another investigator at your location. Both you and that investigator gain 2 resources.
flavor: 我们绝不倒下！

name: 证据！
text:
快速。在你击败一名敌人后打出。
发现你所在地点的1个线索(如果你本回合击败的敌人们总计有至少4点打印的生命值，改为发现2个线索)。
real_text:
Fast. Play after you defeat an enemy.
Discover 1 clue at your location (2 clues instead if you defeated enemies with a combined total of at least 4 printed health this turn).
flavor: 跟我想的一样！

name: 刺激
text:
快速。只能在你回合中打出。
准备你控制的1张[guardian]支援卡。在你回合中，你可以进行额外一个行动，该行动只能用于攻击。
real_text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Ready a [guardian] asset you control. You may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to fight.

name: 还击
text: 快速。在一名敌人攻击你时(在该次攻击结算之前)打出。 攻击。这次攻击将刚刚发动攻击的敌人作为目标。这次攻击中你+2[combat]并造成+1伤害。
real_text: Fast. Play when an enemy attacks you (before resolving that attack). Fight. This attack targets the attacking enemy. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack.

name: 单打独斗
text:
只可作为你的第一个行动打出。
对与你交战的一个敌人造成2点伤害。此行动不会引起趁乱攻击。
real_text:
Play only as your first action.
Deal 2 damage to an enemy engaged with you. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: 压制
text:
每次技能检定最多投入1张。
如果这次检定成功，抽取1张卡牌(如果超过难度至少2点，改为抽取2张卡牌)。
real_text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test is successful, draw 1 card (2 cards instead if it succeeds by 2 or more).
flavor: 去死吧，你这个怪物！

name: 拳击手套
text:
你攻击时+2[combat]。
[reaction]在你击败一名敌人后，消耗拳击手套：在你牌堆顶部9张卡牌中查找1张[[勇气]]事件卡，将其加入你的手牌。混洗你的牌堆。
real_text:
You get +2 [combat] while fighting.
[reaction] After you defeat an enemy, exhaust Boxing Gloves: Search the top 9 cards of your deck for a [[Spirit]] event and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: 格蕾特·瓦格纳
text:
你获得+1[combat]和+1[intellect]。
[reaction]在你击败一名敌人后，消耗格蕾特·瓦格纳并对她造成1点伤害：发现你所在地点或一个连接地点的1个线索。
real_text:
You get +1 [combat] and +1 [intellect].
[reaction] After you defeat an enemy, exhaust Grete Wagner and deal 1 damage to her: Discover 1 clue at your location or a connecting location.
flavor: "生命之所需：水火铁盐麵，蜜奶酒衣油。而我只需前四件。"

name: 炸药爆破
text:
快速。在任何[free]时间段中打出。
选择你所在地点或一个连接地点。对所选地点的每名敌人和调查员各造成3点伤害。
real_text:
Fast. Play during any [fast] window.
Choose either your location or a connecting location. Deal 3 damage to each enemy and investigator at the chosen location.

name: 嘲讽
text:
快速。在任何[free]时间段中打出。
与你所在地点的任意数量敌人交战。对于以此方式与你交战的每名敌人，对其造成1点伤害并抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
Fast. Play during any [fast] window.
Engage any number of enemies at your location. For each enemy engaged this way, deal it 1 damage and draw 1 card.
flavor: 你鼓起勇气，朝黑暗中大喊道："快来抓我！"

name: 体能训练
text:
使用(2资源)。当每轮开始时重新补满资源。
[free]花费你资源池或体能训练的1资源：这次技能检定中你+1[willpower]或+1[combat]。
real_text:
Uses (2 resources). Replenish these resources at the start of each round.
[free] Spend 1 resource from your resource pool or from Physical Training: You get +1 [willpower] or +1 [combat] for this skill test.

name: 失败恐惧症
text: 显现 - 将失败恐惧症放置入你的威胁区域。 强制 - 在你技能检定失败后：受到1点恐惧。 [action][action]：丢弃失败恐惧症。
real_text: Revelation - Put Atychiphobia into play in your threat area. Forced - After you fail a skill test: Take 1 horror. [action] [action]: Discard Atychiphobia.

name: 奥恩奶奶
text:
你获得+1[willpower]。
[reaction]在你所在地点的调查员的技能检定将要失败时，消耗奥恩奶奶：该调查员检定失败，且失败结果高1点或低1点。
real_text:
You get +1 [willpower].
[reaction] When an investigator at your location would fail a skill test, exhaust Granny Orne: That investigator fails by either 1 less or 1 more.

name: 神秘乌鸦
text: [fast]丢弃神秘乌鸦并受到1点恐惧：发现你所在地点的1个线索。
real_text: [fast] Discard Mysterious Raven and take 1 horror: Discover 1 clue at your location.
flavor:
"牠的双眸与睡梦中的魔鬼一模一样……"
<cite>埃德加·爱伦·坡，《乌鸦》</cite>

name: 拳击家
text:
[free]花费1资源：这次技能检定中你+1[combat]。
[free]花费1资源：这次技能检定中你+1[agility]。
real_text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [combat] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.

name: 生存意志
text:
快速。只能在你回合期间打出。
你这回合执行的下一次技能检定不用抽取混乱标记。
real_text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Do not reveal chaos tokens for the next skill test you perform this turn.

name: 意志考验
text:
快速。在你所在地点的一位调查员抽取出一张非弱点诡计卡时打出。
检定[willpower](3)。如果你成功，取消该卡牌的显现效果。
real_text:
Fast. Play when an investigator at your location draws a non-weakness treachery card.
Test [willpower] (3). If you succeed, cancel that card's revelation effect.
flavor: 无论是否看得到希望，你所能做的只有抵抗。

name: 珍爱纪念
text: 强制 - 在珍爱纪念由于恐惧而被击败时：将其放逐。
real_text: Forced - When Cherished Keepsake is defeated by horror: Exile it.
flavor: 帕特森先生一直告诉温蒂一切都会好起来的。但帕特森先生终究只是一隻泰迪熊，它什么都不懂。

name: 皮大衣
text: 强制 - 在皮大衣由于伤害而被击败时：将其放逐。
real_text: Forced - When Leather Coat is defeated by damage: Exile it.
flavor: 皮大衣可能并不是很时尚，但是温暖又抗寒，而且很可靠。

name: 意志考验
text:
快速。在你所在地点的一位调查员抽取出一张非弱点诡计卡时打出。
取消该卡牌的显现效果。然后，检定[willpower](3)。如果你失败，放逐意志考验。
real_text:
Fast. Play when an investigator at your location draws a non-weakness treachery card.
Cancel that card's revelation effect. Then, test [willpower] (3). If you fail, exile A Test of Will.
flavor: 无论是否看得到希望，你所能做的只有抵抗。

name: "看看我发现了什么！"
text:
快速。在你调查失败，并且低于难度3点及以内后打出。
发现你所在地点和连接地点的总计2个线索。
real_text:
Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 3 or less while investigating.
Discover 2 total clues from among your location and connecting locations.

name: 狗屎运
text:
快速。在你尝试躲避一个非[[精英]]敌人失败，并且低于难度3点及以内后打出。
将该敌人放到遭遇牌堆底部。
real_text:
Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 3 or less during an evasion attempt against a non-[[Elite]] enemy.
Place that enemy on the bottom of the encounter deck.
flavor: 傻人有傻福。

name: 绝处逢生
text:
每次技能检定最多投入1张。
如果这次检定失败，将绝处逢生返回你的手牌。
real_text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test fails, return Unexpected Courage to your hand.

name: 运气好！
text:
快速。在你所在地点的调查员的技能检定将要失败时打出。
该调查员该次检定的技能值+3。该调查员抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
Fast. Play when an investigator at your location would fail a skill test.
They get +3 to their skill value for that test. That investigator draws 1 card.

name: 电锯
text: 使用(3补给)。 [action]花费1补给：攻击。这次攻击中你+2[combat]并造成+2伤害。如果这次攻击失败，在电锯上放置1补给，或者对受到攻击的敌人造成1点伤害。
real_text: Uses (3 supplies). [action] Spend 1 supply: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +2 damage for this attack. If this attack fails, either place 1 supply on Chainsaw or deal 1 damage to the attacked enemy.
traits: 道具. 工具. 武器. 近战

name: 不顾后果
text: 只能在你执行的未投入其它卡牌的(任意类型的)技能检定中投入。该次技能检定不能投入其它卡牌。 如果这次检定失败，将本技能卡返回手牌。 强制 - 如果你回合结束时不顾后果在你手牌中：将其揭示并失去2资源。
real_text: Commit only to a skill test you are performing (of any type) that has no other cards committed to it. Other cards cannot be committed to this skill test. If this test fails, return this skill to your hand. Forced - If Reckless is in your hand at the end of your turn: Reveal it and lose 2 resources.

name: 撬锁工具
text: [action]消耗撬锁工具：调查。这次调查中将你的[agility]数值加入你的技能值。如果你没有成功并超过难度至少2点，丢弃撬锁工具。
real_text: [action] Exhaust Lockpicks: Investigate. Add your [agility] value to your skill value for this investigation. If you do not succeed by at least 2, discard Lockpicks.
traits: 道具. 工具. 违法

name: 朗尼·里特纳
text:
你获得+1[combat]。
[fast]消耗朗尼·里特纳并花费1资源：选择你所在地点的调查员控制的一张[[道具]]支援卡。治癒该支援卡的1点伤害和朗尼·里特纳的1点恐惧。
real_text:
You get +1 [combat].
[fast] Exhaust Lonnie Ritter and spend 1 resource: Choose an [[Item]] asset controlled by an investigator at your location. Heal 1 damage from that asset and 1 horror from Lonnie Ritter.

name: 皮夹克
text: 快速。
real_text: Fast.
flavor:
"你是不是觉得自己穿上这衣服看起来酷毙了？"
"不呀。我一直觉得自己酷毙了。这身衣服只是让别人也知道了这一点。"

name: 街头浪子
text:
[free]花费2资源：这次技能检定中你+2[intellect]。
[free]花费2资源：这次技能检定中你+2[agility]。
real_text:
[free] Spend 2 resources: You get +2 [intellect] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 2 resources: You get +2 [agility] for this skill test.

name: 小偷小摸
text: 调查。这次调查不使用[intellect]，改为使用[agility]。如果你成功，额外发现你所在地点2个线索。
real_text: Investigate. This investigation uses [agility] instead of [intellect]. If you succeed, discover 2 additional clues at your location.

name: 悄然溜过
text: 躲避。在这次行动开始时，获得2资源。
real_text: Evade. When this action begins, gain 2 resources.
flavor: 别人都劝你别做的事情，温妮弗雷德会示意你按计画执行。

name: 酒胆
text:
使用(4补给)。
[action]花费1补给：选择你所在地点的一位调查员，治癒1点恐惧。然后，该调查员检定[willpower](2)。如果检定成功，该调查员抽取1张卡牌。如果检定失败，该调查员治癒额外1点恐惧，随机丢弃其1张手牌。
real_text:
Uses (4 supplies).
[action] Spend 1 supply: Choose an investigator at your location to heal 1 horror. Then, that investigator tests [willpower] (2). If the test succeeds, they draw 1 card. If the test fails, they heal 1 additional horror and discard 1 card at random from their hand.

name: 毛瑟C96手枪
text: 使用(5子弹)。 [action]消耗毛瑟C96手枪并花费1子弹：攻击。这次攻击中你+2[combat]并造成+1伤害。如果你成功且超过难度至少2点，执行以下一项：准备毛瑟C96手枪或者获得1资源(如果你成功且超过难度至少4点，则改为执行两项)。
real_text: Uses (5 ammo). [action] Exhaust Mauser C96 and spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If you succeed by 2 or more, either ready Mauser C96 or gain 1 resource (if you succeed by 4 or more, do both).
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械. 违法

name: 艺高胆大
text:
快速。在你的技能检定将要成功时打出。
这次技能检定你的技能值+3。抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
Fast. Play when you would succeed at a skill test.
You get +3 skill value for this test. Draw 1 card.
flavor:
"麦克格伦，你想让我们两个都送命吗？"
"这次不会了，伙计。这次不会了。"

name: 暗中偷袭
text: 攻击。这次攻击中将你的[agility]加入你的技能值。如果你成功且超过难度至少1点，自动躲避受到本次攻击的敌人。如果你成功且超过难度至少3点，当你回合结束时将暗中偷袭返回你的手牌。
real_text: Fight. Add your [agility] value to your skill value for this attack. If you succeed by 1 or more, automatically evade the attacked enemy. If you succeed by 3 or more, return Cheap Shot to your hand at the end of your turn.
flavor: "瞄准眼睛。"他们这么告诉我的。

name: 悄然遁去
text: 躲避。这次躲避尝试将你的[intellect]加入你的技能值。如果你成功且超过难度至少1点，且被躲避的敌人非[[精英]]，该敌人在下一个补给阶段不进入准备状态。如果你成功且超过难度至少3点，当你回合结束时将悄然遁去返回你的手牌。
real_text: Evade. Add your [intellect] to your skill value for this evasion attempt. If you succeed by 1 or more and the evaded enemy is non-[[Elite]], it does not ready during the next upkeep phase. If you succeed by 3 or more, return Slip Away to your hand at the end of your turn.

name: 幸运烟盒
text: [reaction]在你技能检定成功且超过难度至少1点后，消耗幸运烟盒：在你牌堆顶部X张卡牌中查找并抽取1张卡牌，并将其余卡牌混洗入你的牌堆。其中X为你超过的点数。
real_text: [reaction] After you succeed at a skill test by 1 or more, exhaust Lucky Cigarette Case: Search the top X cards of your deck for a card, draw it, and shuffle the remaining cards into your deck. X is the amount you succeeded by.

name: 小偷小摸
text: 调查。这次调查不使用[intellect]，改为使用[agility]。如果你成功，额外发现你所在地点的2个线索。如果你成功且超过难度至少2点，当你回合结束时将小偷小摸返回你的手牌。
real_text: Investigate. This investigation uses [agility] instead of [intellect]. If you succeed, discover 2 additional clues at your location. If you succeed by 2 or more, return Pilfer to your hand at the end of your turn.

name: 背刺
text: 攻击。这次攻击不使用[combat]，改为使用[agility]。这次攻击造成+2伤害。如果你成功且超过难度至少2点，当你回合结束时将背刺返回你的手牌。
real_text: Fight. This attack uses [agility] instead of [combat]. This attack deals +2 damage. If you succeed by 2 or more, return Backstab to your hand at the end of your turn.

name: 查克·费格斯
text:
[reaction]在你打出一张[[策略]]或[[技巧]]事件卡时，消耗查克·费格斯：选择以下两项：
- 该卡牌获得快速。
- 该事件的打出费用减少2资源。
- 你在该事件结算期间执行检定时技能值+2。
real_text:
[reaction] When you play a [[Tactic]] or [[Trick]] event, exhaust Chuck Fergus: Choose two -
- That event gains fast.
- That event costs 2 fewer resources to play.
- You get +2 skill value while performing a skill test during the resolution of that event.

name: 惊悚贤人
text:
使用(3秘密)。
[fast]：消耗惊悚贤人：将你控制的支援卡上的1个秘密或充能移动到你所在地点调查员控制的另一张支援卡上。
real_text:
Uses (3 secrets).
[fast]: Exhaust Eldritch Sophist: Move 1 secret or charge from an asset you control to another asset controlled by an investigator at your location.
traits: 盟友. 米斯卡塔尼克
flavor: 一旦你放非自己的假想，一切皆有可能。

name: 亵渎圣约
text:
永久。每副牌组限制1张[[圣约]]。
[reaction]你所在地点的调查员在技能检定中抽出一个[curse]标记时，消耗亵渎圣约：将将该标记的修正值改为视为+1。在这次检定结束后，将该标记返回混乱袋。
real_text:
Permanent. Limit 1 [[Covenant]] per deck.
[reaction] When an investigator at your location reveals a [curse] token during a skill test, exhaust Blasphemous Covenant: Treat that token's modifier as +1 instead of its normal modifier. After this test ends, return that token to the chaos bag.

name: 无神论者
text: 这次技能检定中，将每个[bless]和[curse]标记的修正值改为视为+1。
real_text: During this skill test, treat the modifier of each [bless] and each [curse] token as +1 instead of its normal modifier.
flavor: "哦，别这样。最坏还能发生什么事呢？"

name: 混乱之眼
text: 使用(3充能)。 [action] 花费1充能：调查。不使用[intellect]，改为使用[willpower]调查。如果你成功，发现此地点的额外1个线索。如果这次调查中抽出[curse]标记，你可以发现连接地点的1个线索，或在混乱之眼上放置1充能。
real_text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect]. If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue at this location. If a [curse] token is revealed during this investigation, you may discover 1 clue at a connecting location or place 1 charge on Eye of Chaos.

name: 古代圣约
text:
永久。每副牌组限制1张[[圣约]]。
[reaction]在你所在地点的调查员的技能检定期间结算一个[bless]标记时，消耗古代圣约：不要为此[bless]标记的效果抽出另一个标记。
real_text:
Permanent. Limit 1 [[Covenant]] per deck.
[reaction] When an investigator at your location resolves a [bless] token during a skill test, exhaust Ancient Covenant: Do not reveal another token as part of this [bless] token's effect.

name: 宗教信物
text: [reaction]在抽出了至少1个[curse]或[auto_fail]标记的技能检定结束后，消耗宗教信物：加入同等数量的[bless]标记到混乱袋。
real_text: [reaction] After a skill test ends in which 1 or more [curse] or [auto_fail] tokens were revealed, exhaust Token of Faith: Add that many [bless] tokens to the chaos bag.

name: 惊骇诅咒
text: 显现 - 加入5个[curse]标记到混乱袋。
real_text: Revelation - Add 5 [curse] tokens to the chaos bag.
flavor:
我们都有翅膀，但却毫无用处。要是能私下翅膀，我们就会这么干。
──弗朗茨‧卡夫卡《蓝色八开笔记本》

name: 蒙福之刃
text: [action]如果蒙福之刃已准备：攻击。这次攻击你+1[combat]。如果这次攻击中抽出[bless]或[elder_sign]标记，这次攻击造成+1伤害。这次攻击在抽出混乱标记前，你可以消耗蒙福之刃，来加入1个[bless]标记到混乱袋。
real_text: [action] If Blessed Blade is ready: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. If a [bless] or [elder_sign] token is revealed during this attack, this attack deals +1 damage. Before revealing chaos token(s) for this attack, you may exhaust Blessed Blade to add 1 [bless] token to the chaos bag.
traits: 道具. 武器. 近战. 祝福

name: 眼花撩乱
text:
快速。使用(3充能)。
[reaction]在一名敌人对你进行趁乱攻击时，花费1充能：取消该次攻击。
real_text:
Fast. Uses (3 charges).
[reaction] When an enemy makes an attack of opportunity against you, spend 1 charge: Cancel that attack.

name: 允诺力量
text: 在你投入允诺力量到技能检定后，加入1个[curse]标记到混乱袋。如果你不能，改为受到2点恐惧。
real_text: After you commit Promise of Power to a skill test, add 1 [curse] token to the chaos bag. If you cannot, take 2 horror instead.

name: 索菲
text: 索菲不能离场。 你每项技能-1。 强制 - 如果马克·哈里根身上有4点或更少伤害：将索菲翻面。
real_text: Sophie cannot leave play. You get -1 to each of your skills. Forced - If Mark Harrigan has 4 or less damage on him: Flip Sophie.

name: 命运之手
text:
快速。在一名敌人攻击你所在地点一位调查员时打出。
取消该次攻击。然后，加入数量等同于该攻击敌人的伤害值和恐惧值总和的[bless]标记到混乱袋。
real_text:
Fast. Play when an enemy attacks an investigator at your location.
Cancel that attack. Then, add [bless] tokens to the chaos bag equal to the attacking enemy's total combined damage and horror values.

name: 行动计划
text:
如果这次技能检定在本回合的第一个行动中或之前，行动计划获得[willpower][agility]。
如果这次技能检定在本回合的第一个和第三个行动之间且成功，抽取1张卡牌。
如果这次技能检定在本回合的第三个行动中或之后，行动计划获得[combat][intellect]。
real_text:
If this skill test is during or before the first action of this turn, Plan of Action gains [willpower] [agility].
If this skill test is between the first and third actions of this turn, draw 1 card if it succeeds.
If this skill test is during or after the third action of this turn, Plan of Action gains [combat] [intellect].

name: 耀灿一击
text: 攻击。这次攻击你可以不使用[combat]，改为使用[willpower]。在你发动这次攻击时，在混乱袋中查找最多3个[bless]标记，并将其封印在此。耀灿一击上每有一个封印的[bless]标记，这次攻击你+1技能值并造成+1伤害。如果这次攻击击败被攻击的敌人，将封印的标记返回供应堆。否则，将其释放。
real_text: Fight. You may use [willpower] instead of [combat] for this attack. When you initiate this attack, search the chaos bag for up to 3 [bless] tokens, and seal them here. For each [bless] token sealed on Radiant Smite, you get +1 skill value and deal +1 damage for this attack. If this attack defeats the attacked enemy, return the sealed tokens to the token pool. Otherwise, release them.
traits: 法术. 勇气. 祝福

name: 真相的呼唤
text: 只能在你未与敌人交战时打出。 移动。选择一个未揭示地点。朝向该地点最短的路径移动(一次一个地点)，直到你进入该地点。如果你翻开了地点，或与敌人交战，或你的移动被阻挡，结束此效果。
real_text: Play only if you are not engaged with an enemy. Move. Choose an unrevealed location. Move (one location at a time) along the shortest path toward that location, until you enter that location. End this effect if you reveal a location, if an enemy engages you, or if your movement is blocked.

name: 沃科施的凝视
text: 从混乱袋随机抽出7个。对你所在地点的敌人造成总计为1+抽出的[curse]和[auto_fail]标记数量的伤害。这个行动不会引起趁乱攻击。
real_text: Reveal 7 random chaos tokens from the chaos bag. Deal a total of 1 damage plus 1 additional damage for each [curse] or [auto_fail] token revealed, divided as you choose among enemies at your location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: 事不过三
text:
快速。在你所在地点技能检定开始时打出。
这次检定中两次，在调查员抽出混乱标记时，可以将其取消，返回混乱袋，并抽出一个新的混乱标记。
real_text:
Fast. Play when a skill test at your location begins.
Twice during this test, when an investigator reveals a chaos token, they may cancel it, return it to the chaos bag, and reveal a new chaos token.

name: 操纵命运
text:
从混乱袋抽出标记，直到你抽出一个[curse]、[auto_fail]、[bless]或[elder_sign]标记。如果你抽出……
- ……[curse]或[auto_fail]标记，对你所在地点一名敌人造成2点伤害。
- ……[bless]或[elder_sign]标记，治癒你所在地点一位调查员或[[盟友]]支援卡2点伤害。
这个行动不会引起趁乱攻击。
real_text:
Reveal tokens from the chaos bag until you reveal a [curse], [auto_fail], [bless], or [elder_sign] token. If you revealed...
- ...a [curse] or [auto_fail] token, deal 2 damage to an enemy at your location.
- ...a [bless] or [elder_sign] token, heal 2 damage from an investigator or [[Ally]] asset at your location.
This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: 特里希‧斯卡波罗
text:
[reaction]你在有敌人的地点发现线索后：发现该地点的额外1个线索，或自动躲避该敌人(每轮限制一次)。
[elder_sign]效果：+2。如果是调查检定，你可以选择任一已揭示地点；改为如同你正在该地点调查。
real_text:
[reaction] After you discover 1 or more clues at a location with an enemy: Either discover 1 additional clue at that location, or automatically evade that enemy. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +2. If this is an investigation, you may choose any revealed location; you are now investigating as if you were at that location instead.
back_text: 牌组卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：流浪者卡牌([rogue])等级0-5，中立卡牌等级0-5，探求者卡牌([seeker])等级0-2。 牌组构建需求(不计入牌组卡牌张数)：潜于阴影、影子特工、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 特里希向来文武双全，她坚定不移，追求卓越，无所畏惧，敢打敢拚，让她屡屡马到成功。鉴于她智体皆优的毕业纪录，人人都指望她再干一番大事业。但特里希却去了一家商业密码公司。她的工作实在平平，旁人最初的惊讶也都消磨，一度被寄予重塑的特里希‧斯卡波罗已经泯然众人。但这却很适合特里希，也让旁人更难发现真相：她日常的工作不过是一种伪装，真实身分却是黑室这一官方解码特工组织的间谍。

name: 戴克斯特‧德雷克
text:
[free]在你的回合中，丢弃一张你控制的支援卡：从你手牌打出一张不同名称的支援卡，其费用减1(每轮限制一次)。
[elder_sign]效果：+2。你可以将你游戏区域的一张支援卡返回你的手牌。然后，抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
[free] During your turn, discard an asset you control: Play an asset with a different title from your hand, reducing its cost by 1. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +2. You may return an asset from your play area to your hand. Then, draw 1 card.
flavor: "想看看真正的魔法吗？"
back_text: 牌组卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：潜修者卡牌([mystic])等级0-5，流浪者卡牌([rogue])等级0-2，中立卡牌等级0-5。 牌组构建需求(不计入牌组卡牌张数)：精湛手法、密教残页、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 戴克斯特‧德雷克从大战退役后成了一名优秀的魔术师，总能用精巧的幻象和别出心裁的舞台技巧迷惑观众。儘管他声名鹊起，戴克斯特还是想发现真正的魔法。他为自己在战争中找的的密教文本着了魔，儘管这是一节火烧过的断章，但它也却是臭名招着的《死灵之书》中的一节。戴克斯特用自己的财富寻找古代典籍之后的真相，但他的发现却叫人毛骨悚然。他知道，除了自己，可能再没人能阻止邪恶吞噬整个世界。

name: 赛拉斯‧马什
text:
[reaction]你在你执行的技能检定中抽出混乱标记后：将你投入到此检定的一张技能卡返回你的手牌(每轮限制一次)。
[elder_sign]效果：+0。你可以将你弃牌堆的一张技能卡投入这次检定。这次检定结束后，不丢弃该技能卡，改为将其返回你的手牌。
real_text:
[reaction] After you reveal a chaos token during a skill test you are performing: Return a skill you committed to this test to your hand. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +0. You may commit a skill from your discard pile to this test. After this test ends, return that skill to your hand instead of discarding it.
flavor: "出海了就别怕，小子。"
back_text: 牌组卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：求生者卡牌([survivor])等级0-5，中立卡牌等级0-5，[[天性]]技能卡等级0-2。 牌组构建需求(不计入牌组卡牌张数)：骇变鱼叉、赛拉斯的渔网、海妖之唤、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 自打在海岸滩涂上蹒跚学步，赛拉斯‧马什就深深爱上了大海。他不假思索就决定要做一名水手。他体格健壮，对天气有着超凡的感知，这让他名声在外，出海的每条船都认得。只有一件事困扰着赛拉斯：他一次次地梦到浪涛之下恼人的城市，还有栖息其中的古怪生物。这些梦境在召幻他，扰动他内心深处的一些东西，那些他以为已经留在家乡印斯茅斯的东西。

name: 潜于阴影
text:
特里希‧斯卡波罗牌组专用。
快速。在你的回合开始后打出。
与每名与你交战的敌人解除交战。直到本轮结束，敌人不能与你交战，且你不能对敌人造成伤害。
real_text:
Trish Scarborough deck only.
Fast. Play after your turn begins.
Disengage from each enemy engaged with you. Until the end of the round, enemies cannot engage you and you cannot deal damage to enemies.

name: 影子特工
text: 猎物 - 仅对特里希‧斯卡波罗。 猎手。 只要影子特工与你交战，你除了调查外不能发现线索。 强制 - 在躲避影子特工后：将其丢弃。
real_text: Prey - Trish Scarborough only. Hunter. While Shadow Agents is engaged with you, you cannot discover clues except by investigating. Forced - After Shadow Agents is evaded: Discard it.

name: 精湛手法
text:
戴克斯特‧德雷克牌组专用。
[reaction]在一张支援卡入场在你控制之下后：直到本轮结束，结算该支援卡上的触发能力时，你每项技能+2。
real_text:
Dexter Drake deck only.
[reaction] After an asset enters play under your control: Until the end of the round, you get +2 to each of your skills while resolving a triggered ability on that asset.

name: 密教残页
text:
不能用打出行动打出密教残页。
只要密教残页在你的手牌，你获得-2[willpower]。
只要密教残页在场，你获得-1[willpower]。
real_text:
Occult Scraps cannot be played using a play action.
While Occult Scraps is in your hand, you get -2 [willpower].
While Occult Scraps is in play, you get -1 [willpower].

name: 骇变鱼叉
text: 赛拉斯‧马什牌组专用。 [action]：攻击。这次攻击你+1[combat]。如果你有投入技能卡到这次技能检定，这次攻击造成+1伤害。在这次技能检定结束时，你可以将骇变鱼叉返回你的手牌，来让所有你投入的技能卡都不丢弃，改为返回你的手牌。
real_text: Silas Marsh deck only. [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. If you committed 1 or more skills to this skill test, this attack deals +1 damage. When this skill test ends, you may return Sea Change Harpoon to your hand to return all of your committed skill cards to your hand instead of discarding them.
traits: 道具. 武器. 近战

name: 赛拉斯的渔网
text: 赛拉斯‧马什牌组专用。 [action]：躲避。这次躲避尝试你+1[agility]。如果你成功且你有投入技能卡到这次技能检定，你可以自动躲避另一名与你交战的敌人。在这次技能检定结束时，你可以将赛拉斯的渔网返回你的手牌，来让所有你投入的技能卡都不丢弃，改为返回你的手牌。
real_text: Silas Marsh deck only. [action]: Evade. You get +1 [agility] for this evasion attempt. If you succeed and you committed 1 or more skills to this skill test, you may automatically evade another enemy engaged with you. When this skill test ends, you may return Silas's Net to your hand to return all of your committed skill cards to your hand instead of discarding them.

name: 海妖之唤
text: 显现 - 将海妖之唤放置入你的威胁区域。 作为投入卡牌到技能检定的额外费用，那些卡牌每有一个匹配的技能图标，你必须支付1资源。 [action][action]：丢弃海妖之唤。
real_text: Revelation - Put Siren Call into play in your threat area. As an additional cost to commmit 1 or more cards to a skill test, you must pay 1 resource for each matching skill icon those cards have. [action] [action]: Discard Siren Call.

name: 《圣经‧诗篇》
text:
使用(4秘密)。
[action]花费1秘密：治癒你所在地点一位调查员1点恐惧。加入2个[bless]标记到混乱袋。
real_text:
Uses (4 secrets).
[action] Spend 1 secret: Heal 1 horror from an investigator at your location. Add 2 [bless] tokens to the chaos bag.
traits: 道具. 书籍. 祝福

name: 加密编码盘
text: 使用(3秘密)。 [fast]消耗加密编码盘并花费1秘密：调查。这次调查你所在地点隐藏值+1。 [action]消耗加密编码盘并花费1秘密：调查。这次调查你所在地点隐藏值-2。
real_text: Uses (3 secrets). [fast] Exhaust Cryptographic Cipher and spend 1 secret: Investigate. Your location gets +1 shroud for this investigation. [action] Exhaust Cryptographic Cipher and spend 1 secret: Investigate. Your location gets -2 shroud for this investigation.

name: 深沉知识
text: 作为打出深沉知识的额外费用，加入2个[curse]标记到混乱袋。 你所在地点的调查员抽取总计3张卡牌(由你决定每位调查员各抽取几张卡牌)。
real_text: As an additional cost to play Deep Knowledge, add 2 [curse] tokens to the chaos bag. Investigators at your location draw a combined total of 3 cards (you decide how many cards each investigator draws).

name: .25自动手枪
text: 快速。使用(4子弹)。 [action]花费1子弹：攻击。如果攻击的敌人已消耗，这次攻击你+2[combat]并造成+1伤害。
real_text: Fast. Uses (4 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. If the attacked enemy is exhausted, you get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack.
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械. 违法

name: 黑暗仪式
text: 封印(最多5[curse])。 强制 - 当神话阶段结束时：你必须花费1资源或丢弃黑暗仪式。
real_text: Seal (up to 5 [curse]). Forced - At the end of the mythos phase: You must either spend 1 resource or discard Dark Ritual.

name: 坚守信念
text:
快速。在任何[fast]玩家时间段中打出。
加入4个[bless]标记到混乱袋。
real_text:
Fast. Play during any [fast] window.
Add 4 [bless] tokens to the chaos bag.

name: 挚爱
text: 如果这次检定中抽出[bless]标记，你可以将挚爱从游戏中移除，来将该标记的效果替换为以下文本："你自动成功。(不要再抽出另一个标记。在这次检定结束后，将该标记返回混乱袋)。"
real_text: If a [bless] token is revealed during this test, you may remove Beloved from the game to replace that token's effects with the following: "You automatically succeed. (Do not reveal another token. Return this token to the chaos bag after this test ends)."
flavor: 爱或许才是最强大的法术。

name: 人定胜天
text:
快速。在任何[fast]玩家时间段中打出。
加入3个[curse]标记到混乱袋。然后，加入3个[bless]标记到混乱袋并抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
Fast. Play during any [fast] window.
Add 3 [curse] tokens to the chaos bag. Then, add 3 [bless] tokens to the chaos bag and draw 1 card.
traits: 幸运. 祝福. 诅咒萦绕

name: 受诅拥趸
text: 生成 -离你最远的地点。 冷漠。 强制 - 当敌人阶段结束时：加入1个[curse]标记到混乱袋。
real_text: Spawn - Location farthest from you. Aloof. Forced - At the end of the enemy phase: Add 1 [curse] token to the chaos bag.
traits: 类人. 异教徒. 诅咒萦绕

name: 清算之日
text: 显现 - 将清算之日迭加到当前密谋。然后，在混乱袋中查找一个[elder_sign]标记，并将其封印在清算之日上。 卡片设计灵感来自于阿卡姆之夜活动2018。
real_text: Revelation - Attach Day of Reckoning to the current agenda. Then, search the chaos bag for an [elder_sign] token and seal it on Day of Reckoning. Card design inspired by the events of Arkham Nights 2018.

name: 虚假圣约
text:
永久。每副牌组限制1张[[圣约]]。
[reaction]你所在地点的调查员在技能检定中抽出一个[curse]标记时，消耗虚假圣约：取消该混乱标记，将其返回供应堆，并抽出另一个标记。
real_text:
Permanent. Limit 1 [[Covenant]] per deck.
[reaction] When an investigator at your location reveals a [curse] token during a skill test, exhaust False Covenant: Cancel that chaos token, return it to the token pool, and reveal another token.

name: 水手的罗盘
text: [action]消耗水手的罗盘：调查。如果你成功且你的资源池里没有资源，发现你所在地点的额外1个线索。 [fast]在使用水手的罗盘调查中，花费1资源：这次技能检定你+1[intellect]。(每次调查限制3次。)
real_text: [action] Exhaust Mariner's Compass: Investigate. If you succeed and have no resources in your resource pool, discover 1 additional clue at your location. [fast] During an investigation using Mariner's Compass, spend 1 resource: You get +1 [intellect] for this skill test. (Limit three times per investigation.)

name: 警哨
text: 在你的回合中你可以进行一次额外的行动，该行动只能用于交战。
real_text: You may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to engage.
flavor: "你要是再吹一下，我就让你把它吃下去。"

name: 正义猎杀
text: 交战。选择一名最多2个连接地点远的敌人。移动(一次一个地点)到该敌人的地点，与其交战，并加入等于该敌人的恐惧值数量的[bless]标记到混乱袋。
real_text: Engage. Choose an enemy up to 2 locations away. Move (one location at a time) to that enemy's location, engage it, and add [bless] tokens to the chaos bag equal to that enemy's horror value.
flavor: 丽塔眼睛瞇起，手上攥紧。牠们逃不掉了。这次一定。不会失手。

name: 庄严圣约
text:
永久。每副牌组限制1张[[圣约]]。
[reaction]在任意地点的调查员执行技能检定的"抽出混乱标记"步骤(步骤3)后，消耗庄严圣约: 将这次检定中抽出的任意数量的[bless]标记返回混乱袋，这次检定忽略其修正值。
real_text:
Permanent. Limit 1 [[Covenant]] per deck.
[reaction] After an investigator at any location performs the "reveal chaos token" step of a skill test, exhaust Sacred Covenant: Return any number of [bless] tokens revealed during this test to the chaos bag, ignoring their modifiers for this test.

name: 掀起麻烦
text:
作为打出掀起麻烦的额外费用，加入数量等于你所在地点隐藏值的[curse]标记到混乱袋。
发现你所在地点的2个线索。
real_text:
As an additional cost to play Stirring Up Trouble, add [curse] tokens to the chaos bag equal to your location's shroud value.
Discover 2 clues at your location.
flavor: 要是你追踪线索，很难说你在另一头究竟会找到什么。

name: 破门而入
text: 调查。将你的[agility]值加入你这次调查的技能值。如果你成功且超过难度至少2点，你可以自动躲避此地点的一名敌人。这个行动不会引起趁乱攻击。
real_text: Investigate. Add your [agility] value to your skill value for this investigation. If you succeed by 2 or more, you may automatically evade an enemy at this location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
flavor: 要是你小心点，这就只是一次"进入"。

name: 哈米吉多顿
text: 使用(3充能)。 [action]花费1充能：攻击。这次攻击不使用[combat]，改为使用[willpower]，并造成+1伤害。如果这次攻击中抽出[curse]标记，你可以对你所在地点的一名敌人造成1点伤害，或在哈米吉多顿上放置1充能。
real_text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat] and deals +1 damage. If a [curse] token is revealed during this attack, you may deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location or place 1 charge on Armageddon.

name: 暗影遁形
text: 使用(3充能)。 [action]花费1充能：躲避。这次躲避不使用[agility]，改为使用[willpower]。如果你成功，且躲避的敌人非[[精英]]，你可以移动该敌人到连接地点。如果这次躲避尝试期间抽出[curse]标记，你可以移动到连接地点，或在暗影遁形上放置1充能。
real_text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Evade. This evasion uses [willpower] instead of [agility]. If you succeed and the evaded enemy is non-[[Elite]], you may move that enemy to a connecting location. If a [curse] token is revealed during this evasion attempt, you may move to a connecting location or place 1 charge on Shroud of Shadows.

name: 矛盾圣约
text: 永久。每副牌组限制1张[[圣约]]。 [reaction]你所在地点的调查员在执行技能检定的"抽出混乱标记"步骤(步骤3)后，如果该检定中同时抽出[bless]标记和[curse]标记，消耗矛盾圣约：这次检定自动成功。(在这次检定结束后，移除所有从混乱袋抽出的[bless]和[curse]标记。)
real_text: Permanent. Limit 1 [[Covenant]] per deck. [reaction] After an investigator at your location performs the "reveal the chaos token" step of a skill test, if both a [bless] token and a [curse] token were revealed during that test, exhaust Paradoxical Covenant: This test automatically succeeds. (Remove each [bless] and [curse] token revealed from the chaos bag after this test ends.)
traits: 圣约. 祝福. 诅咒萦绕

name: Gloria Goldberg
text:
You choose the investigator order during the mythos phase.
[reaction] When you look at 1 or more cards from the encounter deck: Look at 1 additional card and choose 1 non-[[Elite]] card among them. Either discard it, put it on top of the encounter deck, or place it facedown beneath Gloria Goldberg (max 3 cards beneath her).
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Look at the top card of the encounter deck.
real_text:
You choose the investigator order during the mythos phase.
[reaction] When you look at 1 or more cards from the encounter deck: Look at 1 additional card and choose 1 non-[[Elite]] card among them. Either discard it, put it on top of the encounter deck, or place it facedown beneath Gloria Goldberg (max 3 cards beneath her).
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Look at the top card of the encounter deck.
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Secondary Class Choice: At deck creation, choose Guardian ([guardian]), Seeker ([seeker]), or Rogue ([rogue]). Deckbuilding Options: Mystic cards ([mystic]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, up to 10 level 0-1 events and/or skills of your chosen secondary class. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 3 copies of Psychic Sensitivity, 3 copies of Prophecy of the End (shuffled into the encounter deck), 1 random basic weakness.
back_flavor: Nightmares and apocalyptic visions have plagued novelist Gloria Goldberg her entire life. Although she learned to exorcise her terrors onto the page, she has never revealed the inspiration for her weird tales, not even to fellow author Jamie Galbraith. One day, she is struck by a vision of Jamie begging her to help finish what he started. Moments later, she receives word of his sudden death. As Gloria reads Jamie's unfinished book, the story takes hold of her, and the words on the page begin to bleed into reality.

name: Ruth Westmacott
text:
Gloria Goldberg deck only. Replacement.
[reaction] When an investigator fights, attempts to evade, or initiates a skill test on an encounter card, discard an encounter card that shares a [[Trait]] with that encounter card from beneath Gloria Goldberg: Reduce the difficulty of this skill test by 2.
real_text:
Gloria Goldberg deck only. Replacement.
[reaction] When an investigator fights, attempts to evade, or initiates a skill test on an encounter card, discard an encounter card that shares a [[Trait]] with that encounter card from beneath Gloria Goldberg: Reduce the difficulty of this skill test by 2.

name: Liber Omnium Finium
text: Gloria Goldberg deck only. Replacement. Revelation - Draw a random non-weakness encounter card from beneath Gloria Goldberg. That card gains peril, its effects cannot be canceled, and you get -2 to all skills while resolving its effects. If that card is an enemy, it immediately attacks you. If no card is drawn by this effect, shuffle this card back into your deck.
real_text: Gloria Goldberg deck only. Replacement. Revelation - Draw a random non-weakness encounter card from beneath Gloria Goldberg. That card gains peril, its effects cannot be canceled, and you get -2 to all skills while resolving its effects. If that card is an enemy, it immediately attacks you. If no card is drawn by this effect, shuffle this card back into your deck.

name: 深渊典籍
text: [action]消耗深渊典籍：攻击。这次攻击你可以不使用[combat]，改为使用[intellect]或[willpower]。在你发动这次攻击时，你可以在深渊典籍上放置1个毁灭标记(深渊典籍上最多3个)。深渊典籍每有一个毁灭标记，这次攻击你+1技能值并造成+1伤害。
real_text: [action] Exhaust Abyssal Tome: Fight. You may use either [intellect] or [willpower] for this attack, instead of [combat]. When you initiate this attack, you may place 1 doom on Abyssal Tome (to a maximum of 3). You get +1 skill value and deal +1 damage for this attack for each doom on Abyssal Tome.

name: 蝴蝶效应
text: 快速。在你所在地点的技能检定中抽出带有符号的混乱标记时打出(在结算其效果之前)。 你或执行检定的调查员可投入一张卡牌到这次技能检定，或将其投入到这次检定的一张卡牌返回其手牌。
real_text: Fast. Play when a chaos token with a symbol is revealed during a skill test at your location (before resolving its effects). You or the performing investigator may either commit a card to this skill test, or return a card they committed to this test to their hand.
traits: 悖论. 祝福. 诅咒萦绕

name: 双面神父
text: [reaction]在双面神父入场后：加入3个[bless]标记到混乱袋。 强制 - 当结束补给阶段时：你必须加入1个[curse]标记到混乱袋或丢弃双面神父。
real_text: [reaction] After Priest of Two Faiths enters play: Add 3 [bless] tokens to the chaos bag. Forced - At the end of the upkeep phase: You must either add 1 [curse] token to the chaos bag or discard Priest of Two Faiths.
traits: 盟友. 祝福. 诅咒萦绕

name: 密切监视
text: 迭加到你所在地点。每个地点限制1张。 强制 - 在一名非[[精英]]敌人进入迭加地点后，丢弃密切监视：自动躲避该敌人并在迭加地点发现1个线索。该敌人在下一个补给阶段中不准备。
real_text: Attach to your location. Limit 1 per location. Forced - After a non-[[Elite]] enemy enters attached location, discard Under Surveillance: Automatically evade that enemy and discover 1 clue at attached location. That enemy does not ready during the next upkeep phase.

name: 附魔护甲
text: 打出附魔护甲，置于你所在地点任意调查员控制之下。 强制 - 在放置伤害和/或恐惧到附魔护甲上后：附魔护甲检定的所有者检定[willpower](X)，其中X为附魔护甲上的伤害和恐惧的总量。如果检定失败，丢弃附魔护甲并将刚刚放置在其上的伤害和/或恐惧分配到别处。
real_text: Play Enchanted Armor under the control of any investigator at your location. Forced - After damage and/or horror is placed on Enchanted Armor: The owner of Enchanted Armor tests [willpower] (X), where X is the total amount of damage and horror on it. If the test fails, discard Enchanted Armor and assign the damage and/or horror just placed on it elsewhere.

name: 狂怒畸变
text: 攻击。在你发动这次攻击时，加入最多3个[curse]标记到混乱袋。每以此方式加入1个[curse]标记到混乱袋，你这次攻击+1[combat]并造成+1伤害。
real_text: Fight. When you initiate this attack, add up to 3 [curse] tokens to the chaos bag. For each [curse] token added to the chaos bag in this way, you get +1 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack.
traits: 法术. 勇气. 诅咒萦绕

name: 崔斯丹‧波特雷
text:
[reaction]在你的回合开始后：选择两项技能。这些技能你每项得到+1，直到你的下回合开始。
[reaction]在任何抽出总计至少3个[curse]或[bless]标记的技能检定结束后：从你手牌免费打出崔斯丹‧波特雷。
real_text:
[reaction] After your turn begins: Choose two skills. Until the start of your next turn, you get +1 to each of those skills.
[reaction] After any skill test ends in which a total of 3 or more [curse] or [bless] tokens were revealed: Play Tristan Botley from your hand, at no cost.
traits: 盟友. 罪犯. 诅咒萦绕
flavor: "万事不同了，维托。"

name: 十字圣号
text:
只能在你执行的技能检定中投入，且该检定难度必须高于你的基础技能值。
在你投入十字圣到技能检定后，加入X个[bless]标记到混乱袋。X为本检定难度和你的基础技能值之差。
real_text:
Commit only to a skill test you are performing, and only if the difficulty of that test is higher than your base skill value.
After you commit Signum Crucis to a skill test, add X [bless] tokens to the chaos bag. X is the difference between the test's difficulty and your base skill value.

name: 信仰之盾
text:
封印(最多5[bless])。如果信仰之盾上没有封印的标记，将其丢弃。
[reaction]在一名敌人攻击你所在地点的一位调查员时，消耗信仰之盾并释放一个封印在此的混乱标记：取消该次攻击。
real_text:
Seal (up to 5 [bless]). If Shield of Faith has no tokens sealed on it, discard it.
[reaction] When an enemy attacks an investigator at your location, exhaust Shield of Faith and release a chaos token sealed here: Cancel that attack.

name: "幸运"分币
text: 卓越。 强制 - 你在你执行的技能检定中抽出一个[bless]或[curse]标记时：掷一枚硬币。正面的话，将该标记视为[bless]标记。反面的话，将该标记视为[curse]标记。如果你因此效果的结果将[bless]标记视为[curse]标记，抽取1张卡牌。
real_text: Exceptional. Forced - When you reveal a [bless] or [curse] token during a skill test you are performing: Flip a coin. On a heads, treat that token as a [bless] token. On a tails, treat that token as a [curse] token. If you treat a [bless] token as a [curse] token as a result of this effect, draw 1 card.
traits: 道具. 守护. 诅咒萦绕

name: 迪精之眼
text:
卓越。
