[reaction]你在你的回合中发动技能检定时，消耗迪精之眼：将你这次检定的基础技能值设为5。如果这次检定中抽出[bless]标记，准备迪精之眼。如果这次检定中抽出[curse]标记，这回合你可以进行一个额外的行动。
real_text:
Exceptional.
[reaction] When you initiate a skill test during your turn, exhaust Eye of the Djinn: Set your base skill value to 5 for this test. If a [bless] token is revealed during this test, ready Eye of the Djinn. If a [curse] token is revealed during this test, you may take an additional action this turn.
traits: 道具. 遗物. 祝福. 诅咒萦绕

name: 暗影遁形
text: 使用(3充能)。 [action]花费1充能：躲避。这次躲避不使用[agility]，改为使用[willpower]。这次检定你+2[willpower]。如果你成功且被躲避敌人非[[精英]]，你可以将该敌人移动到连接地点。这次躲避尝试期间每抽出一个[curse]标记，你可以移动到一个连接地点，或在暗影遁形上放置1充能。
real_text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Evade. This evasion uses [willpower] instead of [agility]. You get +2 [willpower] for this test. If you succeed and the evaded enemy is non-[[Elite]], you may move that enemy to a connecting location. For each [curse] token revealed during this evasion attempt, you may move to a connecting location or place 1 charge on Shroud of Shadows.

name: 锐利目光
text:
[free]花费2资源：你获得+1[intellect]直到本阶段结束。
[free]花费2资源：你获得+1[combat]直到本阶段结束。
real_text:
[free] Spend 2 resources: You get +1 [intellect] until the end of the phase.
[free] Spend 2 resources: You get +1 [combat] until the end of the phase.

name: 鲜血盟约
text:
[free]增加1个毁灭标记到鲜血盟约：这次技能检定你+2[willpower]。(每次检定限制一次。)
[free]增加1个毁灭标记到鲜血盟约：这次技能检定你+2[combat]。(每次检定限制一次。)
real_text:
[free] Add 1 doom to Blood Pact: You get +2 [willpower] for this skill test. (Limit once per test.)
[free] Add 1 doom to Blood Pact: You get +2 [combat] for this skill test. (Limit once per test.)

name: 艾格尼丝·贝克
text:
作为打出1张[[法术]]事件卡的额外花费，你可以受到1点伤害。如果你这么做，降低该事件卡的费用2点，并且你可以不将该事件卡丢弃，改为洗回你的牌堆。
[elder_sign]效果：+1。你可以治癒1点伤害。
real_text:
As an additional cost to play a [[Spell]] event, you may take 1 damage. If you do, reduce the cost to play that event by 2, and you may shuffle that event back into your deck instead of discarding it.
[elder_sign] effect: +1. You may heal 1 damage.
flavor:
"我的魔法与生俱来。
流淌在我的血管中。
随着我的心跳搏动。"
back_text: 卡牌张数：25。 牌组构建选项：潜修者([mystic])等级0-5，[[法术]]卡牌等级0-3，[[密教]]卡牌等级0-3，中立卡牌等级0-5。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：希波利尔传家宝、黑暗回忆、1张随机基础弱点。 额外选项：当你升级[[法术]]卡牌时，你可以改为支付较高等级卡牌的全额经验值，并将较低等级卡牌保留在你的牌组中(该卡不计入你的牌组卡牌张数，或你牌组中的同名卡牌数量)。
back_flavor: 艾格尼丝·贝克或许只是个默默无名的侍应，但是在前世，她是一个无比强力的女巫。这一切都要从一把钥匙说起，她在自己的小阁楼里，家传的一个首饰盒中找到了它。当她拿起钥匙，记忆突然如同洪水般涌入，伴随着一个词："希波利尔"。

name: 希波利尔传家宝
text:
艾格尼丝·贝克牌组专用。进阶。
只有玩家卡的效果造成的伤害和/或恐惧才能分配给希波利尔传家宝。
[reaction]在你打出一张[[法术]]卡后：抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
Agnes Baker deck only. Advanced.
Only damage and/or horror from player card effects can be assigned to Heirloom of Hyperborea.
[reaction] After you play a [[Spell]] card: Draw 1 card.

name: 黑暗回忆
text: 进阶。 在当前密谋卡上放置1个毁灭标记。该效果可能导致当前密谋推进。 强制 - 如果你的回合结束时，手牌中有黑暗回忆：展示该牌并受到2点恐惧。
real_text: Advanced. Place 1 doom on the current agenda. This effect may cause the current agenda to advance. Forced - If Dark Memory is in your hand at the end of your turn, reveal it and take 2 horror.

name: 奈芙蒂斯
text:
你获得+1[willpower]。
[reaction]在技能检定中将要从混乱袋移除至少1个[bless]标记时：改为将其封印在奈芙蒂斯上。
[free]消耗奈芙蒂斯：释放封印在她上面的3个[bless]标记，,或将封印在她上面的3个[bless]标记返回供应堆来对你所在地点一名敌人造成2点伤害。
real_text:
You get +1 [willpower].
[reaction] When 1 or more [bless] tokens would be removed from the chaos bag during a skill test: Seal them on Nephthys, instead.
[free] Exhaust Nephthys: Either release 3 [bless] tokens sealed on her, or return 3 [bless] tokens sealed on her to the token pool to deal 2 damage to an enemy at your location.

name: 幽暗之眼
text:
快速。只能在你的回合中打出。
混乱袋内每有一个[curse]标记，打出幽暗之眼的费用减1。
直到本轮结束，你的每项技能+3。
real_text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Reduce the cost to play The Stygian Eye by 1 for each [curse] token in the chaos bag.
Until the end of the round, you get +3 to each of your skills.

name: 超感知
text:
使用(2资源)。当每轮开始时重新补满这些资源。
[free]花费你的资源池或超感知的1资源：这次技能检定你+1[intellect]或+1[agility]。
real_text:
Uses (2 resources). Replenish these resources at the start of each round.
[free] Spend 1 resource from your resource pool or from Hyperawareness: You get +1 [intellect] or +1 [agility] for this skill test.

name: 外神的长笛
text:
卓越。封印(最多X[curse])。
[action]消耗外神的长笛并释放其上封印的1个[curse]标记：选择你所在地点一名非[[精英]]敌人。移动所选敌人到连接地点，或对其地点的任一敌人造成所选敌人伤害值的伤害。这个行动不会引起趁乱攻击。
real_text:
Exceptional. Seal (up to X [curse]).
[action] Exhaust Flute of the Outer Gods and release 1 [curse] token sealed on it: Choose a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location. Either move the chosen enemy to a connecting location, or deal its damage to any enemy at its location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
traits: 道具. 乐器. 遗物. 诅咒萦绕

name: 月之恩惠
text:
快速。封印(最多3[curse])。如果月之恩惠上没有封印标记，将其丢弃。
[reaction]在你将要从混乱袋抽出一个混乱标记时，消耗月之恩惠：改为结算一个封印在此处的标记，如同其刚刚从混乱袋抽出。然后，获得1资源。
real_text:
Fast. Seal (up to 3 [curse]). If there are no tokens sealed on Favor of the Moon, discard it.
[reaction] When you would reveal a chaos token from the chaos bag, exhaust Favor of the Moon: Resolve a token sealed here instead, as if it were just revealed from the chaos bag. Then, gain 1 resource.

name: 伊西斯的祝福
text: [reaction]在你所在地点的单次技能检定中抽出第二个[bless]标记时，消耗伊西斯的祝福：取消该标记，并改为将其视为如同[elder_sign]标记。在这次检定结束后，将这两个标记都放回混乱袋。
real_text: [reaction] When a second [bless] token is revealed during a single skill test at your location, exhaust Blessing of Isis: Cancel that token and treat it as if it were a [elder_sign] token instead. Return both of those tokens to the chaos bag after this test ends.

name: 神秘魔法书
text: 研究。(FAQ, v2.0) [reaction]：你在技能检定中结算至少1个[curse]标记后：在神秘魔法书上放置同等数量的秘密。 [reaction]在你的回合打出一张[[洞察]]事件卡时，花费2秘密：该事件卡获得快速。其费用减1。
real_text:
Researched.
[reaction]: After you resolve 1 or more [curse] tokens during a skill test: Place that many secrets on Cryptic Grimoire.
[reaction] When you play an [[Insight]] event during your turn, spend 2 secrets: That event gains fast. Reduce its cost by 1.
traits: 道具. 书籍. 诅咒萦绕

name: 神秘魔法书
text: 研究。(FAQ, v2.0) [reaction]：你在技能检定中结算至少1个[curse]标记后：在神秘魔法书上放置同等数量的秘密。 [reaction]在你将要抽取遭遇牌堆顶部的卡牌时，花费5秘密：改为从你的牌堆抽取一张卡牌。
real_text:
Researched.
[reaction]: After you resolve 1 or more [curse] tokens during a skill test: Place that many secrets on Cryptic Grimoire.
[reaction] When you would draw the top card of the encounter deck, spend 5 secrets: Draw a card from your deck instead.
traits: 道具. 书籍. 祝福

name: 万古诅咒
text: [reaction]在你所在地点的单次检定检定中抽出第二个[curse]标记时，消耗万古诅咒：取消该标记，并改为将其视为如同[skull]标记。在检定结束后，你可以选择将这两个标记都从混乱袋移除。
real_text: [reaction] When a second [curse] token is revealed during a single skill test at your location, exhaust Curse of Aeons: Cancel that token and treat it as if it were a [skull] token instead. You may choose to remove both of those tokens from the chaos bag after the test ends.

name: 不屈不挠
text:
每次检定最多投入1张。
在你投入不屈不挠到技能检定后，在混乱袋查找最多3个你选择的非[auto_fail]混乱标记，并将其封印在不屈不挠上。如果不屈不挠上封印的3个标记都是"+1"、"0"、[bless]和/或[elder_sign]标记，抽取2张卡牌。在这次检定结束后，释放此处封印的所有标记。
real_text:
Max 1 committed per test.
After you commit Unrelenting to a skill test, search the chaos bag for up to 3 non-[auto_fail] chaos tokens of your choice, and seal them on Unrelenting. If all 3 tokens sealed on Unrelenting are "+1,", "0," [bless], and/or [elder_sign] tokens, draw 2 cards. Release all tokens sealed here after this test ends.

name: 圣玫瑰珠
text:
你获得+1[willpower]。
[reaction]你在诡计卡上的[willpower]检定成功后，消耗圣玫瑰珠：加入2个[bless]标记到混乱袋。
real_text:
You get +1 [willpower].
[reaction] After you succeed at a [willpower] test on a treachery, exhaust Holy Rosary: Add 2 [bless] tokens to the chaos bag.
traits: 道具. 守护. 祝福

name: 鬼灵精怪
text: 如果这次技能检定中抽出[curse]标记，在这次检定结束时，你可以将鬼灵精怪返回你的手牌。
real_text: If a [curse] token is revealed during this skill test, you may return Fey to your hand when this test ends.
flavor:
"谁叫你'大仙'或是'好迫克'的，
你就给他幸运，帮他做工……"
——威廉‧莎士比亚，《仲夏夜之梦》

name: 隐形指引
text: 使用(4秘密)。 [fast]在你所在地点的技能检定中：执行检定的调查员可以在其牌堆顶部3张卡牌中查找一张能投入到这次检定的卡牌。你可以花费1秘密来投入该卡牌。混洗执行检定的调查员的牌堆。(每次检定限制1次。)(FAQ, v1.9)
real_text:
Uses (4 secrets).
[fast] During a skill test at your location: The performing investigator may search the top 3 cards of their deck for a card that can be committed to this test. You may spend 1 secret to commit that card. Shuffle the performing investigator's deck. (Limit once per test.)

name: 哈米吉多顿
text: 使用(3充能)。 [action]花费1充能：攻击。这次攻击不使用[combat]，改为使用[willpower]。这次攻击你+2[willpower]并造成+1伤害。这次攻击中每抽出一个[curse]标记，你可以对你所在地点的一名敌人造成1点伤害，或在哈米吉多顿上放置1充能。
real_text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. You get +2 [willpower] and deal +1 damage for this attack. For each [curse] token revealed during this attack, you may deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location or place 1 charge on Armageddon.

name: 混乱之眼
text: 使用(3充能)。 [action]花费1充能：调查。不使用[intellect]，改为使用[willpower]调查。这次检定你+2[willpower]。如果你成功，在此地点发现1个额外的线索。这次调查中每抽出一个[curse]标记，你可以发现1个在连接地点的线索，或在混乱之眼上放置1充能。
real_text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect]. You get +2 [willpower] for this test. If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue at this location. For each [curse] token revealed during this investigation, you may discover 1 clue at a connecting location or place 1 charge on Eye of Chaos.

name: 人性抉择
text:
[fast]消耗人性抉择并受到1点伤害和1点恐惧：加入2个[bless]标记到混乱袋。
[fast]消耗人性抉择并加入2个[curse]标记到混乱袋：治癒1点伤害和1点恐惧。
real_text:
[fast] Exhaust Spirit of Humanity and take 1 damage and 1 horror: Add 2 [bless] tokens to the chaos bag.
[fast] Exhaust Spirit of Humanity and add 2 [curse] tokens to the chaos bag: Heal 1 damage and 1 horror.
traits: 仪式. 祝福. 诅咒萦绕

name: 恢復和谐
text: 在混乱袋中查找X个[curse]标记，并将其返回供应堆。X为混乱袋内[bless]标记的数量。每以此方式移除一个[curse]标记，获得1资源。
real_text: Search the chaos bag for X [curse] tokens and return them to the token pool. X is the number of [bless] tokens in the chaos bag. Gain 1 resource for each [curse] token removed in this way.
flavor: 纠葛的命运之线亦可解开，即便只是片刻。

name: 幸运兔脚
text: [reaction]在你技能检定失败后，消耗幸运兔脚：抽取1张卡牌。
real_text: [reaction] After you fail a skill test, exhaust Rabbit's Foot: Draw 1 card.
flavor: 他们都说这不会带来任何好运。我倒是觉得宁信其有，不信其无。

name: 狗屎运
text:
快速。躲避尝试一个非[[精英]]敌人期间，在你失败且低于难度2点以内后打出。
将该敌人放到遭遇牌堆顶。
real_text:
Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 2 or less during an evasion attempt against a non-[[Elite]] enemy.
Place that enemy on top of the encounter deck.
flavor: 傻人有傻福。

name: 学无止境
text: 快速。在你技能检定失败且完毕后(结算该次检定的所有效果后)打出。 再次尝试该次检定。你本次检定+2技能值。
real_text: Fast. Play after a skill test you failed ends (after resolving all effects from the failed test). Attempt that test again. You get +2 skill value for this test.

name: "看看我发现了什么！"
text:
快速。在你调查失败，并且低于难度2点及以内后打出。
发现你所在地点的2个线索。
real_text:
Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 2 or less while investigating.
Discover 2 clues in your location.

name: 哎呀！
text:
快速。在你攻击与你交战的敌人失败，并且低于难度2点及以内后打出。
对你所在地点的不同敌人造成该次攻击的伤害。
real_text:
Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 2 or less while attacking an enemy engaged with you.
Deal this attack's damage to a different enemy at your location.

name: 重拾信念
text:
每次技能检定最多投入1张。
你可以在任何类型的检定中投入重拾信念。
如果这次检定失败，执行检定的调查员抽取2张卡牌并获得2资源。
real_text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
You may commit Take Heart to any type of test.
If this test fails, the performing investigator draws 2 cards and gains 2 resources.

name: 星星·XVII
text:
你控制的所有有生命值的支援得到+1生命值。
你控制的所有有神智值的支援+1神智值。
[reaction]在游戏开始时，如果星星·XVII在你起始手牌中：将其放置入场。
real_text:
Each asset you control with health gets +1 health.
Each asset you control with sanity gets +1 sanity.
[reaction] When the game begins, if The Star • XVII is in your opening hand: Put it into play.

name: 教皇·V
text:
你拥有额外1个法术槽。
你的法术槽可以用来携带占用饰品槽位的卡牌，反之亦然。
[reaction]在游戏开始时，如果教皇·V在你起始手牌中：将其放置入场。
real_text:
You have 1 additional arcane slot.
Your arcane slots can be used to hold cards that take up accessory slots, and vice versa.
[reaction] When the game begins, if The Hierophant • V is in your opening hand: Put it into play.

name: 月亮挂坠
text:
你拥有额外1个塔罗槽位。
你手中或投入到技能检定中的每张非弱点[[塔罗]]支援获得[wild][wild]。
[reaction]在游戏开始时，如果月亮挂坠在你起始手牌中：将其放置入场。
real_text:
You have 1 additional tarot slot.
Each non-weakness [[Tarot]] asset in your hand or committed to a skill test gains [wild] [wild].
[reaction] When the game begins, if Moon Pendant is in your opening hand: Put it into play.

name: 圣洁
text:
作为打出圣洁的额外费用，将混乱袋内或封印在场上卡牌上的总计10个[bless]标记返回供应堆。
移除场上任一卡牌上的1个毁灭标记。
real_text:
As an additional cost to play Hallow, return a total of 10 [bless] tokens to the token pool from the chaos bag or sealed on cards in play.
Remove 1 doom from any card in play.
flavor: 黑暗至深之处，光明仍会绽放。

name: 阿里阿德涅之线
text:
使用(0秘密)。
阿里阿德涅之线上的秘密能被花费，如同其在你所在地点调查员控制的任何支援卡上。
[free]消耗阿里阿德涅之线：将1秘密从你控制的支援卡移动到你的资源池，作为资源；或从你的资源池将1资源移动到你控制的支援卡，作为秘密。
real_text:
Uses (0 secrets).
Secrets on Ariadne's Twine can be spent as if they were on any asset controlled by an investigator at your location.
[free] Exhaust Ariadne's Twine: Move 1 secret from an asset you control to your resource pool, as a resource, or vice versa.

name: 不择手段
text:
你可以投入不择手段到任何类型的检定中。
作为投入不择手段到技能检定的额外费用，加入数量等于这次检定难度的[curse]标记到混乱袋。
这次检定自动成功。
real_text:
You may commit Justify the Means to any type of test.
As an additional cost to commit Justify the Means to a skill test, add [curse] tokens to the chaos bag equal to this test's difficulty.
This test automatically succeeds.

name: 幸运骰子
text:
卓越。
[reaction]在你抽出一个非[curse]、非[auto_fail]的混乱标记时，加入1个[curse]标记到混乱袋：忽略刚刚抽出的混乱标记并抽出另一个结算。如果该标记有[curse]或[auto_fail]符号，将幸运骰子返回你的手牌(不能被忽略/取消)。
real_text:
Exceptional.
[reaction] When you reveal a non-[curse], non-[auto_fail] chaos token, add 1 [curse] token to the chaos bag: Ignore the just revealed chaos token and reveal another one to resolve. If that token has a [curse] or [auto_fail] symbol, return Lucky Dice to your hand (cannot be ignored/canceled).

name: 实验室助理
text:
你手牌上限+2。
[reaction]在实验室助理入场后：抽取2张卡牌。
real_text:
Your maximum hand size is increased by 2.
[reaction] After Laboratory Assistant enters play: Draw 2 cards.
traits: 盟友. 米斯卡塔尼克. 科学

name: 荒唐的素描像
text:
只能在你所在地点有至少1个线索时打出。
抽取3张卡牌。
real_text:
Play only if there is a clue on your location.
Draw 3 cards.

name: 推理
text: 如果调查一个地点时本技能检定成功，额外发现该地点的1个线索。
real_text: If this skill test is successful while investigating a location, discover 1 additional clue at that location.
flavor: 我就知道我看过这个符号。我现在通知其他人还为时不晚！

name: 仪式蜡烛
text: [reaction]在技能检定期间，你抽出[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]或[elder_thing]标记后：你这次检定技能值+1。
real_text: [reaction] After a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] symbol is revealed during a test you are performing: You get +1 skill value for this test.
flavor: 蜂蜡滴落，反射出光泽。火焰舞蹈，彷佛活物般。

name: 星界旅行
text: 移动。移动到任意一个已揭示的地点并从混乱袋中随机抽取1个标记。如果抽出[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]、[elder_thing]或[auto_fail]标记，你必须丢弃一张你控制的[[道具]]或[[盟友]]支援卡(如果你不能这么做，则受到1点伤害)。
real_text: Move. Move to any revealed location and reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If you reveal a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, you must discard an [[Item]] or [[Ally]] asset you control (if you cannot, take 1 damage).
flavor: 跨维度的旅行存在着风险，这他很清楚。但谁能抗拒那超越时空的疆域呢?

name: 催眠术
text:
快速。在一名敌人攻击你所在地点的调查员时打出。
取消该次攻击。然后从混乱袋中抽出1个标记。如果是[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]、[elder_thing]或[auto_fail]标记，将敌人的伤害转移给敌人自身。
real_text:
Fast. Play when an enemy attacks an investigator at your location.
Cancel that attack. Then, reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If it has a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, deal the attacking enemy's damage to itself.

name: 黑暗预言
text:
快速。在你将要抽出混乱标记时打出。
改为抽出5个混乱标记，而不是1个。从这些标记中选择1个[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]、[elder_thing]或[auto_fail]标记来结算，忽略其余标记。(如果没有抽出上述标记，从这些标记中选择任意1个标记来结算，忽略其余标记。)
real_text:
Fast. Play when you would reveal a chaos token.
Reveal 5 chaos tokens instead of 1. Choose one of those tokens with a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol to resolve, and ignore the rest. (If no such token is revealed, choose any one of those tokens to resolve, and ignore the rest.)
flavor: 真相就写在星辰之间。

name: 逆反
text: 在你为这次检定抽取混乱标记前，选择下列一个符号：([skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]或[elder_thing])。在这次检定中，忽略所选符号的效果(包括其修正值)。
real_text: Before revealing chaos tokens for this test, choose one of the following symbols: ([skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing]). Ignore the effects of the chosen symbol during this test (including its modifier).

name: 体能训练
text:
[free]花费1资源：这次技能检定期间你+1[willpower]。
[free]花费1资源：这次技能检定期间你+1[combat]。
real_text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [combat] for this skill test.

name: 闪躲
text:
快速。在一名敌人攻击你所在地点的一位调查员时打出。
取消那次攻击。
real_text:
Fast. Play when an enemy attacks an investigator at your location.
Cancel that attack.

name: 致命打击
text: 如果攻击期间的这次技能检定成功，则该次攻击造成+1伤害。
real_text: If this skill test is successful during an attack, that attack deals +1 damage.
flavor: 大斧砸在肉上，发出令人作呕的响声，他停不住地反覆打击着那个怪物，直到它再也无法动弹为止。

name: 弹簧刀
text: 快速。 [action]：攻击。如果你成功且超过难度至少2点，该次攻击造成+1伤害。
real_text: Fast. [action]: Fight. If you succeed by 2 or more, this attack deals +1 damage.
traits: 道具. 武器. 近战. 违法

name: 幸运烟盒
text: [reaction]在你技能检定成功且超过难度至少2点后，消耗幸运烟盒：抽取1张卡牌。
real_text: [reaction] After you succeed at a skill test by 2 or more, exhaust Lucky Cigarette Case: Draw 1 card.
flavor: "其实没那么幸运，只是想抽根烟。"

name: 暗中偷袭
text: 攻击。本次攻击中将你的[agility]数值加入你的技能值。如果你成功且超过难度2点或以上，自动躲避本次攻击的敌人。
real_text: Fight. Add your [agility] value to your skill value for this attack. If you succeed by 2 or more, automatically evade the attacked enemy.
flavor: "瞄准眼睛。"他们这么告诉我的。

name: 艺高胆大
text:
快速。在你技能检定将要成功时打出。
这次技能检定你+2技能值。
real_text:
Fast. Play when you would succeed at a skill test.
You get +2 skill value for this test.
flavor:
"麦克格伦，你想让我们两个都送命吗？"
"这次不会了，伙计。这次不会了。"

name: 悄然遁去
text: 躲避。本次躲避尝试将你的[intellect]加入你的技能值。如果你成功且超过难度至少2点，且被躲避的敌人非[[精英]]，该敌人在下一个补给阶段不进入准备状态。
real_text: Evade. Add your [intellect] to your skill value for this evasion attempt. If you succeed by 2 or more and the evaded enemy is non-[[Elite]], it does not ready during the next upkeep phase.

name: 机会主义者
text:
只能在你执行的技能检定中投入。
如果你成功且超过难度至少3点，在检定后不丢弃机会主义者，改为将其返回你的手牌。
real_text:
Commit only to a skill test you are performing.
If you succeed by 3 or more, return Opportunist to your hand after this test instead of discarding it.

name: 附魔武器
text: 迭加到你所在地点调查员控制的一张[[武器]]支援卡。每张支援卡限制一张。 迭加支援卡获得[[遗物]]关键词，并且额外占用一个法术槽位。 [reaction]在你使用迭加支援卡执行攻击行动时，消耗此卡牌：这次攻击将此卡牌所有者的[willpower]加入你的[combat]。这次攻击造成+1伤害。
real_text: Attach to a [[Weapon]] asset controlled by an investigator at your location. Limit 1 per asset. Attached asset gains the [[Relic]] trait and takes up an arcane slot in addition to its other slots. [reaction] When you perform a Fight action using attached asset, exhaust this card: Add the owner of this card's [willpower] to your [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage.

name: 誓愿
text: 卓越。 你获得+1[willpower]、+1[intellect]、+1[combat]和+1[agility]。 强制 - 在誓愿入场后：使用以下格式做出承诺——"在我的每个回合中，我不会(抽取/打出/投入)任何卡牌。" 。如果誓愿在场时你打破承诺，将其丢弃并加入10个[curse]标记到混乱袋。
real_text: Exceptional. You get +1 [willpower], +1 [intellect], +1 [combat], and +1 [agility]. Forced - After Geas enters play: Make a promise using the following formula - "I shall not (draw/play/commit) any cards during each of my turns." If you break this promise while Geas is in play, discard it and add 10 [curse] tokens to the chaos bag.

name: 沉重打击
text:
使用(2资源)。当每轮开始时重新补满这些资源。
[free]花费你的资源池或沉重打击的1资源：这次技能检定你+1[combat]或+1[agility]。
real_text:
Uses (2 resources). Replenish these resources at the start of each round.
[free] Spend 1 resource from your resource pool or from Hard Knocks: You get +1 [combat] or +1 [agility] for this skill test.

name: 伊恰克
text:
你获得+1[willpower]和+1[intellect]。伊恰克底下每有一张弱点，你获得-1[willpower]和-1[intellect]。
[reaction]你所在地点的一位调查员在抽取一张基础弱点时，消耗伊恰克：取消该弱点的效果并将其正面朝下放置在伊恰克底下。如果伊恰克离场，弱点的所有者必须将其抽取。
real_text:
You get +1 [willpower] and +1 [intellect]. You get -1 [willpower] and -1 [intellect] for each weakness beneath Ikiaq.
[reaction] When an investigator at your location draws a basic weakness, exhaust Ikiaq: Cancel that weakness's effects and place it facedown beneath Ikiaq. Its owner must draw it if Ikiaq leaves play.

name: 警戒和平
text:
作为打出警戒和平的额外费用，在混乱袋和/或场上的卡牌中查找总共5个[bless]标记，并将其返回供应堆。
快速。在神话阶段的"抽取遭遇卡"步骤(步骤1.4)将要开始时打出。跳过神话阶段的此步骤。
real_text:
As an additional cost to play A Watchful Peace, search the chaos bag and/or cards in play for a total of 5 [bless] tokens and return them to the token pool.
Fast. Play when the "draw encounter cards" step of the mythos phase would begin. Skip this step of the mythos phase.

name: 深挖
text:
使用(2资源)。当每轮开始时重新补满这些资源。
[free] 花费你的资源池或深挖的1资源：这次技能检定你+1[willpower]或+1[agility]。
real_text:
Uses (2 resources). Replenish these resources at the start of each round.
[free] Spend 1 resource from your resource pool or from Dig Deep: You get +1 [willpower] or +1 [agility] for this skill test.

name: 日之恩惠
text:
快速。封印(最多3[bless])。如果日之恩惠上没有封印标记，将其丢弃。
[reaction]在你将要从混乱袋抽出一个混乱标记时，消耗日之恩惠：改为结算一个封印在此处的标记，如同其刚刚从混乱袋抽出。
real_text:
Fast. Seal (up to 3 [bless]). If there are no tokens sealed on Favor of the Sun, discard it.
[reaction] When you would reveal a chaos token from the chaos bag, exhaust Favor of the Sun: Resolve a token sealed here instead, as if it were just revealed from the chaos bag.

name: 净化腐败
text:
[reaction]在你抽取一张非弱点诡计卡时，受到1点伤害和1点恐惧：取消该卡牌的显现效果并在此卡牌上放置1资源，作为腐败。如果此卡牌有至少3个腐败，将其从游戏移除。
[fast]抽取遭遇牌堆顶部的卡牌：治癒1点伤害和1点恐惧，或从此卡牌移除1腐败。
real_text:
[reaction] When you draw a non-weakness treachery, take 1 damage and 1 horror: Cancel that card's revelation effect and place 1 resource on this card, as corruption. If this card has 3 or more corruption, remove it from the game.
[fast] Draw the top card of the encounter deck: Either heal 1 damage and 1 horror, or remove 1 corruption from this card.
traits: 仪式. 祝福. 诅咒萦绕

name: 圣矛
text: [action]：攻击。这次攻击你+2[combat]并造成+1伤害。在你发动此能力时，你可以释放一个封印在圣矛上的[bless]标记。 [action]在混乱袋中查找2个[bless]标记，并将其封印在圣矛上：攻击。这次攻击你+4[combat]并造成+2伤害。
real_text: [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. When you initiate this ability, you may release a [bless] token sealed on Holy Spear. [action] Search the chaos bag for 2 [bless] tokens and seal them on Holy Spear: Fight. You get +4 [combat] and deal +2 damage for this attack.
traits: 道具. 武器. 近战. 祝福

name: 先祖知识
text:
永久。卓越。
你的牌组必须包含至少10张技能卡。你的牌组卡牌张数加5。
[reaction]在抽取你的起始手牌前：从你牌堆将随机5张非弱点技能卡正面朝下迭加到此卡牌。
[fast] 消耗先祖知识:抽取1张迭加的技能卡。
real_text:
Permanent. Exceptional.
Your deck must include at least 10 skills. Your deck size is increased by 5.
[reaction] Before drawing your opening hand: Attach 5 random non-weakness skills from your deck facedown to this card.
[fast] Exhaust Ancestral Knowledge: Draw 1 attached skill.

name: .25自动手枪
text: 快速。使用(4子弹)。 [action]花费1子弹：攻击。如果攻击的敌人已消耗，这次攻击你+2[combat]并造成+1伤害。 [reaction]在你躲避你所在地点的敌人后：执行上述攻击能力，无须花费一个行动。
real_text: Fast. Uses (4 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. If the attacked enemy is exhausted, you get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. [reaction] After you evade an enemy at your location: Perform the above Fight ability without spending an action.
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械. 违法

name: 均衡仪式
text:
选择以下一项：
- 加入X个[curse]标记到混乱袋，来加入X个[bless]标记到混乱袋。
- 从混乱袋移除X个[curse]和X个[bless]标记，来治癒你所在地点卡牌的总计X点恐惧。
real_text:
Either (choose one):
- Add X [curse] tokens to the chaos bag to add X [bless] tokens to the chaos bag.
- Remove X [curse] and X [bless] tokens from the chaos bag to heal X total horror from among cards at your location.
traits: 法术. 祝福. 诅咒萦绕

name: 雅各布‧莫里森
text:
雅各布‧莫里森在补给阶段中不准备。
[reaction]在你技能检定将要失败时，消耗雅各布‧莫里森：该检定你+2技能值。
[reaction]你在你执行的技能检定中从混乱袋抽出[bless]标记后：准备雅各布‧莫里森。
real_text:
Jacob Morrison does not ready during the upkeep phase.
[reaction] When you would fail a skill test, exhaust Jacob Morrison: You get +2 skill value for that test.
[reaction] After a [bless] token is revealed from the chaos bag during a skill test you are performing: Ready Jacob Morrison.

name: 命运三女神的祭坛
text: 迭加到你所在地点。使用(3贡品)。 迭加地点获得："[fast]抽取遭遇牌堆顶部的卡牌，消耗命运三女神的祭坛，并花费1贡品：从你的弃牌堆将最多2张等级总计5以下的卡牌返回你的手牌。位于该地点的所有调查员均可触发此能力。(FAQ, v2.0)" 卡牌由命运三女神于阿卡姆之夜2019设计。
real_text: Attach to your location. Uses (3 offerings). Attached location gains: "[fast] Draw the top card of the encounter deck, exhaust Shrine of the Moirai, and spend 1 offering: Return up to 2 cards with a total combined level of 5 or less from your discard pile to your hand. Any investigator at this location may trigger this ability." Card design by the Moirai at Arkham Nights 2019.
traits: 幸运. 祝福. 诅咒萦绕

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 扫堂腿
text: 攻击。这次攻击将你的[agility]加入你的技能值。这次攻击造成+1伤害。如果你成功，自动躲避被攻击的敌人。
real_text: Fight. Add your [agility] to your skill value for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage. If you succeed, automatically evade the attacked enemy.
traits: 勇气. 策略. 技巧
flavor: "非常好，丽丽。现在再来一次。"

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 蝴蝶对剑
text: [action]：攻击。你这次攻击+1[combat]。在这次攻击后，你可以消耗蝴蝶对剑以再次攻击，该攻击将你的[agility]加入你的技能值。该攻击造成+1伤害。
real_text: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. After this attack, you may exhaust Butterfly Swords to fight again, adding your [agility] to your skill value for that attack. That attack deals +1 damage.
traits: 道具. 武器. 近战
flavor: 熟练操控，这就是延长的双手。

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 繁星密语
text:
快速。只能在你的回合中打出。
丢弃你牌堆顶部的卡牌。如果该卡牌为弱点，将其混洗回你的牌堆。否则在你的回合剩余时间内，只要该卡牌在你的弃牌堆中，将其投入到你执行的每个符合条件的技能检定中。
real_text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Discard the top card of your deck. If that card is a weakness, shuffle it back into your deck. Otherwise, for the remainder of your turn, while that card is in your discard pile, commit it to each eligible skill test you perform.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 咏春棍
text: 你拥有1个额外的法术槽位。 [action]：攻击。你每有一个法术槽位被占用，这次攻击+1[combat]。如果你有至少2个法术槽位被占用，这次攻击造成+1伤害。
real_text: You have 1 additional arcane slot. [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack for each of your arcane slots that is filled. If at least 2 of your arcane slots are filled, this attack deals +1 damage.
traits: 道具. 武器. 近战

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 天文地图集
text:
[fast]消耗天文地图集：查看你牌堆顶部的卡牌。如果其非弱点，将其正面朝下迭加到天文地图集(最多迭加5张卡牌)。
[fast]：将迭加到天文地图集的一张卡牌投入到一个符合条件的技能检定中。如果该检定成功，不丢弃该卡牌，改为将其加入你的手牌。(每次检定限制1次。)
real_text:
[fast] Exhaust Astronomical Atlas: Look at the top card of your deck. If it is not a weakness, attach it facedown to Astronomical Atlas (max 5 cards attached).
[fast]: Commit a card attached to Astronomical Atlas to an eligible skill test. If that test succeeds, add that card to your hand instead of discarding it. (Limit once per test.)

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 人多力量大
text: 你控制的卡牌之中每有一个不同的职阶，人多力量大获得一个[wild]图标。
real_text: Strength in Numbers gains a [wild] icon for each different class among cards you control.
flavor: "可以在后方掩护我吗？其实前方也需要你掩护。"

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 医学生
text: [reaction]在医学生入场后：治癒你所在地点的一位调查员或一张[[盟友]]支援卡1点伤害和1点恐惧。
real_text: [reaction] After Medical Student enters play: Heal 1 damage and 1 horror from an investigator or [[Ally]] asset at your location.
traits: 盟友. 米斯卡塔尼克. 科学
flavor: "做这些会给我学分吗？"

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 迈克尔·利
text:
你获得+1[intellect]和+1[combat]。
[reaction]在你成功调查后：从供应堆拿取1资源放在迈克尔·利上，作为证据(最多3证据)。
[reaction]在你发动一次攻击时，消耗迈克尔·利并花费1证据：你这次攻击造成+1伤害。
real_text: You get +1 [intellect] and +1 [combat]. [reaction] After you successfully investigate: Place 1 resource (from the token pool) on Michael Leigh, as evidence (to a maximum of 3 evidence). [reaction] When you initiate an attack, exhaust Michael Leigh and spend 1 evidence: You deal +1 damage for this attack.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 占卜
text: 使用(4充能)。 [action]：调查。你这次调查+1技能值，并且你可以不使用[intellect]，改为使用[willpower]。如果你成功，花费1或2充能。不发现你所在地点的一个线索，改为每花费1充能，发现你所在地点的1个线索。如果你成功且等于难度，从你手牌中选择并丢弃1张卡牌。
real_text: Uses (4 charges). [action]: Investigate. For this investigation, you may use [willpower] instead of [intellect], and you get +1 skill value. If you succeed, spend 1 or 2 charges. Instead of discovering a clue at your location, discover 1 clue at your location for each charge spent. If you succeed by 0, choose and discard a card from your hand.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 身形虚化
text: 使用(3充能)。 [action]如果身形虚化还有剩余充能：躲避。你这次躲避尝试+1技能值，并且你可以不使用[agility]，改为使用[willpower]。如果你成功，花费1充能并且这回合你可以进行一个额外行动。如果你成功且等于难度，受到1点伤害。
real_text: Uses (3 charges). [action] If Blur has charges remaining: Evade. For this evasion attempt, you may use [willpower] instead of [agility], and you get +1 skill value. If you succeed, spend 1 charge and you may take an additional action this turn. If you succeed by 0, take 1 damage.

name: 罗兰·班克斯
text: 当牌组构建时，选择3张不同的指令支援卡加入牌组。 [fast]：将1张指令支援卡翻面(忽略其永久关键词)。(每场游戏限制1次)。 [elder_sign]效果：+2。选择1张指令支援卡。在这一轮中，你可以忽略其守则能力。
real_text: At deck creation, choose 3 different Directive assets to add to your deck. [fast]: Flip a Directive asset facedown (ignoring its permanent keyword). (Limit once per game.) [elder_sign] effect: +2. Choose a Directive asset. You may ignore its regulation ability this round.
flavor: "如果我惹是生非，警长，那是因为已有是非。"
back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：守卫者([guardian])等级0-3，[[洞察]]卡牌等级0-3，[[策略]]卡牌等级0-3，中立卡牌等级0-5。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：罗兰的.38特製手枪、掩盖罪证、1张随机基础弱点。 额外经验值：剧本开始时你额外拥有5点经验值(这不影响你在冒险模式所需拿取的弱点卡数量)。
back_flavor: 罗兰总能在规则和命令中找到一种安全感。作为联邦探员之一，他在遇上任何状况的时候总能找到应对的办法。但对于近来他碰到的事件来说，他的联邦探员手册完全没帮上忙，尤其是在面对那些奇怪生物、时空之门、魔法咒文之时。如果不是亲眼所见，他永远不会相信这些奇闻……他确信，自己的上司只会把这些事情当做是都市怪谈。

name: 指令
text: 罗兰·班克斯牌组专用。永久。 守则 - 你每轮不能攻击超过2次。 [fast]在调查、躲避或谈判的技能检定中，消耗此指令：每有1个敌人与你交战，你这次技能检定+2技能值。
real_text: Roland Bank deck only. Permanent. Regulation - You cannot fight more than twice each round. [fast] During a skill test while investigating, evading, or parleying, exhaust Directive: You get +2 skill value for this test for each enemy engaged with you.

name: 指令
text: 罗兰·班克斯牌组专用。永久。 守则 - 你每轮不能打出超过2张卡牌。 [reaction]在你打出1张[[洞察]]或[[策略]]事件卡时，消耗此指令：该事件卡获得快速。
real_text: Roland Bank deck only. Permanent. Regulation - You cannot play more than 2 cards each round. [reaction] When you play an [[Insight]] or [[Tactic]] event, exhaust this Directive: That event gains fast.

name: 指令
text: 罗兰·班克斯牌组专用。永久。 守则 - 你不能主动将伤害或恐惧分配给[[盟友]]支援卡。 你拥有额外1个盟友槽位。
real_text: Roland Bank deck only. Permanent. Regulation - You cannot voluntarily assign damage or horror to [[Ally]] assets. You have 1 additional ally slot.

name: 指令
text: 罗兰·班克斯牌组专用。永久。 守则 - 只要你所在地点有至少1个线索，你不能在技能检定中投入卡牌，除非你本轮有发现线索。 [reaction]在你发现线索后，如果你所在地点有敌人，消耗此指令：抽取1张卡牌。
real_text: Roland Bank deck only. Permanent. Regulation - When your location has 1 or more clues, you cannot commit cards to skill tests unless you have discovered a clue this round. [reaction] After you discover a clue, if an enemy is at your location, exhaust this Directive: Draw 1 card.

name: 指令
text: 罗兰·班克斯牌组专用。永久。 守则 - 你每轮不能移动超过2次。 你+3神智值。
real_text: Roland Bank deck only. Permanent. Regulation - You cannot move more than twice each round. You get +3 sanity.

name: 罗兰的.38特製手枪
text: 罗兰·班克斯牌组专用。进阶。使用(4子弹)。 [action]花费1子弹：攻击。这次攻击中你+2[combat](如果所在地点有至少1个线索，改为+4[combat])。这次攻击造成+1伤害。如果这次攻击击败1个敌人，且你所在地点没有线索，在罗兰的.38特製手枪上放置1子弹。
real_text: Roland Banks deck only. Advanced. Uses (4 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack (if there are 1 or more clues on your location, you get +4 [combat], instead). This attack deals +1 damage. If this attack defeats an enemy and there are no clues on your location, place 1 ammo on Roland's .38 Special
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械

name: 掩盖罪证
text: 进阶。 显现 - 将掩盖罪证放置入你的威胁区域，并在卡上放置4个线索。 [reaction]在你将要从所在地点发现至少1个线索时：改为从掩盖罪证上丢弃同等数量的线索。 强制 - 在游戏结束时，如果掩盖罪证上仍然有线索：你受到1点精神创伤。
real_text: Advanced. Revelation - Put Cover Up into play in your threat area, with 4 clues on it. [reaction] When you would discover 1 or more clues at your location: Discard that many clues from Cover Up instead. Forced - When the game ends, if there are any clues on Cover Up: You suffer 1 mental trauma.

name: 圣化之镜
text: 每个牌组限制1张。 [reaction]在你打出一张舒缓旋律时：将其上所有"2"变为"3"，或不将其丢弃，改为将其洗入你的牌堆。 强制 - 在圣化之镜入场后：查找你的绑定卡牌，找出3张舒缓旋律。将其中1张加入你手牌，将其余2张洗入你的牌堆。
real_text: Limit 1 per deck. [reaction] When you play a copy of Soothing Melody: Either change each "2" on it to a "3," or shuffle it into your deck instead of discarding it. Forced - After Hallowed Mirror enters play: Search your bonded cards for 3 copies of Soothing Melody. Add 1 to your hand and shuffle the other 2 into your deck.
traits: 道具. 遗物. 密教. 祝福

name: 世界·XXI
text:
[fast]如果你手牌等于或大于8张，消耗世界·XXI：抽取1张卡牌。
[reaction]在游戏开始时，如果世界·XXI在你起始手牌中：将其放置入场。
real_text:
[fast] If you have 8 or more cards in your hand, exhaust The World • XXI: Draw 1 card.
[reaction] When the game begins, if The World • XXI is in your opening hand: Put it into play.

name: 密教辞典
text: 每个牌组限制1张。 [reaction]在你打出一张鲜血仪式时：将其上所有"2"变为"3"，或不将其丢弃，改为将其洗入你的牌堆。 强制 - 在密教辞典入场后：查找你的绑定卡牌，找出3张鲜血仪式。将其中1张加入你手牌，将其余2张洗入你的牌堆。
real_text: Limit 1 per deck. [reaction] When you play a copy of Blood-Rite: Either change each "2" on it to a "3," or shuffle it into your deck instead of discarding it. Forced - After Occult Lexicon enters play: Search your bonded cards for 3 copies of Blood-Rite. Add 1 to your hand and shuffle the other 2 into your deck.
traits: 道具. 书籍. 密教

name: 宝剑骑士
text:
[reaction]在你技能检定将要成功时：你本次检定得到技能值+1。你可以丢弃宝剑骑士，改为得到技能值+3。
[reaction]在游戏开始时，如果宝剑骑士在你起始手牌中：将其放置入场。
real_text:
[reaction] When you would succeed at a skill test: You get +1 skill value for this test. You may discard Knight of Swords to get +3 instead.
[reaction] When the game begins, if Knight of Swords is in your opening hand: Put it into play.

name: 良好人脉
text:
每位调查员限制1张。
[fast]消耗良好人脉：你每有4资源，本次技能检定的技能值+1。
[fast]花费2资源：准备良好人脉。(每轮限制一次。)
real_text:
Limit 1 per investigator.
[fast] Exhaust Well Connected: You get +1 skill value for this skill test for every 4 resources you have.
[fast] Spend 2 resources: Ready Well Connected. (Limit once per round.)

name: 魔法手势
text: 快速。 你拥有额外1个法术槽，只能用来携带一张[[法术]]或[[仪式]]支援。 [reaction]在你启动一张[[法术]]或[[仪式]]支援上的一个[action]能力后，消耗魔法手势：启动你控制的一张不同的[[法术]]或[[仪式]]支援上的一个[action]能力(无需支付其[action]费用)。
real_text: Fast. You have 1 additional arcane slot, which can only be used to hold a [[Spell]] or [[Ritual]] asset. [reaction] After you activate an [action] ability on a [[Spell]] or [[Ritual]] asset, exhaust Sign Magick: Activate an [action] ability on a different [[Spell]] or [[Ritual]] asset you control (without paying its [action] cost).

name: 权杖九
subname: 每次尝试都是一场教训
text:
[reaction]在你抽取一张非弱点遭遇卡时，消耗权杖九：取消该卡牌的所有效果并将其洗回遭遇牌堆。然后，从遭遇牌堆顶再抽取1张卡牌。
[reaction]在游戏开始时，如果权杖九在你起始手牌中：将其放置入场。
real_text:
[reaction] When you draw a non-weakness encounter card, exhaust Nine of Rods: Cancel all of that card's effects and shuffle it into the encounter deck. Then, draw another card from the top of the encounter deck.
[reaction] When the game begins, if Nine of Rods is in your opening hand: Put it into play.

name: 勇闯火线
text:
快速。只能在你的回合中打出。
你回合结束之前，将你所有技能的基础值设为5，或将你一项技能的基础值设为7。
real_text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Until the end of your turn, set the base value of each of your skills to 5, or the base value of one of your skills to 7.
flavor: 只有在你性命受到威胁时，你才会认识到自己能力的极限。

name: 愚人·0
text:
[reaction]在你打出一张卡牌时，消耗愚人·0：该卡牌的费用减少1点。
[reaction]在游戏开始时，如果愚人·0在你起始手牌中：将其放置入场。
real_text:
[reaction] When you play a card, exhaust The Fool • 0: Reduce that card's cost by 1.
[reaction] When the game begins, if The Fool • 0 is in your opening hand: Put it into play.

name: 观测
text:
永久。每位调查员限制1张。
在每场游戏设置前，从塔罗牌堆抽取3张随机塔罗牌并选择其中1张。将选择的牌以正位放在你的面前。其他每位调查员忽略该牌效果。将其余牌洗回塔罗牌堆。
real_text:
Permanent. Limit 1 per investigator.
Before setting up each game, draw 3 random cards from the tarot deck and choose 1. Place the chosen card in front of you, in the upright position. Each other investigator ignores its effects. Shuffle the rest back into the tarot deck.

name: 诅咒缠身
text:
永久。
在每场游戏设置前，从塔罗牌堆抽取1张随机塔罗牌，将其以逆位放在你的面前。其他每位调查员忽略该牌效果。
real_text:
Permanent.
Before setting up each game, draw a random card from the tarot deck and place the chosen card in front of you, in the reverse position. Each other investigator ignores its effects.

name: 恶魔·XV
text: 恶魔·XV在你手中时，你不能打出除了恶魔·XV以外的支援。 如果冒险设置期间你抽取了恶魔·XV作为你起始手牌(不论在换牌机会之前或之后)，你不能将其替换。本卡牌必须留在你的起始手牌中。
real_text: You cannot play assets other than The Devil • XV while it is in your hand. If The Devil • XV is drawn in your opening hand during setup (before or after taking a mulligan), you cannot replace it. It must stay in your opening hand.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 诺曼·威瑟斯
text: 你牌堆顶部的卡牌始终揭示。 每轮1次，你可以-1资源费用打出你牌堆顶部的卡牌，如同其为你的手牌。 强制 - 在你的牌堆顶部揭示弱点后：将其抽取。 [elder_sign]效果：+X。你可以用你1张手牌交换你牌堆顶部的卡牌。X为你牌堆顶部卡牌的资源费用。
real_text: Play with the top card of your deck revealed. Once per round, you may play the top card of your deck as if it were in your hand, at -1 resource cost. Forced - After a weakness is revealed while on top of your deck: Draw it. [elder_sign] effect: +X. You may swap the top card of your deck with a card in your hand. X is the resource cost of the top card of your deck.

deck_options.error: You cannot have more than 5 level 0 Mystic cards

back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：探求者([seeker])等级0，潜修者([mystic])等级1-5，中立卡牌等级0-5，最多5张其它的潜修者卡牌([mystic])等级0。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：伊波恩之书，预示者、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 星星里藏有很多秘密，而诺曼从不会忽略任何蛛丝马迹。某日当六颗星星从天上消失时，诺曼简直无法接受——儘管他的同事都告诉他，那一切只是他的幻想罢了。他花费了好几年，终于在行将就木之时从古籍里找到了答案：书中描述了星星以及它们消失的顺序，和确切的日期和时间，里头还提及这是万物中将迎来结局的一个讯号：他预示了一隻庞大的野兽，将会撕碎人类所创造的一切。诺曼不知道该怎么做来阻止野兽摧毁世界，但如果星星知道谕示，他将会找到答案。

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 伊波恩之书
text:
诺曼·威瑟斯牌组专用。
[fast]消耗伊波恩之书：用你1张手牌交换你牌堆顶部的卡牌。
[fast]消耗伊波恩之书：将你牌堆顶部的卡牌投入到你所在地点调查员执行的符合条件的技能检定中。
real_text:
Norman Withers deck only.
[fast] Exhaust Livre d'Eibon: Swap the top card of your deck with a card in your hand.
[fast] Exhaust Livre d'Eibon: Commit the top card of your deck to an eligible skill test performed by an investigator at your location.
traits: 道具. 遗物. 书籍

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 预示者
text: 显现 - 将本卡牌放置于你的牌堆顶部。 只要你的牌堆顶部揭示了预示者，除了下方能力外，你牌堆内的卡牌不能被查找、抽取、或以任何方式操纵。 [action] [action]：丢弃预示者。只要预示者在你的牌堆顶部就可以启动本能力，如同其在你的威胁区域。
real_text: Revelation - Place this card on top of your deck. While The Harbinger is revealed and on top of your deck, cards in your deck cannot be searched, drawn, or manipulated in any way except by the below ability. [action] [action]: Discard The Harbinger. This ability may be activated while The Harbinger is on top of your deck, as if it were in your threat area.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 蒙特雷·杰克
text:
[reaction]当你的回合结束时，如果你本轮开始时的地点与你现在地点的连接次数为1：获得1资源或抽取1张卡牌(如果连接次数至少为2，改为执行两项)。
[elder_sign]效果：+1。如果你本轮开始时的地点与你现在地点的连接次数至少为1，获得1资源或抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
[reaction] At the end of your turn, if you started this round 1 location away from your current location: Either gain 1 resource or draw 1 card (if you started this round 2 or more locations away, do both instead).
[elder_sign] effect: +1. If you started this round 1 or more locations away from your current location, gain 1 resource or draw 1 card.

deck_options.error: You cannot have more than 5 level 0 Seeker cards

back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项流浪者([rogue])等级0，探求者([seeker])等级1-5，中立卡牌等级0-5，最多5张探求者卡牌([seeker])等级0。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：可靠的长鞭、被埋葬的秘密、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 年轻的杰克跟随他父亲一起考古探险、巡游世界，如今他已是遍历全球的寻宝猎人，同时也是一个出色的考古学家，"蒙特雷"跟随父亲的脚步，保护着古代文明和失落文化的宝藏。但当蒙特雷发现了一个熟悉又陌生符号的银色吊坠后，他决定探索自己蒙着灰的过去。多年前，他的父亲被杀害时，额头上留下这个相同的符号。至此之后，那个惊悚的画面一直停留在蒙特雷的梦境里，时不时反覆出现。不过，他已经快接近真相了；在找出杀害他父亲的凶手前，他是不会停下迈进的步伐……无论需要付出多少代价。

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 可靠的长鞭
text: 快速。蒙特雷·杰克牌组专用。 [action]：攻击。这次攻击不使用[combat]，改为使用[agility]。如果这次攻击成功，你可以消耗可靠的长鞭，以自动躲避被攻击的敌人或这次攻击造成+1伤害。
real_text: Fast. Monterey Jack deck only. [action]: Fight. This attack uses [agility] instead of [combat]. If this attack succeeds, you may exhaust Trusty Bullwhip to either automatically evade the attacked enemy or deal +1 damage for this attack.
traits: 道具. 武器. 近战

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充

real_text: Revelation - Put Buried Secrets into play in your threat area. If your location can be investigated, you cannot move except by scenario card effects. [action]: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering clues, discard Buried Secrets. If you fail, you may take 2 horror to shuffle it into your deck.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充

text:
游戏开始时将你牌组里每张演武放置入场，[[运功]]面朝上。
[elder_sign]效果：+2。这次检定结束后，将你控制的1张[[破功]]演武翻转至其[[运功]]面。
real_text:
You begin the game with each Discipline in your deck in play, [[Unbroken]] side faceup.
[elder_sign] effect: +2. After this test ends, flip a [[Broken]] Discipline you control to its [[Unbroken]] side.

deck_options.error: You cannot have more than 5 level 0 Guardian cards

flavor: "我此生都在准备迎面这个邪魔。吾意已决。"
back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项潜修者([mystic])等级0，守卫者([guardian])等级1-5，中立卡牌等级0-5，最多5张守卫者卡牌([guardian])等级0。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：每张演武支援卡搭配1张命运重担(见下方)、1张随机基础弱点。 牌组构建限制：无[[枪械]]支援卡。 其它需求：当构建牌库时，选择一张演武支援卡加入你的牌库。其被视为你牌组构建需求的一部分。你每拥有15点经验值，你可以选择加入一张不同的演武支援卡到你的牌组。
back_flavor: 陈丽丽不是一个多话的人，不过一但开口，必定是倍加思量的金玉良言。在经历一生的严格训练，她的每个武术动作都优雅而干净俐落。养育她的高僧曾经说过，她的出生是为了与一个强大的恶魔抗衡；现在，他们深信恶魔即将到来，而她是唯一一个能够阻止邪恶的人。

text:
在任何时候，你所在地点的调查员可以向你揭示其手中的[[道具]]支援卡。
在你回合中，你可以进行一个额外行动，该行动只能用于打出你所在地点调查员手中的一张[[道具]]支援卡，置于该调查员控制之下(双方调查员都可以花费资源来支付其费用)。

real_text:
At any time, an investigator at your location may reveal to you the [[Item]] assets in their hand.
You may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to play an [[Item]] asset from the hand of an investigator at your location, under their control. (Both investigators may spend resources to pay its cost).
[elder_sign] effect: +1 for each [[Item]] asset you control.

deck_options.error: You cannot have more than 5 level 0 Rogue cards

back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：求生者([survivor])等级0，流浪者([rogue])等级1-5，中立卡牌等级0-5，最多5张其它流浪者卡牌([rogue])等级0。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：精明的交易、贪婪、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 鲍勃认为，推销员的成功取决于自身坚持不懈的性格：你只需要一遍又一遍地告知别人他们想要的是什么。最近，鲍勃拥有几枚"诅咒萦绕"的金币，他希望自己一向的坚持能够发现金币的起源与出现的缘由，如果他不出一点差错的话，这将是一大成就。也许干完这票，他终于能够退休，买下自己梦寐以求的那艘船，在热带天堂钓鱼度过余生。也许到最后，鲍勃会发现那些闪闪发亮的光芒，其实并不是他所认为的黄金。

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 贪婪
text: 显现 - 受到1点恐惧。如果你有…… - ……10资源或更少，额外受到1点恐惧。 - ……5资源或更少，额外受到1点恐惧。 - ……0资源，额外受到1点恐惧。
real_text: Revelation - Take 1 horror. If you have... - ...10 or fewer resources, take 1 additional horror. - ...5 or fewer resources, take 1 additional horror. - ...0 resources, take 1 additional horror.
flavor: 也许有人会说，自有信徒拜金。

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 21点
text:
依次从混乱袋随机抽出标记，直到你选择停下。将每个[skull]、[cultist]、[tablet]或[elder_thing]视为5；[auto_fail]视为10；[elder_sign]视为1或11。如果这些标记的总和(忽略+/-)为……
- ……18或更少，获得4资源。
- ……19，获得5资源。
- ……20，获得6资源。
- ……21，获得9资源。
real_text:
One at a time, reveal random tokens from the chaos bag until you choose to stop. Treat each [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] as a 5; the [auto_fail] as a 10; and the [elder_sign] as either a 1 or an 11. If the combined value of those tokens (ignoring +/-) is...
- ...18 or less, gain 4 resources.
- ...19, gain 5 resources.
- ...20, gain 6 resources.
- ...21, gain 9 resources.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 不当交易
text: 揭示你手中的一张[[道具]]支援卡。你所在地点的另一位调查员可以打出该支援卡，如同其在他的手牌中。如果他这么做，你抽取1张卡牌并获得等于该支援卡打印费用的资源。
real_text: Reveal an [[Item]] asset in your hand. Another investigator at your location may play that asset as if it were in their hand. If they do, draw 1 card and gain resources equal to that asset's printed cost.
flavor: "真的假的？你现在在跟我讨价还价？"

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 红色闹钟
text: 卓越。使用(0充能)。 强制 - 在你的回合开始后：在此放置1充能，或取走此处所有充能作为资源。然后，如果其正好有…… - 1充能，下次技能检定你+3技能值。 - 2充能，你可以移动最多2次。 - 3充能，这回合你可以进行一次额外行动。
real_text: Exceptional. Uses (0 charges). Forced - After your turn begins: Either place 1 charge here, or take all charges here, as resources. Then, if it has exactly... - 1 charge, you get +3 skill value for your next skill test. - 2 charges, you may move up to 2 times. - 3 charges, you may take an additional action this turn.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 沙夫纳的目录
text:
使用(5秘密)。如果沙夫纳的目录没有秘密，则将其丢弃。
你可以花费沙夫纳的目录上的秘密作为资源，来支付你所在地点任何调查员打出的[[道具]]支援卡。
real_text:
Uses (5 secrets). If Schoffner's Catalogue has no secrets, discard it.
You may spend secrets on Schoffner's Catalogue as resources to pay for [[Item]] assets played by any investigator at your location.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 提前侦察
text: 移动。移动最多3次。这次移动中敌人不会与你交战。
real_text: Move. Move up to 3 times. Enemies do not engage you during this movement.
flavor: "……一种无形的气息抗拒着我，并让我远离这些古老而凶险的秘密，这些秘密不应为人所知，也未曾有人所知。"<cite>H. P. 洛夫克拉夫特，《无名之城》</cite>

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 丹妮拉·雷耶丝
text:
[reaction] 在一名敌人攻击你后(除了你引起的趁乱攻击外)，即使该攻击被取消：对该敌人造成1点伤害，或自动躲避它。
[elder_sign]效果：+1。如果你本轮被敌人攻击过，改为你自动成功。
real_text:
[reaction] After an enemy attacks you (except an attack of opportunity you provoked), even if that attack was canceled: Either deal 1 damage to that enemy, or automatically evade it.
[elder_sign] effect: +1. If you were attacked by an enemy this round, you automatically succeed, instead.

deck_options.error: You cannot have more than 5 level 0 Survivor cards

flavor: "别绷着神经，老兄，我来搞定这些。你在那站好我来就行了。"
back_text: 卡牌张数：30。 牌组构建选项：守卫者([guardian])等级0，求生者([survivor])等级1-5，中立卡牌等级0-5，最多5张其它的求生者卡牌([survivor])等级0。 牌组构建需求(不计入卡牌张数)：机修工扳手、黑帮暴徒、1张随机基础弱点。
back_flavor: 丹妮拉一直认为自己过得充实而愉快。她有一个可爱、热闹非凡的家庭：一份可以自力更生的稳定工作；还有充裕的金钱投资在跑车、漂亮女孩儿、和她的摩托车–加布里埃尔身上。不过好景不常，她的哥哥–拉蒙陷入不小的麻烦中，母亲若有所指的警告她要提起警觉心，黑暗将在不久之后降临于世。由于家人的一番话，丹妮拉在门后放了一杯水——母亲小时候教导她，说这样能抓住恶灵。隔日，当丹妮拉醒来发现四散一地玻璃碎片，心中一股不好的油然而生，她毅然踏上寻找事情的源头，并解决一切麻烦事，直接而不拖泥带水，就和过去的她如出一辙。

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 机修工扳手
text: 丹妮拉·雷耶丝牌组专用。 [fast]消耗机修工扳手：选择你所在地点的一名敌人。该敌人攻击你。 [action]：攻击。只能对你上回合结束后攻击过你的敌人使用此能力。你这次攻击+2[combat]并且这次攻击造成+1伤害。
real_text: Daniela Reyes deck only. [fast] Exhaust Mechanic's Wrench: Choose an enemy at your location. That enemy attacks you. [action]: Fight. Use this ability only against an enemy that has attacked you since the end of your last turn. You get +2 [combat] for this attack and deal +1 damage for this attack.
traits: 道具. 工具. 近战

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 黑帮暴徒
text: 猎手。 猎物 - 仅对丹妮拉·雷耶丝。 本敌人的攻击不能被取消。 本敌人的攻击造成的伤害/恐惧被视为直接伤害/恐惧。
real_text: Hunter. Prey - Daniela Reyes only. This enemy's attacks cannot be canceled. Damage/horror dealt by this enemy's attacks is treated as direct.
flavor: 债务也是家务事

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 正面迎击
text: 攻击。这次攻击造成+1伤害并自动成功。作为执行这次攻击的额外费用，所选敌人攻击你。
real_text: Fight. This attack deals +1 damage and is automatically successful. As an additional cost to perform this attack, the chosen enemy makes an attack against you.
flavor: 有时候，坚持到底是唯一突破口。

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: "到我身后！"
text:
快速。在任何[fast]时间段中打出。
直到本阶段结束，任何攻击你所在地点另一位调查员的敌人，改为攻击你，然后与你交战。取消每次因此类攻击造成的1点恐惧。
real_text:
Fast. Play during any [fast] window.
Until the end of the phase, whenever an enemy would attack another investigator at your location, it attacks you instead, then engages you. Cancel 1 horror dealt by each attack made in this way.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 成群结队
text: 攻击。你控制的卡牌之中每有一个不同的职阶，你这次攻击+1[combat]并造成+1伤害。
real_text: Fight. For each different class among cards you control, you get +1 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack.
flavor: "你要是惹毛了我们之中的哪一个，就是招惹了我们全部人！"

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 防御姿态
text: 只要防御姿态在你手中或被投入到技能检定中，其获得等于你[agility]的[combat]图标，以及等于你[combat]的[agility]图标。
real_text: While Defensive Stance is in your hand or committed to a skill test, it gains [combat] icons equal to your [agility], and [agility] icons equal to your [combat].
flavor: 你迈开步伐，架好姿势、深吸一口气，站稳了身子，周围敌人无数，而你孤身一人。

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 耶利米·科尔比
text:
你获得+1[intellect]。
[reaction]在耶利米·科尔比入场后，选择"偶数"或"奇数"：揭示你牌堆顶部的5张卡牌。抽取费用符合你所选择的每张卡牌。将剩余卡牌与你的牌堆混洗。
real_text:
You get +1 [intellect].
[reaction] After Jeremiah Kirby enters play, choose "even" or "odd:" Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Draw each card with a cost that matches the chosen option. Shuffle the remaining cards into your deck.
traits: 盟友. 米斯卡塔尼克. 旅人

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 加入马队
text:
快速。只能在你的回合中打出。你控制的卡牌之中每有一个不同的职阶，本卡牌的费用减1。
移动到任一个已揭示地点。
real_text:
Fast. Play only during your turn. Reduce the cost of this card by 1 for each different class among cards you control.
Move to any revealed location.
flavor: 心之所向才是真正的旅途。

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 地区勘测
text: 只要地区勘测在你手中或被投入到技能检定中，其获得等于你[agility]的[intellect]图标，以及等于你[intellect]的[agility]图标。
real_text: While Survey the Area is in your hand or committed to a skill test, it gains [intellect] icons equal to your [agility], and [agility] icons equal to your [intellect].
flavor: 不拍进相片上就没有人会相信你。该死，就算拍了还是不会有人相信你。

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 医学教科书
text: [action]：选择你所在地点的一位调查员并检定[intellect](2)。如果你成功，治癒该调查员1点伤害(如果你成功且超过难度至少2点，改为治癒2点伤害)。如果你失败，你必须消耗医学教科书或对该调查员造成1点伤害。
real_text: [action]: Choose an investigator at your location and test [intellect] (2). If you succeed, heal 1 damage from that investigator (2 damage instead if you succeed by 2 or more). If you fail, you must either exhaust Medical Texts or deal 1 damage to that investigator.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 发掘古物
text: 调查。选择你手中最多2张[seeker]支援卡。这次技能检定难度等于所选支援卡费用之和。如果你成功，将所选支援卡依次放置入场。每有1张[[遗物]]支援卡通过此能力放置入场，抽取1张卡牌。
real_text: Investigate. Choose up to 2 [seeker] assets in your hand. The difficulty of this skill test is equal to the combined cost of the chosen assets. If you succeed, put the chosen assets into play, one at a time. For each [[Relic]] asset put into play by this ability, draw 1 card.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 亵渎预言
text:
只要你没位于座标点，你获得+1[intellect]和+1[agility]，并且你可以忽略趁乱攻击。
[reaction]在亵渎预言入场后：选择一个已揭示地点。该地点为"座标点"，直到亵渎预言离场为止。
[action]：移动任一位调查员到座标点。
real_text:
While you are not at the locus, you get +1 [intellect], +1 [agility], and you may ignore attacks of opportunity.
[reaction] After Prophesiae Profana enters play: Choose a revealed location. That location is "the locus" until Prophesiae Profana leaves play.
[action]: Move any investigator to the locus.
traits: 道具. 遗物. 书籍

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 地下支持
text:
永久。每副牌组限制1张。当牌组构建时购买。
你的牌组中每张非弱点、非专属卡牌最多只能有一张同名卡牌。
你的牌组卡牌张数减5。
real_text:
Permanent. Limit 1 per deck. Purchase at deck creation.
Your deck cannot include more than 1 copy of each non-weakness, non-signature card (by title).
Reduce your deck size by 5.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 欺骗制度
text:
快速。在任何[fast]时间段中打出。
你控制的卡牌之中每有一个不同的职阶，获得1资源。
real_text:
Fast. Play during any [fast] window.
Gain 1 resource for each different class among cards you control.
flavor: 要是有事是你不该做的，那它当然不会合法。

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 补给匮乏
text: 永久。每副牌组限制1张。当牌组构建时购买。 强制 - 在你游戏的第一回合开始时：丢弃你牌堆顶部10张卡牌。
real_text: Permanent. Limit 1 per deck. Purchase at deck creation. Forced - When your first turn of the game begins: Discard the top 10 cards of your deck.
flavor: 你只能祈祷这些够用。

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 抵挡
text:
快速。在一名非[[精英]]敌人在你所在地点生成时打出。
该敌人攻击你。然后，自动躲避该敌人并将抵挡迭加到它。
被迭加的敌人不能准备。
real_text:
Fast. Play when a non-[[Elite]] enemy spawns at your location.
That enemy attacks you. Then, automatically evade that enemy and attach Fend Off to it.
Attached enemy cannot ready.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 追踪
text: 选择你所在地点以外任何地点的一名敌人。朝该敌人移动2次。在每个你因此效果进入的地点各发现1个线索。
real_text: Choose an enemy at any location other than yours. Move twice toward that enemy. Discover 1 clue at each location you entered by this effect.
flavor: "步步为营！"

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 克图格亚的烙印
text: 使用(6充能)。 [action]：攻击。这次攻击你可以不使用[combat]，改为使用[willpower]，并且你+1技能值。如果你成功，花费1或2充能。这次攻击不造成基础伤害，改为每花费1充能，造成1点伤害。如果你成功且等于难度，失去1行动。
real_text: Uses (6 charges). [action]: Fight. For this attack, you may use [willpower] instead of [combat], and you get +1 skill value. If you succeed, spend 1 or 2 charges. Instead of its standard damage, this attack deals 1 damage for each charge spent. If you succeed by 0, lose 1 action.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 恩科西·马巴蒂
text: [reaction]在恩科西·马巴蒂入场后：声名一个非[elder_sign]的符号混乱标记。直到此卡牌离场，声明的标记为你的"咒印"。 [reaction]在你所在地点的一位调查员抽出一个[cultist]、[tablet]或[elder_thing]符号时，消耗恩科西·马巴蒂：改为在混乱袋中查找并抽出你的咒印(将其余标记放回混乱袋)。
real_text: [reaction] After Nkosi Mabati enters play: Name a non-[elder_sign] chaos token with a symbol. Until this card leaves play, the named symbol is your "sigil." [reaction] When an investigator at your location reveals a [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] symbol, exhaust Nkosi Mabati: Search the chaos bag for your sigil and reveal it, instead (returning the other token to the chaos bag).

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 巨石锤
text: [action]：攻击。这次攻击将你的[willpower]加入你的技能值。你这次攻击造成+1伤害。如果你成功且该敌人非[[精英]]，你可以将其移动远离你1个地点。(如果你成功且超过难度至少3点，改为造成+2伤害，并且你可以将其移动远离你最多2个地点)
real_text: [action]: Fight. Add your [willpower] to your skill value for this attack. You deal +1 damage for this attack. If you succeed and the enemy is non-[[Elite]], you may move it one location away from you. (If you succeed by 3 or more, you instead deal +2 damage and may move the enemy up to two locations away from you.)
traits: 道具. 遗物. 武器. 近战

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 远古海图
text: 使用(3秘密)。 [fast]在你的回合中，消耗远古海图并花费1秘密：从以下行动(移动、躲避或调查)选择2个不同的行动，并以任意顺序进行。(FAQ, v2.1)
real_text:
Uses (3 secrets).
[fast] During your turn, exhaust Eon Chart and spend 1 secret: Choose and take two different actions of the following, in any order (move, evade, or investigate).

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 威廉·韦伯教授
text:
使用(3秘密)。
[reaction]在你成功调查时，消耗威廉·韦伯教授并花费1秘密：选择你的弃牌堆中1张[[道具]]卡牌并加入你的手牌。你可以不发现你所在地点的一个线索，改为发现连接地点的一个线索。
real_text:
Uses (3 secrets).
[reaction] When you successfully investigate, exhaust Professor William Webb and spend 1 secret: Choose an [[Item]] card in your discard pile and add it to your hand. Instead of discovering a clue at your location, you may discover a clue at a connecting location.
traits: 盟友. 米斯卡塔尼克

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 身形虚化
text: 使用(4充能)。 [action]如果身形虚化还有剩余充能：躲避。你这次躲避尝试+2技能值，并且你可以不使用[agility]，改为使用[willpower]。如果你成功，花费1或2充能并且这回合你可以进行等量次数的额外行动。如果你成功且等于难度，受到2点伤害。
real_text: Uses (4 charges). [action] If Blur has charges remaining: Evade. For this evasion attempt, you may use [willpower] instead of [agility] and get +2 skill value. If you succeed, spend 1 or 2 charges and you may take that many additional actions this turn. If you succeed by 0, take 2 damage.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 雪橇犬
text: 你的牌组里可以有最多4张雪橇犬。一个盟友槽位可以有最多2张雪橇犬卡牌。 [action]消耗X张雪橇犬：移动。移动X次。 [action]消耗X张雪橇犬：攻击。你这次攻击+X[combat]。这次攻击不造成基础伤害，改为造成X点伤害。
real_text: You may include up to 4 copies of Sled Dog in your deck. Up to 2 Sled Dog cards take up a single ally slot. [action] Exhaust X Sled Dogs: Move. Move X times. [action] Exhaust X Sled Dogs: Fight. You get +X [combat] for this attack. Instead of its standard damage, this attack deals X damage.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 请求支援
text:
以任意顺序依次结算，如果你控制……
- [rogue]卡牌，你可以移动到连接地点。
- [guardian]卡牌，对你所在地点的一名敌人造成1点伤害。
- [seeker]卡牌，发现你所在地点的1个线索。
- [mystic]卡牌，治癒任意卡牌1点恐惧。
- [survivor]卡牌，治癒任意卡牌1点伤害。
real_text:
One at a time, in any order, if you control a...
- [rogue] card, you may move to a connecting location.
- [guardian] card, deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.
- [seeker] card, discover 1 clue at your location.
- [mystic] card, heal 1 horror from any card.
- [survivor] card, heal 1 damage from any card.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 全副武装
text: 永久。每副牌组限制1张。当牌组构建时购买。 强制 - 在你游戏的第一回合开始时：一次一张，打出你手牌中任意数量的[[道具]]支援卡，每张费用减少1点。这回合中你减少3次行动。(FAQ, v2.0)
real_text: Permanent. Limit 1 per deck. Purchase at deck creation. Forced - When your first turn of the game begins: One at a time, play any number of [[Item]] assets from your hand, reducing the cost of each by 1. During this turn, you have 3 fewer actions to take.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 冥想放空
text: 你每有一个法术槽位被占用，治癒1点伤害或1点恐惧。
real_text: For each of your arcane slots that is filled, either heal 1 damage or 1 horror.
flavor: 你让自己的思想沉沦，冰冷而漫无目的，万物皆空。虚无如归。

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 先见
text:
快速。在一位你所在地点的调查员将要从其牌堆或从遭遇牌堆抽取一张卡牌时打出。
声明一张卡牌。如果抽取的卡牌是声明的卡牌，该调查员可以(选择一项)：
- 取消该卡牌的效果并将其丢弃。
- 立刻-2费用打出该卡牌。
real_text:
Fast. Play when an investigator at your location would draw a card from their deck or from the encounter deck.
Name a card. If the drawn card is the named card, that investigator may either (choose one):
- Cancel that card's effects and discard it.
- Immediately play that card at -2 cost.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 灭火器
text: [action]：攻击。你这次攻击+1[combat]并造成+1伤害。 [action]丢弃灭火器：躲避。自动躲避所有与你交战的敌人。你可以改为放逐灭火器来丢弃每名被此效果躲避的非[[精英]]敌人。
real_text: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. [action] Discard Fire Extinguisher: Evade. Automatically evade all enemies engaged with you. You may exile Fire Extinguisher instead of discarding it to discard each non-[[Elite]] enemy evaded by this effect.
traits: 道具. 工具. 近战

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 吉恩·波尔格
text:
你获得+1[intellect]和+1[agility]。
[reaction]在你的回合中，在你移动到一个地点后，消耗吉恩·波尔格：将一个线索或一名非[[精英]]敌人从连接地点移动到你所在地点，或从你所在地点移动到连接地点。
real_text:
You get +1 [intellect] and +1 [agility].
[reaction] During your turn, after you move to a location, exhaust Gené Beauregard: Move a clue or a non-[[Elite]] enemy from a connecting location to your location, or vice versa.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 保护魂灵
text:
快速。在你所在地点一张[[盟友]]支援卡被卡牌效果丢弃或被击败后打出。
将该支援卡返回其所有者的手中，或其所有者抽取3张卡牌。
real_text:
Fast. Play after an [[Ally]] asset at your location is discarded by a card effect or is defeated.
Either return that asset to its owner's hand, or its owner draws 3 cards.
flavor: 所有的活物都有着气息，注意别被他们的气息诅咒了。

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: "再来一张！"
text:
快速。你在技能检定中抽出混乱标记后打出。
抽出额外一个混乱标记，将其"-"变为"+"。如果该混乱标记是[skull]标记，你自动失败。
real_text:
Fast. Play after you reveal a chaos token during a skill test.
Reveal an additional chaos token, switching its "-" to a "+". If that chaos token is a [skull] token, you automatically fail.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 闪躲
text:
快速。在一名敌人攻击你所在地点一位调查员时打出。
取消该次攻击。然后，检定[agility](1)。如果你成功，对该名敌人造成1点伤害。
real_text:
Fast. Play when an enemy attacks an investigator at your location.
Cancel that attack. Then, test [agility] (1). If you succeed, deal 1 damage to that enemy.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 战斗训练
text:
快速。场上限制1张[[沉稳]]在场。
你获得+1[combat]和+1[agility]。
非直接伤害/恐惧在被分配给你的调查员卡之前，必须先分配给战斗训练。
[fast]花费1资源：你这次技能检定+1[combat]或+1[agility]。
real_text:
Fast. Limit 1 [[Composure]] in play.
You get +1 [combat] and +1 [agility].
Non-direct damage/horror must be assigned to Combat Training before it can be assigned to your investigator card.
[fast] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [combat] or +1 [agility] for this skill test.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 追猎行动
text: 快速。在神话阶段中你将要抽取一张遭遇卡时打出。 改为在遭遇牌堆中查找一名敌人，将其生成并与你交战(代替其原有的生成地点)，迭加追猎行动到该敌人，并混洗遭遇牌堆。 [reaction]在你击败被迭加的敌人时：获得3资源。
real_text: Fast. Play when you would draw an encounter card during the mythos phase. Instead, search the encounter deck for an enemy, spawn it engaged with you (instead of its normal spawn location), attach On the Hunt to it, and shuffle the encounter deck. [reaction] When you defeat attached enemy: Gain 3 resources.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 提尔斯哈之牙
text: 攻击。选择任何已揭示地点的一名敌人作为这次攻击的目标。在结算这次攻击前，你可以移动到该敌人的地点。这次攻击将你的[agility]加入你的[combat]。这次攻击造成+3伤害。
real_text: Fight. Choose an enemy at any revealed location as the target for this attack. Before resolving this attack, you may move to that enemy's location. Add your [agility] to your [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +3 damage.
flavor: 廷达洛斯之牙不会放过任何猎物。

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 蝴蝶对剑
text: [action]：攻击。你这次攻击+2[combat]。在这次攻击后，你可以再次攻击，该攻击将你的[agility]加入你的技能值。如果两次攻击都成功，你可以消耗蝴蝶对剑，使第二次攻击造成+1伤害。
real_text: [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. After this attack, you may fight again, adding your [agility] to your skill value for that attack. If both attacks are successful, you may exhaust Butterfly Swords to have the second attack deal +1 damage.
traits: 道具. 武器. 近战

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 强制学习
text:
永久。每副牌组限制1张。当牌组构建时购买。
你的牌组卡牌张数加15。
补给阶段中，不抽取1张卡牌，改为抽取2张卡牌并丢弃其中1张。
real_text:
Permanent. Limit 1 per deck. Purchase at deck creation.
Increase your deck size by 15.
During each upkeep phase, instead of drawing 1 card, draw 2 cards and discard 1 of them.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 通路檔案
text:
每副牌组限制1张。作为打出本支援卡的额外费用，在4个不同地点放置1资源，作为灵脉。
[reaction]在你成功调查一个带有灵脉的地点后，消耗本支援卡：将该灵脉移动到本支援卡上。然后，如果通路檔案上有4灵脉，将其丢弃，取得灵脉作为资源，并在你的冒险日誌中记录下"你已经确认了前行道路。"
real_text:
Limit 1 per deck. As an additional cost to play this asset, place 1 resource on 4 different locations, as leylines.
[reaction] After you successfully investigate a location with a leyline, exhaust this asset: Move that leyline onto this asset. Then, if there are 4 leylines on it, discard it, take its leylines as resources, and record in your Campaign Log that "you have identified the gateway."
traits: 道具. 书籍. 密教

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 登山靴
text:
每位调查员限制1[[鞋子]]。
你获得+1[agility]。
[reaction]在你所在地点的最后一个线索被发现后，消耗登山靴：移动到有至少一个线索，或未揭示的连接地点。
real_text:
Limit 1 [[Footwear]] per investigator.
You get +1 [agility].
[reaction] After the last clue is discovered from your location, exhaust Hiking Boots: Move to a connecting location with at least 1 clue, or to a connecting unrevealed location.
traits: 道具. 服装. 鞋子

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 科学理论
text:
快速。场上限制1张[[沉稳]]。
你获得+1[intellect]和+1[combat]。
非直接伤害/恐惧在被分配给你的调查员卡之前，必须先分配给科学理论。
[fast]花费1资源：你这次技能检定+1[intellect]或+1[combat]。
real_text:
Fast. Limit 1 [[Composure]] in play.
You get +1 [intellect] and +1 [combat].
Non-direct damage/horror must be assigned to Scientific Theory before it can be assigned to your investigator card.
[fast] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [intellect] or +1 [combat] for this skill test.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 通路檔案
text:
研究。使用(4灵脉)。每副牌组限制1张。
[fast]：从本支援卡移动1灵脉到一名非[[精英]]敌人。
[action]：选择一位调查员和一名位于已揭示地点且带有灵脉的敌人。该调查员移动到该地点。你可以移除此灵脉来对该敌人造成1点伤害。
real_text:
Researched. Uses (4 leylines). Limit 1 per deck.
[fast]: Move 1 leyline from this asset to a non-[[Elite]] enemy.
[action]: Choose an investigator, and an enemy with a leyline at a revealed location. That investigator moves to that location. You may remove the leyline to deal 1 damage to that enemy.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 通路檔案
text:
研究。使用(4灵脉)。每副牌组限制1张。
[fast]从本支援卡移动1灵脉到一个已揭示地点。
[action]：选择一位调查员和有一个带有灵脉的已揭示地点。该调查员移动到该地点。你可以移除此灵脉来使其进行一次调查行动。
real_text:
Researched. Uses (4 leylines). Limit 1 per deck.
[fast]: Move 1 leyline from this asset to a revealed location.
[action]: Choose an investigator and a revealed location with a leyline. That investigator moves to that location. You may remove the leyline to have them take an investigate action.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 通路檔案
text:
研究。使用(4灵脉)。每副牌组限制1张。
[fast]：从本支援卡移动1灵脉到一名非[[精英]]敌人。
[action]：选择一位与一名带有灵脉的敌人交战的调查员。该调查员与该敌人解除交战状态并移动到一个连接地点。你可以移除此灵脉来自动躲避该敌人。本行动不会引起趁乱攻击。
real_text:
Researched. Uses (4 leylines). Limit 1 per deck.
[fast]: Move 1 leyline from this asset to a non-[[Elite]] enemy.
[action]: Choose an investigator engaged with an enemy with a leyline. That investigator disengages from that enemy and moves to a connecting location. You may remove the leyline to automatically evade that enemy. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 通路檔案
text:
研究。使用(4灵脉)。每副牌组限制1张。
[fast]从本支援卡移动1灵脉到一位调查员。
[action]：选择一位带有灵脉的调查员。该调查员抽取1张卡牌并治癒1点伤害或1点恐惧。你可以移除此灵脉来使其改为抽取2张卡牌并治癒2点伤害或2点恐惧。
real_text:
Researched. Uses (4 leylines). Limit 1 per deck.
[fast]: Move 1 leyline from this asset to an investigator.
[action]: Choose an investigator with a leyline. That investigator draws 1 card and heals 1 damage or 1 horror. You may remove the leyline to have them instead draw 2 cards and heal 2 damage or 2 horror.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 反间谍活动
text:
快速。在你抽取一张非弱点诡计卡时打出。
取消该卡牌的显现效果并抽取遭遇牌堆顶部的卡牌。
[reaction]在你打出反间谍活动时，提升其费用2点：将"遭遇牌堆"换成"你的牌堆"。
[reaction]在你打出反间谍活动时，提升其费用2点：将"你"换成"任一位调查员"。
real_text:
Fast. Play when you draw a non-weakness treachery.
Cancel that card's revelation effect and draw the top card of the encounter deck.
[reaction] When you play Counterespionage, increase its cost by 2. Change "the encounter deck" to "your deck".
[reaction] When you play Counterespionage, increase its cost by 2: Change "you" to "any investigator".

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 行业专家
text: 行业专家获得等于(除正在检定的技能外)你最低技能值的[wild]图标。
real_text: Savant gains [wild] icons equal to your lowest skill other than the skill being tested.
flavor: 五十分的运气，一百分的实力。

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 金钱万能
text:
快速。在任何地点的调查员发起技能检定时打出。
这次检定不是其标示的技能类型([willpower]、[intellect]、[combat]或[agility])，而是改为资源技能检定。执行这次检定的调查员的基础技能值等于你资源池内资源数量的一半(向下取整)。抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
Fast. Play when an investigator at any location initiates a skill test.
Instead of the skill type indicated for this test ([willpower], [intellect], [combat], or [agility]), this is a resource skill test. The performing investigator's base skill value for this test is equal to half the number of resources in your resource pool (rounded down). Draw 1 card.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 黑市
text:
快速。当调查阶段开始时打出。
依次从任一调查员的牌堆顶部揭示卡牌，直到正好揭示5张卡牌。将这些卡牌放在一边，位于场外。只要这些卡牌放在一边，任何调查员可以将其视为自己的手牌打出。当下次调查阶段开始时，将仍放在一边的这些卡牌混洗入其所有者的牌堆。
real_text:
Fast. Play at the start of the investigation phase.
One at a time, reveal cards from the top of any investigator deck(s) until exactly 5 cards have been revealed. Set those cards aside, out of play. While set aside, any investigator may play any of those cards as if they were in their hand. At the start of the next investigation phase, shuffle each of those cards still set aside into its owner's deck.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 刚毅果敢
text:
快速。场上限制1张[[沉稳]]在场。
你获得+1[willpower]和+1[agility]。
非直接伤害/恐惧在被分配给你的调查员卡之前，必须先分配给刚毅果敢。
[fast]花费1资源：你这次技能检定+1[willpower]或+1[agility]。
real_text:
Fast. Limit 1 [[Composure]] in play.
You get +1 [willpower] and +1 [agility].
Non-direct damage/horror must be assigned to Moxie before it can be assigned to your investigator card.
[fast] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] or +1 [agility] for this skill test.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 黑色扇子
text:
卓越。
只要你有……
- ……10+资源，你获得+1生命和+1神智。
- ……15+资源，在你回合中你可以进行一次额外行动。
- ……20+资源，你的每项技能+1。
real_text:
Exceptional.
While you have...
- ...10+ resources, you get +1 health and +1 sanity.
- ...15+ resources, you may take one additional action during your turn.
- ...20+ resources, you get +1 to each of your skills.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 红色闹钟
text: 卓越。使用(0充能)。 强制 - 在你的回合开始后：你可以取走此处所有充能，作为资源。在此放置1充能。如果其正好有…… - 1充能，下次技能检定你+4技能值。 - 2充能，你可以移动最多3次. - 3充能，这回合你可以进行2个额外行动。
real_text: Exceptional. Uses (0 charges). Forced - After your turn begins: You may take all charges here, as resources. Place 1 charge here. If it has exactly... - 1 charge, you get +4 skill value for your next skill test. - 2 charges, you may move up to 3 times. - 3 charges, you may take 2 additional actions this turn.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 掉进兔子洞
text:
永久。每副牌组限制1张。当牌组构建时购买。
在一个剧本的每场冒险结束后，在下一场冒险之前，你升级的前2张卡牌经验值费用减1。
你购买新卡牌的经验值费用加1。
real_text:
Permanent. Limit 1 per deck. Purchase at deck creation.
After each scenario of a campaign, reduce the experience cost of the first 2 cards you upgrade before the next scenario by 1.
Increase the experience cost for you to purchase new cards by 1.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 闭环
text:
使用(充能数等于你控制卡牌之中不同的职阶数，包含本卡牌)。
[fast]花费1充能并消耗闭环：进行一次基础行动。该行动期间执行的每次技能检定，你可以不使用该行动指定的技能，改为使用你的[willpower]。
real_text:
Uses (1 charge for each class among cards you control, including this one).
[fast] Spend 1 charge and exhaust Close the Circle: Take a basic action. For each skill test performed during that action, you may use your [willpower] instead of the skill indicated for that action.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 力量之风
text:
在你控制的一张支援卡上放置2充能。
[reaction]在你的回合中抽取了力量之风后：将其打出。
real_text:
Place 2 charges on an asset you control.
[reaction] After you draw Winds of Power during your turn: Play it.
flavor: 愿奥雅之息指引吾等。

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 密教理论
text: 只要密教理论在你手中或被投入到技能检定中，其获得等于你[intellect]的[willpower]图标，以及等于你[willpower]的[intellect]图标。
real_text: While Occult Theory is in your hand or committed to a skill test, it gains [willpower] icons equal to your [intellect], and [intellect] icons equal to your [willpower].
flavor: 知识一旦匮乏，信仰便足以。

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 平行命运
text: 查看一位调查员的牌堆或遭遇牌堆顶部6张卡牌。你可以将它们以任何顺序放回该牌堆顶部，或将它们与该牌堆混洗。如果你查看了调查员的牌堆，该调查员可以抽取1张卡牌。
real_text: Look at the top 6 cards of an investigator's deck or the encounter deck. You may either return them to the top of that deck in any order, or shuffle them into that deck. If you looked at an investigator's deck, that investigator may draw 1 card.
flavor: "如果我说，在你濒死之际我才会把你的命运告诉你，你还想知道吗？"

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 治癒真言
text:
使用(4充能)。
[action]花费1充能：治癒你所在地点的调查员总计2点伤害。
real_text:
Uses (4 charges).
[action] Spend 1 charge: Heal 2 damage from among investigators at your location.
flavor: 你不是必须相信密教之言，只是你别无选择。

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 情绪稳定
text:
快速。场上限制1张[[沉稳]]在场。
你在[[法术]]卡牌的技能检定中+1技能值。
非直接伤害/恐惧在被分配给你的调查员卡之前，必须先分配给情绪稳定。
[fast]在[[法术]]卡牌的技能检定中，花费1资源：你这次检定+1技能值。
real_text:
Fast. Limit 1 [[Composure]] in play.
You get +1 skill value during skill tests on [[Spell]] cards.
Non-direct damage/horror must be assigned to Grounded before it can be assigned to your investigator card.
[fast] During a skill test on a [[Spell]] card, spend 1 resource: You get +1 skill value for this test.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 真法魔典
text: 使用(1充能)。当每轮开始时重新补满此充能。 你可以藉由揭示你手牌中的[[法术]]支援卡来结算其能力。将真法魔典视为被揭示的支援卡(支付费用、花费充能、执行效果等)。
real_text: Uses (1 charge). Replenish this charge at the start of each round. You may resolve abilities on [[Spell]] assets in your hand by revealing them from your hand. Treat True Magick as if it were the revealed asset (to pay its costs, spend charges, perfom its effect, etc).
traits: 道具. 遗物. 书籍

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 绷带
text:
使用(3补给)。如果绷带没有补给，则将其丢弃。
[reaction]在你所在地点一位调查员或一张[[盟友]]支援卡受到至少1点伤害后，花费1补给：治癒该卡牌1点伤害。
real_text:
Uses (3 supplies). If Bandages has no supplies, discard it.
[reaction] After an investigator or [[Ally]] asset at your location takes 1 or more damage, spend 1 supply: Heal 1 damage from that card.

pack_name: 闇与地球之界调查员扩充
name: 应急装备
text:
使用(3耐久)。
迭加到你所在地点调查员控制的一张[[道具]]支援卡。
[fast]在被迭加的支援卡的技能检定中，花费1耐久：你这次检定+2技能值。
real_text:
Uses (3 durability).

Forced - After you take a fight or activate action: You cannot take any of those types of actions for the remainder of the turn.
