real_text:
Bonded (Hank Samson).
You cannot be healed. You may be assigned damage/horror dealt to [[Ally]] assets or other investigators at your location.
[reaction] When 1 or more damage is placed on you: Gain 2 resources.
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Move 1 damage from Hank Samson to an asset you control.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 英勇无畏
text:
汉克‧萨姆森牌组专用。
快速。在你与1名非[[精英]]敌人交战时打出。
将汉克‧萨姆森上的最多2点伤害和/或恐惧移动到该敌人上，作为伤害。
real_text:
Hank Samson deck only.
Fast. Play when you engage a non-[[Elite]] enemy.
Move up to 2 damage and/or horror from Hank Samson to that enemy, as damage.
flavor: 每个人都可能成为某人的英雄。

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: "老爸在哪？"
text: 显现 -从遭遇牌堆顶部丢弃卡牌，直到丢弃1名敌人。将"老爸在哪？"迭加到该敌人，并将其生成在一个连接地点(如果可能)。 被迭加的敌人获得避战。 强制 - 当一轮结束时：汉克‧萨姆森受到1点直接恐惧。
real_text: Revelation - Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until an enemy is discarded. Attach "Where's Pa?" to that enemy and spawn it at a connecting location, if able. Attached enemy gains elusive. Forced - At the end of the round: Hank Samson takes 1 direct horror.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 先祖御守
text: [reaction]在你击败一名敌人后，消耗先祖御守：加入等同于该敌人印刷的生命值数量的[bless]标记到混乱袋(最多5)。
real_text: [reaction] After you defeat an enemy, exhaust Ancestral Token: Add [bless] tokens to the chaos bag equal to that enemy's printed health (max 5).
traits: 道具. 守护. 祝福
flavor: 勿忘先人。

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 野狼面具
text:
每位调查员限制1[[面具]]。
使用(2贡品)。在你与1名敌人交战后，补充1贡品。
[fast]花费1贡品：你这次技能检定中+2[combat]或+2[agility]。(每次检定限制一次。)
real_text:
Limit 1 [[Mask]] per investigator.
Uses (2 offerings). Replenish 1 of these offerings after you engage an enemy.
[fast] Spend 1 offering: You get +2 [combat] or +2 [agility] for this skill test. (Limit once per test.)
traits: 道具. 守护. 面具

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 赦免
text:
从混乱袋随机抽出3个标记，以及X个额外标记。
每抽出一个非符号标记，就加入1个[bless]标记到混乱袋。每抽出1个[bless]标记，治癒你所在地点一位调查员或一张[[盟友]]支援卡的1点恐惧。
real_text:
Reveal 3 random tokens from the chaos bag, along with X additional tokens.
For each non-symbol token revealed, add 1 [bless] token to the chaos bag. For each [bless] token revealed, heal 1 horror from an investigator or [[Ally]] asset at your location.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 信仰引导
text: 调查。这次调查你可以不使用[intellect]，改为使用[willpower]。在这次检定抽出混乱标记前，加入2个[bless]标记到混乱袋。如果这次技能检定期间抽出[bless]或[elder_sign]标记，发现你所在地点的额外1个线索。
real_text: Investigate. You may use [willpower] instead of [intellect] for this investigation. Before revealing chaos tokens for this test, add 2 [bless] tokens to the chaos bag. If a [bless] or [elder_sign] token is revealed during this skill test, discover 1 additional clue at your location.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 别动
text: 谈判。选择你所在地点的1名敌人与你手牌中的1张[[道具]]支援卡。对所选敌人执行一次攻击行动。如果你成功，不造成伤害，改为打出所选支援卡，你每成功且超过难度一点，减少其一点费用。
real_text: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location and an [[Item]] asset in your hand. Perform a fight action against the chosen enemy. If you succeed, instead of dealing damage, play the chosen asset, reducing its cost by each point you succeeded by.
flavor: "把、把手举起来！"

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 净化
text:
每次技能检定最多投入1张。
你可以在任何类型的检定中投入净化。
如果这次检定成功，你每超过难度1点(最多5点)，加入1个[bless]标记到混乱袋，或从混乱袋移除1个[curse]标记。
real_text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
You may commit Purified to any type of test.
If this test is successful, for each point you succeeded by (to a maximum of 5), add 1 [bless] token or remove 1 [curse] token from the chaos bag.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 强健双臂
text: 使用[[近战]]或[[远程]]支援卡的攻击中投入强健双臂的时候，这次攻击造成+1伤害。这次技能检定抽出混乱标记后，你可以受到1点伤害来取消该一个混乱标记，将其放回混乱袋，并抽出一个新的标记。(你可以执行任意次。)
real_text: While Strong-Armed is committed to an attack using a [[Melee]] or [[Ranged]] asset, this attack deals +1 damage. After revealing chaos token(s) for this skill test, you may take 1 damage to cancel that chaos token, return it to the chaos bag, and reveal a new one. (You may do this any number of times.)

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 老鼠面具
text:
每位调查员限制1[[面具]]。
使用(2贡品)。在你翻开一个地点或将一个新地点放置入场后，补充1贡品。
[fast]花费1贡品：这次技能检定中你+2[willpower]或+2[intellect]。(每次检定限制一次。)
real_text:
Limit 1 [[Mask]] per investigator.
Uses (2 offerings). Replenish 1 of these offerings after you reveal a location or put a new location into play.
[fast] Spend 1 offering: You get +2 [willpower] or +2 [intellect] for this skill test. (Limit once per test.)
traits: 道具. 守护. 面具

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: "用书扔牠们！"
text: 攻击。选择你控制的一张[[书籍]]支援卡。这次攻击中你+X[combat]，其中X为该支援卡的印刷费用。如果你成功，你可以自动躲避被攻击的敌人，或在本攻击结束后，你可以结算所选支援卡上的一个[action]或[fast]能力(忽略其[action]费用，如果有的话)。
real_text: Fight. Choose a [[Tome]] asset you control. You get +X [combat] for this attack, where X is that asset's printed cost. If you succeed, you may either automatically evade the attacked enemy, or after the attack ends, you may resolve an [action] or [fast] ability on the chosen asset (ignoring its [action] cost, if any).
flavor: "孩子你……你比我意料中的懂得更多。"

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 剧烈突变
text: 躲避。这次躲避你可以不使用[agility]，改为使用[intellect]。如果你成功且该敌人非[[精英]]，迭加剧烈突变到该敌人。 被迭加的敌人获得："庞大。不能移动。 [reaction]在你躲避该敌人后：发现其所在地点的1个线索。(每轮限制一次。)"
real_text: Evade. You may use [intellect] instead of [agility] for this evasion attempt. If you succeed and the enemy is non-[[Elite]], attach Transmogrify to it. Attached enemy gains: "Massive. Cannot move. [reaction] After you evade this enemy: Discover 1 clue at its location. (Limit once per round.)"
flavor: "我说的是'炸了牠'，不是'<u>变大</u>牠'"

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 精准调校
text:
迭加到你控制的[[工具]]或[[科学]]支援卡。每张支援卡限制1张。
[reaction]在被迭加的支援卡消耗后，消耗精准调校：准备被迭加的支援卡。
real_text:
Attach to a [[Tool]] or [[Science]] asset you control. Limit 1 per asset.
[reaction] After attached asset exhausts, exhaust Fine Tuning: Ready attached asset.
flavor: "我跟你保证没什么好怕的！"

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 棱角透镜
text: [action]加入1个[curse]标记到混乱袋：调查。这次调查中你+2技能值。如果这次调查期间抽出了[curse]标记，你可以消耗棱角透镜来发现你所在地点的额外1个线索。
real_text: [action] Add 1 [curse] token to the chaos bag: Investigate. You get +2 skill value for this investigation. If a [curse] token is revealed during this investigation, you may exhaust Prismatic Spectacles to discover 1 additional clue at your location.
traits: 道具. 遗物. 诅咒萦绕

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 混淆视听
text: 谈判。选择你所在地点的1名敌人。检定[intellect](X)，其中X为所选敌人的躲避值。如果你成功，发现你所在地点的2个线索。然后，如果所选敌人非[[精英]]，自动躲避该敌人。该敌人在下个补给阶段期间不准备。
real_text: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location. Test [intellect] (X), where X is the chosen enemy's evade value. If you succeed, discover 2 clues at your location. Then, if the chosen enemy is non-[[Elite]], automatically evade it. It does not ready during the next upkeep phase.
flavor: "赫伯特，这招从来没成功过。"

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 假证件
text: [action]选择你所在地点的一名敌人并消耗假证件：谈判。检定[intellect](1)。假证件上每有一可疑，这次检定难度+1。如果你成功，发现你所在地点的1个线索并放置1资源到假证件上，作为可疑。如果你失败，你必须丢弃假证件，或所选敌人攻击你。
real_text: [action] Choose an enemy at your location and exhaust Fake Credentials: Parley. Test [intellect] (1). This test gets +1 difficulty for each suspicion on Fake Credentials. If you succeed, discover 1 clue at your location and place 1 resource on Fake Credentials, as suspicion. If you fail, you must either discard Fake Credentials, or the chosen enemy attacks you.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 象牙护符
text: [action]加入1─3个[curse]标记到混乱袋并消耗象牙护符：获得1资源。每加入一个标记，获得额外1资源。
real_text: [action] Add 1-3 [curse] tokens to the chaos bag and exhaust Scrimshaw Charm: Gain 1 resource. For each token added, gain 1 additional resource.
traits: 道具. 守护. 诅咒萦绕
flavor: "让信念蒙蔽真相；让幻想取代记忆；我向内心深深推进，坚定笃信。" - 赫尔曼‧梅尔维尔，<u>《白鲸记》</u>

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 红颜祸水
text: 谈判。选择你所在地点的一名敌人并检定任意技能(3)。如果你成功，并且你检定了…… - ……[willpower]，从该敌人上移除1个毁灭标记。 - ……[intellect]，发现你所在地点的1个线索。 - ……[agility]，自动躲避该敌人。如果该敌人非[[精英]]，将其移动到连接地点。 - ……[combat]，对该敌人造成2点伤害。
real_text: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location and test any skill (3). If you succeed and you tested... - ...[willpower], remove 1 doom from that enemy. - ...[intellect], discover 1 clue at your location. - ...[agility], automatically evade that enemy. If it is non-[[Elite]], move it to a connecting location. - ...[combat], deal 2 damage to that enemy.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 告密者
text:
快速。在你进行谈判并且技能检定成功后打出。
发现你所在地点和连接地点的总计2个线索。
real_text:
Fast. Play after you succeed at a skill test while parleying.
Discover 2 total clues from among your location and connecting locations.
flavor: "我不应该告诉你的，不过你看起来可以信任……"

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 红颜祸水
text: 谈判。选择你所在地点的一名敌人与任意数量的技能。以任意顺序依次检定所选的技能(2)。如果你检定成功并且检定了…… - ……[willpower]，从该敌人上移除1个毁灭标记。 - ……[intellect]，发现该敌人所在地点的1个线索。 - ……[agility]，自动躲避该敌人。如果该敌人非[[精英]]，将其移动到连接地点。 - ……[combat]，对该敌人造成2点伤害。
real_text: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location and any number of skills. One at a time, in any order, test each chosen skill (2). For each test you succeeded, if it was... - ...[willpower], remove 1 doom from that enemy. - ...[intellect], discover 1 clue at that enemy's location. - ...[agility], automatically evade that enemy. Move it to a connecting location if it is non-[[Elite]]. - ...[combat], deal 2 damage to that enemy.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 挑拨离间
text: 谈判。选择你所在地点的一名敌人并检定[intellect](X)，其中X为所选敌人的伤害/恐惧值总和。如果你成功，对你所在地点的每名敌人造成X点伤害。在此效果结算后，你可以与每名敌人解除交战，并移动到连接地点。
real_text: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location and test [intellect] (X), where X is the chosen enemy's combined damage/horror values. If you succeed, deal X damage to each enemy at your location. After this effect resolves, you may disengage from each enemy and move to a connecting location.
flavor: "…并且他还说你是个蠢货！"

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 灵猫面具
text:
每位调查员限制1[[面具]]。
使用(2贡品)。在毁灭标记被放置到没有毁灭标记的卡牌上后，补充2贡品。
[fast]花费1贡品：这次技能检定中你+2[willpower]或+2[combat]。(每次检定限制一次。)
real_text:
Limit 1 [[Mask]] per investigator.
Uses (2 offerings). Replenish 2 of these offerings after doom is placed on a card with no doom.
[fast] Spend 1 offering: You get +2 [willpower] or +2 [combat] for this skill test. (Limit once per test.)
traits: 道具. 守护. 面具

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 抽取精质
text: 谈判。选择你所在地点的一名敌人并检定[willpower](X)，其中X为所选敌人的攻击值。如果你成功，将你调查员上的1点伤害移动到所选敌人上(如果所选敌人非[[精英]]，改为最多2点伤害)。
real_text: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location and test [willpower] (X), where X is the chosen enemy's fight value. If you succeed, move 1 damage from your investigator to the chosen enemy (up to 2 damage instead if the chosen enemy is non-[[Elite]]).
flavor: 你的一切现在归我所有。

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 所罗门之钥
text:
[fast]如果混乱袋中的[bless]标记数量多于[curse]标记，从混乱袋移除1个[bless]标记并消耗所罗门之钥：治癒你所在地点一位调查员或一张[[盟友]]支援卡的最多2点伤害和/或恐惧。
[fast]如果混乱袋中的[curse]标记数量多于[bless]标记，从混乱袋移除1个[curse]标记并消耗所罗门之钥：获得2个资源。
real_text:
[fast] If there are more [bless] than [curse] tokens in the chaos bag, remove 1 [bless] token from the chaos bag and exhaust The Key of Solomon: Heal up to 2 damage and/or horror from an investigator or [[Ally]] asset at your location.
[fast] If there are more [curse] than [bless] tokens in the chaos bag, remove 1 [curse] token from the chaos bag and exhaust The Key of Solomon: Gain 2 resources.
traits: 道具. 书籍. 祝福. 诅咒萦绕

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 火柴盒
text:
使用(3补给)。如果火柴盒没有补给，将其丢弃。
[fast]在任何调查员的回合期间，消耗火柴盒并花费1补给：直到本回合结束前你所在地点-1隐藏值。
real_text:
Uses (3 supplies). If Matchbox has no supplies, discard it.
[fast] During any investigator's turn, exhaust Matchbox and spend 1 supply: Your location gets -1 shroud until the end of this turn.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 毛皮生意
text:
只要毛皮生意在你的手牌中，你的手牌上限减少3。
[reaction]在游戏结束或你撤退时，如果毛皮生意在你的手牌中：你在下场冒险前购买下一张新卡牌的经验值费用减1。
real_text:
While Pelt Shipment is in your hand, your maximum hand size is reduced by 3.
[reaction] When the game ends or you resign, if Pelt Shipment is in your hand: Reduce the experience cost of the next new card you purchase before the next scenario by 1.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 手斧
text: [action]：攻击。将你的[agility]加入你这次攻击的技能值。这次攻击造成+1伤害。如果这次攻击击败敌人，丢弃手斧。否则，失去对手斧的控制，并将其迭加到被攻击的敌人。被迭加的敌人获得： "[reaction]在被迭加的敌人被击败时：控制手斧。位于手斧所在地点的任何调查员均可触发此能力。"
real_text: [action]: Fight. Add your [agility] to your skill value for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage. If this attack defeats an enemy, discard Hatchet. Otherwise, lose control of Hatchet and attach it to the attacked enemy. Attached enemy gains: "[reaction] When attached enemy is defeated: Take control of Hatchet. Any investigator at Hatchet's location may trigger this ability."
traits: 道具. 工具. 武器. 远程

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 毅力
text: 你可以从你的弃牌堆将毅力投入到技能检定。如果你这么做，在这次检定结束后将其混洗入你的牌堆。
real_text: You may commit Persistence to a skill test from your discard pile. If you do, shuffle it into your deck after this test ends.
flavor: "任何人都可能沉迷其中并失去理智，除了专心致志的农夫……"—H.P.洛夫克拉夫特，<u>《星之彩》</u>

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 生存技巧
text:
[fast]选择一张迭加到你所在地点的，且你拥有的卡牌，并消耗生存技巧：将该卡牌加入你的手牌。
[fast]在地点上或迭加到你所在地点的诡计上的技能检定期间，消耗生存技巧：这次检定中你+2技能值。
real_text:
[fast] Choose a card you own that is attached to your location and exhaust Survival Technique: Add that card to your hand.
[fast] During a skill test on a location or on a treachery attached to your location, exhaust Survival Technique: You get +2 skill value for this test.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 神佑
text: 如果这次技能检定成功，你每有1点伤害或恐惧(取其中较低的数值)，加入1个[bless]标记到混乱袋。
real_text: If this skill test is successful, add 1 [bless] token to the chaos bag for each damage or horror on you (whichever is less).
flavor: 面对潜伏的恐惧，勇气是你最好的防御。

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 宗教信物
text: [reaction]在抽出至少1个[curse]或[auto_fail]标记的技能检定结束后，消耗宗教信物：加入同等数量的[bless]标记混乱袋。如果这次技能检定失败，在结算该失败检定的所有效果后，执行的调查员可以再次尝试该检定。(每次检定最多一次。)
real_text: [reaction] After a skill test ends in which 1 or more [curse] or [auto_fail] tokens were revealed, exhaust Token of Faith: Add that many [bless] tokens to the chaos bag. If this skill test failed, after resolving all effects from the failed test, the performing investigator may attempt that test again. (Max once per test.)
traits: 道具. 守护. 祝福

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 衣着华丽
text: 在谈判行动期间投入衣着华丽到技能检定的时候，其获得[wild][wild][wild]。
real_text: While Well-Dressed is committed to a skill test during a parley action, it gains [wild] [wild] [wild].
flavor: 人要衣装。

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 银蛾
text: 显现 - 你必须将银蛾放置入你的威胁区域，或受到1点恐惧并将其混洗入你的牌堆。除非通过以下[action][action]能力，否则其不能离场。 你获得-1神智值。 [action][action]：丢弃银蛾。
real_text: Revelation - You must either put The Silver Moth into play in your threat area, or take 1 horror and shuffle it into your deck. It cannot leave play except by the [action] [action] ability below. You get -1 sanity. [action] [action]: Discard The Silver Moth.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 狐狸面具
text:
每位调查员限制1[[面具]]。
使用(2贡品)。在你移动离开有敌人的地点后，补充1贡品。
[fast]花费1贡品：这次技能检定中你+2[intellect]或+2[agility]。(每次检定限制一次。)
real_text:
Limit 1 [[Mask]] per investigator.
Uses (2 offerings). Replenish 1 of these offerings after you move out of a location with an enemy.
[fast] Spend 1 offering: You get +2 [intellect] or +2 [agility] for this skill test. (Limit once per test.)
traits: 道具. 守护. 面具

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 清理工具
text:
使用(3补给)。
清理工具上的补给可以如同你控制的支援卡上的补给或子弹来被花费。
real_text:
Uses (3 supplies).
Supplies on Cleaning Kit may be spent as if they were supplies or ammo on assets you control.
flavor:
"清洁！修理！夹起！拔除！擦亮！扫刷！一次满足！"
-沙夫纳的目录，1924冬季号。

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 武士刀
text: [action]：攻击。这次检定中你+2[combat]。如果你成功且超过难度正好2点，你可以消耗武士刀来使这次攻击造成+2伤害。 [fast]消耗武士刀：攻击。这次攻击不使用[combat]，改为使用[agility]。
real_text: [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this test. If you succeed by exactly 2, you may exhaust Katana to deal +2 damage for this attack. [fast]Exhaust Katana: Fight. Use [agility] instead of [combat] for this attack.
traits: 道具. 武器. 近战

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 作业部队
text:
作为打出作业部队的额外费用，花费一个行动。一次一个，以任意顺序，选择你所在地点的一位调查员……
- ……结算他控制的支援卡上的一个[action]能力，无需支付其[action]费用。
- ……移动到一个连接地点。
- ……发现他所在地点的1个线索。
real_text:
As an additional cost to play Task Force, spend an action. One at a time, in any order, choose an investigator at your location to...
- ...resolve an [action] ability on an asset they control without paying its [action] cost.
- ...move to a connecting location.
- ...discover 1 clue at their location.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 恢復元气
text:
只能作为你的第一个行动打出。
治癒2点伤害(如果你本轮抽取了诡计卡，改为治癒3点伤害)。抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
Play only as your first action.
Heal 2 damage (3 damage instead if you drew a treachery this round). Draw 1 card.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 清理工具
text:
使用(4补给)。
清理工具上的补给可以如同你控制的支援卡上的补给或子弹来被花费。
[reaction]在从清理工具花费补给时，将其消耗：执行检定的调查员这次检定中+2技能值。
real_text:
Uses (4 supplies).
Supplies on Cleaning Kit may be spent as if they were supplies or ammo on assets you control.
[reaction] When a supply is spent from Cleaning Kit, exhaust it: The performing investigator gets +2 skill value for this test.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 蒙福之刃
text: [action]：攻击。这次攻击中你+2[combat]。如果这次攻击成功，其造成+1伤害。将这次攻击期间抽出的每个[bless]标记放回混乱袋。在这次攻击抽出混乱标记前，你可以消耗蒙福之刃来加入2个[bless]标记混乱袋。
real_text: [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. If this attack is successful, it deals +1 damage. Return each [bless] token revealed during this attack to the chaos bag. Before revealing chaos token(s) for this attack, you may exhaust Blessed Blade to add 2 [bless] tokens to the chaos bag.
traits: 道具. 武器. 近战. 祝福

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 瓦卢西亚之眼
text: [action]：谈判。选择你所在地点的1名敌人。直到本轮结束，每位调查员对所选敌人攻击、躲避或谈判的时候+1技能值。放置1个资源在瓦卢西亚之眼上，作为充能。 [fast]：在你的绑定卡牌中查找幽嘶之刃，并将其与瓦卢西亚之眼交换, 将瓦卢西亚之眼上的所有充能移动到幽嘶之刃。
real_text: [action]: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location. Until the end of the round, each investigator gets +1 skill value while fighting, evading, or parleying with the chosen enemy. Place 1 resource on Eyes of Valusia, as a charge. [fast]: Search your bonded cards for Blade of Yoth and swap it with Eyes of Valusia, moving all charges from Eyes of Valusia to Blade of Yoth.
traits: 道具. 遗物. 法术

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 幽嘶之刃
text: 绑定(瓦卢西亚之眼)。 [action]花费1-3充能：攻击。这次攻击你可以不使用[combat]，改为使用[willpower]。作为这次行动的花费的一部分，每花费1充能，你+2技能值并造成+1伤害。 [fast]：在你的绑定卡牌中查找瓦卢西亚之眼，并将其与幽嘶之刃交换，丢弃所有充能。
real_text: Bonded (Eyes of Valusia). [action] Spend 1-3 charges: Fight. For this attack, you may use [willpower] instead of [combat]. You get +2 skill value and deal +1 damage for each charge spent as part of this action's cost. [fast]: Search your bonded cards for Eyes of Valusia and swap it with Blade of Yoth, discarding all charges.
traits: 道具. 遗物. 武器. 近战

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 疾风连击
text: 只能在你有控制[[近战]]支援卡时才可打出。作为打出疾风连击的额外费用，花费一个行动。 攻击。选择你控制的一张[[近战]]支援卡并立即使用该支援卡进行一次攻击行动(无需支付其[action]费用)。你可以重复此效果最多三次。在最后一次攻击结算后，如果这是你的回合，结束你的回合。
real_text: Play only if you control a [[Melee]] asset. As an additional cost to play Flurry of Blows, spend an action. Fight. Choose a [[Melee]] asset you control and take an immediate fight action with that asset (without paying its [action] cost). You may repeat this effect up to three times. After the final attack resolves, if it is your turn, end your turn.
traits: 策略. 双倍. 定命

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 奇蹟之愿
text:
快速。在你所在地点的技能检定期间抽出1个以上的[bless]后打出。
在你的绑定卡牌中查找转瞬昇华，并将其放置入场。在其上放置最多X个资源，作为愿望(最多为抽出的[bless]标记数量)。将奇蹟之愿从游戏中移除。
real_text:
Fast. Play after 1 or more [bless] tokens are revealed during a skill test at your location.
Search your bonded cards for Evanescent Ascension and put it into play. Place up to X resources on it, as wishes (to a maximum of the number of [bless] tokens revealed). Remove Miracle Wish from the game.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 转瞬昇华
text: 绑定(奇蹟之愿)。如果转瞬昇华没有愿望，将其放在一边，位于场外。 [reaction]在你所在地点的调查员技能检定将要失败时，花费1愿望并消耗转瞬昇华：结算该调查员的[elder_sign]效果(加上这次检定期间抽出的所有其它标记)。
real_text: Bonded (Miracle Wish). If Evanescent Ascension has no wishes, set it aside, out of play. [reaction] When an investigator at your location would fail a skill test, spend 1 wish and exhaust Evanescent Ascension: Resolve that investigator's [elder_sign] effect (in addition to all other tokens revealed during this test).
traits: 仪式. 契约. 祝福

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 控制变因
text:
快速。你所在地点的调查员在技能检定期间抽出[curse]标记后打出。
发现你所在地点的1个线索。
real_text:
Fast. Play after an investigator reveals a [curse] token during a skill test at your location.
Discover 1 clue at your location.
traits: 洞察. 科学. 诅咒萦绕
flavor: "他将一种溶液注射进死物的血脉里，如果它们死亡时间不长，就会产生奇特的反应。" —H.P.洛夫克拉夫特，《赫伯特‧韦斯特—幽灵人种》

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 快速运算
text: 作为打出快速运算的额外费用，花费一个行动。 调查。依隐藏值由低到高依序调查你所在地点与每个连接地点各一次，直到你调查失败，或成功调查每个符合条件的地点。
real_text: As an additional cost to play Testing Sprint, spend an action. Investigate. One at a time, investigate your location and each connecting location once each in ascending order of shroud, until you either fail to investigate or successfully investigate each eligible location.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 研究透彻
text: 作为打出研究透彻的额外费用，花费一个行动。 你所在地点的调查员抽取总计5张卡牌(由你决定每位调查员各抽取几张卡牌)。
real_text: As an additional cost to play Thorough Inquiry, spend an action. Investigators at your location draw a combined total of 5 cards (you decide how many cards each investigator draws).
flavor: 真相往往近在眼前。

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 盖布瑞欧‧凯瑞罗
text:
你获得+1[intellect]。
[reaction]当你的回合开始时，加入1个[curse]标记到混乱袋：抽取1张卡牌。
real_text:
You get +1 [intellect].
[reaction] At the start of your turn, add 1 [curse] token to the chaos bag: Draw 1 card.
traits: 盟友. 学者. 诅咒萦绕
flavor: "帮你忙比教会我的学生几何学简单多了。"

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 沉稳双手
text:
每位调查员限制1张。
[reaction]在你技能检定将要成功时，消耗沉稳双手：你成功且超过难度的点数增加1点或减少1点。如果你成功且超过难度正好2点，治癒1点恐惧。
real_text:
Limit 1 per investigator.
[reaction] When you would succeed at a skill test, exhaust Steady-Handed: You either succeed by 1 more or 1 less. If you succeeded by exactly 2, heal 1 horror.
flavor: 即使是最细微的颤抖都可能是决定生死的关键。

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 奇诡手法
text: 在这次技能检定结束后，执行检定的调查员每成功且超过难度1点，或每失败且低于难度1点，就加入1个[curse]标记到混乱袋。
real_text: After this skill test ends, add 1 [curse] token to the chaos bag for each point the performing investigator either succeeded or failed by.
flavor: 有传言说大学里最后一位颅像学教授拥有长的不自然的任期。

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 显微镜
text: [reaction]在你所在地点的敌人被成功躲避或被击败后：放置1资源在显微镜上，作为证据。 [action][action]：调查。显微镜上每有一证据，这次调查中你+2[intellect](最多+6[intellect])。如果你成功，你可以花费最多3证据来发现你所在地点等同该花费量的额外线索。
real_text: [reaction] After an enemy at your location is successfully evaded or defeated: Place 1 resource on Microscope, as evidence. [action] [action]: Investigate. You get +2 [intellect] for this investigation for each evidence on Microscope (max +6 [intellect]). If you succeed, you may spend up to 3 evidence to discover that many additional clues at your location.
traits: 道具. 工具. 科学

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 暴食菌株
text:
研究完成。每副牌组限制1张。
[fast]：在你的绑定卡牌中查找诡异生长，并将其加入你的手牌。(每轮限制一次。)
[reaction]在调查员抽取一张非弱点诡计卡时，如果其所在地点的隐藏值等于或低于暴食菌株上的生长数量：取消该诡计卡的效果并将其丢弃。移除暴食菌株上的全部生长。
real_text:
Researched. Limit 1 per deck.
[fast]: Search your bonded cards for Uncanny Growth and add it to your hand. (Limit once per round.)
[reaction] When an investigator draws a non-weakness treachery card, if their locations shroud is equal to or less than Ravenous Myconid's growth: Cancel that treachery's effects and discard it. Remove all growth from Ravenous Myconid.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 暴食菌株
text:
研究完成。每副牌组限制1张。
[fast]：在你的绑定卡牌中查找诡异生长，并将其加入你的手牌。(每轮限制一次。)
[fast]选择你所在地点一名剩余生命值等于或低于暴食菌株上的生长数量的非[[精英]]敌人：击败该敌人。移除暴食菌株上的全部生长。
real_text:
Researched. Limit 1 per deck.
[fast]: Search your bonded cards for Uncanny Growth and add it to your hand. (Limit once per round.)
[fast] Choose a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location with equal or fewer remaining health than the amount of growth on Ravenous Myconid: Defeat that enemy. Remove all growth from Ravenous Myconid.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 暴食菌株
text:
研究完成。每副牌组限制1张。
[fast]：在你的绑定卡牌中查找诡异生长，并将其加入你的手牌。(每轮限制一次。)
[fast]移除暴食菌株上的全部生长：治癒暴食菌株等量的伤害/恐惧，或将你所在地点的调查员或[[盟友]]支援卡上等量的伤害/恐惧移动到暴食菌株上。
real_text:
Researched. Limit 1 per deck.
[fast]: Search your bonded cards for Uncanny Growth and add it to your hand. (Limit once per round.)
[fast] Remove all growth from Ravenous Myconid: Either heal that much damage/horror from Ravenous Myconid, or move that much damage/horror from investigators or [[Ally]] assets at your location to Ravenous Myconid.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: "野猫"碧安卡
text: 每副牌组限制1张。使用(10资源)。 [action]消耗"野猫"碧安卡：谈判。将"野猫"碧安卡上的X个资源移动到你的资源池，X不能大于5。检定[agility](X)。如果你失败，记住"你欠碧安卡X资源"。然后，在你的绑定卡牌中查找"野猫"碧安卡敌人，并将她生成到你所在地点。将本卡牌从游戏中移除。
real_text: Limit 1 per deck. Uses (10 resources). [action] Exhaust Bianca "Die Katz": Parley. Move X resources from Bianca "Die Katz" to your resource pool. X cannot be more than 5. Test [agility] (X). If you fail, remember "you owe Bianca X resources." Then, search your bonded cards for the Bianca "Die Katz" enemy and spawn her at your location. Remove this card from the game.
traits: 盟友. 罪犯. 社会名流

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: "野猫"碧安卡
text: 绑定("野猫"碧安卡)。猎手。 猎物 - 仅对承受者。 [action]如果"你欠碧安卡X资源"，花费X资源：谈判。将"野猫"碧安卡加入胜利牌区。 强制 - 在"野猫"碧安卡离场时(除了藉由以上能力以外)：将她混洗入你的牌组。
real_text: Bonded (Bianca "Die Katz"). Hunter. Prey - Bearer only. [action] If "you owe Bianca X resources," spend X resources: Parley. Add Bianca "Die Katz" to the victory display. Forced - When Bianca "Die Katz" leaves play (except by the above ability): Shuffle her into your deck.
traits: 类人. 罪犯. 社会名流

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 不列颠斗牛犬
text: 使用(3子弹)。 [action]花费1子弹：攻击。这次攻击你可以不使用[combat]，改为使用[agility]。这次攻击造成+1伤害。 [reaction]在你与敌人谈判并且技能检定失败后：将不列颠斗牛犬从你的手牌中放置入场。
real_text: Uses (3 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You may use [agility] instead of [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage. [reaction] After you fail a skill test while parleying with an enemy: Put British Bull Dog into play from your hand.
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械. 违法

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 银行劫案
text:
作为打出银行劫案额外费用，花费一个行动。
你所在地点的调查员获得总计8资源，由你自行分配
real_text:
As an additional cost to play Bank Job, spend an action.
Investigators at your location gain a total of 8 resources, distributed as you wish.
traits: 局势. 双倍. 违法
flavor:
"别喊名字，倒霉蛋。"
"抱歉，芬恩。"

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 挑拨离间
text: 谈判。选择你所在地点的一名敌人并检定[intellect](X)，其中X为所选敌人的伤害和恐惧值总和。如果你成功，对你所在地点的每名敌人各造成2点伤害。如果你成功且超过难度至少2点，在此效果结算后，你可以与每名敌人解除交战，并移动到连接地点。
real_text: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location and test [intellect] (X), where X is the chosen enemy's combined damage and horror values. If you succeed, deal 2 damage to each enemy at your location. If you succeed by 2 or more, after this effect resolves you may disengage from each enemy and move to a connecting location.
flavor: "他讲了你头髮的坏话…"

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 极糟的运气
text: 在你执行的技能检定期间抽出[curse]标记时，你可以从你的手牌中投入极糟的运气到该技能检定。如果你这么做，极糟的运气获得[wild][wild][wild]。
real_text: When you reveal a [curse] token during a skill test you are performing, you may commit Diabolical Luck to that skill test from your hand. If you do, Diabolical Luck gains [wild][wild][wild].
flavor: "修格斯，为什么每次都是修格斯？"

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 身轻如燕
text: 如果躲避期间这次技能检定成功，你可以自动躲避你所在地点的另一名敌人。
real_text: If this skill test is successful during an evasion attempt, you may automatically evade another enemy at your location.
flavor: "我从没见过那种恶魔，也从来没跑得像今晚这么快过。希望我不会再遇到这种事。" -—丽塔‧杨，《诡镇奇谈》调查员

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 不列颠斗牛犬
text: 使用(3子弹)。 [action]花费1子弹：攻击。这次攻击你可以不使用[combat]，改为使用[agility]，并且你+2技能值。这次攻击造成+1伤害。这次攻击忽略冷漠关键词。 [reaction]在你与敌人谈判并且技能检定失败后：将不列颠斗牛犬从你的手牌中放置入场。
real_text: Uses (3 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You may use [agility] instead of [combat] for this attack and you get +2 skill value. This attack deals +1 damage. Ignore the aloof keyword for this attack. [reaction] After you fail a skill test while parleying with an enemy: Put British Bull Dog into play from your hand.
traits: 道具. 武器. 枪械. 违法

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 妖艷迷人
text:
永久。卓越。
[reaction] 在你抽取你的起始手牌前：在你的牌堆中查找最多3张不同的[[Trick]]卡牌，并将其面朝下迭加到妖艷迷人。混洗你的牌堆。
[reaction]在你与敌人交战时，消耗妖艷迷人：抽取1张迭加的卡牌，或在你的牌堆顶部9张卡牌中查找并抽取一张与迭加的卡牌同名的卡牌，并混洗你的牌堆。
real_text:
Permanent. Exceptional.
[reaction] Before you draw your opening hand: Search your deck for up to 3 different [[Trick]] cards, and attach them facedown to Bewitching. Shuffle your deck.
[reaction] When you engage an enemy, exhaust Bewitching: Either draw 1 attached card, or search the top 9 cards of your deck for a copy of an attached card, draw it, and shuffle your deck.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 龌龊生意
text: 作为打出龌龊生意的额外费用，花费一个行动。 在你的牌堆中查找一张[[违法]]支援卡，并支付其费用将其打出。然后，你可以结算该支援卡上的一个[action]或[fast]能力，忽略所有费用(包含其[action]费用，如果有的话)。打出这张卡牌不会引起趁乱攻击。
real_text: As an additional cost to play Dirty Deeds, spend an action. Search your deck for an [[Illicit]] asset and play it, paying its cost. Then, you may resolve an [action] or [fast] ability on that asset, ignoring all costs (including its [action] cost, if any). Playing this card does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
traits: 恩惠. 双倍. 违法

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 假证件
text: [action]选择你所在地点的一名敌人：谈判。检定[intellect](0)。假证件上每有一可疑，这次检定难度+1。如果你成功，发现你所在地点或连接地点的1个线索。如果你没有成功且超过难度至少2点，放置1资源到假证件上，作为可疑。如果你失败，将假证件返回你的手牌。
real_text: [action] Choose an enemy at your location: Parley. Test [intellect](0). This test gets +1 difficulty for each suspicion on Fake Credentials. If you succeed, discover 1 clue at your location or a connecting location. If you did not succeed by 2 or more, place 1 resource on Fake Credentials, as suspicion. If you fail, return Fake Credentials to your hand.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 卡纳玛戈斯的权杖
text:
每副牌组限制1张。
[fast]选择任意地点的一名非[[精英]]敌人并消耗卡纳玛戈斯的权杖：从混乱袋随机抽出5个混乱标记。如果抽出[curse]标记，在你的绑定卡牌中查找随机1张[[Rot]]事件，并将其迭加到该敌人。
real_text:
Limit 1 per deck.
[fast] Choose a non-[[Elite]] enemy at any location and exhaust Rod of Carnamagos: Reveal 5 random chaos tokens from the chaos bag. If a [curse] token is revealed, search your bonded cards for a random [[Rot]] event and attach it to that enemy.
traits: 道具. 遗物. 密教. 诅咒萦绕

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 深渊腐蚀
text: 绑定(卡纳玛戈斯的权杖) 被迭加的敌人不能攻击。 强制 - 在被迭加的敌人离场时：将深渊腐蚀放在一边，位于场外。
real_text: Bonded (Rod of Carnamagos). Attached enemy cannot attack. Forced - When attached enemy leaves play: Set Abyssal Rot aside, out of play.
traits: 法术. 腐烂. 诅咒萦绕

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 珀色腐蚀
text: 绑定(卡纳玛戈斯的权杖) 强制 - 在被迭加的敌人被击败时：获得等同于其印刷生命值数量的资源(最多5)。 强制 - 在被迭加的敌人离场时：将珀色腐蚀放在一边，位于场外。
real_text: Bonded (Rod of Carnamagos). Forced - When attached enemy is defeated: Gain resources equal to its printed health (to a maximum of 5). Forced - When attached enemy leaves play: Set Aember Rot aside, out of play.
traits: 法术. 腐烂. 诅咒萦绕

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 虚弱腐蚀
text: 绑定(卡纳玛戈斯的权杖) 被迭加的敌人-1攻击和-1躲避。 强制 - 在被迭加的敌人离场时：将虚弱腐蚀放在一边，位于场外。
real_text: Bonded (Rod of Carnamagos). Attached enemy gets -1 fight and -1 evade. Forced - When attached enemy leaves play: Set Putrescent Rot aside, out of play.
traits: 法术. 腐烂. 诅咒萦绕

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 猩红腐蚀
text: 绑定(卡纳玛戈斯的权杖) 强制 - 当本轮结束时：被迭加的敌人受到1点伤害。 强制 - 在被迭加的敌人离场时：将猩红腐蚀放在一边，位于场外。
real_text: Bonded (Rod of Carnamagos). Forced - At the end of the round: Attached enemy takes 1 damage. Forced - When attached enemy leaves play: Set Scarlet Rot aside, out of play.
traits: 法术. 腐烂. 诅咒萦绕

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 邪绿腐蚀
text: 绑定(卡纳玛戈斯的权杖) 被迭加的敌人不能移动。 强制 - 在被迭加的敌人离场时：将邪绿腐蚀放在一边，位于场外。
real_text: Bonded (Rod of Carnamagos). Attached enemy cannot move. Forced - When attached enemy leaves play: Set Virescent Rot aside, out of play.
traits: 法术. 腐烂. 诅咒萦绕

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 洪荒圣歌
text:
作为打出洪荒圣歌的额外费用，花费一个行动。
揭示遭遇牌堆顶部的5张卡牌。对于每张揭示的卡牌，你可以加入1个[curse]标记到混乱袋来将该卡牌放到遭遇牌堆底部。 将剩余卡牌任意顺序返回遭遇牌堆顶部 。
real_text:
As an additional cost to play Antediluvian Hymn, spend an action.
Reveal the top 5 cards of the encounter deck. For each card revealed, you may add 1 [curse] token to the chaos bag to place that card on the bottom of the encounter deck. Return the rest to the top of the encounter deck in any order.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 醉人诱引
text: 投入此卡牌到技能检定的时候，执行的调查员可以忽略这次检定期间将要触发的所有关键词或地点效果。
real_text: While this card is committed to a skill test, the performing investigator may ignore all keyword or location effects that would trigger during this test.
flavor: 幻梦的识海跟任何海洋一般深沉。

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 卡纳玛戈斯的权杖
text: [fast]选择任意地点的一名非[[精英]]敌人并消耗卡纳玛戈斯的权杖：从混乱袋随机抽出5个混乱标记。每抽出1个[curse]标记，你可以在你的绑定卡牌中查找随机1张[[腐烂]]事件，并将其迭加到该敌人。
real_text: [fast] Choose a non-[[Elite]] enemy at any location and exhaust Rod of Carnamagos: Reveal 5 random chaos tokens from the chaos bag. For each [curse] token revealed, you may search your bonded cards for a [[Rot]] event and attach it to that enemy.
traits: 道具. 遗物. 密教. 诅咒萦绕

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 召唤彼方
text:
作为打出召唤彼方的额外费用，加入3个[curse]标记到混乱袋。
选择你控制的一张有"使用(充能)"或"使用(秘密)"的支援卡。补充该支援卡的所有充能或秘密。然后，你可以结算该支援卡上的一个[action]或[fast]能力，无需支付其[action]费用，如果有的话。
real_text:
As an additional cost to play Call the Beyond, add 3 [curse] tokens to the chaos bag.
Choose an asset you control with "uses (charges)" or "uses (secrets)". Replenish all of that asset's charges or secrets. Then, you may resolve an [action] or [fast] ability on that asset without paying its [action] cost, if any.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 飘渺灵体
text: 躲避。将你的[willpower]值加入你这次躲避的技能值。如果你成功，与每名与你交战的其于敌人解除交战，并且本轮接下来的时间里，你视为无形(敌人不能与你交战，并且你不能攻击或对敌人造成伤害)。如果这次躲避期间有抽出符号，当你回合结束时将飘渺灵体返回你的手牌。
real_text: Evade. Add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this evasion attempt. If you succeed, disengage from each other enemy engaged with you, and for the remainder of the round, you are ethereal (enemies cannot engage or be engaged with you, and you cannot attack or deal damage to enemies). If a symbol was revealed during this evasion attempt, return Ethereal Form to your hand at the end of your turn.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 解读秘符
text: 调查。将你的[willpower]值加入你这次调查的技能值。你可以忽略这次调查期间将在你所在地点触发的任意效果或关键词。如果你成功，发现此地点的额外1个线索。如果这次调查期间有抽出符号，当你回合结束时将解读秘符返回你的手牌。
real_text: Investigate. Add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this investigation. You may ignore any effect or keyword on your location which would trigger during this investigation. If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue at this location. If a symbol was revealed during this investigation, return Read the Signs to your hand at the end of your turn.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 幽灵利刃
text: 攻击。将你的[willpower]值加入你这次攻击的技能值。在这次攻击前，你可以立即与被攻击的敌人交战。这次攻击造成+1伤害(如果该敌人非[[精英]]，改为+2伤害)。如果这次攻击期间有抽出符号，当你回合结束时将幽灵利刃返回你的手牌。
real_text: Fight. Add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this attack. Immediately before this attack, you may engage the attacked enemy. This attack deals +1 damage (+2 damage instead if the enemy is non-[[Elite]]). If a symbol was revealed during this attack, return Spectral Razor to your hand at the end of your turn.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 以太织法
text:
作为打出以太织法的额外费用，花费一个行动。
从你的手牌中揭示最多3张不同的[[法术]]事件卡。一次一张，打出每张揭示的事件，其费用减1。结算这些事件的时候，你+2技能值。
real_text:
As an additional cost to play Ethereal Weaving, spend an action.
Reveal up to 3 different [[Spell]] events from your hand. One at a time, play each revealed event, reducing its cost by 1. While resolving each of these events, you get +2 skill value.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 古者封印
text:
快速。在你所在地点，且其中抽出了至少2个[curse]标记或2个[bless]标记的技能检定结束后打出。
如果抽出了2个[curse]标记，在你的绑定卡牌中查找黄铜侍从，并将其放置入场。如果抽出了2个[bless]标记，在你的绑定卡牌中查找门钥守卫并将其放置入场。如果抽出了2个[curse]标记和2个[bless]标记，改为执行两者。将古者封印从游戏中移除。
real_text:
Fast. Play after a skill test at your location ends in which at least 2 [curse] tokens or 2 [bless] tokens were revealed.
If 2 [curse] tokens were revealed, search your bonded cards for 1 copy of Servant of Brass and put it into play. If 2 [bless] tokens were revealed, search your bonded cards for Keeper of the Key and put it into play. If 2 [curse] tokens and 2 [bless] tokens were revealed, do both instead. Remove Seal of the Elders from the game.
traits: 法术. 契约. 祝福. 诅咒萦绕

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 门钥守卫
text: 绑定(古者封印)。 [reaction]在你所在地点的技能检定期间抽出一个[bless]标记时：对门钥守卫造成1点恐惧，并发现你所在地点或连接地点的1个线索。 强制 - 在黄铜侍从将要离场时：将其放在一边，位于场外。
real_text: Bonded (Seal of the Elders). [reaction] When a [bless] token is revealed during a skill test at your location: Deal 1 horror to Keeper of the Key and discover 1 clue at your location or a connecting location. Forced - When Keeper of the Key would leave play: Set it aside, out of play.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 黄铜侍从
text: 绑定(古者封印)。 [reaction]在你所在地点的技能检定期间抽出一个[curse]标记时：对黄铜侍从造成1点伤害，并对你所在地点或连接地点的一名敌人造成2点伤害。 强制 - 在黄铜侍从将要离场时：将其放在一边，位于场外。
real_text: Bonded (Seal of the Elders). [reaction] When a [curse] token is revealed during a skill test at your location: Deal 1 damage to Servant of Brass and 2 damage to an enemy at your location or a connecting location. Forced - When Servant of Brass would leave play: Set it aside, out of play.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 精心策画的诱敌
text:
作为打出精心策画的诱敌的额外费用，花费一个行动。打出精心策画的诱敌不会引起趁乱攻击。
对于你所在地点与连接地点的每名敌人，选择以下一项：
- 如果该敌人非[[精英]]，自动躲避该敌人。
- 对该敌人造成1点伤害。
real_text: As an additional cost to play Elaborate Distraction, spend an action. Playing Elaborate Distraction does not provoke attacks of opportunity. For each enemy at your location and at each connecting location (choose one): - Automatically evade that enemy if it is non-[[Elite]]. - Deal 1 damage to that enemy.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: "恶魔"
text: 强制 - 在你的回合开始时：将你调查员上的1点伤害移动到"恶魔"上。 强制 - 在"恶魔"被击败时：对你所在地点的每名敌人和每位调查员各造成2点伤害。
real_text: Forced - When your turn begins: Move 1 damage from your investigator to "Devil". Forced - When "Devil" is defeated: Deal 2 damage to each enemy and investigator at your location.
traits: 盟友. 生物. 诅咒萦绕
flavor: 我会指引你。

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 消防斧
text: 快速。 [action]：攻击。如果你的资源池里没有资源，这次攻击造成+1伤害。 [free]在使用消防斧攻击期间，花费1资源：这次技能检定中你+2[combat]。(每次攻击限制三次。)
real_text: Fast. [action]: Fight. If you have no resources in your resource pool, this attack deals +1 damage. [free] During an attack using Fire Axe, spend 1 resource: You get +2 [combat] for this skill test. (Limit three times per attack.)
traits: 道具. 武器. 近战

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 狩猎外套
text:
[fast]消耗狩猎外套：选择你手牌中的1张非弱点卡牌，并将其面朝下迭加到狩猎外套(最多迭加3张卡牌)。然后，每有一张迭加的卡牌，获得1资源。
[reaction]在狩猎外套被击败时：抽取每张迭加的卡牌.
real_text:
[fast] Exhaust Hunting Jacket: Choose 1 non-weakness card in your hand and attach it facedown to Hunting Jacket (max 3 cards attached). Then, gain 1 resource for each attached card.
[reaction] When Hunting Jacket is defeated: Draw each attached card.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 水手的罗盘
text: [action]消耗水手的罗盘：调查。如果你失败，准备水手的罗盘。如果你成功且你的资源池里没有资源，发现你所在地点的额外1个线索。 [fast]在使用水手的罗盘调查期间，花费1资源：这次技能检定中你+1[intellect]。(每次调查限制三次。)
real_text: [action] Exhaust Mariner's Compass: Investigate. If you fail, ready Mariner's Compass. If you succeed and have no resources in your resource pool, discover 1 additional clue at your location. [fast] During an investigation using Mariner's Compass, spend 1 resource: You get +1 [intellect] for this skill test. (Limit three times per investigation.)

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 坚守信念
text:
快速。在任何[fast]时间段期间打出。
加入4个[bless]标记到混乱袋。
real_text:
Fast. Play during any [fast] window.
Add 4 [bless] tokens to the chaos bag.
flavor: 行走于信仰之光者无惧黑暗。

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 黑马
text:
永久。每副牌组限制1张。
在补给阶段期间，你可以选择不获得资源。
只要你的资源池里没有资源，你获得+1[willpower]、+1 [intellect]、+1 [combat]和+1 [agility]。
real_text:
Permanent. Limit 1 per deck.
During the upkeep phase, you may choose to not gain resources.
While you have no resources in your resource pool, you get +1 [willpower], +1 [intellect], +1 [combat], and +1 [agility].

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 静候时机
text:
作为打出静候时机的额外费用，花费一个行动。
在你的下回合期间，你可以进行二个额外行动。
real_text:
As an additional cost to play Bide Your Time, spend an action.
During your next turn, you may take two additional actions.
flavor: 距离午夜已经过了半小时，你开始怀疑这一切都是个骗局。

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 黎明之星
text:
快速。在你所在地点的技能检定期间抽出混乱标记后打出。
忽略这次检定期间抽出的每个[curse]标记的修正值。每忽略一个[curse]标记，对你所在地点的一名敌人造成1点伤害。
real_text:
Fast. Play after revealing chaos tokens during a skill test at your location.
Ignore the modifiers of each [curse] token revealed during this test. For each [curse] token ignored, deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.
flavor: 唯有坚强的心灵可以击碎黑暗。

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 破碎头冠
text:
每副牌组限制1张。每位调查员限制1[[面具]]。
[reaction]在你所在地点,同时抽出[bless]和[curse]标记的技能检定结束后：放置1资源在本卡牌上，作为贡品。然后，如果本卡牌上有3贡品，在你的绑定卡牌中查找暮光头冠，并将其与本卡牌交换，将本卡牌上的所有贡品移动到暮光头冠上。
real_text:
Limit 1 per deck. Limit 1 [[Mask]] per investigator.
[reaction] After a skill test at your location ends in which both a [bless] and [curse] token were revealed: Place 1 resource on this card, as an offering. Then, if there are 3 offerings on this card, search your bonded cards for Twilight Diadem and swap it with this card, moving all offerings from this card to Twilight Diadem.
traits: 道具. 守护. 面具

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 暮光头冠
text:
绑定(破碎头冠)。每位调查员限制1[[面具]]。
[reaction]你在技能检定期间抽出一个[bless]或[curse]标记时，花费1贡品并消耗本卡牌：改为将抽出的标记视为[elder_sign]标记，并将其返回混乱袋。然后，如果本卡牌没有贡品，在你的绑定卡牌中查找破碎头冠，并将其与本卡牌交换。
real_text:
Bonded (Broken Diadem). Limit 1 [[Mask]] per investigator.
[reaction] When you reveal either a [bless] or [curse] token during a skill test, spend 1 offering and exhaust this card: Treat the revealed token as an [elder_sign] token instead, returning it to the chaos bag. Then, if this card has no offerings, search your bonded cards for Broken Diadem and swap it with this card.
traits: 道具. 守护. 面具. 祝福

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 手部重创
text: 显现 - 你必须将手部重创放置入你的威胁区域，或受到1点伤害并将其混洗入你的牌堆。除非通过以下[action][action]能力，否则其不能离场。 你获得-1生命值。 [action][action]：丢弃手部重创。
real_text: Revelation - You must either put Maimed Hand into play in your threat area, or take 1 damage and shuffle it into your deck. It cannot leave play except by the [action] [action] ability below. You get -1 health. [action] [action]: Discard Maimed Hand.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 背部重伤
text: 显现 - 你必须将背部重伤放置入你的威胁区域，或受到1点伤害并将其混洗入你的牌堆。除非通过以下[action][action]能力，否则其不能离场。 你获得-1生命值。 [action][action]：丢弃背部重伤。
real_text: Revelation - You must either put Back Injury into play in your threat area, or take 1 damage and shuffle it into your deck. It cannot leave play except by the [action] [action] ability below. You get -1 health. [action] [action]: Discard Back Injury.

pack_name: 铁杉谷盛宴调查员扩充
name: 德兹泰利齐之誓
text: 显现 - 你必须将德兹泰利齐之誓放置入你的威胁区域，或受到1点恐惧并将其混洗入你的牌堆。除非通过以下[action][action]能力，否则其不能离场。 你获得-1神智值。 [action][action]：丢弃德兹泰利齐之誓。
real_text: Revelation - You must either put Vow of Drzytelech into play in your threat area, or take 1 horror and shuffle it into your deck. It cannot leave play except by the [action] [action] ability below. You get -1 sanity. [action] [action]: Discard Vow of Drzytelech.

name: 雷克斯·墨菲
text:
[reaction] 当你将要在你所在地点放置1个线索,或者在混乱袋中加入2个[curse]标记时：改为执行另一项。(这也可以作为启动能力的费用)
[elder_sign] 效果：本次检定抽出的每个[curse]标记+2。本次检定每抽出一个[curse]标记，抽一张牌。
real_text:
[reaction] When you would either place 1 of your clues on your location, or add 2 [curse] tokens to the chaos bag: Do the other instead. (This can still satisfy the cost of an ability.)
[elder_sign] effect: +2 for each [curse] token revealed during this test. Draw 1 card for each [curse] token revealed during this test.

deck_options.error: You cannot have more than 5 Rogue cards.

flavor: "Oh, come on, not <u>again</u>!"
back_text: 卡牌张数: 30. 牌组构建选项: 探求者 ([seeker]) 等级 0-3, [[诅咒萦绕]] 和 [[策略]] 卡牌等级0-4, 中立卡牌等级 0-5, 最多5张流浪者 ([rogue]) 等级0。 牌组构建需求： (不计入卡牌张数): 寻找真相，雷克斯的诅咒, 1张随机基础弱点. 牌组构建限制: 无 [[幸运]] 或 [[祝福]] 卡牌 (除非它们同时具有 [[诅咒萦绕]]).
back_flavor: When disaster strikes, Rex Murphy is usually on hand, suffering the consequences. After spending a day with Rex, even the most hardened skeptic will concede that the man is cursed. Anytime he had a lead on a good story, something would go wrong, like that business in Innsmouth with the photographs that blew out to sea. His terrible fortune has more than once exposed him to gruesome beasts and occult conspiracies. To survive, Rex has developed an inquisitive mind, keeping one step ahead of the next disaster.

name: 寻找真相
text:
雷克斯·墨菲牌组专用。进阶。
雷克斯·墨菲每拥有1个线索(最大为5)，你可以选择一项：
- 抽一张牌。
- 将该线索放置到你所在地点，并将弃牌堆中的任意一张牌返回你的手牌。
real_text:
Rex Murphy deck only. Advanced.
For each clue on Rex Murphy (to a maximum of 5) you may either:
- Draw 1 card.
- Place that clue on your location and return any card from your discard pile to your hand.

name: 雷克斯的诅咒
text: 进阶。 显现 - 将雷克斯的诅咒放置入你的威胁区域。 强制 - 在你将要技能检定成功时：额外抽取1个新标记。如果这个效果导致你检定失败，将雷克斯的诅咒与你的牌堆混洗。(每次检定限制1次。)
real_text: Advanced. Revelation - Put Rex's Curse into play in your threat area. Forced - When you would succeed at a skill test: Reveal an additional chaos token. If this effect causes you to fail the test, shuffle Rex's Curse into your deck. (Limit once per test.)

name: Jenny Barnes
text:
[reaction] After your turn begins: Play a [[Talent]] asset, reducing its cost by 1.
[fast] Discard a [[Talent]] asset you control: Gain resources equal to that asset's printed cost. (Limit 5 resources per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +0. If you succeed, gain 3 resources.
real_text:
[reaction] After your turn begins: Play a [[Talent]] asset, reducing its cost by 1.
[fast] Discard a [[Talent]] asset you control: Gain resources equal to that asset's printed cost. (Limit 5 resources per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +0. If you succeed, gain 3 resources.
flavor: "Oh honey, I'm making this up as I go along."
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Rogue cards ([rogue]) level 0-3, Neutral cards level 0-5, up to 10 other non-permanent [[Talent]] cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Jenny's Twin .45s, Searching for Izzie, 1 random basic weakness.
back_flavor: Jenny Barnes has spent the majority of her young life in pursuit of creature comforts, fine dining, and the latest fashions. That all changed when she received a letter from her sister, Isabelle. In this letter, Isabelle confessed that mysterious forces were aligning against her and that she feared she may fall victim to some paranormal threat. It was the last letter Jenny received from her beloved sister. Jenny has since returned to the States to track down and investigate all occult occurrences she can find. Hardly a wilting flower, she has proven herself a crack shot as well as a fearless and clever investigator of the unknown. Until Isabelle's disappearance is explained, Jenny will never relent in her search.

name: Jenny's Twin .45s
text: Jenny Barnes deck only. Advanced. Uses (X ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage. [reaction] After you defeat an enemy using the above ability, exhaust Jenny's Twin .45s: Gain resources equal to that enemy's printed health.
real_text: Jenny Barnes deck only. Advanced. Uses (X ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage. [reaction] After you defeat an enemy using the above ability, exhaust Jenny's Twin .45s: Gain resources equal to that enemy's printed health.

name: Searching for Izzie
text: Advanced. Revelation - Attach Searching for Izzie to the location farthest from you. Attached location gets +2 shroud. [action] [action]: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering clues, discard Searching for Izzie. Forced - When the game ends, if Searching for Izzie is in play: You suffer 1 mental trauma.
real_text: Advanced. Revelation - Attach Searching for Izzie to the location farthest from you. Attached location gets +2 shroud. [action] [action]: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering clues, discard Searching for Izzie. Forced - When the game ends, if Searching for Izzie is in play: You suffer 1 mental trauma.

name: Father Mateo
text:
[fast] During your turn: Seal a [bless] token on an investigator at your location with no [bless] token sealed on them. (Limit once per round.)
[reaction] When an investigator would reveal a chaos token: Resolve the [bless] token sealed on them instead. Release that token.
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Resolve Father Mateo's [fast] ability, ignoring its limit.
real_text:
[fast] During your turn: Seal a [bless] token on an investigator at your location with no [bless] token sealed on them. (Limit once per round.)
[reaction] When an investigator would reveal a chaos token: Resolve the [bless] token sealed on them instead. Release that token.
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Resolve Father Mateo's [fast] ability, ignoring its limit.
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Mystic cards ([mystic]) level 0-3, [[Blessed]] cards level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, up to 5 other cards with "seal" level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): The Codex of Ages, Serpents of Yig, 1 random basic weakness.
back_flavor: Mateo Castile's life has not been easy since he became a priest. Recent decades in Mexico have been wracked with instability and conflict. Father Mateo struggled to balance his faith with the pragmatic concerns of preaching when the law told him he must not. But this is not what has assaulted Mateo's faith at its core. The nearby murders and kidnappings were not politically motivated, as he had suspected. A gruesome and horrid cult thrives at the heart of the brewing war. How, Mateo wonders, could a kind and loving God allow what he saw that night to exist?

name: The Codex of Ages
text:
Father Mateo deck only. Advanced. Seal ([elder_sign] or up to 3 [bless]).
You get +1 to each of your skills while there is a token sealed here.
[reaction] When an investigator at your location would reveal a chaos token from the chaos bag: That investigator resolves a token sealed here instead, then releases that token. (Limit once per test.)
real_text:
Father Mateo deck only. Advanced. Seal ([elder_sign] or up to 3 [bless]).
You get +1 to each of your skills while there is a token sealed here.
[reaction] When an investigator at your location would reveal a chaos token from the chaos bag: That investigator resolves a token sealed here instead, then releases that token. (Limit once per test.)

name: Serpents of Yig
text: Advanced. Prey - Father Mateo only. Hunter. Revelation - Search the chaos bag and all play areas for the [elder_sign] token and each [bless] token and seal them on Serpents of Yig.
real_text: Advanced. Prey - Father Mateo only. Hunter. Revelation - Search the chaos bag and all play areas for the [elder_sign] token and each [bless] token and seal them on Serpents of Yig.

name: George Barnaby
text:
Your max hand size is equal to the number of facedown cards beneath George Barnaby. (Limit 5 cards.)
You may commit facedown cards beneath George Barnaby to skill tests as if they were in your hand.
[reaction] After you discard a card from your hand: Place it facedown beneath George Barnaby, then draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Draw 1 card.
real_text:
Your max hand size is equal to the number of facedown cards beneath George Barnaby. (Limit 5 cards.)
You may commit facedown cards beneath George Barnaby to skill tests as if they were in your hand.
[reaction] After you discard a card from your hand: Place it facedown beneath George Barnaby, then draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Draw 1 card.
back_text: Deck Size: 35. Deckbuilding Options: Survivor cards ([survivor]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, up to 10 other level 0 Seeker and/or Rogue cards ([seeker]/[rogue]). Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 3 copies of Grim Resolve, Cast Adrift, 1 random basic weakness. Additional Setup: After drawing your opening hand, you may place any number of cards in your hand facedown beneath George Barnaby.
back_flavor: After spending a month in jail at the age of 19, George Barnaby felt compelled to become a lawyer. He found great success and notoriety in his career, and as retirement approached he made plans to sail around the world with his wife Maria. On the eve of his retirement, however, his home was attacked and Maria was murdered by cultists. Now, with a lifetime of wealth and contacts at his back, George has tracked the culprits to the city of Arkham, vowing to bring them to justice for their hideous crimes.

name: Grim Resolve
text:
George Barnaby deck only.
After this skill test resolves, you may swap any number of cards beneath George Barnaby with the same number of non-weakness cards in your hand.
real_text:
George Barnaby deck only.
After this skill test resolves, you may swap any number of cards beneath George Barnaby with the same number of non-weakness cards in your hand.

name: Cast Adrift
text: Revelation - If there are no cards beneath George Barnaby, shuffle Cast Adrift into your deck. Otherwise, discard each card beneath George Barnaby.
real_text: Revelation - If there are no cards beneath George Barnaby, shuffle Cast Adrift into your deck. Otherwise, discard each card beneath George Barnaby.

name: Marion Tavares
text:
You have 1 fewer hand slots.
[reaction] After you play an event during your turn: Draw 1 card. Then, you may play a different event. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Search the top 3 cards of your deck for an event and draw it. Shuffle your deck.
real_text:

text:
[reaction] After you successfully evade an enemy by 2 or more: Discover 1 clue at your location. (Limit once per round.)

real_text:

flavor: "I'm just glad all my dreams have stayed in my head."
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0-5, Rogue cards ([rogue]) level 0-2, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Book of Verse, Dreams of the Flood, 1 random basic weakness.
back_flavor: A Southern transplant raised in New York, Lucius has made quite a name for himself writing dreamy poetry alongside the intellectuals, artists, and musicians of Harlem. What his contemporaries don't know is that the hazy underwater city Lucius describes is inspired not by New York, but by the nightmarish dreams of his missing partner, Rudi. Before he disappeared, Rudi spoke of a cabal of fellow dreamers in Arkham who shared these unsettling visions. Now, Lucius has taken on the role of guest lecturer at Miskatonic University as he searches for his lost lover, and perhaps the source of his own horrifying dreams...

text:
[reaction] When your turn ends, if you sealed, canceled, or ignored 1 or more chaos tokens this round: Play a [[Spell]] or [[Insight]] event from your discard pile. After that event resolves, remove it from the game.
[elder_sign] effect: +2. You may cancel this token and draw another in its place. If you do, draw 1 card.
real_text:
[reaction] When your turn ends, if you sealed, canceled, or ignored 1 or more chaos tokens this round: Play a [[Spell]] or [[Insight]] event from your discard pile. After that event resolves, remove it from the game.

back_text: Deck Size: 35. Deckbuilding Options: Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, [[Insight]] events level 0-3, up to 10 other level 0 Mystic cards ([mystic]). Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Ocula Obscura, Glimpse the Void, 1 random basic weakness.
back_flavor: With degrees in Mathematics and Psychology, Agatha Crane has always placed a premium on evidence-based science. In her youth, she cared little for ghost stories, but mounting evidence has led Agatha to conclude that there is an unmistakable truth to the tales of monsters and magic that permeate Arkham's history. If these things are real, then they must obey consistent rules. As she will explain to anyone who listens for long enough - and as her husband Wilbur has heard many times - this new field of study is called "parapsychology." With tried-and-true scientific methods, Agatha seeks to bridge the gap between the mystic and the rational, between occultism and science.

[reaction] After you spend 1 or more ammo from a [[Firearm]] asset: Gain 1 resource. (Limit once per [[Firearm]] asset per round.)

flavor: "Don't care if it's a god. If it crosses me, it's gonna regret it."
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Rogue cards ([rogue]) level 0-3, Neutral cards level 0-5, cards with [[Firearm]] either as their Trait or in their text box level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): "Viola" Case, Confiscation, 1 random basic weakness.
back_flavor: Michael McGlen was a man of few words. He didn't need to talk much; he had Fast Louis for that. The two of them were O'Bannion's best soldiers, making sure the gang was respected throughout Arkham... until the night the thing in the river dragged Louis off the dock to tear him to pieces beneath the water. Michael thought his bosses would call him crazy when he told them what happened, but the truth was worse: they told him they believed him and to let the matter lie. But Michael can't just let the death of his partner, or the things he saw that night, go unpunished. He's still a man of few words. Now he'll let his gun do the talking.

Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 3 copies of Psychic Sensitivity, 3 copies of Prophecy of the End (shuffled into the encounter deck), 1 random basic weakness.
back_flavor: As a young girl, Gloria was haunted by terrible visions. After years of visiting doctors, she learned to exorcise these visions by writing stories. Her weird and disturbing fiction somehow spoke to the public and made her a bestselling writer. But while visiting Arkham, she had the most powerful vision she's ever experienced. The sky tore open, a monstrous form pouring out of the very air itself. Gloria knew, somehow, that this vision was real, and that it would come to pass unless she did something about it.
